1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bud d+hAd+ha/k+Sha tra gu Na/byu
1b2(dkon brtsegs): na nA ma ma hA yA na smr-i tA/bod skad du/'phags pa 'jomr-i dpal
1b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
1b4(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
2a1(dkon brtsegs): phyug 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan
2a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab ni/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
2a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun tshon po dang /byams pa dang /'jam dpal dang /ngan song sel dang /spyan ras gzigs
2a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dang /mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/thams
2a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/phyir mo ldog pa shi sdug dang thabs gcig
2b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu zhugs s+ho/b+h+yo ba phrag bdun nu rtsag /ma stan+ya /d+ma/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par thugs pa rnams
2b2(dkon brtsegs): mas kyi pyong dri rgyu sbyin dang mi mjed kyi bdUg/ba chang slongapa da /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pal yad dag par
2b3(dkon brtsegs): blugs pa'i tshangs pa pa ni khre nyos stong rlung snang thangs gcig go/'di lta ste sgyu ma yin gyi dbang po zags zangs ris dang /sgyum yin
2b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po stongs can duseMn+d+he m+b+hi dbang skyes rgyan dang /min gyi dbang po phyug rnab dang /l+h+wam min+di m+b+hi nga por
2b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog/lha mi yinA brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs gcig go/klu'i
2b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dga' bo dang /nyo dga' bo dang /klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /klu'i rgyal po rgya mchi dang /klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang gi
3a1(dkon brtsegs): /klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /klu
3a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri bo dang /klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal dang /klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa/klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis
3a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'di lta ste rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang
3a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang /g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dang /gnod
3a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin kum bir dang /'brog gnas dang /khab spu dang /yid bzangs dang /blo gros bzang po dang /dbyibs bzang dang
3a6(dkon brtsegs): kun nas kha dog dang /gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang /de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thab so gcig go
3b1(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za drang lha ma yin
3b2(dkon brtsegs): dang na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang /'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas//
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/rim grore byas nas/mchod cing gsol te/bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang ba dang /na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzi mos cha dang
3b4(dkon brtsegs): snyun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad bzang po mang po bzhiso//yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol/lha bzed bsnams te/dge
3b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thobs gcig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam
3b6(dkon brtsegs): par rol pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /me tog ut+palA dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po ni mngon para'
3b7(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan brgya stong ni bkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po me skyes dga'i khyim du bsod snyos kyi phyar ga sh+yaM te/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rubyu byung
4a1(dkon brtsegs): /de na de'i tshe bac+doMsak+Shi dziSh+Tha bu'i rdzu drul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du gzhag pa'i zhabs gzhag pa de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/
4a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma ni gser/tshu ba ni dngul/ze ba ni bai DUr+ya/snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/pad+ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil
4a3(dkon brtsegs): mo krungs bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do//de nis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas te//
4a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//skye bo rnams la phan pa mdzad pa ded dpon gang /yon gyi gnas
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa//shAkya khyu mchog zlo bzhin bdag nyid tshe//'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs//lha yi gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang //de bzhin rga dang
4a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi las thar 'dod dang //bdud kyi sde rnams 'pham par gang 'dod pa//des ni shAkya seng ge mchid par gyis//'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir//bskal
4a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa//thub po rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'//thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhid//zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang /
4b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang bu mo chud ma rnams dang ni//sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba//kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khyab tu gshogs//lag pa rkang bya mig dang rna ba dang //sna dang yan
4b2(dkon brtsegs): lag dam pa mgo btang ste//kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong phong pa//de ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so//sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing //skyes bu//
4b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa//bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa//zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so//sdug bsngal bying pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas///
4b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing //bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan//tshangs dbyangs de ni di ring grong khyer gshegs//drang srong chen po de yi
4b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni//tshungs med na mkha'i khamos ltar dpag tu med//bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang //spyod pa dang ni rnam par smin pas sbyangs//blo ldan gang gis
4b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi sde bcom zhing //mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes//chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab skor te//chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs//mtsho na rab sum cu rtsa
4b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis brgyan pa'i sku//bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni//snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste//mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thad du song //'dod chags zhe sdang
5a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug spang ba dang //de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa//de ni ston pa'i thad du nyor song la//mchod pa rnams mang mtha' yas myang du m+b+ha//
5a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang //brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing //lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtse dga' ba//de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song //gling bzhi
5a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing //rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang //bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa//sems can mchog la des myur mchod par
5a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis/khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang //mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang //longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa//de
5a5(dkon brtsegs): ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis//gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun//thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te//'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon
5a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis/de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur dang //de nas rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po drug tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis
5a7(dkon brtsegs): bskul nas/skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams me tog dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma'i phur ma thogs/gser dang /
5b1(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/bdug dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan thogs pa/rnga bo che dang /dung dang rdza rnga dang /khar rnga dang /pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /sgra brnyan dang /gling
5b2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang /khar dkrol dang /kim pa dang /na gu la dang /pi lcang thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing /de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
5b3(dkon brtsegs): la byed pas dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
5b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung /lha'i me tog gi
5b5(dkon brtsegs): char yang rab tu bab ste/sems can long ba rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong /sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/sems can smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob/sems
5b6(dkon brtsegs): can yid brel pa rnams ni rtse gcig pa thob/sems can gcer bu rnams ni gos dang /sems can bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed/sems can dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed do//de'i tshe na sems
5b7(dkon brtsegs): can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/zhe sdang gis ma yin/gti mug gis ma yin/phrag dog gis ma yin/ser snas ma yin/khro bas ma yin/nga rgyal gyis ma yin no//
6a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /phran pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
6a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas skyes bu seng ge che//stobs bcu grong khyer nu ma gshegs tshe//dri yi mod la skye bo rnams//bde ba rgya cher dri med 'thob//long bas mig rnams mthong bar gyur//'on pa
6a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i rgyu yod skye//myos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed//yid brel rtse cig de bzhin no//gtsor bu dag ni gos rnyed do//bkres pa dag gis zas thob po//skyes bu gang su dbul po yang //
6a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur//lha rnams bye ba mang po yang //mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod//smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir//me tog char kyang rab tu 'bebs//
6a5(dkon brtsegs): rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung //nyams dga' byed po dpag med pa//sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis//grong khyer 'jug chu sgra yang 'byung //grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te//de tshe
6a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' mnyam par gnas//skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nus//dga' ba shin tu rgya chen 'thob//'dod tshogs kyis ni mi gzir zhing //de tshe khro b+h+yon ser sna med//nga rgyal la sogs
6a7(dkon brtsegs): nyes pas kyang //gzir ba de tshe ma lus med//dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste//mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur//gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po//skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe//
6b1(dkon brtsegs): mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams//ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung //'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas//bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas pa gang //de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni//'gro la pan phyir//
6b2(dkon brtsegs): grong gshegs pa//de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba//rnam pa mang po rab tu dga'//de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang /tshong dpon shing sa la tshon/
6b3(dkon brtsegs): popo lta bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/dga' bar
6b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba/dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa bsdams pa/glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/mtsho
6b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs pa brgyan pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog
6b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to//de sems shin tu dad nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la
6b7(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs
7a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas/byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la
7a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
7a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong /sa bya kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang /yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/de nas bcom ldan
7a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so//phyogs
7a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to//bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
7a6(dkon brtsegs): du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
7a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na myur du blo na med pa yang
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta
7b2(dkon brtsegs): yang yo su 'dzin to//chos gcig po gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na
7b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o//de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang
7b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas/mi dge ba'i las gong yang mi spyod pa'o//ci mi spyod ce na 'dod chags mi spyod/zhe sdang mi spyod/gti mug mi spyod/khyim pa'i rtags la
7b5(dkon brtsegs): sred pa mi spod de/rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang /tshigasu bcad po mi 'dod cing gang rab tu byang ba'i bosgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no//de la rab tu
7b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o//chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang
7b7(dkon brtsegs): zhen/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang /khams dang skye mched dang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so//phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji
8a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar rab tu rtogs she na/phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang /dben pa dang /stong pa dang /dmigs pa med pa dang /mu skyes pa dang /ma 'gags par rab tu
8a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa ste/ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o//gang gi tshe yang dag par rjesu mi mthong /ye shes/rlom semasu mi byed//
8a3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtogs rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe/rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o//gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa
8a4(dkon brtsegs): skye/rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o//da ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongasu mi gtong ngo //de ci'i
8a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/des ji ltar bdag gis//chos de dag yongasu shes par gyur pa de lhor sems can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/rigs kyi
8a6(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
8a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu sbyong /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongasu 'dzin to//bcom ldan 'das kyis
8b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/
8b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid du bar snad la mngon par 'phags so//'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par
8b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//lha dang mer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
8b4(dkon brtsegs): par dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gis tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe bcom
8b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'dra 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ston pa dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /lab rgan dang /shes
8b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /dngul gyi kha dog lci bu rnams byu ste/de dge gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yis ma med pa dang /snang bas khyab par byas nas/skyur log ste/bcom ldan 'as
8b7(dkon brtsegs): la len gisum bsko ba byas nas/btsam ldan 'das kyis dus ni chug tu rngug go//de namatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spyan los langs nis/blu gas phrag pa gcig tu
9a1(dkon brtsegs): gan to/pus myog yas bya'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mau sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la
9a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin//'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la mnga'//khyod ni thams cad mkhyen
9a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig rten grags//ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs//thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen//de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen//de
9a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa//ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs//rab 'bring tha mi'i sems dang ldan pa yi//sems can thams cad kyi ni
9a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mkhyen//tshogs grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin//mi 'dul kha lo bsgyur ba lung bsten gsol//lha rnams byi ba khrag khrig kun lhags te//skyon ma
9a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing //skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyis//thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol//khyod nI ye shes phyi rol phyin//
9a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'//spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa//ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan//bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/chos rnams baH
9b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te//de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis//khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams/
9b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid//skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun//thub pa dang 'dir the tshom myur bcad gsol//de skad ces gsol pA dang /bcom
9b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun
9b4(dkon brtsegs): srid du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dos methong lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso//bcom ldan 'dra
9b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na/bla na med pa
9b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
9b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/kun dga' bo dper
10a1(dkon brtsegs): na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang nyan thos phun sum
10a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu
10a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing dul ba'o dbang phyug de'i spangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas ga
10a4(dkon brtsegs): te mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba dang gshegs nas byon pa dang /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhug so//dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams
10a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang stan ci 'os pa dag lo 'khod do//de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas/bdag nyid lag bdang
10a6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang bca' ba dang /btung ba dang /myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so//
10a7(dkon brtsegs): bstabs te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das lo ras btsas
10b1(dkon brtsegs): bu zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to//sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig/
10b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang /tha
10b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang zhe sdang dang /'chab pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lpags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
10b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las/gnod sems
10b5(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ba dang zhe sdang dang 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//drar 'dzin pa dang /dra yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang /nyes pa mi shes te/de bas na mi
10b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o//gang ngang 'dzin pa dang /dA yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yong su shes pa de la ni shes pa 'am/mi shes pa zhes gdags
10b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so//de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang /gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya
11a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po gang gAr yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med do//gang la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa de
11a2(dkon brtsegs): la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o//shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nges par 'byung
11a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyiraro//gang gi tshe dra bar 'azung ba'i/dra par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhe
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
11a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar
11a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na ni bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag
11a7(dkon brtsegs): par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nA/
11b1(dkon brtsegs): phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa sbyangs te/lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag
11b2(dkon brtsegs): nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs sde//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs
11b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te/byin nas/'di lta ste chos yang dag pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la
11b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang
11b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der ding ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'jam
11b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dge 'jog las langs te/lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yong dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yod
11b7(dkon brtsegs): su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gla la ba der dong ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
12a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdang nas lhan/
12a2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bcom ldan 'das gal po dar dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//byang chub sems dpa'
12a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongasu bskrad cing /mdun du bdar nas ldan
12a4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//rgyal po ma skyes
12a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra yang dpung gis tshogs yan lag bzhis yongasu bskor cing /mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das
12a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang
12a7(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du me ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nos/bcom ldan
12b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang
12b2(dkon brtsegs): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyang ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
12b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
12b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/yongasu zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang
12b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu 'grub pa de la brtsams te/ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
12b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid/
12b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /nyon mongs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu sbyong bar
13a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang /smon lam yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /shes rab yong su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
13a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste byang chub sems
13a3(dkon brtsegs): dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can dpag tu mo mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos lags par
13a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa gang rnams bcom ldan 'das
13a5(dkon brtsegs): las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te/de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan
13a6(dkon brtsegs): tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis
13a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas nas/phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re re raM yang 'od zer bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong mang po bgyi la/'od
13b1(dkon brtsegs): zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing /de dag
13b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis monan nas phyir mig gi dbang po li snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/klu dang gnod sbyin dang /nor bu dang /
13b3(dkon brtsegs): glog dang /me dang /skar ma'i gzugs dang /sems can gzhan gyi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang /gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthu' yas ma
13b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khor yug dang /khor yug chen po dang /gtang bzung dang /btang bzung chen po dang /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /de ma yin pa bzhin ri'i rgyal po
13b5(dkon brtsegs): nag po dag dang /rtsig pa dang /shing dang /nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o//snyam du dgongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas/gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang /gsung gsal
13b7(dkon brtsegs): bo'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to//yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sang/
14a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma skyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
14a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba de lhar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
14a3(dkon brtsegs): na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongasu gang ngo ///
14a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do//sangs
14a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya zhe na/
14a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing chos ston pa'i
14a7(dkon brtsegs): spyon snga na/shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags te lus mi snang bar gang 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje
14b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi gzud kyi chos ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs
14b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang med kyi/bI shod pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te/gzugs yongasu grub pa yang mi snang ngo //sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no//gzu
14b3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo//de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob skye/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b4(dkon brtsegs): de chos 'phags shes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gsung gasngal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/mthong zhing thos nas
14b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig
14b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
14b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing de sung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di lta
15a1(dkon brtsegs): thun ston chad ma mthong ngo //de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sa //
15a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags le 'di skad ces bku' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub
15a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
15a4(dkon brtsegs): po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes s+ho//de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyags bcu'i 'jig rten
15a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /'di lta ste chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad
15a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'od zor 'di dag btang ste gsung gsal ba'i sgra byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
15a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdeg 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das ngo bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom
15b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang blta ba
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos de yang nyan du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes ni song zhig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
15b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpe' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu stobs po ches lag pa smra
15b4(dkon brtsegs): pa las brkyang ba dang /brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/'jig rten gyi khams mi
15b5(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir gnas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyi rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs
15b6(dkon brtsegs): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
15b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur te//sil spyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo //'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang /rgyal mtsho
16a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to//spros mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs
16a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'bru na pa ni lta bu bstan nas/byang chub sems
16a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug
16a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lanA gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
16a5(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig ga d+hA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi kham
16a6(dkon brtsegs): rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs
16a7(dkon brtsegs): ti 'tsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongasu bskor cing chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing don nyan thos dong rang sangs rgyas rnams
16b1(dkon brtsegs): med do//yang sangs rgyas kyis zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir
16b2(dkon brtsegs): lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nA
16b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed log gis byugs nas/lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //chos rin po che'i sgra dang
16b4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
16b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //de dag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
16b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin pa ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gsung gsal po'i sku
16b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang thos te/mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
17a1(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
17a2(dkon brtsegs): na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du
17a3(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang phyogasu sa d+ya kyi ni
17a4(dkon brtsegs): sa byas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
17a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa des gar bcom ldanas
17a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /'di lta ste dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa'i phyir ba spu'i khong bu thams cad nA
17a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo //yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
17b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom
17b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das pa dag 'jig rten gyi
17b3(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur
17b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod der
17b5(dkon brtsegs): song ste ci rung /de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phred pas na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o///
17b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la
17b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bcom
18a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongasu 'dzin/bcom ldan 'das des bka'
18a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par
18a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
18a4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
18a5(dkon brtsegs): na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba
18a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du mchi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongasu bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das de
18a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung bar dka'o//de mthong
18b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yang rnyed par dka'o//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bya khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrim pa
18b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/smras par gyur ta re/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni brnyan par dka' ba'o//de na sems can gzhan de
18b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba dag go/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sred
18b4(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang rje su chags pa dang /khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smras par 'gyur gyi//
18b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjesu chags pa'ang ma mchis/khong khro ba yang ma mchis na bdag ci'i slad du smras par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams
18b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing spyos te/brdegs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/sems can gang la'ang gnod par
18b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i sems mi bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
19a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag khyod las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di
19a2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der dang shig/bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i
19a3(dkon brtsegs): na nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpo' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa
19a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mtsho'o zhes gsol to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na/
19a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar
19a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
19a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing /sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
19b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bzang/
19b2(dkon brtsegs): ba byung ba dang /btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang /de bzhin du bzhon pa dang /gos dang /gser dang dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /mu tig dang /dung dang /man shel dang
19b3(dkon brtsegs): byi ru dang /su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de de ga gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par
19b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang /de nas sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang /sems can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar
19b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po
19b6(dkon brtsegs): lag na rin po ches/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga
19b7(dkon brtsegs): la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i
20a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya
20a2(dkon brtsegs): stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsi gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar
20a3(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai DUr+ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
20a4(dkon brtsegs): de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par bzhag pa med de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs gang ngo //yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang
20a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung /'ong yang rung /'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung /ldang yang rung /'chag kyang rung ste/de dag gis bai DUr+ya'i sa chen po de las
20a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo //'di lta ste dper na/shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyis shin gyi ni snang ba de bzhin du byang chub
20a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gis bai DUr+ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo //mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de ying de dag la lung ston to//
20b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo//'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che
20b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po mngon par grub ste/nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri na me tog kha zum pa dang /me tog kha bye
20b3(dkon brtsegs): ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa yang med/nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do//yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po
20b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros shes bya ba zhig gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon
20b5(dkon brtsegs): lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong //gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs
20b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po dag la ba der sing ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug gi/phyogs gcig tu 'jug nas byang chub sa
20b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
21a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan
21a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga d+hA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye me
21a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya
21a4(dkon brtsegs): bapa de ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshod med pa dag rje
21a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /'di lta ste chos bsgrag pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'dra rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal po'i sgra byung ngo //de skad ces bka
21a6(dkon brtsegs): stsol pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi
21a7(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed dor bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /
21b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs
21b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi
21b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongasu bskor cing /mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
21b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir gnas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de
21b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoms yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par
21b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshi ni rje'i 'jig rten du/
21b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang
22a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang /sems can gang dag bkres pa dang /skom pas nyen pa yid btags dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de
22a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing bde ba mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ba 'di lto ste dper na dge slong bsam gtan
22a3(dkon brtsegs): la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang dge 'dod chags snyam
22a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang ngam/giti mug gam/khro ba 'am/nga rgyal lam/'chab pa 'am/'tshig pa 'am/phrag dog gam/sor sna 'am/g.yo ba 'am/tha ba 'am/gnod sems kyis gzi
22a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang /'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /phan tshun dub mar
22a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam
22a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan
22b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do///bam po gnyis pa/
22b3(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya
22b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhes la chos kyang ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go/sangs
22b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na/bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon zhing skyil mo krung bcas par
22b7(dkon brtsegs): brdzus te 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to//de
23a1(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems
23a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bslab pa yongasu rdzogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/sems mi g.yeng ba/gtong ba rdza su gtong po/stong pa nyid kyi rjes
23a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa/mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par bsgrub pa/smon lam med pa tshol ba/rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/phung po dang khams dang skye mched rab tu rtogs
23a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la mngon par dad pa/chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa de dag la yong su rtog po med pa/rtog pa yang
23a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o//yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan
23a6(dkon brtsegs): pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
23a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong na de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po
23b1(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa gA la ba der song ste phyin//
23b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
23b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyalo 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces
23b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang legs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
23b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA li'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des/rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
23b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri suM stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de lta yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs rgyas shAHthub pa das gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang 'di lta tshas
24a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra byung ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i srid du 'jig rten gyi kham
24a3(dkon brtsegs): de mi mdzad ces bgyi/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags le mi mjed/zhe sdang la mi mjed/
24a4(dkon brtsegs): mug la mi mdzad/sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can dri dag la la smras
24a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi snyan par brjod pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /bA rdags pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/de bzhin
24a6(dkon brtsegs): du zhe sdang gi sems dang /gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang sngon tan 'di dag
24a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ni cung ngo //rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang tha ba dang zhe sdang mang ste/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis kun
24b1(dkon brtsegs): dkris so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi mdzad ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bAb+hA po//gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni de yang rung na/bcom ldan
24b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mdzad ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po//bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
24b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas pa/bzod pa dong dul ba dang /nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spyos bsdigs mtshon gyis btab kyang /ji
24b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam mi mjed de 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so//rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed
24b6(dkon brtsegs): ces brjod do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de ni sems can kha cig sdig po'i chos dang ldan pa/mu cor smra ba/khro ba gtum pa/sems
24b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mi gus pa/phrag dog la mngon par
25a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems can de dag gis de tsam du spros shing smad de/gnod par byas shing bskur kyang /bcom ldan 'dra de snying rje che bas bzod cing /dang du lan
25a2(dkon brtsegs): te sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rje su chags pa dang /khong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed de/bsti sbyang du ma byis kyang 'dud par mi byed de/de spyos
25a3(dkon brtsegs): shing brgyad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/gnod par mi 'gyur/mi 'phrogs mi tshogs mi skyo ste/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
25a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung po de la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i skar mo brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di/
25a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam smad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnye do//
25a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang dang shor gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong
25a7(dkon brtsegs): gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar
25b1(dkon brtsegs): /yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no//'di lta ste dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par bzhugs/
25b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no//yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis rgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya skyong du tshangs par
25b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa spad pa bas ni/gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol togs pa tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/do bas 'di bsod nams
25b4(dkon brtsegs): chos mang du bskyed na/gang nyin mtshan du yongasu dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de
25b5(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/
25b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang
25b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par
26a1(dkon brtsegs): shes na song shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su/
26a2(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod 'dir gnas s+ho//de nas byang chub sems
26a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa skur mo brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
26a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas/de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs
26a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu bab/sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/mu tig gi rgyan phreng ba
26a6(dkon brtsegs): stong yang mngon par 'phyang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan brgya snying mngon par 'phyang ba dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khri 'dus pa dge
26a7(dkon brtsegs): slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod skyon dang /dri za dang snyam yon dang /namakhye' lding dang /mi'amatsi dang /
26b1(dkon brtsegs): ma masaH/\u0f7fsa samasamasananathas rba taHSha sa /a
26b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gis lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
26b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu
26b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
26b5(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa ga la ba dar dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byas nas/smon lam ji
26b6(dkon brtsegs): lte ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrog khrig brgya stong tshad med
26b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gas da kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/rang rong gi de bzhin
26b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la yongasu zhus te/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
27a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyupar gas pa'i'o snangs rnas shwASh+Thathub pa'i zhas la mag byas phyug 'tshal tAM/tsum ldan 'das la lan gsum bskung ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do//gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lho dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /
27a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang /de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/de dag
27a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de
27a5(dkon brtsegs): dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas ba
27a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa ji
27a7(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag nas/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi///
27b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing /khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog
27b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /chu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongasu grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/so so nas mthong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
27b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir
27b4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang /bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
27b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho chen po de mthong nas/sbyin las langs te bla gos
27b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mau g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
27b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo//'jig rten lhur bcas 'dir ni lam me ste//thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyi'o//
28a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod pasam yis//phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa//chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags shing //bcom ldan
28a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la kun kyang gus bcas nas//smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs//phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa//tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo/
28a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis//seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes te//nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal//lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa//dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge slong ma//
28a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis//bcom ldan pan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol//khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang //da ltar yang ni shin tu nges
28a5(dkon brtsegs): par mkhyen//lus can mos po ji bzhin khyod gzigs la//the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol//thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na//zhing rnams dag pa rdul
28a6(dkon brtsegs): med 'thob par 'gyur//ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba//de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol//ji ltar ser sna'i dri mos mi gos shing //ji ltar tshul khrims
28a7(dkon brtsegs): ma nyams 'gyur ba dang //bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang //brnyas pa dge kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod//sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi//'jig rten dag gi
28b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bzlog slad du//bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams//ji ltar brtson 'grus tsom shing spyod par 'gyur//rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing //bsam gtan /
28b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste//pad+ma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar//ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur//thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing //mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i
28b3(dkon brtsegs): blo ldan 'gyur//brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas//byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
28b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
28b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jog pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
28b6(dkon brtsegs): po byams po 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdog gdan bting du bcug ste//nas brtan kun dga' bo dang /maut+pal gyi bu chen po
28b7(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding du bcug pa las na/gtam 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan
29a1(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta/
29a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
29a3(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpog tshad bzhi 'bum pa/rin po che du mas spros pa/lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/shing bal 'dzom zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas/
29a4(dkon brtsegs): khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma de las bzhengs nas/seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs
29a5(dkon brtsegs): so//bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
29a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/
29a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang /sems can la snying rje ba dang /brtson 'grus tsom pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/
29b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu tshos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldanan byang chub sems
29b2(dkon brtsegs): dpe' sems dpa' chen po smon lame las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro//chos gcig po gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
29b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon
29b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces gol te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
29b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams
29b6(dkon brtsegs): cod du 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung gong ni mi za bar khyim gyi gnos nas 'byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste khyim gyi
29b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon por dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon//
30a1(dkon brtsegs): tan bcu yongasu 'dzin to//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /sangs
30a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang /de chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo la srid par mi 'gyur ba dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang /bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos
30a3(dkon brtsegs): la brten pa dang /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongasu mi nyams pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang /de la lha rnams dga' ba dang /de la mi ma yin/
30a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i/
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang //sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pas/rgyun tu rab tu 'byung ba
30a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o//shA ri'i bu chos gcig po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum
30a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yang yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
30b1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i
30b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam la mi dga'/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi bstan/nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/gzhan yang nyan thos kyi
30b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang /gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par
30b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o//shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu
30b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin to//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste nyan thos dang ring sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun
30b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rnyed pa dang /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongasu sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang /'di lta
30b7(dkon brtsegs): ste de brgya byin nyid dam/tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang /mir gyur na yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /sangs
31a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams kyi phung po
31a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa yongasu 'dzin pa'o//shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
31a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pas/gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
31a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do//shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes
31a5(dkon brtsegs): pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang ring sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung
31a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la rab tu/
31a7(dkon brtsegs): 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongasu 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing //
31b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam la mi nyams shing
31b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin te/gsum gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa
31b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o//shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
31b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/bcu gang zhe na/gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang /mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang /mi 'jigs par kha
31b5(dkon brtsegs): zas za ba dang /mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang /mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang /mi 'jigs
31b6(dkon brtsegs): par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang /mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjesu ston pa dang /mi 'jigs par gos dang zas dang mal cha dang /na
31b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad la spyod pa dang /des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa
32a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag 'thob po//shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs 'dzin te/bcu
32a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/de shes kyis khe mi 'dod pa yin/de grogs pa mi 'dod pa yin/de khyim yongasu mi 'dzin pa yin/de khyim la/
32a3(dkon brtsegs): sder sna med pa yin/de ges dang zas dang mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa
32a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa yin/de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa
32a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongasu 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu dgan
32a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongasu 'dzin to//bcu gang zhe na/gang 'di 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang /rab tu
32a7(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la brten pa dang /de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang /de'i lus bde/
32b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mo 'bral ba dang /de'i tshangs par spyod pa b.rang chad du mi 'gyur ba dang /tshogs chung ngus ting 'dzin 'thob pa dang /des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang /
32b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su
32b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu
32b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yong su 'dzin
32b5(dkon brtsegs): te/bzhi gang the na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra ba yinaji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/dr-i t+yal tshar bcud
32b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dag dang ser sna yongasu spangs pa yin/pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' bo yin no//shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra bo'i byang chub sem
32b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i phan yon te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta spyo de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri dang 'byung ba dang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yangasu dag par 'gyur ba dang /
