33a1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'a khrul ba myed par gyu ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsung dran du mtshogs pa yong su 'dzin ste//
33a2(dkon brtsegs): bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon yin no//shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/bzhi
33a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par slong ba ste/'di lta ste rnga mo dang /ba lang dang /bong bu dang /rta'i skye gnas dang /de bzhin du gzhan smad par skyong po rnam
33a4(dkon brtsegs): par spong ba dang /mi smad bar 'gyur ba dang /gzhan phyir rgol ba dang /mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /lce dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyog bya ba
33a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no//shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongasu spangs pa'i
33a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang /mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang //
33a7(dkon brtsegs): do tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang /de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag
33b1(dkon brtsegs): nidrigadog drang ser sna yongasu spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no//shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon
33b2(dkon brtsegs): te/bzhi gang zhi na/'di lta ste bdag gis sems can 'di dag gzung ste bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag la bde bar sbyor bar bya ba yin na/sems
33b3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag na rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang /de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang rkun po dang /me dang chu la sogs pa
33b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang /gang gi tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /g.yog 'khor phun sum chags pa dang /longs
33b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe/de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur ba na/sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/de longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po la
33b6(dkon brtsegs): sems 'jug pa ste/shA ri'i bu bzhi po de drug ni pha rol 'byor bra lnga dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no//shA rI'i bu chos bzhi po dri dag dang ldan na byang
33b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' smon lama~M las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos
34a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin
34a2(dkon brtsegs): cing /yongasu sbyong ste lde gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya
34a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongasu bsgrubs pa de kun 'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin
34a4(dkon brtsegs): dun no tan byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing /de tshul khrims yongs dag par
34a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/de tshul khrims yongasu dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/de der skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa la sems shing rtog
34a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'am/byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin
34a7(dkon brtsegs): to/des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/de bzhini gshegs pa'i tha~Md du song nas/bcom ldan 'das byang
34b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs 'dzin ces kun tu zhus nas/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i
34b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mkhyen te/gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing /yang dag par rab tu
34b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chad de/des de thos nas de bzhin du nAn tan byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing /bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/
34b4(dkon brtsegs): de mi shes pa yongasu sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongasu spong ngo //de la ye shes ni gang /bye ba ni gang zhe na/ye shes shes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye
34b5(dkon brtsegs): shes te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o//bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tron byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
34b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/de lo rgyu ni gang /'byung ba ni gang zhe na/rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid
34b7(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o//de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/de la tshul bzhin/
35a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba gang zhe na/gang 'di chos thams cad yid la byed pa skye/'byung ba yang de nyid yin no//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems
35a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so//de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gang /zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gong zhe na/sangs
35a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo//gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing /ji ltar chos gang yang mi
35a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ltar shes pa skye/shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu
35a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de lta bu yong su 'dzin cing yongasu sbyong ngo //shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
35a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su 'dzin te/drug gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang
35a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongasu gtang yang zhum par mi
35b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing /yid dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs bya dang /yid bde bya bskyed nas 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par snron pa//
35b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang /theg pa chen po dang /bya ba chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
35b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go/des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/des rang gi lus dang srog yongasu gtang yang yid
35b4(dkon brtsegs): mo 'di bar mi 'gyur na/gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang /chung ma dang /bu pho dang bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems gang thams cad mkhyen pa /
35b5(dkon brtsegs): byA 'i tshig 'di'i bstan ji lta bu zhe na/shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa skyed cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su
35b6(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba yin te/de'i phyir dri byang chub thob pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yangang+ge 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i khyim par gyur pa yang rung /
35b7(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba yang rung ste/tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o//gang tshul khrims kyi sdom
36a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ste/
36a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing /mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/de tshangs par spyod cing
36a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do//de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro//chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro//yong
36a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o//bzod pa skyes pa ni lta ba drang por 'gyur ro//lta ba drang po ni yang dag par nan tan byed par
36a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//yang dag bya'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur
36a6(dkon brtsegs): ro//skrag pas 'byung ba tsholo//'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/bdag gis
36a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la/nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med snyam no//de de ltar so sor rtog pa ni snying rje chen po
36b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo//de cher snying rdzobs thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub
36b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no//des spyos brgyad/brdegs bsdigs kyang
36b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bsgrub ste/pha rol la mi 'khrug gnod par mi sems so//de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis rI rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs
36b4(dkon brtsegs): shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang /bdag gi gnod sems dang tho ba dang /zhe sdang gis sems bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sim+ba/
36b5(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni ma bslabs pa/bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la slob par 'dod pa'o snyam nas/de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis smyos pa dang /
36b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa dang /brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po bskyed de/bdag gris sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o//bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha
36b7(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas/bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te/bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yong su thar por bya'i/bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang //
37a1(dkon brtsegs): zab dang zhe sdang gi sems bsgred ba nI mi byA'o snyam mo//de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pasgyu/phun sum tshogs pa brgya'o ba ste/ban+d+ha gang /
37a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/gang 'di la rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs
37a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang chos nyan po phun sum tshogs pa dang /chos lanan tan byed
37a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang /shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang /mthong nas kyang dad po thob pa ste/shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go tsho bgo/
37a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob po//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir
37a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus parnams shing yi dam la brtan pa yin no//de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/gal te bdag gosde sems can ra re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i brnam
37a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang /spyod pa 'di dang /sems zhi ba 'di dang /yi dam 'od dang /dge ba'i bsam pa
37b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang /snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor par byas te/'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongasu mi
37b2(dkon brtsegs): gtong ngo snyam nas/brtson 'grus rtsom mo//yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna
37b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyis yongasu gang bar byas te/sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la

37b5(dkon brtsegs): srom tshogs pa/snying rje chen po la gnas pos 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed ni/de de bas bstod nams ches mang du bskyed do//shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bAbarnams pa'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/bcu gang zhe na/des 'di lta ste des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs po yin/des sangs rgyas
37b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yongasasu bzung ba yin/des 'khor ba la nye bar 'du shes bskyed pa yin/des snying rje chen po yongasu bzung ba yin//sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur po yin
38a1(dkon brtsegs): nad nyung ba yin/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/'dod chags dang na
38a2(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang gti mug chung ba yin/ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa yin te/shA ri'i bu brtson/

38a5(dkon brtsegs): nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa'i rje su 'gro bar bya na sems g.yengs pa dang brjed ngas pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/

38a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang /grogs po dang /gla mi dang khyim la sred pa thams cad yongasu btang ste/sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can
38b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bdag gis yongasu mi btang ngo snyam nas/dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing dgon pa rab tu dgon pa drug tu
38b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du chod med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
38b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do//byams pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro//yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim

39a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan lnga bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no//shA rI'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mkhas pa
39a4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas 'byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing /de 'di snyam du sems te/shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste/
39a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas/de shes rab la slob ste/gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas dang /

39a7(dkon brtsegs): de/gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung ba mo yin/'dod chag sa dang bral bar ma yin/'gog par ma yin/zhi bar ma yin//mngon par shes par mo
39b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/dge sbyong ma yin/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur

39b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/de sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa 'dzin te/shA ri'i bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan
39b6(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams la/'jig rten thams cad
39b7(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan
40a1(dkon brtsegs): na/byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong //bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdog pa thad/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gtong zhing /sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang /tshul khrims kyang skyon med la tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang /bzod cing des la soni de yang mi dmigs pa
40a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la lus dang ngag dang sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang /bsam+ban yang yongasu sgrub la/de yang mi gnas pa'i bsamun pa bsamun pa dang /shes rab kyang

40b6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi

41a2(dkon brtsegs): na sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yi dwags kyi yul med cing bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dang /bgo ba phun sum tshogs
41a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med pa gyur te/nga'i bi med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de

41a7(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug ste/yid du 'ong ba dang mdzes pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'ang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /rin po ches

41b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

41b6(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/yid du 'ong ba'i sgyu shu stag thos par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba yongasu mi tshol zhing gan

42a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blangs shing bsgrub ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing go/
42a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i

42a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi brjod cing /gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyis theg pa'i gtam sho stag brjod de/de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs

43b1(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur bar mdor bstan to//shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

44a6(dkon brtsegs): stong so so'i stan las langs te/thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
44a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o//nan tan gyis yongasu sgrub par bgyi'o//bag mchis par gnas par bgyir/smon ma
44b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//ji ltar bsams pa'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du byang
44b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzub pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus 'di skad
44b3(dkon brtsegs): cis gsol te//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad sang+ge'i
44b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra sgrogs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di dag
44b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas/bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pade rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu dper na seng ge
44b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du/dri bzhin gshegs pa de dag smon lam bkod pa zhes bya
44b7(dkon brtsegs): bau sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
45a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar
45a2(dkon brtsegs): lhag tshad med dar 'gyur te/tshe'i nAd ni ma gtogs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad co tsam zhig tu 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis
45a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i
45a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa stan las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
45a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
45a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags na/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yun ji
45a7(dkon brtsegs): srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya//de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/de skad ces gsol
45b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
45b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song gi'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal
45b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur//
45b4(dkon brtsegs): 'angapa dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo la dzaM khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong dag par zhugs sam/'on te mo zhugs shes
45b5(dkon brtsegs): de dris shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyan//kho bo yang dag par zhugs
45b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/smras pa/'jam dpal khyod sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
45b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe no//sems can dmigasu med pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos
46a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can zhig dmigs na ni de'i phyir kho bo yang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can yang/
46a2(dkon brtsegs): med/srog kyang med/gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do//ldog pa med do//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma zhugs sam/
46a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//de ni'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/chos gang zag pa med cing khongs
46a4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa med lnga/mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgya su zhugs pa yin te/chos thams cad kyang sangs rgya su zhugs pa de dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas
46a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do//rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skye du khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam zhes smras pa de khyod nyid la dIs/
46a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs byang chub tu smon tam/'oni te gzugs kyi rang bzhin
46a7(dkon brtsegs): nam/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu
46b1(dkon brtsegs): sbrospron/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dmau/gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya smras pa/'dzi
46b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ni ma yin te/gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do//gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang /gzugs kyi
46b4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang /gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang /gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang chub tu smin pa med do//gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/gzu
46b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
46b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon tam/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rnam par shes
46b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni
47a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi
47a2(dkon brtsegs): bar du'ang byang chub tu smon pa med do//rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub
47a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam sems/phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag gam/bdag gi zhes bya bar gdogs par
47a4(dkon brtsegs): nus sam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin no//smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar yin na/byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod/byang chub mngon par rdzogs
47a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang zhig yod/smras pa/'jam dpal khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du gyur pa/tshad mar gyur pa
47a6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do//kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/bstan pa de thos pas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnam skrag lnga gyuro//
47a7(dkon brtsegs): da la kyi zlos pa/shA kye bre chos thaMd ni blag pa med pa ste/ba dag bI mtha 'a di rlan pa med do//skrag par med par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston te//gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro//
47b1(dkon brtsegs): gang skyo bar gyur pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro//gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol lo//gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcings pa med par 'gyur
47b2(dkon brtsegs): ro//gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro//gang chags pa med pa de ni 'gro ba med do//gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do//gang 'ong ba med pa de ni
47b3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med do//gang smon pa med pa de ni smon lam 'debs pa med do//gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni ldog pa med do//gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog pa
47b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ci las phyir ldog ce na/bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /srog tu 'dzin pa dang /gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /chad par 'dzin
47b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rtag par 'dzin pa da /mtshan mar 'dzin po la sa phyir ldog go/rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog pa/nam phyir ldog pa de ni de'i tshe 'gyur ba med pas
47b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog ste/gang las phyir mi ldog ce na/stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go/mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /sangs
47b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog go//de la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso//longs
48a1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so//dmigs pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso//len pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso//dor
48a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso//rgyu ba med pa dang /rnam par rig pa med pa dang ming tsam du zad pa dang /stong pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /ma 'gags pa dang //
48a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /rdul med pa dang /rdul dang bral ba dang bdag gi ba med pa
48a4(dkon brtsegs): drang /yid la bya ba med pa dang /mI ldan pa med pa dang /zad pa med pa dang /blangs pa med pa dang /mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so///
48a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag la gang las 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
48a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnamaso zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i gnas mi dmig so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gong gis bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs par gyur pa de
48a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni myur du bla na mod pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par
48b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyuraro//smras pa/'jam dpal ji las bsams shing de skad du ston/smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur
48b2(dkon brtsegs): te glang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pas/de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan
48b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed du skyes par gyur pa de snyed mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi bskyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing
48b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed do/byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do//gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe ci'ang mngon par rdzogs
48b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya ba med do//ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do//
48b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/na mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya'am/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin no//'jam dpal gyis
48b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/smras pa/'jam dpal de de bzhin no//'jam dpal gyi sgras pa/rigs
49a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de lta bas na na mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/byang chub ji lta bar na mkha' yang de bzhin te/na mkha' dang byang chub de ni gnyis
49a2(dkon brtsegs): med de/gnyisu byar med do//gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni cung zod kyang shes pa med la/des ma shes pa'ang gang yang med do//bstan pa
49a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//lha dang mi khri bzhi stong chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral
49a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
49a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song ge'i rtsol gyis/
49a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang drag par rdzo
49a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu kha rog ches rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma bzhug/rigs kyi bu gang la
49b1(dkon brtsegs): la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bdag gis byang chub kyi phyi spyad par bya'o zhes zer na/de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/rigs kyi
49b2(dkon brtsegs): bu bdag gis ni sems gang byang chub tu bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag por rjesu ma mthong ste/de ltar bdag gis sems de yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas byang
49b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu'ang sems ma bskyedado//smras pa/'jam dpal rjesu mthong zhes bya ba'i chog de'i dron gang yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pas/rigs kyi bu yang dag par rje su mi
49b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan to//smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/smras pa/rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad
49b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ste/mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas re gcig tu brjod cing /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang //
49b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba med pa dang /chad pa med pa dang rtag pa med pa dang /mi skye ba med pa dang /mi 'gag pa dang /nga'i ba med pa dang /yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang //
49b7(dkon brtsegs): dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing /mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o//rigs
50a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams la tha dad par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo //gcig tu
50a2(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par rjes mi mthong po 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do//mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o//mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni
50a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod ma nas dag pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces
50a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpel gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni yid srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes
50a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar mi ston te/'khor 'di dag ni nyen par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i do ni zab
50a6(dkon brtsegs): mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/de yang ci tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du zab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/des byang chub
50a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems mi dmigs pas/ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya bar mi ston na/rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring
50b1(dkon brtsegs): po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs
50b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol/de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
50b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/
50b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga d+ha'i
50b5(dkon brtsegs): klung bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
50b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bru go sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/byang
50b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de nyis 'gyur te/de'i tshe rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan
51a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byung ste/rigs kyi bu rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang /chung ma dang gnyen 'dab dang /'khor du bcas pa las gzhan med cing
51a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs nyon thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de lo brgyad khri bzhi///
51a3(dkon brtsegs): stong gi bar du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dong gzhan dag dang /na bza' sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /pho brang khong pa brtsen
51a4(dkon brtsegs): paM gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /rim gro kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /bde bar sbar ba thams cad kyis rim gro byas par gyur to///
51a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnas shing gnyisu med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par
51a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyi 'dus byas na/da ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongasu bsngo/
51a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o snyam nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/dge bo'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo 'am/tshangs par bsngo 'am/'khor los bsgyur bar bsngo 'am/nyan/
51b1(dkon brtsegs): thos su bsngo 'am/rang sangs rgyasu bsngo 'am/gang du bsngo snyam pa dang /rigs kyi bu rgyal po de sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrag pa//
51b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma bskyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/khyod kyi bsod nams kyi phung po yongs pa byas kyis/rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag
51b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig ces byas pa dang /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te/des
51b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bsam so//bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongasu shes te/sgra bsgragaso snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de
51b5(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po na mkha' de srog chags byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cus yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i
51b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
51b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de logasu thal
52a1(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu//skyes bu dam pa mchog skye bar//rnam pa/
52a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'gyur ba de//rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsung //rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum+b+ha du//mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang //ma ngos sems kyis
52a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid gyur gyis//gang yang yongasu bsnga ma bgyis//bdag ni gcig pu dpon gnas tshe//'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur//bdag gis bsod nams che
52a4(dkon brtsegs): bsregs na//ji ltar yongasu de bsngo snyam//tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam//gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par rom//'on te nyan thos dngos por 'am//rang
52a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam//de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag/lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni//dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di//rnam par chud gson ma
52a6(dkon brtsegs): byed cig/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis//byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing /'jig rten rnams kyi don kyang gyis//de//
52a7(dkon brtsegs): bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso//rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste//thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na//rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur//ye shes de ni gang
52b1(dkon brtsegs): gis 'thob//de don bdag la bstan du gsol//byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing //thub pa khyod 'dra ba dag kyang smon//de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas//de bzhin
52b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bka' stsal pa//rgyal po chen pos shes par gyis//rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya//chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te//'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu
52b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas//gang gis smon lam ci btab pa//de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//rgyal po des kyang sngan chad ni//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur//sems can kun
52b4(dkon brtsegs): la phan don du//ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab//smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du//ngas ni 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//byang chub dam pa ngas thos pas//nga yi bsam pa
52b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par gyur//rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la//mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis//gal te skyed pa spyang byas na//khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur//thub pa'i
52b6(dkon brtsegs): drasung de thos gyur nas//rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur//'jig rten kun gyis mngon sum du//skyong gi'i nga ra tshog 'di brjod//'khor ba tha ma med pa yi//sngon gyi tha ma ji
52b7(dkon brtsegs): skyid pa//de srid sems can phan don du//spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir//byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do//'gro ba thams cad
53a1(dkon brtsegs): mgron gnyer ste//dbul zhing phongs pa dgrol bar bya//de ring phan chad gal te yang//bdag gis 'dod na lam bskyed na//phyogs bcu dag na dang
53a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i//sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur//byang chub na mo zhig thob par du//tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang //phrog dog dang ni ser sna yang //de
53a3(dkon brtsegs): ring phan chad mi bya'o//tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad//sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongasu btang //tshul khrims snum dang nges pa la//sangs rgyas rjesu bslab par bya//'dug
53a4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub rings tshul du//'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba maud/phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang //sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya//tshad mang bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i
53a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya//phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad ru//bdag gi ming ni zas par bya//bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te//sangs rgyas 'gyur bar do//
53a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med//bdag gi lhag bsdom rnam par dag/bdag dbang 'di ni 'dren pa rnams//lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang //rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyangs//yid kyi las
53a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang sbyang bar bya//mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya//ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te//'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na//bden pa des ni sa 'di yang //rnam pa drug tu
53b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos gyur cig/bdag gis badren tshig gang brjod pa//ma nor yang dag smras she na//bden pA des ni mkha' dbyings las//sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog/bdag
53b2(dkon brtsegs): la gal te g.yo med cing //de bzhin tha ba med ce ni//man dU ra yi me tog bzang //bden pa de ni char du phob//yang dag don du nges pa yi//tshig bden de skad brjo/
53b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi//bye ba'i zhing rnam rab tu g.yos//de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas//sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung //me trog
53b4(dkon brtsegs): man da ra ba dag/mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur//rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te//srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis//'dran par bdag cag 'gyur smon ces//yid du
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i sgra yang bskus//de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag/nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang //rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing //byang chub tu ni zhugs par gyur//
53b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir
53b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid do'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/'jog dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang
54a1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad bskul pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
54a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thob nas kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogaso///
54a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongasu rdzogaso//'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu rdzogaso//'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongasasu rdzogs te/bar
54a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang dgra bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to//rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
54a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar/rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag
54a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can tshod med grangs med pa'i
54a7(dkon brtsegs): don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
54b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab la yang dag par btsud do//
54b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cid la yang bsnyen bkur dang yongasu spyad par byas so//thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung //de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na
54b3(dkon brtsegs): 'og gi phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gaung+ga'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma skyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyings shes bya ba yod de/de ni de bzhin gshegs
54b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sa'i lho zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang /sgo tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste/de de ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o bzheso//sngon
54b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i le'u 'di bston pa'i tshe/srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
54b6(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so//'jom dpal gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
54b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu yang yong su rdzogs byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongasu rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yong su rdzogs/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs na/
55a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong min+ta/da skad ceg smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nu rgyu/
55a2(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub sems dpa'a'i seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs na yang dang yang du byeng
55a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyur med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/des byang chub thob par gyu rangs thob zin pa ni bzod pa mi bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal so
55a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos yongasu rdzogs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o//
55a5(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su rdzogs pa'o//de ltar na mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de bzhin nyid ces bya
55a6(dkon brtsegs): ba da ni gnyi su med de gnyi su dbyer med do//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin zhes de skad zer ba la/gang gzugs yongasu rjo
55a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /gang rnam par shes pa yong su rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su rdzogs pa'o//smras
55b1(dkon brtsegs): m+b+ha dpal gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongasu rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/smras pa/rigs
55b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni mthong ngo //'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos go/
55b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa yang ma yin/mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yong su rdzogs pa 'am/'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni med do//'jam dpa
55b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongasu rdzogs pa yang med/'grib pa yang med pa de ni yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/cis yong su rdzogs pa sha
55b5(dkon brtsegs): bya/smras pa/des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gang gi
55b6(dkon brtsegs): ma dz+dza rnam par mi rtog de'i tshe/yang su rdzogs pa ra ma 'grib par byed pa med//gang yongs su rdzogs pa 'am 'grib par med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do//rigs
55b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas ni gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs yong su rdzogs pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes/
56a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa yong su rdzogs pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsa
56a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal de lhor khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang /bdag
56a3(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/'jam dpal khyod kyis ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par
56a4(dkon brtsegs): gzud par bya/smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can med pa dang /sems
56a5(dkon brtsegs): can dben po'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni byang chub kyang dmigs/gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni byang chub la sems can
56a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang mi dmigs/sems can yang mi dmigs pas de ltar byang chub la sems can
56a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dzud par mi byed do//mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa byed pa'ang med/de las ldog pa 'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog
56b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ya mamaHsan/cas samasamama.anan/tha a rba taHSha sa na/ma/aaH
56b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas/de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do//ldog pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang /gang du yang 'gro ba med de de ni mnyan
56b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid do//rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/stong pa nyid la smon po gang yang med do//rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad de ltar yun
56b4(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas bzod pa thob na ji ltar ci'i phyir bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'i byo'o zhes bya bar sems mi bskyed ces zer ba ni/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis
56b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni mi mthong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas/byang
56b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang ming tsam ste/yid las byung ba ma yin pas/byang chub ces bya ba 'am/sems shes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa'o//smras pa
56b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de las bsams nas/bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyan du sems bskyed pa med do zhes smras pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/
56b8(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa la skye ba med do//gang la skye ba med po de la thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par bya ba gang zhig yod/smras pa/'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji ltar
57a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//ji ltang rngu
57a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtog pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni rnam par mi rtog su/de ni mngon
57a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs shing /ma dmigs pas gcig pa 'am tha dad par mi byed cing
57a4(dkon brtsegs): rlom semasu mi byed po 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//chos thams cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon du byas shing shes kyang lus
57a5(dkon brtsegs): la'ang mngon par zhen pa med/sems la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta/
57a6(dkon brtsegs): bu/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ni rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste/de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o//de'i rgyu ba khams gsum no tha snyad du 'di yin no zhes bstan du med de/'phags
57a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de ni gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so//rigs kyi bu
57b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de ni thob pa med pa las thob pa'i sbyar brjod pa ste/de ni chos gang yang thob pa yang ma yin ma thob pa yang ma yin pas/de'i phyir thob pa zhes
57b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o////bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
57b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba de
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/de nas byang
57b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod kyis
57b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig/smras pa/'dzam dpal
57b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba yin nam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o//
58a1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o//sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyuraro//skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do//gang la
58a2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med do//byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par
58a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba med do//rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi/'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa
58a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thugasu chud pa mngon sum du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi
58a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyi brjod na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis
58a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam ston cig/de bzhin gshegs pas gnang //de ci'i phyir
58a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/khyod las smon lam de dag thos nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhin dag kyang spyod pa de lta bu yongasu rdzogs par byed do//'jam dpal
58b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi bzlog ste/sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
58b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
58b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer
58b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongasu rdzogs par bgyid la de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na/bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o//de ltar 'jam dpal
58b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du g.yo/
58b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag khrig phrag brgya stong grangs ma
58b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med
59a1(dkon brtsegs): pas bltas na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thaMd bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang /bdag gis byang chub kyi sems
59a2(dkon brtsegs): la bkod pa dang /bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang /de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bas mo gtan dang /
59a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang /bdag gis bskul pa dang /bdag gis rjesu bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
59a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i/nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas
59a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gong yang mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
59a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab po//de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/'jam dpal gzhon
59a7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar gyur snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa
59b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyis thugs chud nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di lta stong po/
59b2(dkon brtsegs): na skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phra rab tu glegs shing /bshig ste thal bar byas na/rigs kyi bu de ji
59b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag brtsis shes pa 'am/brtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe
59b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/
59b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya stong 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes shes pa 'am/bgrang ba 'am/gzhal ba 'am/tshad bzung bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so//bde
59b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa de ni ma lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/phyogs bcu'i phyogs
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang+gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyis tha gru yangs par yongasu ma grub cing //
60a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang /rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas smras pa/srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi ba
60a3(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi bar smon lam btab po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi
60a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas
60a5(dkon brtsegs): shing khyab par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung du bdag 'dug pa'i tshe/bla na med
60a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang
60a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya spyong 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag du dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos sto/
60b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam
60b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ye med par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang the ba dang 'chab pa med pa/tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongasasu dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
60b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing /skyil mo krung/
60b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas par brdzus te byung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
60b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te/mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos
60b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing /byang chub sems dpas yongasu gang bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad bta
60b7(dkon brtsegs): bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
61a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nA ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//

61a3(dkon brtsegs): bya zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs
61a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
61a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang /rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/nga mya dran las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
61a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang /mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma
61a7(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa gro lnga 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o///

61b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang
61b3(dkon brtsegs): dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du mi dang ldan pa'i kha zas
61b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gong ba'i snod mngon du 'byung bar gyur la/snod do dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma
61b5(dkon brtsegs): phul/sems can dbul zhing phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang /mgon med par gyur pa dang /yid btags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang
61b6(dkon brtsegs): mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dge yongasu tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bza' ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cing /de'i
61b7(dkon brtsegs): mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongasu grub par gyur te/rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing na mkha' las mchi ba dang /rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs
62a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas/kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang
62a2(dkon brtsegs): phul/sems can phongs shing lhogs pa dang /mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang /yid btags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongasu tshim par bgyis nas/de dag
62a3(dkon brtsegs): la chos bstan te/skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gi
62a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dge gos rin po che rnam pa ste tshogs kyi long spyod pa dang
62a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur te/bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa rung ba dag byung bar gyur la/gos rin po che de dag byung mo thag tu 'di
62a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gi gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar bdag nyid kyis yongasu spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i
62a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa thob par gyur nas/de dag gi sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mtshos shing gos de dag thams cad sangs
62b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bkab ste slar sangs rgyas kyi nod der mchis nas/ci dga' ba'i gos rin po chul spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad
62b2(dkon brtsegs): btab po//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis longs spyod dang /yongasu spyod pa gang ji snyed cig
62b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas slad kyis bdag cag yongasu spyod par 'gyur ba dang /sangs
62b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang /
62b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang /ro dang reg pa yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par gyur cig
62b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bgyi bar smon lam btab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol
62b7(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur//
63a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu rdzogs shing /dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya bar

63a6(dkon brtsegs): po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten no dkon la/sngan chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste/de dag gi ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba

63b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang /dngul las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong ba la/
63b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du lnga grub pa dang /shel la thub pa dang /mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang /rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang /spug las

64a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha phye ba dang /kha zum par 'gyur ba dang /gang dus dang tshod rnam pa ji lta bur
64a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i 'grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba yang ma mchis/rga ba

64a4(dkon brtsegs): shing dga' ldan gyi gnasu tshe bas par bgyis nas/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gri bar snang las sil snyan blta/
64a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gda' ba byi ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang /sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi/gzhan du na pha rol tu
