64a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta bar 'tshal na/'chag gam
64b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'am/'ong ngam sdod dam/mchis kyang rung ste/gang dag der sangs rgyas la blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
64b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom mam/nem nur ram/yid gnyis sam/chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongasu chad par gyur te/bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don
64b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab po//de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/gang 'di
64b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag
64b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te/gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /gang dag
64b7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
65a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bya
65a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong gi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/bcom
65a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lha mos kyang ci dgos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing
65a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang ma mdzad do//de nas 'khor de'i lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin
65a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin gcig tu
65a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshalo//de skad ces brjod pa dang /ngo
65a7(dkon brtsegs): mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//sems can tshad med pa
65b1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur
65b2(dkon brtsegs): byur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa
65b3(dkon brtsegs): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang /smon lam gyi brgyan dang /mtshan nyid dang /mtshan ma dang
65b4(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang /gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang /snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag
65b5(dkon brtsegs): gros sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang /khongasu chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
65b6(dkon brtsegs): ke bye ma snyed du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod po la sde brtsoms te/rnam po gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa me mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma
65b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis par bshad dam/de bos kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tani bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon ma
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan
66a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pas thugasu chud do//de bzhin gshegs
66a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni thogs pa med de/dus gsum kun tu 'jug go//de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
66a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang /bcom ldan 'dra
66a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas/sangs rgyas kyi zheng gi yon tan bkod pa dod de gnyis 'dra 'am/'on te mi
66a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugasu chud nas/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal
66a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i chas rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i
66b1(dkon brtsegs): gas pa gcig blangs na/rlugs phyi zla 'dang smyan du sams/rgyu rnangs pa da / na la smra da da dang mang bar 'byur /gatshul pa/ma ldan 'dus blangs pa
66b2(dkon brtsegs): smad rnamapa pa ni tshad ma mchig//bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/rigs kyi tsa ma des N+Te me baidU bshags pa'i chos rgya mtsho chen po las rgyu mi thizhes pa gcin
66b3(dkon brtsegs): bId tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o//rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i lhag ma ji
66b4(dkon brtsegs): cig yod pa de tsam du ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs d+ham+b+ha kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
66b5(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
66b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan lal la mda' bu gyur tam/mnga' ber 'gyur ram/dalta bA
66b7(dkon brtsegs): nA dri lce bu mnga' ba stsa yang bzhugs sas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi nu yang de/sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas shar phyogs mag su sangs rgyas byin//
67a1(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de//
67a2(dkon brtsegs): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tsho'i tshad dpag tu
67a3(dkon brtsegs): med pas da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to//rigs kyi
67a4(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin /
67a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
67a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te lhag chad med do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos bgos pa/'jug pa chen pos zhugs pas gang
67a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas po bzhi yod do//byang chub sems dpo' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'di
67b1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming bstan du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na mchis pa dang /bcom ldan
67b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang bstan du gsol/de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang
67b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol/de ci'i sladadu zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongasasu 'dzin par
67b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i slanga'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi tog ces
67b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/shar phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug/gnyis pa ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/lho phyogs
67b6(dkon brtsegs): logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug/gsum pa ni zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/nub phyogs logs no bcom
67b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug/bzhi pa ni smon lam blo gros shes bya ste/byang phyogs lo grin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
68a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad//
68a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mngon par mdzad pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi
68a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang kun tu snang bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
68a4(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa sngon chad ma mthong ma thos shing bsam gyis mi khyab la/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i
68a5(dkon brtsegs): lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kun tu snang bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
68a6(dkon brtsegs): kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de yang sku tha mal par dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga' ba ste/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi ri bo ltar
68a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shing lha me lhan ne lhang nge bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun
68b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis byas te/byang chub kyi shing gi yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par sprul pa mdzad do//
68b2(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das
68b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /byang chub sems
68b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong stan las langs te/thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang
68b5(dkon brtsegs): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi'o//bdag
68b6(dkon brtsegs): cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu bsgrub par bgyi'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'dzum pa mdzodado//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
68b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel dang dngul gyi
69a1(dkon brtsegs): dog lta bu mang po mthon par gyur te/de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das la
69a2(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
69a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
69a4(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de
69a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon bkod pa yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las skyes bu dam pa bcu
69a6(dkon brtsegs): drug gis ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas tshig brjod de/de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bI
69a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'gyuraro//lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa
69b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgya
69b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyuraro//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenag/
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas gces spras byed pa la ltos/tshig tu brjod par 'dra yang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa thag pa nos tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs
69b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to//gang gis dma' ba'i sems dang dad pa tsam
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshigs tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/
69b6(dkon brtsegs): ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang /ye shes bla ma dang /zhi ba'i dbang po dang /smon lam blo gros dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa
69b7(dkon brtsegs): bai DUr+ya'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du bzhugs te/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor tsong mdun du bdar te/sangs rgyas kyi
70a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs/sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi
70a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
70a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ci'i slad dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa dang /phyogs bzhi nas khong pa brtsegs pa bzhi mchi bar gda' bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
70a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar gyur to//de skad ces bka'
70a5(dkon brtsegs): stsol nas/ring po ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dge lhags te/lhags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs po de dag nas babs nas/bcom ldan 'das de
70a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba dor song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba
70a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur
70b1(dkon brtsegs): hUM/donas bam ldan 'dus sa byang chub sems dang ni tshigs la bka' stsal pa/gas kyi bu dag skyos gra dam pa 'das pa ldan de 'di dag ni byas m+b+ha myos su byud par/
70b2(dkon brtsegs): gis gyon pa 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la rim gro bskyed la chos dris shig/rigs kyi bu
70b3(dkon brtsegs): dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig/rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo byang /
70b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gis bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/bud med gcig gis kyang bdog cag go ming thos na
70b6(dkon brtsegs): yang myur du bud med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya bar de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/
70b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ni de yang mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'dra la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
71a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa'ang bgyid/
71a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma ma mchis par yang bgyid de/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye ba'ang skye/'gag kyang 'gag ste/gang las skye ba dang /'gag pa ma
71a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
71a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal byang
71a5(dkon brtsegs): chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gang sus kyang mi thob ma bshig tsang gang la yod pa 'am med par chags pa dmigasu
71a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smos pa/'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/smras pa/rigs kyi
71a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de de bzhi no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba med do//smras pa/'jam dpal
71b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig pa'i chos bsnun pas/de skad du ston tam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/smras pa/'jam dpal
71b2(dkon brtsegs): gong phung po rnams kyang mi mthong /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/dmus long yang ma yin/sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog rnam par
71b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa dang /chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang /'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis
71b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi
71b5(dkon brtsegs): chos so//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'bad cing /gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig la 'jug pa
71b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu mi byed
71b7(dkon brtsegs): cing /'di ni zab mo zhes bya bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas
72a1(dkon brtsegs): sgyus glu la 'ang phyu gang na rnag tu zad du spyan kyis rnams ca po dang rnas ston pa na chos nyid las 'gal bar mi byung
72a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltang bstun pa gang med pa de nas k+Shi na ga tu sbyin bya'o/tshun mas dpa' bas pa pa legs der sums des smras bya/gang bsam ngas pas
72a3(dkon brtsegs): yid pa la yang 'jig la/bsam du med pa des rlomasas sum byed cing /oM dmanas pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshu la gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub
72a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdul dang bral bas smras pa/gang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams nad las 'dod chags pa yang med 'dod tshigs dang bral ba yang med/sarnas
72a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med/khong khro ba'ang med/rmongs pa yang byed/gtu byed pa yang med/gnyis byed pa'ang med /byed pa yang med/mi byed pa yang med/len pa yang med
72a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba yang med de/de ltang bsnyen pa gang sbyin pa de ni tse kyi tshum ga cig tu btsun pa'o//spyod chub sasas bu'o rgya mchos smras te/da rgyunargyo lta byung bab cing gti
72a7(dkon brtsegs): da/ba'i chos la zhugs pa'i la mi na ma par man mang gi bozhin du chos pon cing /bdag dang gzhan du rnaMs sam mi byed pa de sa
72b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pa snga smras pa/gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis zla ba lta bur gyur kyang //
72b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad de dag la'ang rlom semasu med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams
72b3(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun bcad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do//sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zugs rngu dang ldan pa'o//de
72b4(dkon brtsegs): la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang /de yir 'dzin pa ste/gang ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul
72b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /
72b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta
72b7(dkon brtsegs): bas smras pa/gang chos ston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems mi byed/mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa
73a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yong su dag pas smras pa/gang chos
73a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/'khor gsum gang zhe na/bdag mi dmigs pa dang /chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang /chos la'ang mngon par
73a3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa'o//'di ni 'khor gsum yongasu dag par chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas smras pa/gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par shes shing /ji ltar shes pa bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste/chos thams cad
73a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas
73a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/chos de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo //gang ston pa dang /gang la snyan pa dang /gang bstan pa de
73a7(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba da ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73b1(dkon brtsegs): chen pa gzi brjid chen pa gzi brjid nan pa dag gis sa sa nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to//nul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgra 'di bstan pa'i tshe/byung
73b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag bar
73b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to//dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//lha dang mi'i skye rgu las khrag
73b4(dkon brtsegs): khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' se mos dpa'
73b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po song ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems
73b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ji srid cig na bla na med po yang dag par
73b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig
74a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon pang bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpalnga gzhon nur kyang ba pa da /
74a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras//'jam dpal khyed ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu
74a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe na mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par
74a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'ching rgyu'o//gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
74a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba da'i tshe/bdag kyang byang chub mngon pa rdo rdzogs par 'chung rgya'o//gang gis tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang /brag cha dang /mig yod dang /chu zla dang /de bzhin
74a6(dkon brtsegs): papopa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/bdag kyang byang chub mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor
74a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur li/zla bo'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag kyang byang chub mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar yin gyis su byang chub tu sman pa de la
74b1(dkon brtsegs): dris shig/smras pa/'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi ston tam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu don ma yin te/ngaH phyir zhe na/'jam dang lu nyid kyang byang chub la/byang chub //
74b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jam dang lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni mang tsam//ming gang yin pa de ni dpon zhing byed pa med pa/
74b3(dkon brtsegs): ste stong pa'o//stong pa nyid gong yin pa de ni byang chub bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon por bsgrags
74b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbrul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang /nyan
74b5(dkon brtsegs): thos 'dus pa mthong ngam+b+ha/thos sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong de thos so//bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems//gsol pa/bcom
74b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab po//bde bar gshegs pa dri ni bgrang du ma mchi so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/yul ma g+he
74b7(dkon brtsegs): d+hA'i til gyi dong nas ti la 'bru gcig gcig blangs nas/rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig pa de ji lta bu de lta bur ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub ses/
75a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'dus pa dang /nyan thos 'dus par blta'o//phyi na til gyi lhag ma las pa ltar ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par
75a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar rlags
75a3(dkon brtsegs): te/rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang /brgya'i
75a4(dkon brtsegs): char yang smos par mi 'gyuraro//stong gi cha dang /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong gi cha dang /grangs dang cha dang /bgrad pa da /rgyur yang smos
75a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe la tshad ni tshang
75a6(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu
75a7(dkon brtsegs): glags te/thal bar byas pa de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
75b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/der rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig bzhag ste/skyes bu des tshul da bzhin du shar phyogs log su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad du bkod/
75b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur la/de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/des kyang lho phyogs logasu dri snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te/de bzhin du phyogs
75b3(dkon brtsegs): bcur skyes bu de lta bu re ros tshul dang 'dra bar do snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re ra nas bor na/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i
75b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig/
75b5(dkon brtsegs): yod do//bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba brgya stong phrag na 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni
75b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig yod//gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//mi 'khrugs pa ni 'di snyed cig yo do zhes bya bar tshad bzung bar nus
75b7(dkon brtsegs): sam/gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni me nuso//bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gi
76a1(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang /gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang /gang dag
76a2(dkon brtsegs): bcos shes pa 'am/gang dag las 'dus te/rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te/rdul phra rab tu glags na rigs kyi bu
76a3(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/rdul phra rab de dag brtsis shes pa 'am/brtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do//stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//brgya stong
76a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba'i phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do//bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do//bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod//bye ba brgya stong
76a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod//bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do//gtams phrag ni 'di skad cig yod//dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//
76a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar shes pa 'am/bgrang ba 'am/gzhal ba 'am/tshad gzung bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dpe
76a7(dkon brtsegs): del ni sems can rnams mos par 'gyur gyi/don 'tshal ba 'am/gzhal ba'am/bgrang ba 'am/tshad gzung bar mi nuso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
76b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod//stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//brgya stong gi phrag ni 'dre//
76b2(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod do//bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//bye ba brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di
76b3(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod//bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//gtams phrag ni 'di snyed tsog yodado//dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yo do//mi 'khrugs pa'i
76b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba de ba kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugasu chud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
76b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i ska du/byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa'
76b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg kyang de/bcom ldan 'dra de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi
76b7(dkon brtsegs): de ste bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongasu btang bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/sems can
77a1(dkon brtsegs): myos pa chung dang /lde lo che ba dang /brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi bskyed/sangs rgyas kyi ya
77a2(dkon brtsegs): shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe/srog chags khri byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
77a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de ltar phyog/bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji
77a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig 'das pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te/rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang /gang dag las 'das te/ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra
77a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu glags pa de dag pas kyang myang ba'i bskul par du dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu
77a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/yang dag par 'jug po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang byas
77a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis
77b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen/
77b2(dkon brtsegs): po ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das spyad pa chen po ngo mtshar lug so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/na mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang /
77b3(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang /zla ba phyed dang /dus dang lo dang /bsgral pa dang /bskal pa brgya dang /bskal pa stong dang /bskal pa bye ba dang /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dang /bskal pa bye ba
77b4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang /gtams dang /dkrigs dang /mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems sam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
77b5(dkon brtsegs): namakha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad na mkha' lta bur khong du chud de/
77b6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das por gyur to//nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to//zhes bya ba nas snga ma ngonan du la
77b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtag go//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do//rigs kyi bu 'od lta ste dper na/
78a1(dkon brtsegs): namakha'i khams ni skal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa s+ya lhag pa zhog 'das par gyur kyang /skyo zhing yongasu yid chud pa med do//nA mkha'i khams la skye //
78a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/'jig pa 'am/tshig pa 'am/'gyes par 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/namakha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub
78a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa da ni skyo ba dang /yongs yid 'chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do//rigs kyi bu gang la na mkha'i khams shes
78a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de la ni 'tshig pa med/skyo ba med/yid 'chad pa med g.yo ba med/skye ba med/'chi ba med/rga ba med/'pho ba med/'byung ba med/'ong ba med/'gro ba med//
78a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'jom dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/skyo ba med/yid 'chad pa med/g.yo ba med/skye ba med/rga ba med/'chi ba
78a6(dkon brtsegs): med/'pho ba med/'byung ba med/'ong ba med/'gro ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/maung de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro//chos kyi rnam grang so 'di bstan pa'i tshe/rgyal po
78a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu
78b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang/
78b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//bklag par bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//gzhan dag la yang rgyu
78b4(dkon brtsegs): cher bstan par bya'o//zhes tshig tu brjod po de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
78b5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin
78b6(dkon brtsegs): tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par bgyod dam/'jug par bgyid dam/gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan pa dang /gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rje su bslab po zhes
78b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ci tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin
79a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyis spyan sgrib pa med pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji skad cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu ga/
79a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/de bzhin gshegs pa ra rA la phul ba dang /rnam glongs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par rgyas
79a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas te/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/'dzin tama?/'chang ba
79a4(dkon brtsegs): klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/'jug par byed dom/gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston tam/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rje su bslab par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar du
79a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyes cing /gom pa bdun 'dor na/bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas rgyu'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
79a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
79a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bor mi 'gro'o//grangs dang cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe
79b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyur yang mi bzod do//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin kun nas snang bar sgyu ma lta bu byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par/
79b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs so//de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting 'dzin de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag gis phyogs
79b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na 'jom
79b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing /rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas//de dag 'di snyam du sems te/'jam dpa le gzhon byung ba ni da ltar 'jig rten gyi kham
79b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por cig car du snang por gyur pa ni smon lam dang /ting 'dzin dang /ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mcher che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par
79b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci
79b7(dkon brtsegs): legs/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar
80a1(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar
80a2(dkon brtsegs): yang zung shig/byang chub kyi sems yang dag paradaga' bor byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa
80a3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchad pa bya ba'i phyir ma tog gi char chen po phab nas/bcom ldan
80a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skadadu/kye ma sangs rgyas kyi ma sangs rgyas/dang ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang /bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes tshad du brjod pa ched du brjod do//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems
80a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub la phyir mi ldog par gyur to//sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu grub par gyur te/
80a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sang ge'i rtsol
80b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang /phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri
80b2(dkon brtsegs): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
80b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa bcwa lnga pa rdzog s+ho////sho lo ka stong
80b4(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya bzhi bcu'o////rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI lin dra bo d+hi dang /'dzin mi tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsa baM ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad
80b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya pi ta pu tra sa ma ga men nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bad skad du/'phags pa ya ba dang sras mjal ba zhes
80b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba theg pa chen po'i med//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad
80b7(dkon brtsegs): dedag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das grol ba/grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/zhi ba zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/rgal ba rgal
81a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa/pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa thang la phyin pa thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa dbugs
