81a5(dkon brtsegs): byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba yan lag lnga rnam par gsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib
81a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/yid rnam par dang ba yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'kho
81a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum
81b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo bsrung phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan bya/nyi tshe ba'i bdun pas bsal ba nyi rtsa ba'i bden
81b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/gtsal ba spangs pa gcal ba sbyangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar
81b3(dkon brtsegs): thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog po med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
81b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa yongasu chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/mi g.yo
81b5(dkon brtsegs): ba la mngon par mos pa/mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol bya/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/shes rab
81b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dub me dang lcug ma dang /
81b7(dkon brtsegs): shun phrogs kyi skyon dang bral ba dag pa/snying po la gnas pa/shAkya'i yul na ser skya'i gnas/shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/lnga sde dang /grags byin dang /'tshor ka dang /
82a1(dkon brtsegs): lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung dang /chu klung 'od srung dang /'od srung chen po dang /shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya
82a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/
82a3(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu rnam par grol bA/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rje su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor
82a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yongasu zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/de'i
82a5(dkon brtsegs): nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/bla gab med pa na bzhug so//de'i tshe
82a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar/thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs//thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs
82a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag/dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/de nas tshe dang ldan
82b1(dkon brtsegs): ba kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo
82b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /
82b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ko'u 'di n+ya khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/de
82b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /ming chen dang /grogs sbyin dang /lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /chu klung 'od srung dang /gau ya 'od srung dang /'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan
82b5(dkon brtsegs): ba shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o///
82b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos
82b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon por dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig
83a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos ting 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/de ltar mnyam par
83a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa che dang ldan pa 'char ga la gnas shing dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes
83a3(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa mthong ste/'di lta ste dper na khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgro byang phyag su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/
83a4(dkon brtsegs): nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing /dge slong
83a5(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mtho ngo //de na tshe dang ldapa mau dgal gyi bu chen po ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga
83a6(dkon brtsegs): la ba dar song nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon
83a7(dkon brtsegs): par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dang nga bskyed cig
83b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smra so//tshe dang ldan pa maud dgal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya/
83b2(dkon brtsegs): bar shin tu dka' ste/rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ste/tshe dang ldan pa ma
83b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lha ste dper na shing khur bcu 'am/nyi shu 'am/sum bun+da 'am/bzhi bcu 'amo/la bucu 'am/shing khur brgya yang rung ste/bsher bag med cing skam la
83b4(dkon brtsegs): la mang du ljon pa zhig yod la/de la mi la la zhig gis me btang na/me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro//de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/'bru mar zhig btor na//
83b5(dkon brtsegs): me'i phung po de bas ches cher 'bar te/de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o//tshe dang ldan pa mi dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs sa bo nas dang
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'o//cha dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o//tshe dang
83b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gcad/
84a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
84a3(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma
84a4(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed do zhes dgongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/de ci'i phyir
84a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang na ngas dad par bya'i/yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o//'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar
84a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs dang bar byed pa'i mchog yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/'char ka bzang po nga la nyan par
84a7(dkon brtsegs): byos//khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis//shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba bskyed pa yi//rgyal po'i dam pa rab tu dad par byos//rgyal po'i rab de dad par byos
84b1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni//rigs su lha dag drung ni mi rnams la//mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis//mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos//de lta na ni shAkya'i rgyal po de//mngon pa//
84b2(dkon brtsegs): de rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams//rI yi ngos nas dbab 'di la je bzhin du//brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad btang skye gnos//dbang phyug nyams pa rje su d+han byeng pas//
84b3(dkon brtsegs): yid la gnod 'gyur sems la yid kyang stor//dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/rjesu dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin//lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing //lha
84b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzas 'dod pa rje su dran pa bzhin//rkyal bu'i bstan la mngon par mi shes shing //rgyal po sde nyams snying rjer smre sngags 'don//nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang //mi yi phun sum
84b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa bzhi pa dang //longs spyod dag ni rje su dran byed cing //swa bdag de ni snying rje smre sngags 'don//mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis//ji ltar mi zhig yongasu
84b6(dkon brtsegs): non b+hUr na//bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mo shes ltar//sa yi bdag pa de yang de bzhin no//ti se li gangs kyi ri bas bsgribs gyur na//ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba//
84b7(dkon brtsegs): de badzin de rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na//rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo //gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa'i//mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te//de
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgyal po chen po mos gyur pas//rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes po//dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi//bud med snying rjer smre sngags
85a2(dkon brtsegs): 'don byed pa//de bzhin ngo rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas//rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don//de lta bsnga na 'char ko thabs mkhas pas//khyod kyis 'dir ni
85a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dad par gyis//nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos//chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis//'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi//'gro ba
85a4(dkon brtsegs): dag na bskal 'thun spyad med pos//rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dang bya bar//gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med//'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni//'das pa'i
85a5(dkon brtsegs): dus na swa yi bdag po zhig/ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste//sra skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung //de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan//srog chags bye ba
85a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod//rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug po'i sa 'di ni//chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs//grong dang grong khyer dag kyang mngab nye zhing /
85a7(dkon brtsegs): bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pos gang //'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes//sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang //dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): sdong dum chur ma N+Da shing dran pa med//'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras//chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu ban+d+han//drang srong tshogs ban+d+ha d+hAs rgyu ba ste//
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dka' chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs//ngan seng lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad//de nis sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dang //rgyal po de la bu dge yo dpa
85b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sa ng+yas byung ba mthong ba ste//dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can//yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan//ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste//srog chags bye ba
85b4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod//'dod pa rnams la skyon du lte ba can//mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'//rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des//lha y-i
85b5(dkon brtsegs): brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir//na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te//'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyad ces smras//bu yi dam pa khyod lo nga yis ni//ji ltar
85b6(dkon brtsegs): pA'i bya ba gang mi byas//'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir//ma mos nga la bu khyed myur du smos//srid pa'i 'gro ba'i smon tan mkhas bgyis te//bu khyod rin chen
85b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim la dga' ba bskyed//bud med rin chen 'khor dang grogs bgyis te//yul la dga' zhi ngo mos pa bskyed par gyis//dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag
86a1(dkon brtsegs): de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na//dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' lnga spyod//'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs//de lta bas na 'dod pa/
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' la spyad//nga dang rgyal sbrid thams cad khyod dang 'thun//rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi//gzhal med khang gis brgyan can khyim 'dir spyod//'di dag rnams
86a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang mchog gri gzugs ldan zhing //lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa//rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas//bsnyen bkur sems shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog/
86a4(dkon brtsegs): mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste//bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong //so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang //dpral ba'i smin ma legs shing mgul//
86a5(dkon brtsegs): pa sdug/biR+Ya ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra//phrag so shes rgyas thal gong legs dang 'dra//lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/so ri mo byin gyis phra bas
86a6(dkon brtsegs): legs drung ldan//lce ni zangs mdog 'di la srab cing dag/tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan//so ni thugs bzang so rnams rang rlod med//mche ba rab dkar
86a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi brgyan dang ldan//lto ba 'phyang ngor 'dug cing lte ba sdug/sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra//byin pa glang po che yo so 'dra zhing //mda' rgyu snying po
86b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par skyes pa bzhin//dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang 'dra//gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lha//rtse ba 'dod cing dngul bab dang ldan//gzhon nu snyid/
86b2(dkon brtsegs): rje ltos la rtse blo byos//bu cig khyod dang bud med 'dre dag gi/mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang //shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin lhung gis//nga rgyale thang la 'dod pa
86b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten par gyis//blo gros snying po ldan des smra ba yi//pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras//yab cig khyod ni med par gsungs pa lags//gang dag tshig gis grags
86b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi smad med//yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig bsams te gtan la phabal rgyal po gas ni//ji ltar rmi la mo ni yang 'dod la bdag/sems mi dpa' zhing ma mos de 'dra
86b5(dkon brtsegs): gson//sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni//mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te//mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams//mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rten
86b6(dkon brtsegs): tu spang //long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis//long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid//thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na//mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod par skyed//
86b7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi//tshig gis brtson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid//sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na//nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid//so bdag
87a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing //'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba//long ba chus khyer brtson rang gnas pa dang //nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag
87a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de snyam bgyid//mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin//bdag ni mig can khyad par mthing po lags//phyed ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyed pa lags//bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la
87a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smod//'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin//sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste//rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra//me yi phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin/
87a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros snying po ldan pas de skadadu//smre sngags 'don pa'i pho dang 'khor la smras//rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par//rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung //sbrul gyi lpags
87a5(dkon brtsegs): rnying brjes pa ci 'dra dang //ngar sbubs brngubs pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te//blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par//sdig dang rnam par bral ba rab tu byung //gzhon nu de ltar
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung gyur nas//blon po'i bu zhig rje su rab byung ba//ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste//blo gros snying po'i rje su rab tu byung //gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas//tshangs
87a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni//grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga//ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur//'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na//mi
87b1(dkon brtsegs): yi song ba de ni 'dod khams 'das//tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas//de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na//pha de bu la ma dang /
87b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang //zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas//legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas//'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems//de tshe blo glas snying po gzhan snyam
87b3(dkon brtsegs): mam//nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te//'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med//'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems//bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam//sra bdag/
87b4(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe//rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur//'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems//rje su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam//khyad nyid de tshe yi dus ma
87b5(dkon brtsegs): ni/bden pa 'bel ba dad par byed pa yin//de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir//rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon bskyed cig/so skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na//skyid pa chen po/
87b6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/shod nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ko zhag de 'das nas/snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos
87b7(dkon brtsegs): gos dang /sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang
88a1(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do//rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gan su byon cing //ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya
88a2(dkon brtsegs): gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso zhes thos nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so//gal
88a3(dkon brtsegs): te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba//chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po
88a4(dkon brtsegs): cha sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /dz+nyA rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che
88a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no//de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa//gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshong bar 'gyur zhing dri
88a6(dkon brtsegs): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing /mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/myinyam ste me mnyam pa med cing chos dang 'dzin pas legs par bab ma
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing /rim
88b1(dkon brtsegs): klud rgyas pa dang /bkur bstir byas pa dang /ba spyang du smras pa dang /mchod par byas pa dang /dbang phyug go dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba non na/de ltar bdag cag
88b2(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhon nu dag tu byung bas de lta bu'i ljongs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyamo//des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am
88b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed par su 'ang ma 'gro shig/la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do//de'i tshe shAkya'i
88b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dga' bo'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas/song bar gyur te/shAkya'i bu dga' bo'i bzhon gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA rgyud ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na
88b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka go la ba der song ste/tshe drang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dge bar mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa
88b6(dkon brtsegs): leg so//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring ba zhig ni byon te/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcomo ldan 'das la snyen mi mnga' 'am/stobs dang ldan nam/bde bar
88b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/mi bde bar minga' 'am/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/shin du ma mnyel ta me/bsod snyoms kyi
89a1(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma brgyal tAm/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smraso//dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin tu
89a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o//stobs dang ldan no//bde bar bzhug so//mi bde ba mi mnga'o//de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o//bde bar byon to//mnyel ba med do///
89a3(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do//shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong na/
89a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nas byung ste/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/tshe dang
89a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legaso//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon to//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/stobaso dang ldan nam/
89a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar bzhugs sam/mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam+me/shin du me mnyel tam/bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma
89a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyal tam/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sed la 'di skad ces smras//shin tu legs par sad de de bzhin te/bcom
89b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la smyan myi mnga'o//stobs dang ldan no//bde bar bzhugaso//mi badre ba mi mnga'o//de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi myanga'o//bde bar byon to//mnyel ba med do//
89b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi sa 'o brgyal ba med do//shA ri'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhini dang /shAkya'i bu shin tu
89b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par sad/gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/tshe dang ljon pa 'chang ka ga la ba der song s+t+waM/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/
89b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legaso//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nA byon to//tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan
89b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/stobs dang ldan nAm/bde bor bzhugs sam/mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/bcom ldan 'das bde bar
89b6(dkon brtsegs): byon tam/shAn du mnyel tam/bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral la 'di
89b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smraso//mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o//stobs dang ldan no//bde bar bzhugaso//mi bde bar mi mnga'o//de la nyam nga ba
90a1(dkon brtsegs): ci yang mi mnga'o//bde bar byon to//mnyel ba med do//bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba medo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang
90a2(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs po dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do//de skad ces smras pa dang /shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa
90a3(dkon brtsegs): 'char kau la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das lo blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/bdag cag gis de lta ma nuso//de ci'i phyir zhe
90a4(dkon brtsegs): na/'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro zhig/la la zhig de la blta ba 'am bsten bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/
90a5(dkon brtsegs): lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcadado zhes bka' stsal to//de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das la baulta ba 'o ma bsnyen
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed du 'dod par ma nuso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ji ltar bdag
90a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam so//'on kyang bdag gis na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/rgyal
90b1(dkon brtsegs): bzas gtsang ma'i kun du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas rgyo dang ldan pa 'char kas ting 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/sems mnyam par gzhag pa des nam ga//
90b2(dkon brtsegs): la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas par snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der gong ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgya
90b3(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil ko krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthang nas/de la thal mo sbyar te tshig su bcad nas smras
90b4(dkon brtsegs): ra/tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos//khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin//brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka' /
90b5(dkon brtsegs): nga skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kos rgyal po zas gtsang mi la tshig su bcad de slar smras pa/rgyal po bdad ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu//bdag la chos kyi rgyal ba
90b6(dkon brtsegs): gang na bzhugs//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te//bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i beshos bkuro//yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba//khyod la
90b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob//gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar//ston gyi nyi ma'i bung gi 'od dang 'dra//ji ltar sprin med na mkha'i nyi ma ni//phyogs
91a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar//de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras//ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang //ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar
91a2(dkon brtsegs): ban//srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang //de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras//mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs//ji ltar nyi mas zil non
91a3(dkon brtsegs): skar ma rnams//nyin par 'od stong lam mar mi rung ba//de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis//zil gyis munan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang //ji ltar nyi ma'i zil gnon
91a4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba ni//nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stong nyid mi snang //de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams//nyi ma'i zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med//seng ge'i nga ro thos nas phra
91a5(dkon brtsegs): mo rnams//shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du//ri sul gseb tu byed nas 'khru zhing gnas//stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'//de bzhin rgyal ba drang
91a6(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po'i gsung //dpag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na//shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang //gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur//lha dang
91a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la//spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal//snang ba mdzad cing rdul dang rnam par sbyangs//ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shes///
91b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od dang mi bod lAm gnyis rab tu bstan//lam dang grol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bsgyur//lam sbyor skye blo rnams ni lam du btsud//'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thung la bton//
91b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni//sgang dang bshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed//de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras//'gro ba ltar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad/
91b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags//rtswa dang gel pa nags tshal shing rnams dang //khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang //me tog sna tshogs kyis ni sa mdzes pa//de
91b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang //me 'dres bco brgyad chos lnga'i sdong po la//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang //'bras bu smras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes//
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus nu lhun po'i ri//lha yi gnas gyur mi bskul rnam par mdzes//de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras//dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes//bde
91b6(dkon brtsegs): sogs khyim thab brgya byin lho dbang po//lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar//de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras//dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes//byams
91b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te//thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng re re ldan pas//dran pa nye bar bzhag cher rgyun mdo ba 'grogs te//rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos 'char
92a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs//yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer//ting 'dzin nyon mongs lnga min rab 'joms shing //ye shes nyi zer sred pa'i sred pa skems//
92a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes//ting nge 'dzin tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs//byang chub yan lag rin chen
92a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs//thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya//tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug/ting 'dzin la ma dran pa yul grwa
92a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dab//byang chub yan lag me tog sdong po'i sdang //bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po bstan//tshul khrims nags mtha' bsten pa'i stobs chen po//ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri
92a5(dkon brtsegs): khyokhrod phug na gnas//stong pa mtshan med skyon med spyod yul can//rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras//thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston//rgyal ba khyu mchog
92a6(dkon brtsegs): brjid pa'i stabs btsud pas//byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsdogs te//khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin//tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan
92a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nyo bar bskyabs//ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can//rgyal po tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad//dge ba yongasu bzung bas
92b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig bcom ste//nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol pa//lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na//rgyal po khyod kyi skyes mchog rnam par mdzes//tshul khrims
92b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing //yan lag brgyad lom char chen rlan gyis sbrengs//thub pa gces pa'i lo tobla 'bras bu stsol//khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs
92b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongaso sam ci//bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam//de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam//thang gnas ud pa la
92b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi rnyings sam//'char klas smras pa/rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can//dges shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te//thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug
92b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas bac+doMs pas//gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyings//rgyal pos smras pa/sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing //gling bu'i sgra snyan+da nga ros bskul byas te//bud
92b6(dkon brtsegs): med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang ni//de ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam//'chang kas skyes pa/bsami gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul cen//ting 'dzin
92b7(dkon brtsegs): sgrub po'i tshul la mkhas pa ste//mnal lam bzhengs sim bzhud dam bzhugs pa na//sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes//rgyal pos smras pa/che ba'i rkyen 'os
93a1(dkon brtsegs): mal mchog bshams pa la//me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' skong te//bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na//da lta mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs//
93a2(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa/thub chen 'phags pa gzims male gzims pa ni//byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs//dga' ba gnas pas dgyes dang ldan
93a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na//srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'//rgyal pos smras pa/shAkya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar//bstan bcos mkhas drang rtse zhing dga' byas te//gzhan
93a4(dkon brtsegs): med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na//dA yi bu de nags mthor ji ltar dga'//'char kas smras pa/chos kyi byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis//zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de
93a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag mdun du bad+mor//zhi bo'i dgon par zhi ba'i bston mdzad pas//ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyeso//rgyal pos smras pa/sngon chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe//
93a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te//rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na//nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru//'char kas smras pa/khrims gtsang
93a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bab sdigs chos chu rdzing bu ste//thub pa de bkru gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad//sku la mi gsher sras dang bca su 'bog/rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol//rgyal
93b1(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyan//rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang gyon gyon//tsan dan zhim pos shing 'dra ba legs par bris//nags chen de
93b2(dkon brtsegs): gseb thub pa su yis brgyan//'char kasa? smras pa/tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan//khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan//mngon
93b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku//rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags ni mdzes//rgyal pos smras po/rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i//dpa' bo g.yul
93b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te//bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dag ba dgab pa//gcig pu nags na 'dug nu su yis bsrung //'char kas smras pa/byams pa'i stobs kyis thub
93b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs bsrungs te//de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'o//stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes
93b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras//chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos//khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis//bdag kyang mi
93b7(dkon brtsegs): yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o//de skad ces smras po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni chog
94a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog dge sbyong gri tshogs yongasu sdud pa drang srong chen po ste/dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me/lhan
94a2(dkon brtsegs): neni lhang nge'o//rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yir gyi ngo tshes bco lnga li zla ba nye ste yongasu rgyas pa'i tshe/skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni/lham me lhan ne lha
94a3(dkon brtsegs): de'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan ne lhang de'o//rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma ni ston gyi dus na shin tu lham
94a4(dkon brtsegs): me ldan ni lhang nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'ongs de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na shin du lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lham mi lhan ne lhung nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi rdzan ba'u Du lhun me lhan ne lhang ngo'o//'di lta ste dper na lha'i
94a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na gnas na lham mi lhun ne lgang ngo //de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhun ne/
94a7(dkon brtsegs): lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldan dang /lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang /lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs
94b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me ldan ne lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na mi mdzad
94b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na lhame me lhan ne lhang nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham ma/
94b3(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lta nga'o//de nas rgyal po zos gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan bas
94b4(dkon brtsegs): zad na/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe/sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
94b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg/chem chem rab tu chem chem kun du rab tu tshim
94b6(dkon brtsegs): chetshem//'ur 'ur rab tu 'uru 'ur kun du rab tu 'u re'ur/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos//btsi sa mA~M thag tu sus
94b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi brten par sra la gram po bdU bor po dang /steng gi bar snang las rgyu'i rgyun grang hU~M rnam pa gnyis byung ste/de gnyis kyis khrus byas paM dang /de tshe lha'i khri ba
95a1(dkon brtsegs): dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang /steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta 'ang ci smos/ma btsas ma thag tu lha thams
95a2(dkon brtsegs): cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang /gang gi tshe bcas nas/gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ji skad
95a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de ltar byed pa/rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan po yang dag par smra ba/slu ba med pa lta ci smos/gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
95a4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/brgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas/
95a5(dkon brtsegs): po de dran nas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//blo mchog ldan pa gong zhig bltam ma thag/nor pa med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de//gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba
95a6(dkon brtsegs): de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du//'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes//mgon po mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa//
95a7(dkon brtsegs): de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang //brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te//ji ltar gsungs pa de dag mdzad mdzad pa//de la
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs bu su zlog yod mchis//gsor gyi phung po gangs rwa mnyam pa yis//gang zhig rgyags par bya bar mi nus shing //gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa//de la mdzang/
95b2(dkon brtsegs): pa su zhig yud mi ches//mtshan rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis//gang zhig khro bar bye bar ma nus shing //zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa//de la mkhas pa su
95b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid mi ches//chags par gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs gyur pas//gang zhig thul bar nus pararo ma gyur te//shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa//de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): ches//'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang //longs spyod dgal rtog pa'i rnam pa yis//gang zhig bcing bar nus por ma gyur pa//de la ma khacu pa su zhig yid mi ches//

95b6(dkon brtsegs): gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa//rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang //gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa//de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//don gyi tshul la rtson
95b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang //chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis//gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid ma ches//dri ma med stobs mtha' yas
96a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur pa//gang zhig grong khyer chog nas 'byung ba'i tshe//dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//byang chub dam/
96a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir//gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su//'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//byang chub dam pa
96a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir//zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis//lo drug bar du dka' thub dge spyad pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//'jig rten la ni
96a4(dkon brtsegs): phan drang bde ba'i phyir//byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na//lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod ku gsol//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//gang la lo drug bar du bdud
96a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni//rtag tu phye bzhin 'brengs te glags btsal kyang //de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyu
96a6(dkon brtsegs): cing //su la cung zad tsam yang mi smang la//'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par//
96a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dga' bar rab tu zhi ba yi//byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab
96b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi de yi tshig gsan te//nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na//dro yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir//shAkya/
96b2(dkon brtsegs): glong khyim du ni byon gyur te//shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na//de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//brgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gdo gis//sngon
96b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi thugs dam bcas par dgongs mdzad de//bdag cag srid pa'i rgyu las sgrol mdzad pa//de yI gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//de dus da bab de ltar dus mkhyen pas//

96b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes//rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su//de snyam du ni rjesu bsam pa byas//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig rje su bsams
96b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'tsher ka la smras pa/dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshig su bcad de slar
96b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsams byas te//khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs//stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems skyed na//skyes pa bud med dag kyang ma
97a1(dkon brtsegs): ris 'dong //stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan//drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa//'dir spyon rgyal po thug dang skyed cig dang //khyod kyi grags
97a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung //khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste//phyogs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba//chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par//stobs bcu
97a3(dkon brtsegs): chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad//srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgol gyur nas//'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol//rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis///

97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mchog la ni drad pa bskyed//bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de//nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas//mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub rnyed 'gyur

97b1(dkon brtsegs): bla tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis//'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed//rnam drag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/mun pA rab rib stug po bsgribs pa yi//mig sbyong rab rib sel
97b2(dkon brtsegs): cing gsal mdzad kyis//'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed//rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa nyon mongs la//rga shi med mchog mi lnga ston mdzad cing //'tshe med gnasu sems

99b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du mas yongs bskor cing mdun du bdad nas/snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan+da 'das kyi spyan snar 'dug par gyur to//des bcom ldan 'das kyi klubs la mgo bos phyag
99b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/shar phyogs log su brten te/steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nis zil mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod nga

99b5(dkon brtsegs): thel mi sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdzod cing 'dug par gyur to//rgyal po chen po mig mi bzung yid klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yod
99b6(dkon brtsegs): su bskor cing mdun du bad nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/nung
99b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs logasu brten te steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to//lha'i
100a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtswa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du steng gi bar/
100a2(dkon brtsegs): snang la thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to//de bzhin du lha'i dbang po 'thab bral dang /yongasu dga' ldan
100a3(dkon brtsegs): dading /rab 'phrul dga' dang /lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /mi mjed kyi badrag po tshangs pa dang /lha'i dbang po 'od grasal dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu
100a4(dkon brtsegs): che ba dang /gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nAs mi snang bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod por gyur nas
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lho'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom
100a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to//lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyang lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang
100a7(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyis dbang po thag
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bzungs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug 'tshal te/
100b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mched cing 'dus par gyur to//bya'i rgyal po med pa bzang brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te//
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug
100b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//gzhan myo stegs can kun du rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrog brgyad cu yang 'dug par gyur to//de la 'dri skad ces bya ste/na mkha' yang
100b5(dkon brtsegs): su dge ba'i dbyings dkyil du//ma lus rdzog sa gyur zla ba nya ba yis//skur mo'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni//na mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam por mdzes//zla ba dr-i/
100b6(dkon brtsegs): mring dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba//mun pa rA ba ri bo sel cing dri gsum 'joms//rtog ge rgyan tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni//mkha' la skar me'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes//
100b7(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus mdzin pa//ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing //lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su//nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed//nyi ma
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bAs//stong gsum po drug zil gyis mnan nas ni//mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing //nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha
101a2(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byed//lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni//'dun sar lha yi tshigs kyis yongs bskor bya//lha yi tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni//bdi sogs khyim thab
101a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes//rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug stobs bcu yang //dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na//rtog ge chags rnams zil gyis minan nas
101a4(dkon brtsegs): no//dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes//lha yi rgyal po mtha' bral dbang byed pa//mtha' bral bzang po lhas bcad btsun byas pa//mtha' bral bzang po lha chos
101a5(dkon brtsegs): nang bzhugs te//mtha' bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes//gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang /mya ngan ngan 'gror 'gro ba zil mnan nas//yan
101a6(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing //stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes//lha yi rgyal po yongasu dga' ldan do//dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor
101a7(dkon brtsegs): lha tshags mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni//sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes//de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yeng //lha me lha men tshogs kyis bla mar byas//
101b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po dag zol gyis mnan nas ni//smyos bya song go dam pa 'jog rten mdzes//l+yA yI dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni//lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su//rlung rga/
101b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na//gnas shang dA ni rab tu rnam par mdzes//de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing //skyobs bcu mang ba nyon mongs bral ba po//
101b3(dkon brtsegs): dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal pA yang //skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes//lha yi rgyal po dbang bskyer byed pa ni//lha'i gnas 'dug rnyid lha tshogs zil mnan te//
101b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis//rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du//de ltar rgyal po stobs bcu'i spyod po dag/sngon chad spyang pasna lha mi zil mnan te//sngon gyi dgra
101b5(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba'i gzi brjid kyis//rgyal ba de de rab tu rnam par mdzes//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ni ni tshangs pa yang //tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rong gis zil mnan te//shin tu snyan
101b6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad ldan dag/yongasu brjed pa byed cing mngon du mdzes//de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa bad+mar gyur pa//dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis//mdun du bdar te bde
101b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam gsung zhing /'jig rten bdag po dag na mngon du mdzes//nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang //lto 'phye chen po dag ni dus mkhyen nas/skyes bu khyu mchog yan
102a1(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad ldan gyi//gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston pa mdzad//bya la mya na mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid//rgyu mtsho blum pas gzhal du rung yang srid
102a2(dkon brtsegs): rorab srang la gcal du rung yang srid//sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nuso//rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////de ma/
102a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka skyong nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang myas kyang shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/grogs po dag 'di la skye dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang
102a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dam re reng 'char bya'o//dmar reng dmar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so//grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ltas yin te/dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no//grogs po dag de lta bas na bzhon pa'i mchog
102a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams stod de ste gon gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de blta zhing 'dong ngo //lha legs so zhes
102a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas/shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsong ma'i ltar mnyan te/thag pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstad do//de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma ser kya'i gnas dang /rgya
102b1(dkon brtsegs): /ta'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing /bye ma gcing ma 'dal du bcug ste/nyams dga' ba dang /me tog sil ma/
102b2(dkon brtsegs): gang ba dang /dar gyi lda ldi dang /phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/skabs skabs gar mkhan dang /glu mkhan dang /gyad dang /bum rnga thogs pa dang /sil snyan dang /rol mo dang
102b3(dkon brtsegs): glu'i cha byad dang /yo byed thogs pa dag dkod par gyur to//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon pa'i mchog dang /ches pa rnams dang /bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ser kya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba ka lA ba der song ngo do//de'i tshe shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/'di ltar shing rta/
102b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang sngo la/rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing /rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/'khor rgyun sngon po can gyis bskor ba/gdugs dang /
102b6(dkon brtsegs): ral gri dang /thod dang /nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang /lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/kha tshar ma bcud pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing rgyan sngon po thog pa'i zhal ta bya rnams
102b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed pa/rgyan sngon po can gyi lcags thogs dang khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha steg ste/shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi/
103a1(dkon brtsegs): mi brgya phrag re res bskong bar gyur to//shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad ser ba nas thams cad du/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): dmar ba dang thams cad du dkar ba dang /thams cad du bikr-i ba dang /shring rta re ri zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhi no//
103a3(dkon brtsegs): shing d+ha de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa shwa steg bshams
103a4(dkon brtsegs): te/glang po che brgyad khI po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa/bkra bA balka na sdug pa/brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dod par gyur to//glang po che
103a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha bskyas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur
103a6(dkon brtsegs): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang shAkya rnams rgyang ring po ni sa 'ong ba gzigs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
103a7(dkon brtsegs): khyed gang gis sum cu rtse gsum gyi lho skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba mi mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge
103b1(dkon brtsegs): slong dag/shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dod pa dang rje su 'thun no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ser skya zhes bya ba'i grong khyer
103b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa nas/rgyal blo zas gtsang mi yi khyu ma chog de//'khor dang bcas te dzi ltar 'od gyur pa//de ltar bsten gyis khyed rnams de nyon cig/shing rta brgya stong mo chog dang bcom
103b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/legs byar rgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni//ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas//mi yi dbang po dom pa byung bar gyur//shing rta sngo zhong rgyan kyang sngo ba dang //
103b4(dkon brtsegs): rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas//mtshan mA lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste//de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo//lcags kyang sngo zhing thag spyad de rnams kyang sngo//dril bu
103b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yer khe'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos cen te//rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas//shing rta ser zhing rgyan yang ser ba dang //
103b6(dkon brtsegs): rta yang ser zhing srir po'i 'khor dang bcas//mtshan ma lde po dag kyang skyer po ste//de bzhin gis kyi dam pa dag kyang ser//lcags kyang ster zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser//
103b7(dkon brtsegs): dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te//rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas//shing rta dmar zhing rkyen kyang dmar ba
104a1(dkon brtsegs): dang //rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas//mtshan ma lnga po drug kyang dmar po ste//de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar//lcags//
104a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang dmar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar//dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te//rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng byas
104a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas//shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang //rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas//mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste//de bzhin gos
104a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar//lcags kyang dkar zhing thug srad rnams kyang dkar//dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te//
104a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas//shing rta bkra zhing brgyan kyang bkra ba dang //rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas//mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang
104a6(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba ste//de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra//lcags kyang bkra zhing thag sred rnams kyang bkra//dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//mi rnams kyang
104a7(dkon brtsegs): ni bkra ba'i gos can te//rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas//shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du//glang po brgyad khrir tshang ba bshams pa ni//gser
104b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal margyan rnams kyis legs par brgyan//glang chen rnams nI gser gyis chal par brgyan//de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi//khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su//
104b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan pa yi//shing rta rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar ba shams//de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang //rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga'
104b3(dkon brtsegs): bar brgya ni//rgyal po'i cha 'os rgyal po mtsham stabs can//glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'bring //rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi//me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram//
104b4(dkon brtsegs): dar gyi lha ldi dag kyang rab tu bris//bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan//glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang gyad rnamasde dang //bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par
104b5(dkon brtsegs): byas//rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang //rig tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang //rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas rgyal po
104b6(dkon brtsegs): zos datsang ma dang /shAkya rnams dz+nyo ba byas sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa la babs te/rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor nus mdun du bdar ti n+ya gro ta'i
104b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra bar dong ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi na mkha' la rgyal po zas ga
105a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon par dad pa'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chags pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshwang/
105a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o//g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o//de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chags pa'i zham 'bring du lha'i
105a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /yongasu dga' ldan dang /rab 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin
105a4(dkon brtsegs): cing gsil yab kyis g.yo ba par gyur to//rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi
105a5(dkon brtsegs): thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzang ta pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga slad nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'ang/
105a6(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to//rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag po'i nub phyogs logasu thog ma la
105a7(dkon brtsegs): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar to/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thel mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la phyag
105b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to//de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i bu rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul
105b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po
105b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /lho'i man da ra ba dang /man da ra ba chen po dang /lha'i spos kyi phye mo rab tu 'thor bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/lha'i rol mo'i sel snyan dang /
105b4(dkon brtsegs): glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang la sgra 'byin par gyur tAM//mi las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang bar snang las byung bar gyur to//sprin las spros kyi tshad zam zim yang 'bab pa
105b5(dkon brtsegs): byu to//lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /lce'o can dan gyi phyi ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad
105b6(dkon brtsegs): bos lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lci de dag bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa
105b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yang mthong /lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ji tsam du bcom ldan
106a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar te sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/'di ska du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la
106a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/
106a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin par lta ste/bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bla gas phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
106a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de/phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/
106a6(dkon brtsegs): dA ni 'jig rten na mchog/nga ni 'jig rten na gtso/nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ngas skye ba dang /rga ba dang /nu ba dang /'chi bo mthar dbyung zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag
106a7(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos btugs te phyag bgyis//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas 'dzam+bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhur/
106b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/nyi ma yol yang 'dzam+bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de ma btang ste/lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas/phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang
106b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyiso//da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang ldan gsum du phyag 'tshalo//zhes smras nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//gang
106b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo khyed bltam nas//sa chen 'di nas gom pa bdun bzhud de//nga ni 'jig rten 'di ni mchog ces gsungs//de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//gang tshe
106b4(dkon brtsegs): thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud de//'dzam+bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa me btang zhing //lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa//de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//da yAng
106b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du//thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo//thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso//khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos//mtshan ni
106b6(dkon brtsegs): don grub legs zhes sngon brjod pa//pha dong ma yis bsams te btags pa lags//khyod kyis bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas nA//don grub lags par bdag gis nga
106b7(dkon brtsegs): gdod 'tshal//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i rdzi bzhin gyi res bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bsham/
107a1(dkon brtsegs): so//thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu yog par bting //steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi
107a2(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu'i bla re bris so//de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa dre nas babs te gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so//rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang
107a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhas la mgo
107a4(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to//'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//spyir skya zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi//n+ya bro da yir
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ba nyams dga' bar//rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe//'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe//skye bo mang po dgu ni 'dus gyur to//lha ma yin dang mkha'
107a6(dkon brtsegs): lding dbang po dang //klu tshegs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang //dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur//de bzhin gasdang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te//mi
107a7(dkon brtsegs): cini yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang //de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha//rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur//de bzhin gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa yi///
107b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang //'od gsal ba dang dge rgyus pa dag dang //'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus//dge sbyong drag drang de bzhin
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang //spyod pa tsan dang kun du rgyu dag dang //gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po//ldog lam rjesu 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus//sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid
107b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa yis//rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems//yongasu smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir//de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur//sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
107b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'i//tshig gis 'khor rnams yongasu tshim par mdzad//da ni rgyal po rgyal po zas gtsang la//rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed//bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
107b5(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang gis//gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi//rgyal por gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis//khab nas ma byung shig ces mngon gsol ba//gling bzhir dbang
107b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod//rin chen sna bdun dang /dang ldan pa 'gyur//'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur//chos
107b7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas shing sa yod skyong ba ste//gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur//mi yi dag dang mi yo mchod par 'ong //lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba
108a1(dkon brtsegs): btag/dAnAm+b+ha de'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa des skal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag mod nas/bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis//rgyul po bdag gi tshig la/
108a2(dkon brtsegs): gson ces gsungs//'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis//bdog la smra ba mdzad par bzhed pas na//de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod//bdag la cung zad tsam
108a3(dkon brtsegs): yang thugs mi re//rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni//rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis ruk+Sha sbal gcig cig 'phangs//rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa ni//ru skal de ni khron pa'i nang/
108a4(dkon brtsegs): du lhungs//de la khron pa'i nang gi ru snrel gyis//rgyu mtsho'i ru skal gnas 'drir 'ongs kyi//nga yi the tshom skyes pa bcad pa'i phyir//myur du ngu la smos shes de skad smras//
108a5(dkon brtsegs): khron de'i nang gi ru stsal de nyid la//rgya mtsho'i ru sbrul blo chen des smras pa//nga ni d+h+ya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te//khyon pa 'dir ni de ring bor bIr gyur//rgya mtsho
108a6(dkon brtsegs): rlabasna chen de ni phyir log s+yAd+me//du ni slar khrog 'gro bar ma nus bai tA//dan+ti rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na//ru sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'acu'o//de la khron pa'i
108a7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi ru sbal gyis//rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am//'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig/dris lan nga la myur du smros shes smras//rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo chen rgyal po/
108b1(dkon brtsegs): des//khron pa'i ru sbrul de la tshig smras pa//khron pa'i ru sbal khyod ni byis pa ste//blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan//da ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas//yun ring dus nas de na
108b2(dkon brtsegs): skye skye yang //rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par mi nus na//dbus lte shes par ga la nus shes smras//de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang //bdag gi mthu ni thugasu ma chud de//
108b3(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni//khyod kyis bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed//bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur//chad pas mi gcad mtshon nas 'da' med par
108b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya//'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can//bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon
108b5(dkon brtsegs): chotshig sbyang bzhed nas//de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang //sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs ma mdzad//rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu b+ha'i phyir//thugs kyis yod/
108b6(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba mdzad pa dang //'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par//de yi tshe na de ni 'dus par gyur//rgyalnga pa 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
108b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzod do//
109a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha mA yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs rIs lA ma yin gyi bu mo khrug khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas byas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byAm+b+ha ta/da//
109a2(dkon brtsegs): nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang ni rin po che'i rin thang yod pa dang /rin tha~Mng med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das lnga mchod pa'i phyir phulo//rin po cho gshu
109a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod pa phul lo//rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to//
109a4(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag re re zhing rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug bcu mngon par sprul to//rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gsar
109a5(dkon brtsegs): las bas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/rin po che sna bdun gyis byas pa'i dbyar 'dib can/gser gyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa sha stug go/rta cang shes de
109a6(dkon brtsegs): dag go rgyun du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to//shing rta de dog kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gsor gyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa sha stag

109b2(dkon brtsegs): de dge kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon por sprul to//shing rti'i rgyan dang rta'i rgyan dang /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag srung gis

112a2(dkon brtsegs): bal las byas pa'i shin tu pra bI dang /srin pa la las byis pa'i shin tu phra ba dang /zan ma'i shun pa las byas pa'i shin tu phra ba dang /shun phrags las byas pa shin tu

114a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la//'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/khyod la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi//rga dang 'chi blas nyen par gyur pa yi//lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa
