114a3(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe rta'i rgyan de dag drong /shing rta'i rgyan de dgo dang /lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi rgyun de
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang bla re dang dril bu ga yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba la mnyan na dpa' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/'di lta ste dper na rol
114a5(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan yan lag brgya pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no//de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i
114a6(dkon brtsegs): che snyeng gi bar snang la lha'i tsan dan dang /ud pa la dang /a ga ru dang /ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i chur mngon par bab par gyur to//lha ma yin gyi spyos kyi phye mo rnams
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs du mo'i chang mngon par bab par gyur to//lha'i me tog man de ra ba dang /man da ra bo chen po dang /man dzu sha ka dang /man dzu sha ka chen po dang /pau ru sha/
114b1(dkon brtsegs): drang pu ru sha ku chen po dang /mya dog dkar dang /mdog dkar chen po dang /s+yA sbyar dang /m+b+ha snar chen po dang /s+thA sngang khra bo dang /sgyu sbyar byAkla rkyen gyi me tog rnams dang /zlul
114b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par byab po//stang gi bar snang las gas r-I dIng /dngul dang /bai dUr+ya dang /shUl dang /spug dong /rdo'i snying po dang /mu tig dmar po dang /
114b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi cher mngon par bab bo//lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par byab bo//spos chu'i cheng de bebs pas ster sbyar gan gyis phred byeng
114b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu man chad spros chus rngub tu gyur to//spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms thams cad rgyas
114b5(dkon brtsegs): par gang bar gyur to//sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de cher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
114b6(dkon brtsegs): to//de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas de'i tshe bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil ston gyi skye dag byung //
114b7(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to//theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sgra thos pa
115a1(dkon brtsegs): gyung pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par gyur to//de ltar lA ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ros kyis bcom/
115a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i cha lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dog bcom ldan 'das le mchod pa dag bya ba dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyi
115a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu lan/la la ni sil snyan byed/la la ni gaMr byed/la la ni lus kyi tshul bsgyur/la la ni tsen dan dang /ud pa la dang /a ka ru dang /ta ma
115a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyi ma 'thor/la la ni lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang /man d+ha ra ba chen po dang /man dzu sha ka dang /mno dzu sha ka chen po dang /pA ru shwa ka dang /pa ru sha ka chen po dang
115a5(dkon brtsegs): mdog dkar dang /mdog dkar chen po dang /skya snar dang /skye snar chen po dang /skya snar khra bo dang /skya smar bkra chen dang /sprul pa'i mye tog dang /gser dang /dngul dang /
115a6(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /rdo'i snying po dang /mu tog dmar po dang /rin pi che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bac+doMs la mngon par 'thor ro//la la
115a7(dkon brtsegs): ni na bza' dang /rkang gdub dang /sku rags dang /phyag gi rgyan dang /sor gdub dang /gdub bu dang /gdub bu tham pa dang /dbu rkyen rtse gsum dang /dpung rgyan dang //
115b1(dkon brtsegs): cod pan dang /gser skud dang /mu tig gi do shal dang /nor bu'i do shal dang /ser mo do dang /gya do dang /mgul rgyan ma/tshogs dang /rna cha dang /rna cha gdub 'khor dang /tshong
115b2(dkon brtsegs): chang bshibyas pa dang /mgo rgan dang /phreng ba'i lda ldi dang /spos kyi lda ldi dang /nor bu'i lnga ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang /spos kyi bla re dang /nor bu'i blar
115b3(dkon brtsegs): dag thog so//la la ni spos chu'i char 'beb so//la le ni phye ma'i char 'bab so//la la ni mu tig demar pos snyim pa bkang ste/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro//la
115b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang /la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro//tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so//yang brtan
115b5(dkon brtsegs): grang la gnas bcas nas//gang zag mchog la mchod gyur pa//de 'dra ba yi grog pa dang //rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris
115b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan
115b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la la no gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstong pa/stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
116a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshalo//chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po//'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo//kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod
116a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshalo//'khor brgyud mi gnas pa lo phyag 'tshalo//mthar phyin thung gnas khyod la phyag 'tshalo//'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tsha lo//sems can 'gyogs kyang
116a3(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa mi mnga' zhing //'gro ba kun las thugs ni rnam grol te//pad+ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po//blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tsho lo//sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong
116a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid bsten//rnam pa kun du mtshan ma thams cad bzhig/khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'//mi gnas na mkha mnyam la phyag 'tshalo//lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab
116a5(dkon brtsegs): sem gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/bcom ldan
116a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskyor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas/tshig su bcad pa drag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod bya/sa dang bur snang dang ni lha yul ne
116a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phab de gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis//mtshan mar bzung nas phyen ci log zhugs pa'i//'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen//'di na byed pa cher
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can med//gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med//chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun la dben//rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan//su zhig bde gshegs bstan
116b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'drir mos te//chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba//de 'dir 'dren pa'i spos su gyur pa ste//ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod//rnam 'dran khyod la bdag bstod bsod
116b3(dkon brtsegs): nams gang skyes te//ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa//dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dgu 'dir//'gro la rtsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/
116b4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa//lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/
116b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
116b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha rol rnam brgal ba//brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyis rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing //bde gshegs pha rol zang bde 'jigs pa med
116b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa//spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtug/blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun du mkhyen//phyin ci log lha thib por rab zhen blo ldan te/
117a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa smrig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la//mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad//mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad
117a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma dang //smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan//thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed//srid pa gsum po dag na mi chags spyad pa spyod//
117a3(dkon brtsegs): do ngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang //gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen//byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bu'o//mi dbang
117a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod//lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la
117a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bu byed cing me tog skya snar khra ba rnams kyis gtor te/tshigasu bcad
117a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag giso bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/mi mchog khyod kyi skra yis ni//lhar bcas 'jig rten zil gyis mnan//ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang //rmya
117a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshos pa rjes chu bzhin no//gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan//gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang //gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnad//dpa
117b1(dkon brtsegs): nanyams mo khyod bzhin//gaN+DI brjid phung ba gzi brjod kyis//samas+thA can dang ldan zil gyis mAnan//zil mnan+ta drug lam mo min//nyams mAM khyud zil brlag bzhin//
117b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis//'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan//zil mnan de dag lam mye yin//nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin//lA ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan
117b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltad byas pa de bzhin du//lham yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtu la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das la lan
117b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skye snar khra bos mngon par gdon te tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/'dren pa'i blo gros zhi ba'o//zhi gnas dbyas
117b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba yi//'dod sdang gto mug rdul zhi mdzad//char las rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin//'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar mdzad pa//blugs sbyin gyis ni ma bzhin no//nags pata//
117b6(dkon brtsegs): nags mes shing bsreg ltar//de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba bsreg/sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig ni//dpag tu med par dag d+hA 'dzin//nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de//
117b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsis lus zhugs drug bzhin no//mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de//mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin//chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de//nor mkhan rin chen yon tan
118a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin//lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang bcom ldan 'das la/
118a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshig su bcad pa
118a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/gdul dka' mi bzang sems ni khyod kyis brtul//g.yul las dpa' bas g.yul nger dpa' bo bzhin//shin du tshar
118a4(dkon brtsegs): gcod rang gis dbang du mdzad//thugs dul mi bsnyungs khyod la phyag 'tshalo//khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom//gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba bsnyed
118a5(dkon brtsegs): khyad ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs//rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom//mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te//khyod kyi thugs ni dag dang /
118a6(dkon brtsegs): byoms la mnyam//thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'//shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams//shes rab
118a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag khyod kyi thugs dag kyang //chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med//lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul
118b1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhwa/
118b2(dkon brtsegs): te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing /bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang phul nas tshig su bcad pa dog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bsto
118b3(dkon brtsegs): pa//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni//chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen//gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang //de ni brnar btags tshig tu zad //chos rnams chos
118b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo yis//rnam pa kun du mi dmig so//gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang //de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs//ming ni ming gis dben pa ste//mtshan nyid kyang ni de
118b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no//chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste//ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad//rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang //bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te//gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing //
118b6(dkon brtsegs): su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis//khyod kyi sras ma mi mchog rnams//chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni//chos rnams la yang mi chags par//rnam par spyod do thub pa che//lha ma yin gyi dbang po
118b7(dkon brtsegs): mig bzang gis ji ltar byas la de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon
119a1(dkon brtsegs): te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod
119a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod//tshul khrims dang ni gzug dang ye shis stabs//des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis//de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis//khyod/
119a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na//gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan//sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs//dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs
119a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang //tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyed//skye bo mkhas spa so sor bsam mi lang //khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/mi yi sing+ge mdzad pa thad 'byor//shes
119a5(dkon brtsegs): rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis//des na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas//'khor du seng+ge lta bur sgra bsgrags te//rtog tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis monan//lha ma
119a6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang /bac+doMs la mchod pa byas nas ri po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la
119a7(dkon brtsegs): /zhon te/bac+doMs la lam gas ma bskor ba byed cing rin pa ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod//thub po chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di//dang ba'i
119b1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du blta//kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong //de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la//skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin/
119b2(dkon brtsegs): so sor 'tshal//thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung //de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa las//'khor gyi tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal zhing
119b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal//de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan//gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni//gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag pa mdzad//'dren pa su
119b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad//de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan//lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung
119b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas chags
119b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lte ba spyod pa grang //yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi//blo la mngon par
119b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de dag bag mchis te//mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras//chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te//rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags
120a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra//rmyi ldum dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis//de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs//ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra//
120a2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni tshangs par bgyid//gang dag rtag tu brag mchis bode gshegs blo dga' ba//mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'od ni rmongs mi bgyid//rgyal ba khyod kyis
120a3(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu bag mchis gang //mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yod ma mchi//chos rnams thams cad rmer ma 'ad bar rnam brtags nas//yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur
120a4(dkon brtsegs): dwa nas thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug bcu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la
120a5(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te/rab tu dga' nas dka' bu dang yid bde ba skyed te/thal ma sbyad nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la byag 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
120a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gro bogs/lA ma yon du dag gi ldeb pa'i bsam pa yang thug su chud nis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom lda
120a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshog sa khe dog dum 'di lta ste sngon po dang /seng po dang /dmang po dang //
120b1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang /lab rgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir logs nas/bcom ldan 'das la
120b2(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
120b3(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshig su bcad de zhus pa 'jig rten can bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis
120b4(dkon brtsegs): par//mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad//skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs//lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas//
120b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ldan bzhad khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na//lha mi rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol//de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur//de ring su yis dogs med rgyu rjen sems//
120b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig go//de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas//mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur//de ring yongasu dag pa'i yid kyis su//
120b7(dkon brtsegs): mi yi mchog la dad pa gong gis bskyed//de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen to//ying du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur//bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas//
121a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bdag shegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di//sgyu yis pabyung bAHsa bdud ni dang bcom zhes//'khor 'di de ring tho tshom 'argyal bar gyur//drang srong chen
121a2(dkon brtsegs): po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal//the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi bcang du gsol//mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi//the tshom sbyar te legs par bcad du gsol//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta
121a3(dkon brtsegs): thul gyis nu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bca dang tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris//'jig rten phan phyir
121a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ngas byas pa//de'i 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya//bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon//bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir//lha min rnams kyis nga mched 'ang
121a5(dkon brtsegs): byas te//de dog sems ni ci lnga 'dra chags med pas//na mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin//lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te//de dag nga la mchod pa 'di
121a6(dkon brtsegs): byos pas//blo can de dag lha min ris bor te//mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur//de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi seng ge/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed//bsnyen bkur
121a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas yid 'ong skal pa la//de dag thams cad mtshan mthun rgyal bar 'gyur//de tshe nge gshegs khrag khrig drug bcu rnams 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste/
121b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing //lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur//'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing //shin tu yangs shing snyims ma med par 'gyur//de tshe
121b2(dkon brtsegs): khrabra khrig drug bcu chang ba yi//rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyang bar 'gyur//de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad//de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur//brtan pa de dag
121b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khom thams cad sbyor//bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur//de dag tshe yi chad du 'gyur ba ni//bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang //rnam por 'dran pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyu
121b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad//thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te//'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu'i gyur nas//bskal pa khrag khrig drug bcu chang bar ni//rang byung rnams kyi
121b5(dkon brtsegs): dam chos gnas par 'gyur//bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs//gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul//dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan mthun 'gyur//zhing dang chad
121b6(dkon brtsegs): dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun//bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug bcu'i ba rwa//skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad do//bla na mod pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur//mkhas
121b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin//rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa//'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas//yid
122a1(dkon brtsegs): rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur//lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha maldan rgya
122a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te//'odi snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//dge ba'i rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig mngon
122a3(dkon brtsegs): pApar 'du mdzad na//'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pos bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing /bcom ldan 'das kyis
122a4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'tsho 'phro dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dge par bsgrubs pa
122a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag gro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
122a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/
122a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig le yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ma snyed na/sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa
122b1(dkon brtsegs): /de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang /de dag gi thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nus so snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
122b2(dkon brtsegs): po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi//thugs bskyed//
122b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni re re la 'ang //lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis//cha tsam mi spyod mi seng ge/de lta'i yon tan mthar phyan te//lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa//tsan dan phur ma ra rab tsam//mi mchog
122b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod par 'os//mi yi seng ge khyod la ni//gang+gA'i bye mo snyed mang ba'i//rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi//spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os//yon tan chen po mnga' ba la//gang+gA'i bye ma
122b5(dkon brtsegs): chos mang ba'i//me tog tshogs ni ri bo tsam//khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os//rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba//mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam//'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu sbed kyi//mor
122b6(dkon brtsegs): me rnams kyis mchod par 'os//mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur//yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa//gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba//me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os//mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse
122b7(dkon brtsegs): brda rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis//bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang //sems can mchog la mchod par 'os//yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod//rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
123a1(dkon brtsegs): gyisaphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste//bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os//mi yi seng ge khyod la ni//bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par//
123a2(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i bye ma ches mnga' ba'i//ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os//drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang //gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa//brtag zung dpe
123a3(dkon brtsegs): la gson du gsol//gal te gad+hA'i bye snyed kyi//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi//sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su//mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la//de dkar ri'i
123a4(dkon brtsegs): mgo bo yang //gang+gA'i bye ma snyed gyur to//mgo bo de dag re re zhing //de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la//khwa rnams de dag re re zhing //lho dang kha yi grangs mnyam la//gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/
123a5(dkon brtsegs): bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni//rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas//khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin//rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi//pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur//de'i tshe bcom ldan
123a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag legs so legs so//nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/chos su gyur pa/dbang du gyur pa
123a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/de dag nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/
123b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o//dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
123b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan+da rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni sems bskyed pA re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs
123b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/sems bskyed pa rI re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis
123b4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus//bsams kyang bsams par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de
123b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gsheg sa pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bas ba sdus pa sems can gang ji snyed ci go yod pa'i
123b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cadra la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa cig kyang myed de/sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khamasra ji snyed
123b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo //sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/sems can gyi khams ji ltar
124a1(dkon brtsegs): mI zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re rI las 'byung ngo //sems can du ni sems can
124a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas//sems can thams cad kyis mtshad kyang lan lon par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni
124a3(dkon brtsegs): zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni sems can 'khor
124a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/zang zing med pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems
124a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
124a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dpag tu med pa/bgrang du med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/mtshungs pa med pa/gzhal du med pa/brjod du med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
124b1(dkon brtsegs): lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po
124b2(dkon brtsegs): tog des/sems bskyed pa re re'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te/don kyang mdzad do//de bzhin
124b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/yongs su dag cing ngan
124b4(dkon brtsegs): song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ldog par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye bo yang med par gyur to//
124b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam pa yang med par gyur to//mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang med par gyur to//lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yang med
124b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs po dang /las las 'byung ba yang med par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can
124b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la bcud cing btams te//rjes su bstan cing bslabs pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i
125a1(dkon brtsegs): tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par 'gyur te/'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par byur
125a2(dkon brtsegs): to//la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang
125a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur to//la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen
125a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par gyur to//'di lta ste dper na/bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do//de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs
125a5(dkon brtsegs): su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do//'di lta ste dper na/bar snang la yang rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa med do//de bzhin du
125a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag kyang badre ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa dngang po'i rtog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan 'khyod pa'i
125a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yid mi bde bar 'gyur pa'i mi dga' ba med/rmongs par 'gyur ba med do//gzhan du yid bde bar 'gyur ba dga' ba sha stag la yongs su
125b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod de/de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems
125b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe mi dge ba'i las yongs su bzlog ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba lo btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin
125b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dbang mod par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med do/mi bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin po mi 'byung ngo //de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems
125b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'dus ma byas te//de ma bsags pa'i
125b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin/mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rgyu
125b6(dkon brtsegs): grogling gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde nyi ma mi 'char ro//rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo //char nyams su
125b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba mi 'bab po//de bzhin gshegs la dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe sems ca na de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad
125'a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'breng ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa
125'a2(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas//lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'breng bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin
125'a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do//rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i
125'a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'byung ba med do//de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mede cing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa med do//
125'a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to//de dag 'chag na
125'a6(dkon brtsegs): yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pas yid kyis chags te/chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi
125'a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo //de bzhin du 'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dang /sad pa dang /spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i
125'b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can do dag la yang ba ma spangs pa med de/de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo //yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba
125'b2(dkon brtsegs): med de/de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par sbyang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/sems ce na de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/de ni 'di ltar sems can
125'b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro//de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad
125'b4(dkon brtsegs): la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro//de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag chos thams cad mngon par zhen
125'b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir ro//sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/de'i phyir de la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do//sems can de dag la sdug
125'b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo //'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor bya rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro//gzhan du na 'du nyid kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/'di lta ste mi
125'b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tig de bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i
126a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su
126a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par byas pa'i phyir ro//dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems//dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /dma' ba dang /zhum pa dang /chung ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis yongs
126a3(dkon brtsegs): su bsgrubs pa dang /sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang /sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /nyes par brtsams pa dang /nyes
126a4(dkon brtsegs): par bi sgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtse bas sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/sdug bsngal bsal
126a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
126a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa de la dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/sems zhan pa dang /sems dma' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis
126a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
126b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de la
126b2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/dad pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang /tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang /thos pa zhan pa nas nyes
126b3(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang /brtson 'gru sa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar de nga /dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bar dang /ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang /shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de skad
126b5(dkon brtsegs): cig gi don bya ba 'am/de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/bde ba bsgrubs pa 'am/sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
126b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba 'am/sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
126b7(dkon brtsegs): slong dag legs so legs so//de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /sems zhan pa dang /dad pa dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /dran pa dang /ting
127a1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin dang /shes rab zhan pa dang /dma' ba dang /zhum pa dang /chung ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /sdug bsngal dang
127a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa dang /sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /nyes par bsams pa dang /nyes par bsgrubs pa'i'i shes rab kyis sems can
127a3(dkon brtsegs): de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/de dag phan par bsam pa 'am/bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya
127a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/sems can de skad yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so//dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de
127a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig yin snyam/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do//de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
127a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
127a7(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas bcom
127b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
127b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
127b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/de nas
127b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba
127b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/'dri lta ste dper na/skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten
127b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sde 'dir gnas par gyur to//des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
127b7(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
128a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang
128a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin snyam zhes bke' stsal pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di
128a3(dkon brtsegs): wAr bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/sangs rgyas
128a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste//la
128a5(dkon brtsegs): la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag por smra na rgyal ba gtso bo//rgyal ba dam pa/rgyal ba mchog/rkyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags
128a6(dkon brtsegs): par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do//de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//dpa' bo rnams
128a7(dkon brtsegs): ni thabs mkhas te//sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing //sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir//dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul//bye ba brgyad cur rgyal
128b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyidasangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang //da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal//byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/sangs rgyas zhing
128b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dag mdzad pas//ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pas//rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal//de dung dang po thugs bskyed par//de dang dir ni yongs bstan te//da dung du
128b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dren pa khyod//sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis//gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad//chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'//
128b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad de//brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang //la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis//sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de//'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi
128b5(dkon brtsegs): nus bud med cha byang spyod pa mdzad//dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang ganga'//'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te//pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin//'dren pa sna tshogs mkhas
128b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi//'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad//des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams//gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod//la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan//la lar mya
128b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'angs pra bstan//la la na ni 'khor lo bskor//lo lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad//sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du//dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad//bshums
129a1(dkon brtsegs): mdag kyang 'dzin par mdang //sems can sas kyang yang ma 'cha//'dod chags myi mengs chags pa'i tshul//'gas bla mi mang sa
129a2(dkon brtsegs): ltultar/sems can rnam par 'dul don du//'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad//rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te//byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis//
129a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnam par gdul don du//'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad//smyos pa ma lags smos pa'i tshul//zhab ma lcogs zhi ba ltar//rnam par 'phrul
129a4(dkon brtsegs): ba sna tshogs kyis//sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad//de ltar bsams sa mgon po khyod//dam d+ha'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab//dpa' chen khyod la phyag bye
129a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas bya'i rgyal po mda' bzongs brkyang
129a6(dkon brtsegs): sri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du maud po'i dad pa skyes te/bcom
129a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug
129b1(dkon brtsegs): stong mngon par sprul lo//lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/gser dang /dngul dang /bai dUr+ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tIg dmar po dang /rdo'i snying po dang bdun mo//
129b2(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sti bzhi'i lan kun b+hi dra ba ris bkra ba bAlta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to//rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/gso
129b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /dngul dang /bai dUr+ya dang /shol lo//gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba ding ka dang bu rnams ni gser/shar bu rnams ni dngul/dngul gyi ldan kan rnams kyi ka ba
129b4(dkon brtsegs): drang /gdang bu rnams ni dngo l-i/shar bu rnams ni gserA/bai dUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai dUr+ya/shar bu rnams ni shel/shel gyi len kan rnams
129b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/shar bu rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis
129b6(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bskor to//de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/'di ltar gser dang /dngul dang /bai dUr+ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tig dmar po dang /
129b7(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po dang bdun no//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste gser gyi dra ba dang /dngul gyi dra ba dang /bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang /
130a1(dkon brtsegs): shul gyi dra ba dang /mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang /spug gi dra ba dang /rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro//gdugs bkra ba
130a2(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to//de dag kyang 'di ltar ga ser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag gI/rgyal mtshan
130a3(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba ba lta na sdug pa/brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te//rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang /dngul dang /bai dUr+ya dang /shel dang /rin po che sna

130a5(dkon brtsegs): tog dkar po can sha stag sngon por sprul to//ba dan kha dog sna tshogs canaM bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon pAr sprul bar gyur to//bla re bkra ba blta na
130a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon pa rI sprul to/bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang /dngul skud kyi bla re dang /bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang /shel gyi bla re dang
130a7(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang /smug gi bla re dang /rdo'i snying po'i blo re ste/rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sho stag go//de nas bya'i rgyal po 'das
130b1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /ba da na
130b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das lto phul ba dang /de dag thams cad steng gyi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das
130b3(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas so//'di lta ste dper na/glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing na mkha' las song ste
130b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'du sa brtol du gzhog go/de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dwag+na dang /gdugs de dag dang /rgyal mtshan de dag dang /ba don de dag dang /bla re de dag par snang
130b5(dkon brtsegs): gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to//de nas mdab bzangs brgyad khri drag skyong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
130b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das lnga lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig du 'khod de thal mo sbyar nus phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
130b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mngon par bstod pa/rga dang 'chi las rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//sems can gzhal yas khe la
131a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so//bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu'i lus ldan zhing /
131a2(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang //dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i//sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar
131a3(dkon brtsegs): shog/bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing //mngon 'phrugs gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing //'gro ba

131a5(dkon brtsegs): bur rjod skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog/'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen la khyod lta bur//bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang //ma 'dris bco brgyad
131a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mthar phyin cing //'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog/bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang //rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang //brag
131a7(dkon brtsegs): cha na mkha' 'dro bar ston byed cing //ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po mdo ba bzang de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
131b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshags su bcad de gsol pa/rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams//rgyu ma//
131b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu rkyen gang lags pa//'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bos gsungs//mdab bzang rnams kyis rgyal ba mi chod
131b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis te//bla re na mkha' rgyas par gang bar bstan//lha ro bcus 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed//rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol//'gro ba thams cad
131b4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo rab sbyar cing //dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod//mkha' lding 'gro ba tsor 'gyur nyan par 'tshal//rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol//
131b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog khyod la 'khor dag mchi ba ni//'gro ba thams cad the tsom med 'gyur zhing //the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur//'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis
131b6(dkon brtsegs): shes mchis//'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//yongs su sra shing shin du skyon bsal bas//rgyal byas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste/slob ma mchog
131b7(dkon brtsegs): la bla mas bstan pa bzhin//the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bcad du gsol//rab tu dga'i mdzad rjes su sman po mdzod//dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di
132a1(dkon brtsegs): dus gyur nas//rang byung mkha' lding 'gro brjir 'gyur bsas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul la tshigs su bcad slar//

132a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mdab bzang 'gro ba rta thul dka' stsal pa//rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris//'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa//de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i
132a4(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis nyon//the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba bskyed//bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi chel zhing //stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis//'dren pa 'jigs med
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir//mdab bzang dbang pos nga la mchod legs byes/ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi//sred med bu lus shin tu 'khregs pa dang //
132a6(dkon brtsegs): sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams//yongs su btsal phyir ngo la mchod pa byas//rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang //gzhan yang
132a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rang dang //phum tshogs zhing dang 'phro rnam dgrol ba//'di dag kun bcol don du mchod pa byas//de dag ngal dga' bas mchod pa byas//
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas//lha dang brtul zhugasu mthun par de dag 'dong //'di na den slong srid pa'i tha ma yin//bskal pa bye ba gAng+gA'i bye snyed du//de dag lha
132b2(dkon brtsegs): mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing //rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas//de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste//mi khom mi
132b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung tshad med mi ldan med//rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun du mdzes//ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rab byung 'gyur//lo ni bye ba brkyang cu bzhi bgrangs par//'jig rten phan phyir/
132b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa de dag bzhugs//'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam gzhag pas//lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur//skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/'dus
132b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cu 'gyur//dri tshe slob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi//shin tu sems 'dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung //'dren pa de dag 'gro bI'i ngal bris la phyir//chos kyi
132b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur//mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che//mdab bzang lus su gyur nas stobs pa che//'di dge sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na/drang srong dka'
132b7(dkon brtsegs): thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur//stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste/dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal//de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis//dga' ba dka'
133b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to//nor bu skar mdog gi bla re khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa gcig kyang steng gri bur snang la mngon
133b2(dkon brtsegs): pAr sprul to//de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi bkru ba mig tu mdzes paM blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bres par mngon par sprul to/bla ri dre'i khro ra khor yub tu
133b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu gi ya ra ka'i dri ba mngon par sprul te bres so//rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang dag mngon par sprul to//klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba
133b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to//de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te na mkha' las 'dong
133b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing /rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la//lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la
133b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mthor//lha'i a ka ru dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /ud pa li'i phye ma dang /me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor//me tog ut+pa la
133b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /na bza' dang rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/lha ma
134a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyuthos d+d+ho wA byas pa bzhin du mchod pargya tshur byas so//de nas de dag gi myur mya mo snrel smyan b+h+yo ba phywag bcu rtsa drug po de dngag byas pa'i smras
134a2(dkon brtsegs): stong bsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gong bar gyur to/sems can+de gang gis rol mo'i sgra dri thos pa de dag thams cad kyad blan med pa yang dag par
134a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs po'i byang chub la snga phyir myi ldog par gyur to//nor bu'i skar myongag gi bla re de dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi lde ldi de dag dang /dril bu g.yor kI dra ba dag dang /khrung
134a4(dkon brtsegs): khrung rkang dkar de dag rlung gi so bskyod pa las 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sel stanA yadz+wa lag brgya dang ldan pa mikhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snun lnga/de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing
134a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to//sgra des kyang snying gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu bar gang bar gyur te/sems can ba gis rgyun gyi sgra de dag zos
134a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
134a7(dkon brtsegs): char dang /glos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur to/me tog gi char dbab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngang byeng skye 'gro zhing ldog go/spos chu'i tshing de bang bas
134b1(dkon brtsegs): srong myur banas kyi klung khyur can po'i khang yug r+b+ha dgu chad gru cu tshun chad smos nus rtsub tu b+hu hU~M/zlos ngos kyang stong gsum rgya na po 'dzi rten gyi mas rgyas
134b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gang hU~M rgyu b+h+yo//sems can gang gis skyes kyi de tshor bar m+b+hi ba dang ga thams cad kyang bran med lung dag par grungs pa'i byang chub las phy-ir mi ldog par gyur to//danas
134b3(dkon brtsegs): klu'i bu mo dadag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /nA b+hi ba byug dgu brgyartsa drug dang /rol po'i bu s+thAn bya ba phrog du na po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
134b4(dkon brtsegs): pobyas nas rgyun thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi ni mkha' lo la ng+tha /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la myog hU~M phyag 'a tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das lce lan bsu
134b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal b+hi phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to//de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so//klu'i bu mo
134b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dka' mgu yid kyi sre su//byang chub zhi batshul rnying shAkya thub ying ring mchod po chen po byas//rgyun gyis lpags brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi ga gas rnams
134b7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen sprul te//bde ba gshegs la mched cing ri tu rdul ba'i yid kyis tshigs brig/rkyen gyis khebs bdun bye ba gro bcu dru gi rna rnams mngon / khangs sbyin
135a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan//de dag thams cang bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis mchod pa byed//klu yi bu mo de dag drang ba'i yid
135a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis thub lnga mgos phyag 'tshal//mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis//mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dron pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po
135a3(dkon brtsegs): byas/sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub ying dag zhugs//de dag rnams
135a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis drer sbrul mkha'u la bla re chen po cig tu gyur//phyogs bcur dpag tshad drug bcur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs por gyur//nor bu rin chen skar ma'i
135a5(dkon brtsegs): mdog gi gi zi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal//klu yi bu mo dga' nas la gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas//gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang
135a6(dkon brtsegs): chub zhi ba tshol byed cing //'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pra grub par shog/ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug
135a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'dre ba ltar//chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol//chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la//
135b1(dkon brtsegs): char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med//me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni//'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang
135b2(dkon brtsegs): dag de nyid bstan par bgyi//sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur mchis shing brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa//skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa//byis
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs//de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan//ji ltar sa chen 'di
135b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga sprin khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang //yang dag tu nu ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis dri la gnas ma mchis//de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par
135b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid //shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa drag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis//yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod bstan pas//des na 'dren pa
135b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyed la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyung 'gyur//khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra//'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir
135b7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang //de lta logs pas sdig mod yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon//skyabs dang dpung dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi//gzhal yas byang chub
136a1(dkon brtsegs): de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod//sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog/de nas bcom ldan
136a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dras kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
136a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad//dpral sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yod mya mthong //mi yi dbang po dam pa
136a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang ngag gsungs//de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa//dri za rnams kyang skyong ba'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur//
136a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnams 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen//rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen por ma gyur yong ma mchis//de ltar bde gshegs
136a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs//de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur//thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la
136a7(dkon brtsegs): don kyang thob par mchi//'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur//bde gshegs
136b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung //'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te//sdug bsngal ngogs bcas yid mi bang
136b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba//de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsol the tshom dgum du gsol//drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tshom
136b3(dkon brtsegs): khum curgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par spangs shing bdud bcom thul//su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis//'di ni su yi mthu lags sngon
136b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol//thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur//khyod kyi zhabs kyi drang du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom 'tshal//
136b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tsom bsal du gsol//de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur//rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas
136b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid dga' 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni
136b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par dris//klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir des ni 'dzum pa bstan//de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon//gang gi don du
137a1(dkon brtsegs): das ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad da tshig la nyon//klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs//'gro ba thams cad stong par rnag
137a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas//'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med//myo so rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smrig rgyu mtshungs la me lcong gzugs
137a3(dkon brtsegs): brnyan 'dra//'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes so//rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs//mchod pa rnam
137a4(dkon brtsegs): par daphye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu rmu 'dra//byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'das stong //nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba
137a5(dkon brtsegs): stong skyes dus//klu las shi 'phos nas ni lce gnas pa N+DI byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur//sum bcu rtsa gsum song sti lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas//ma smad grags
137a6(dkon brtsegs): deng ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur//'thub bral lha nang gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod//lha 'gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas
137a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang //dga' ldan gnas suM lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur//de dag den lha
137b1(dkon brtsegs): yi bu mos bskor nus lha yi dga' ba spyod//pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas//'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rigs blo las nyams par
137b2(dkon brtsegs): yong mi 'gyur//skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la bskos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams//de dag dga' ldan pa nas der gnas de lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni//tshe tshad yongs su zad
137b3(dkon brtsegs): nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur//bde gshegs ma smang grags ldan drir yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te//mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshang bar du gnas
137b4(dkon brtsegs): na gnas par 'gyur//de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni//mkhas pa tshe zang blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas//'dren pa bsam pa
137b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can//chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur//de dag la gnas de ni gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyong
137b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur//mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs//bsam gtan bsam
137b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur//tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas//der gnas ngepe med
138a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskul par gnus par 'gyur//de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang //
138a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten dron ni mtha' yas byed//mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med//bsam gtan bde
138a3(dkon brtsegs): byabla mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi//kun du grol yidri drang srong phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan//mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo cig zhi ba'i mtshan
138a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'gyur//bde bar goshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol po//tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas//kun
138a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir//rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'dres pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston//tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed
138a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur//tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thugs shes nas ni//bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag
138a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba la//ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston//de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir//phan pa byas nas srog
138b1(dkon brtsegs): /chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bgrod//rgyal ba kun la chu chod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur//dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur//lha
138b2(dkon brtsegs): dang klu dang mi dang mdab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang //dri za grul bum mi 'am N+DI tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu//bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs spyad chos
138b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs rnyed pa//de dag thams cad yid rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgo sa phyag 'tshal//klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'i///dri nas klu'i bu mo
138b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos yongs su rdzogs par rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/'di ltar
138b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing //bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ma gzigs pa 'am/ma gsan pa 'am/mngon du ma mdzad pa
138b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/yang dag par mthong ba/nad med pa/dus chad pa med pa/nye bar gtod pa/'di mthong ba la don yod
138b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o//'di ltar bud med du gyur pa rjod
139a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slo ma dge 'dun yang
139a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par zhugs pa/drang por zhugs pa/rig par zhugs pa/mthun par zhugs pa dang /'di lta bur bud med du gyur pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mi bzad pa dang
139a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gi sra bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam+bu'i gling rgya
139a4(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyis khyab par byas so//spos kyi dri'i
139a5(dkon brtsegs): dadra des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can glang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
139a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar
139a7(dkon brtsegs): pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so//n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal bar bkang ngo //klu'i me tog gi mdun khang rgyar
139b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sbyar to//klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo //klu'i me tog gi bdun
139b2(dkon brtsegs): khang de la ying me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lnga lnga bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so//rin po che sna bdun gyi kra ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to//'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin
139b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to//'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste//'di lta ste dper na/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nI ga ltar
139b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa//kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bA nyams de ga' ba/sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong
139b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lta bu'o//nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang na/nor bu la la las ni me 'byung /la la lngas ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/de la 'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung //
139b6(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung /la la lus ni chu kha dog dmyur po 'byung //la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung //la la las ni chu kha drog sna tshogs 'byung ngo //nor
139b7(dkon brtsegs): bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung /nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dge bsam pa bzhin du 'byung //la las ni snum gyi bya ba byed/la las ni me long
140a1(dkon brtsegs): gi bya ba byed de/'khor thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to/ser skya'i gnas nu sems can gang ji snyed cig sgru ba de dag thams cad kyang
140a2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam paro sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sbrel ba mdzad pa/nyan
140a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to//'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs
140a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'thon par gyur to//rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /me tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /spos kyi lde ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rin
140a5(dkon brtsegs): po che'i lha lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /me tog brtsegs pa'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /dril bu g.yer ka'i
140a6(dkon brtsegs): dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to//de nas klu'i rgyalnga po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du bsgri ste/rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan
140a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la la ni gsum bskor ba byas te/nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to/'dun
140b1(dkon brtsegs): khangag gzhi de nas rin po che glang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag rnams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du cur bzhin du thub par gyur //klu'i rol mo so la snyan
140b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa da/kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to//de nas gru bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la len gi sum pa ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi skabasnga la
140b3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pasnga rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par blta la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir
140b4(dkon brtsegs): lhog pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yong dag par zhugs par gyur to//de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas//so so nas bla gos
140b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de//bcom ldan 'dus la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
140b6(dkon brtsegs): nas chings su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa//mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa//dka' thub dbyis pa dri med thugs rje can//rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa
140b7(dkon brtsegs): sa spangs te//bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung //lo drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de//rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi me sa kyang //bdu gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni
141a1(dkon brtsegs): zhum ma gyur//thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad//ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod//'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad do//'jig rten
141a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa//de thos pas kyang bdag tsog yid mi dga'//thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang //byang chub sems ni ji ltar bsgrub ma dzad pa//bde bar gshegs//
141a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na//de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur//gang tshe ka lid rgyal po bzod smra bas//zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams brtabs gyur te//de bzhin shangs/
141a4(dkon brtsegs): bcang rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa//de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'//phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste//gong tshe 'dren khyed srang la btsal gyur pa//rgyal ba'i
141a5(dkon brtsegs): de thos pas kyang mi bde ste//bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che//bdag cag mo 'tshal mI lags ci zhe na/bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa//ngan song
141a6(dkon brtsegs): mun par lhung ngas bde gshegs kyi//sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags//ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang //bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tsho blong gyur dang //
141a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa'i chen de la mi gnod pa//'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal gsol//mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la//nub pa klu chog so 'di dag rab tu brtson//ji ltar
141b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bzhin du spyod 'gyur ba//de ltar bder gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol//rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thor 'tshal zhing //klu tshog su 'di rnams thob pa bsgom par gnas/
141b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba 'di dag ba de bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i//brtul zhugs spyod pa bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs//lhag pa'i
141b3(dkon brtsegs): lha mang pos smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha
141b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag sna tshogs dang /kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbul
141b5(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu drub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub po rnams//rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa
141b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad ni//'dren pa bde ga shegs thugs rje che mnga' ba//mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol//tshogs kyi slab dpon skye bo 'di dag ni//'dzum rgyu nyan
141b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du blta//yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis//mkhas pa'i tshom rnam par bsal du gsol//'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thug/de ringasu
142a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid ni yongs su draga'//gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te//rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis//tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dran
142a2(dkon brtsegs): pa su zhig gis//bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis//bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis//shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum//
142a3(dkon brtsegs): sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing //'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du blta//tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol//'dren pa 'dzum po mdzad pa'i rgyu
142a4(dkon brtsegs): yang gsungs//de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te//rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur//bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na//gzhan
142a5(dkon brtsegs): du mi sems nan tan gnos par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs
142a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi slob dpon gyis//tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis//rta thul skyon mang sems kyis drang byos la//'dzum po mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par bgyis//klu
142a7(dkon brtsegs): yi bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te//'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas//skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol//snying
142b1(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi//'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten//'gro ba byang chub rgya chen thob bya lnga//'dren pa dag ni skye bar yong mi 'gyur//zhi gnas dge ba ye shes
142b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs ldan stobs//mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa//rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su//shin du yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro//'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam
142b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid rtogs te//gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas//mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thub//'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas//snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying
142b4(dkon brtsegs): rjecan//'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur//rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas/de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur//rtag tu bdag meng tshig ni nyan byed cing //
142b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la 'jug pa ste//de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob//de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med//'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi//rgyal ba
142b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/bde gshegs dka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang /bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur//srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod spong
142b7(dkon brtsegs): cing /rje rab pader 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur//mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang //yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur//thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos
143a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan//'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur//phyugs
143a2(dkon brtsegs): drang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur//de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan//bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur//de dag
143a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig thos sems can gang yang ni//bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med//bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi//'gro ba 'chi med yang dag thob par 'gyur//de tshe 'gro
143a4(dkon brtsegs): bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs//rga ba dang nin dang 'chi ba dang //mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su dgrol//cho ga de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur//klu yi
143a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa shAkya steng ge la//yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams//gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi//ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan//klu
143a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi//rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste//de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas//dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song //
143a7(dkon brtsegs): klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams dang //na mkha' lding rnams dang //klu'i bu mo rnams dang /
