143b1(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/'di
143b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/'di lta ste/
143b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na rgya mtsho chen po na rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad lnga the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan
143b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs la//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing //ngo mtshar du mi
143b5(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa ni ngo ra/tshar shin tu che'o snyam mo//de nas grul bum be ba phrag bco brgyud po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi rma chod bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir//rin po che sra
143b6(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi bra re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/'di lta ste gser gyi skud pa'i bla rI dang /dngul gyi skud pa'i bra ra dang /bai DUr+ya'i skud pa'i bla re dang /shel kye bla ra dang /
143b7(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang /spug gi bla re dang /rdo'i snying po'i bla raM sha stag go//rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par sprul te/
144a1(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnaMs la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga lnga ba rtse
144a2(dkon brtsegs): bai DUr+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/shel gyi bla re rnams la ni bai DUr+ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni sdug gi me
144a3(dkon brtsegs): tog gi phreng ba'i lnga lnga bkye/spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig+sa dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye
144a4(dkon brtsegs): bsha stag mngon par sprul to//shing rta bkrab blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin
144a5(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi gdugs zur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang /bai DUr+ya'i yu ba can dang /shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to//gdugs de dag la rin
144a6(dkon brtsegs): po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi mngon par sprul te/'di lta ste gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /dngul gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang /bai DUr+ya'i me tog gi lnga lI dang /shel gyi me
144a7(dkon brtsegs): tog gi lnga ldi dang /mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi ldalnga ldi dang /klu'i nor bu'i me tig gi lda ldi sha stag go//mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul to//
144b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis gdugs de dag dang me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzugs byas so//grul bum gyi rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to//shing rtad de dag ra re zhing yang bla re de
144b2(dkon brtsegs): dag re re rje su 'breng bar gyur to//de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang bla re dang me tog de dag gis bcom
144b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/mchod pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to//bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/bcom
144b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod de/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gi mngon par bstod pa/thams cad du yang
144b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bstengs mda' dbang can//thub pa chen po ma mtho mi dma' ste//ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba//mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol//'gro ba thams cad mying
144b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma dang //tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chaT mi mnga'//'dren pa khyod kyi ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas//shes rab ldan pa dregs pa yong mi mnga'//rgyal po khyod kyis 'gro ba
144b7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu 'drar mkhyen//rang bzhin snying ste rmi lam dga'adra dang //chu zla nam mkha'i smig sgyu lta bur ni//bde bar gshegs 'gro ba 'di cha dag gzigs//dri za'i grong khyer
145a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu/ wAr snang gyu byung //grong klo ni phyogs bcun nan med//gzhan da klod byung de ni mi tsa mAste//dab ba /shogs m+b+ha smai du
145a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/mchod pa 'di kun brig ci dzI bzhin te//shing rta gdugs dang b+he ra~M si lA stan dang //me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa//brag cha ji bzhin de dag da
145a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar gda'//'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang //sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/rmi lamo 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis//rtogs
145a4(dkon brtsegs): bigyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi//nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i//skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang //byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i
145a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas//gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par gyis//bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas//sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi//thub pa'i khrugs
145a6(dkon brtsegs): med chos rnams rab ston pa//mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chung nas 'dzub
145a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das laM tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar
145b1(dkon brtsegs): myi mnga'//ngo mchur 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na//'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal//rgyal ba'i zhal nus 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas//'gro ba 'di dag bachos
145b2(dkon brtsegs): som nyi 'tshal//the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum//mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs//gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag 'gyur//de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal
145b3(dkon brtsegs): yab mthong //deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis//mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal//de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas//gang gis 'du byed
145b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i yid zhig bcom//gang zhig yang dag mtha' lnga mi g.yo gnas//rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal//de rang su yis 'khor bcus bdud rnams bco mo//
145b5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par gyis//'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur//the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnan slang du//'gro ba kun
145b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi thal mo spyar cing gnas//'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom sol//rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
145b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcod de slar bka' stsal pa//rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris//'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na//'gro ba'i don langs khyod kyis byas par gyur//de don
146a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis//grul bum tshogs kyis ngal mchod byas te//zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/mtshar me nga mthong nas ni
146a2(dkon brtsegs): ngam gyur te//zhi ba'i chos la nga dgra yid kyang bzhag/de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de//zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang //lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing //
146a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed//snying rje bas ni da la mchod pa byas//rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams//mkhas pa de dag lngas de byas pas na//
146a4(dkon brtsegs): grul bum skye gran swa shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung //brgya byin lha yi drung du 'gro bar 'gyur//thugs thub byams don mdzad ston drung du 'drong //des ni cung zad yang dang yang
146a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan te//phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur/de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du//zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing //bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed//
146a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po rab tu bgos byed kyis//de dag skye bo med par 'jig rten khams//khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyang bar 'gyur//skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te//ngo mtshar
146a7(dkon brtsegs): med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//de dag zhing rnams gang tu 'gro rgyu ba//der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar sheso//de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na//ngo mtshar med par skye
146b1(dkon brtsegs): bo rnam grol byed//rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing spyod zhing //rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol//de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te//'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro//de ltar
146b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing //bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten ngogs bsal te//grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thob nas//'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar 'gyur//
146b3(dkon brtsegs): grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha mra yin rnams dang //nam mkha' lding rnams dang /klu'i bu mo rnams
146b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /klu rnams dang /grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas
146b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang dag par bka' stsal/bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang bstan la/chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/de bzhin gshegs
146b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la
147a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to//glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing
147a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/mgo bo ri re zhing sro bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/sau r-I rI la rdzing bu bdun bdun/rdzing tri bu re re zhing yang pad+ma bdun bdun/pad+ma re raM
147a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang 'dab ma bya ba phrag stong stong /'dab ma re re zhing lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun
147a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun zhing pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to//glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re re la yang /rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che
147a5(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gdugs byas pa dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga lI bres pa'i sha dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to//glang po che'i mgo
147a6(dkon brtsegs): thims cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla rA sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lde ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to//de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa
147a7(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag la zhon te lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan len cing ni mkha' las rgyu ste/bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug du bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom
147b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to//lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dang /lha'i ta ma la'i phye ma dang /ut+pa la'i phye ma dang /lha'i gser phye dang /lha'i
147b2(dkon brtsegs): me tog man+ta rA ba dang /man+ta ra ba chen po dang /many+dza sha ka dang /many+dza sha ka tshon po dang /pa ru sha ka dang /pa ru sha kra chen po dang /mdog dkar dang /mdog dkar
147b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag gis bcom lnga ni 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon pa ra rab tu gtor to//gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel dang /spug dang /mu tig
147b4(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang /rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang /sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to//spos kyi bla re de
147b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go/lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon duR+Sha bab po//spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser
147b6(dkon brtsegs): skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/spos chu'i rtsub de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
147b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas//sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa dang /rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra zos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na
148a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po ches srung
148a2(dkon brtsegs): gri bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang gar byed pa 'khrod pa dag gi mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so//lha'i bu mo de dag la la la
148a3(dkon brtsegs): ni lus kyi tshul bsgyur/la la ni tsan dan dang a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor//la lnga ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma
148a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thor la li nr-i me tog man+ta d+hA ra ba dang man d+ha ra bA chen po nas sgyu snar khra bo dang sgra smar brakra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor//la li nau gser
148a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang /dbyig dang /goser dang /rin po che snying pas blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor//lA la ni na bza' dag
148a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thodal le ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang sku rags dang gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo//la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi
148a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin//la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag
148b1(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no//de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag la zhon nas/bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa
148b2(dkon brtsegs): las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbar nas phyogs cig tu 'khod
148b3(dkon brtsegs): ngodongo bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa drag gis mngon par bstod pa//bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa//srid ba'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol
148b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na 'ang ma michi sA te//khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'//mi mchog khyod kyis so chen 'di steng du//grags pa mtha'
148b5(dkon brtsegs): yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan//'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchi so la//dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod//bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid//brjod pa
148b6(dkon brtsegs): tsam ste gzhan ni ci mu mchis//tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis//'on kyang bde gshegs khyod kyi 'gro ba sbyong //bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ongs med dang /gnas
148b7(dkon brtsegs): med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang //chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan//rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan//chos rnams gang yang bya ba med ma mchis//'jig
149a1(dkon brtsegs): rton gtso bo bya ba 'ang yongs su bstan//bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la//bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyi bkun kyang bstan//shing rta yan lag
149a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs dag/bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang //shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur//de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs//chos
149a3(dkon brtsegs): ni chos las yongs su bskul mi bgyid//chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis//chos rnams chos la nye bror mi brten te//chos rnams gang yang ma skyes mchi ma mchis//
149a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs//kun rdzob de yang de ni ma mchis te//'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes//tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsung//
149a5(dkon brtsegs): memig gi rang bzhin gang na'adra ma mchis la//bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par gzhag/chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstun pa na//'jig rten mkhas pas shin
149a6(dkon brtsegs): tu ngo mtshar mdzad//de bzhin bdag cag bang gshegs nyung gyur te//nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams//chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te//zhi ba'i go
149a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi//rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar//'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa//thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten
149b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas bstod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog/ji ltar bdu gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis//nga rgyal bsgrubs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba//'dod pa'i
149b2(dkon brtsegs): tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba//mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongs su dgrol//ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis//'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur
149b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga g.yo yi zhugs pas zan cing mu ma mthong //yongs 'thob spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol//ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cagra gisa?/'gro ba mi mkhas
149b4(dkon brtsegs): mig dang bral ba yi//sna tshogs yongs skyog nyid kyis log gyur cing //bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chung zin dgrol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu/
149b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//bde
149b6(dkon brtsegs): shig sa mthu' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad//'dren pa rgyu mu mchis par mi 'dzum na//bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs//nem nur gnod gyur
149b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi the tshom sol//bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas//skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur//'dzum po'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal//thub
150a1(dkon brtsegs): chen 'gro ba the tshom bsal du gsol//bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs//the tshom bral zhing sem nyi bsal bar gyur//bcom ldan 'das
150a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas//mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad//su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin tu//blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas
150a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur//gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas//bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad//'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongasu btang ste//bde gshegs 'dzum don
150a4(dkon brtsegs): zhal nas thob par dga'//sor bcu thal sbyang mgo la bzhag bgyis shing //dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du blta//nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa//
150a5(dkon brtsegs): dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten migo/'gro ba yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol//rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
150a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas bshad pa//khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa ste//'dzum pa de yi don ni
150a7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa//skye bo'i tshig thu chen don ni de ring 'phel//'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis//rnam par 'dren pa 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa//de ni ma log par yang ngas
150b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyis//bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon//dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing //bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byaso//chos nyid 'byung bar gyur pa
150b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste//chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin//rgya le ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas//rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur//gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba//
150b3(dkon brtsegs): desA ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs//de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur ra nas//rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas//byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing //dri
150b4(dkon brtsegs): za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do//nor pa'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos//'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pa//dri za'i ris bor
150b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yid gyur te//blo glos bzang rnams lha rnams lha yul pa//brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur//de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa//bye ba khrag khrig
150b6(dkon brtsegs): mngal mchod byed 'gyur//zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing //de dag lnga ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan//de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su skyong //de dag zhing yang rtag par
150b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs dag 'gyur//rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni//khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston//'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas//bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston
151a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa//rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas
151a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa ste/sangs rgya swa re re khrag khrog phrag mang ba'i//skal pa rnams su rdul nI de gnas par 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston//rgyal ba thub
151a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis//de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan//rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa//dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad//dri za lung bstan
151a4(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'thad 'gyur ba//de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'//dar ni bde par gshegs kyi gsung thos na//shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong //dri za lung bstan
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////bam po lnga pa//de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong
151a6(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid ranges te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid 'od pa skyes nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyedade
151a7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos nas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te//de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
151b1(dkon brtsegs): zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas sa sa rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dod pa skyes par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i byeng
151b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyur te/tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa//mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te//rgya mtsho'i chu 'dzin pad+ma 'tshal dang 'dra//de la
151b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa//mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod//ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'//gzi brjid chen po na mkha' gzhal rung gda'//shes rab
151b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs//tshad gzung dag par nus pa yong ma mchis//'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud//skye bo drang rung mI rung btul min pa//de dag
151b5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen//de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas//de dag ci 'dri'i khams la brten pa dang //de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang //de dag
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ci 'dra mA lus mkhyen//de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas//'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod//mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen//phrag do//
151b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam ma'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste//de bas mtshungs me kun du mtha' yang yas//'gro ba 'di //lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa//de dag mtshungs med rnams kyis rang tu mkhyen//
152a1(dkon brtsegs): de la ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas//de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas//bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs//chung za'i
152a2(dkon brtsegs): lum rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing //byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa//de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs//'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing //
152a3(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dre 'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang //lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams//de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs//mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang //
152a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar//ga lA brtan cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba//de dgra rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs//de dag rgyal ba'i
152a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan la rab byung ste//rnam par thar po'i sgo ni gang zhig gis//ci 'dra'i lam la de dag brten bgyis shing //ci 'dri'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen//byas
152a6(dkon brtsegs): pa blang rnams 'dre gshegs bstan pa la//rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mangs pa yi//bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/de dgu rnams kyang 'dren pos rab tu
152a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs//'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas//dmyal ba chen po ji srid gnas pa dang //ci 'dra sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba//de dag rnams
152b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs//gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de//rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing //chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas//mtshan ma
152b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing //'gro rgyud kun du smon pa rnams spangs te//lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas//phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te//
152b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs//mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang //mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa//de yis bla med sangs rgyas
152b4(dkon brtsegs): grub par shog/'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas
152b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bsol pa//mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa//mi yI zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni//
152b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol//ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas//bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal//
152b7(dkon brtsegs): mgon pos de dag the tshem bsal du gsol//'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur//de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed//gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs//gang
153a1(dkon brtsegs): dris sems ni bskul nas gnas par gyur//de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol//de ring 'khor rnams the tshom tshe 'chal zhing //kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal
153a2(dkon brtsegs): du ba lta zhing sdod//ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba//de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol//de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags//gang gis brtson 'grus bzang/
153a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di bstan lags/gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur//de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol//rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa//the tshim
153a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba yid gnyis legs bsal gsol//de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams//dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
153a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//rta thul khyod kyis dra ba legs par dris//de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas//rang byud 'dzum mdzad h+ya ni dris pas
153a6(dkon brtsegs): naston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyed kyis legs par mthong //de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya//gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas//'gro la phan pa'i don
153a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzum mdzad pa//dad pa'i yod kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis//rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas//gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de//'byung po'i
153b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas//byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang //chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang //mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i
153b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir/'gro ba kun du smon pa rnams spangs shing //byang chub mchog tu de dgra yid kyang btang //rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing //kun rdzob tsam du rig nas
153b3(dkon brtsegs): mi chags te//srid pa kun du chu la pad+mo bzhin//byang chub ma chog tu de dag yid kyang btang //de dag srid po gang du chags 'gyur ba//spyod par bshig ste thams cad legs
153b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa//de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste//byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes//skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste//de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin//dngos
153b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas//zhi ba bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur//phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid//byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid//gang spyod de yang
153b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong pa ste//ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min//ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te//shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas//shes pa po dang 'dra
153b7(dkon brtsegs): bar rtogs gyur na//byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya//stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya//mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin
154a1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ste//de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin//de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams//dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur//rang byung chos
154a2(dkon brtsegs): la de dgra yid ches te//zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ljon gyur//gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te//'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas//gnod sbyin rgyud
154a3(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams//mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur//de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis//zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang //blo tsan
154a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod//de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston//de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis//mtshan ma med par spyod cing dong gyur te//'jig
154a5(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas//'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod//de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas//byang chub bro med de yang thob gyur te//
154a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur//sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'brel//sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can//de dag ming ni 'jig rten
154a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas shes bya//zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi//tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni chang bar 'gyur//de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni//rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de//
154b1(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang bde bas bsam sgra thos par 'gyur//'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med//de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag/rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub
154b2(dkon brtsegs): tshechol/ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te//kun kyang brtson 'gru sa stobs kyis brtan par 'gyur//gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///
154b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong //lung bstan
154b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur to//khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la/srog dang /skye ba po dang /shed las skyes dang /shed bu dang /gang zag dang /
154b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang /bdag gi yang gang yang med la/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched de dang /
154b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dmigs/lus gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya'i las de yang mi dmigs//byang chub kyang mi dra minas/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs
154b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan po mdzad pa 'di ni nga mtshar rmad do//ci zhig las dgongs te bcom
155a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad//ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas
155a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi tsha ba nyid dang /sems can yongasu smin pa dang /zhing bkod pa de skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
155a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing nas zhing du 'dod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /mchod pa de'i mthu dang /sems can rnam par dgod pa dang /bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis
155a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
155a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par
155a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad pa/ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom
155a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
155b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud de/bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/rgyu ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas//shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes//stong pa nyid dang lung
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa//bde gshegs bdag gis ma 'tshal ba//gsung ba'i zla bu chos kyi dbyings//'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang //rang bzhin med gzung ji lta bu//mchod pa 'di ni
155b3(dkon brtsegs): glang zag mchog/skye ba 'ang ma mchis byang chub tu//sems skyed pa ni ji lta bu//skyes bu mchog gis bka' sprul pa'i//ldem po dag de bdag ma 'tshal//me dbang bdag pa
155b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na//'gag po ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung //de ni yang dag lung bstan pas//thob pa bdag gi the tshom khum//sgyu ma 'dral lha skye zhes//gsungs pa de ni 'di lta bu//ldem
155b5(dkon brtsegs): por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal//gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la//dge ba shes brten gsum ji lta bu/ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //
155b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal//g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams//rkang gnyis mchog gsungs ji lta bu//ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //dag bsal bcom
155b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon bdag ma 'tshal//rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang //rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu//the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes//shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal//zhi
156a1(dkon brtsegs): yod ces bka' stsal pa//chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu//mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag/bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol//sku mdzes gyur
156a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi rnams//nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu//chos ni rab tu spang bgyis na//mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu//brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang //'gro ba gzhan
156a3(dkon brtsegs): yang gsungs pa dang //las de bgyis pa ma mchis la//rang las can gsungs ji lta bu//bka' stsoli tshul 'di rnam pa yang //zil gyis mi gnon bdag ma 'tshal//
156a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon po de la bdag dogs na//bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol//dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la//byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs//dge sbyong rgyal po'i
156a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi tshul//de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal//chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la//spongs byed las ni zad bstan pa//tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang //bdag
156a6(dkon brtsegs): ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshalnga//yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsa lnga la//mA nor sbyin pa 'dra bstan mdzad pa//'di yang rab rib bral ba yi//spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du
156a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol//thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs pa//gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di//sal nus ma mchis de lta bas//bdag ni rgyal ba mchog le dad//de nas
156b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas//de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'
156b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa//stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa//bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa//gal te 'ga' zhig mi ston no//rgyal bas de lung bstan ma gsung //ci'i phyir zhe na 'di/
156b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu//rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur nas//'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste//de la 'phel med 'grib pa med//me 'thong shin tu yongs ngag la//ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi//
156b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du//ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis//chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na//mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes//yan lag rnams la
156b5(dkon brtsegs): brtags byos la//ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod//chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du//'gyur myed skye bo mkhas pas rtags//byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/blo sbyangs
156b6(dkon brtsegs): bas ni med par shes//skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed//de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa//stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis//
156b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams//'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa//log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur//de dag sngon
157a1(dkon brtsegs): chang ma thos pa'i//sems snyed chos ni ngas bshad na//byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams//'di la kun du rmongs par 'gyur//byang chub gzhol ba'i sems
157a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang //byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas//zil gyis ma non rang byung sems//rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur//'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba//de yang ma 'tshul ces
157a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa//'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis//gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis//grang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la//'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med//dngos po 'di dag mi rtag
157a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston//sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skyes pa//ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa//mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang //skye bo rnams la mtho
157a5(dkon brtsegs): ris be shred//gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la//dge ba shes bsten ces gang smra ba//gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir//gnas pa med pa'i dge bo shes bsten//g.yo
157a6(dkon brtsegs): bA ma mchis bgyi ba rnams//bstan phra ma mtshal zhes smras pa//shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang //shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs//mi gang bdag yid khas len
157a7(dkon brtsegs): cing /bya ba'ang bdag gis byas 'dzin pa//de dag la ni bya ba dang //g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad//rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang //rtogs shes nga yis gang
157b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa//byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams//rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa//de dag rnams lnga bstan pa'i phyir//rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs paston//kun du rtogs
157b2(dkon brtsegs): bi'i rtog pas bskyed//yang dag ma yin rtag pas bcings//zhi ba yod cing ches kun kyang //zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni//mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyi//kun du
157b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog las sred pa skye//skom pas ji ltar smin rgyu la//kun du rtog pas skom pa skye//mi mkhas de ni rtog pa'i rgyu//yod pa min la log par brtags//chu yin par ni mthong
157b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang //smin rgyo la ni chu med do//de bzhin yongasu rtogs pas dkrugs//sdug pa min la sdug par rtogs//byis pa 'dod chabras ldan pa dag/sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin
157b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis dang sdug medo sgrib rgyu chu bzhin te//smig rgyu la ni chu med do//de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med//gzugs de sdug pa ma yin no//byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can//
157b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur//chos rnams na mkha' 'dra ba dang //spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa//med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa//mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur//
157b7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na//bdag zhan dus ni mi shes pa//de dag stong zhes thos gyur no//bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye//de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te//na mkha' la ni mdung
158a1(dkon brtsegs): bor nas//stong pa gya nom spong byed de//mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por lhung //mtho ris 'jigs pa ngas bstan dang //skye ba'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag
158a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rdu las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te//byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag/rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis//rmi lam gang lo'ang dngos po med//log
158a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhe na//ngas ni lus kyi rnam pa bstan//byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med//shring rnams rlung gis bas pa las//me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no//bdag
158a4(dkon brtsegs): cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes//rlung dang shing la sems pa med//'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar//lus kyi byed po de bzhin no//bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la//byang chub yang
158a5(dkon brtsegs): dag bsgrub pa dang //legs spyad yod tsasra zer ba ni//de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos//mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste//de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi//lo la phung por spungs pa
158a6(dkon brtsegs): med nga'i sgrub pa de yang de dang mo tshungs//zad pa med ces gang smras dang /las zad ces ni ngas smras pa//stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med//tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan//
158a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mi tha' ni ngas bshad pa//phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'//log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams//gang dag mtha' ni mi shes so//mtshan nyid med par shes pa
158b1(dkon brtsegs): yi ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi//nges par ljon pa khyod nyon cig/yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi//byang chub blo ldan rnams la ston//chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa//
158b2(dkon brtsegs): a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan//de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la//mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te//'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni//a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan//chos
158b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad 'gag med pa//a yis chos la 'jug par bstan//a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa//de yang ljon pas shes par gyis//chos rnams rnam par rtogs med
158b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs//chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang //a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag/ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis//
158b5(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa dang zad smras pa//chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste//stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis//mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan//chos rnams kun la sgo med de//de dag
158b6(dkon brtsegs): med pas sgo mi 'byung //'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin to//a laM brten nas 'jug par bya//chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces//yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan//a yi
158b7(dkon brtsegs): sgo yi gzungs bstan pa//de yang ljon pas shes par gyis//chos kun lus med byang chub ces//blo ldan rnams la ras bstan pa//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//a
159a1(dkon brtsegs): la brten nas 'jug par bya//chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste//med pas de dag 'ong du 'du med//'di yang gzungs kyi sgra yin te//a la brten nas 'jug
159a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya//chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste//med pas de dag gdags pa med//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//a la brten nas 'jug par bya//chos rnams rang bzhin
159a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste//med pas de dag rang bzhin med//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan//gzungs kyi sgo mo nga la nyon//chos kun
159a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la bya ba med//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan//med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces//de bzhin gshegs pas
159a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//a la brten nas shes par bya//chos kun thogs pa med pa ste//thogs par bya ba de ni dmigs//'di yang gzungs kyi
159a6(dkon brtsegs): sgo yin te//a la brten nas 'jug par bya//chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par//mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya//chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa//de dag ming med shes
159a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya//chos rnams yang dag ma yin te//de dag ma lus rang bzhin med//'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te//a la brten nas shes par bya//gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba//de dag mthong/
159b1(dkon brtsegs): med bstan par bya/lta ba po ni med pa dang //de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro//chos kun mnyam med de bas na//mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med//na mkha' drang ni 'dra ba ste//chos kun///
159b2(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ma yin no//de lta lhag med chad pa med//mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med//gdung med bsil med che ba 'ang med//blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro//drang po ma yin
159b3(dkon brtsegs): yon po min//mun pa ma yin sngar ba min//mthong ba med cing thos med de//med pas gzungs su shes par gyis//g.yo med dang po'ang med pa ste//chos rnams gsal med g.yo
159b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med//'khrugasla med cing khro ba med//ci yang ma byed nyer zhi byed//skye ba med cing gnas kyang med//'gro min yod med 'gro sems med//nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/gsang
159b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med par shes par bgyis//mig can ma yin long ba min/blta bo ma yin mur bsgribs min//sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa yin//dul ba mA yin ma dul min//rgod pa ma yin
159b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba min//'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min//bden min brdzun min de lta bur//rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis//'jig rten 'dul ba'i phyir yin gyi//'di la the tshom gang yang
159b7(dkon brtsegs): med//gang bcang bya ba'i the tshom de//dam pa'i don du byung ba med//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhub pa lung bstan pa dang gzungs nges par bstan pas yong
160a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra tshim par gyur nas//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te//khang pa brtsegs pa shing la brten pa dang //pad+ma la brten pa dang /rlol
160a2(dkon brtsegs): brten pa dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa//gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa//rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis
160a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/bla re dang lnga ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang
160a4(dkon brtsegs): los skyes pa dang //theng les skyes pa dang /chu la so skyes pa'i mo tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu
160a5(dkon brtsegs): khung po brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/thang las smyos pa dang /chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag
160a6(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to//de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te/rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la
160a7(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing rnam pas
160b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i
160b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum po mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga'
160b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad//lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu//'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' sprul gsol//thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa//'khor gyis
160b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas the tshom mtshal//zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du//smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du blta//bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig/gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes//bdag
160b5(dkon brtsegs): ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur//me mchog dam pa the tshom sol//bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la//dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das//ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur//sla
160b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog bdag gi the tshom khum//thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis//bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing //the tshom ma mchis sem nyi chad//ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par
160b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de ltas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/'gro la thugs rtse mdzad pa dang //the tshom bcad slang ljon pa dang /mi ci rnams kyi lung gsungs pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das
161a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pA rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du//sangs rgyas yon tan bsten 'gyur ba//ljon pa'i
161a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan gang dris pa//rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris//ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa//bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can//de khyod dang ba'i yid kyis nyon//skye med
161a3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis nga la nyon//'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir//ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa//de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas//the tshom bcad pas nga la nyon//ljon pa la sogs
161a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci//bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa//de dag ngal mchod byas nas//'di nas shi 'phros mtho ris 'dong //bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur deng //mi yi nang na 'khor bar
161a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas//sems la dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur//mi yi seng ge de dag gis//sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/sbrul bkye rang ni lha
161a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas na//bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong //bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang //de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas//rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su/byang chub rnam par 'tshang
161a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyar 'gyur//rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la//mi yi seng ge 'jig rton mgan//chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas//stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur//de dag zhing du
161b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can grang //yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye//nyan thos theg pas gang 'byung ba//kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa//mi yi seng ge zhing der ni//byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba//
161b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste//mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur//gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams//bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing //yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes//de
161b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs//sems can rlabs chen de dag ni//smon lam rgya chen yun rang btang /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas//bsam pas rang bzhin rnam par spyod//nyon
161b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs 'joms pa de dag gi/zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni//dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams//ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag/de dag zhing rnams kun du yang //mi khom
161b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur//zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni//sems can rnams kyang bong bar 'dren//da ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis//mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad//
161b6(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan de thos 'khor rnams ni//kun kyang yid ni rangs par gyur//mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can brgyad
161b7(dkon brtsegs): khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid ras te//rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po/
162a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man d+ha ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so//de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'dos la lan gsum bskor
162a3(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas/tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal//srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba//bde bar gshegs pa
162a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje can//'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag/sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi//'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par//zhabs ma chog mdzes shing dga' ldan par//thugs
162a5(dkon brtsegs): rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal//ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe//mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang //de bzhin lha chags 'di rnams kyang //bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta//
162a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa'i dge spyod pa//dpag med ye shes phung po ldan//gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can//blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal//stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal
162a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa//de bzhin mi bo snyengs dri gsum sel//rgyal ba bco brgyad chos dang ldan//the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog//sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing //dpe byad bzang //
162b1(dkon brtsegs): po brgyad cu ldan//dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs//bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//tshul khrims stobs kyis mthar phyin pa//ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod
162b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can//bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba logs//ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa//ser sna mi mangs nyan thos btul//zhi ba'i
162b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul//skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod//gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa//bdag cag rnams kyang
162b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu yi//chos rnams 'dir ni thos par shog//ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi//bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du//'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang //
162b5(dkon brtsegs): lce mir bcas pa'i 'gro dad bgyid//de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du//snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni//'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba//srid pa'i rgyud las bskal bar bgyi/
162b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi//'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur ci bri/'gro ba sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa//srid pa'i rgyud las dpral bar bgyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das
162b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chung nis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcid de
163a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa//bde gshegs rnam par 'dran pa po//rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad//stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i//rgyu gang lags pa bka'
163a2(dkon brtsegs): sprul gsol//rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa//'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas//'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te//'dzum pa'i don ni nyen par 'tshal//don
163a3(dkon brtsegs): chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don//bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod//the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsa lnga gsol//gang gis rgyal
163a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyes par gyis//gang gis deng mchod bla med gyis//su zhig de ring gting thob gyur//bde gshegs bdag gri the tshom khum//de ring gang gyis bdud kyi gnas//
163a5(dkon brtsegs): dkrugs g.yengs kun du dkrugs par bgyis//dring sus lha gnas thams cad kyang //rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis//rgyal bla thub pa de lung ston//'gro ba'i the
163a6(dkon brtsegs): tshom myur du khum//de thos pa de gshegs 'khor 'di rnams//kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshags su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
163a7(dkon brtsegs): la slar bka' stsal pa//phreng ldan glang po can lha yi//lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pa//des nas 'gro ba mang po yis//don chen shin tu deng byas 'gyur//stobs bcu
163b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba ma dris par//sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston//de ni 'gro ba mang don du//de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus//phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis//nga la sems dngang mchod
163b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/rnga bskal pa blangs med 'das 'og tu//nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur//de dag 'di nas shi 'phros nas//mthun par mi yi nang skye sa ti//rgyal ba bye ba dag
163b3(dkon brtsegs): med la//me tog mchog gis me chod par 'gyur//kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems//bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur//rang 'byung mi yi seng ge la//tshigs
163b4(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur//ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis//rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yos ma /me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis//mi mchog rnams la
163b5(dkon brtsegs): bstod byas te//de dag bde gshegs rnams ma chod cing //mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas//rab tu dka' ba'i bskol pa la//rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung //grags pa

163b7(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten med//zhing de na ni lha min med//mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom//phreng ldan glang po can lha yi//longs spyod sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi//ci 'dra ba ni de
164a1(dkon brtsegs): 'drar 'gyur//'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med//de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag/mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos//de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi//skye bo rnams
164a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos can 'gyur//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag/gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed//'gro bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams//gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston//grags/

169a3(dkon brtsegs): bopo che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/de'i 'og tu N+Da cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phyug brgyad cu la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
169a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas//lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phulnga bar gyur to//lha'i ro la mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par
169a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/
169a6(dkon brtsegs): lA lA ni gar byed//lA la ni rol mo byed//la lA ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing //lha ma yon gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so//de nas sum cu rtsa gsum
169a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar spru la pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dge bcom ldan 'das la mi chod pa byed pa las na chos thams
169b1(dkon brtsegs): cad sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas//de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te//sprul pa dang 'dra bya yin
169b2(dkon brtsegs): no/snyam du sems par gyur cing dri dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas/chos la the tsom med pa thob par gyur to//de drug de ltar the tsom med
169b3(dkon brtsegs): cing nem nur med par gyur nas//bcom ldan 'das lnga lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
169b4(dkon brtsegs): do//de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dre bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong //mchod pa de dag kyang sprul po dang 'dra bar mthong /bcom ldan 'das
169b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sprul ba dang 'dra bar mthong nas//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/de dag gis chos thams cad sbrel pa
169b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas the tsom med cing n+dem nur med par gyur te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/'gro ba kun gyis
169b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa gang bgyis dang //sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang //lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa//'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid//'dren
170a1(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang //de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang //'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes//de ltar lha
170a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de dag blo gros skyes//bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du//ston pa'ang de bzhin sbrul dang 'dra ba ste//rgyal bas lung bstani bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas//
170a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis so//rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas//byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags phra//de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin
170a4(dkon brtsegs): te/bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no//slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang //bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa//de dag kun kyang bcom
170a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan sbrul dang 'dra//bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so//bcom ldan gang rnams mi slu lhur len cing //bAse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs sra//de dag rnams
170a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sbrul 'dra bcom ldan 'das//bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis so//glang rnams 'phro ba kun la bde phan phyir//rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'o//
170a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang //khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra//bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren po ma cho ga/stobs bcu shes
170b1(dkon brtsegs): rab mtha' yas thugs rje can//ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten ga tsI ba dag/sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs//'dren pas 'di la chos rnams grang gsungs
170b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing //sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa//de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no//bcom ldan 'di la chos
170b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam gang dag kyang //sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma ma chis//grang tshe go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di//bdag cag rtogs nas the tsom thams cad spangs//sbrul
170b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas//bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur//bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rnams//the tsomi ma mchi sa
170b5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung 'dren par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa grwasum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su rgud nas
170b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de ga sol pa//gru zhal yas grags myang mtha' yas gzi brjid cen
170b7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad//rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na//rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tsom khum//rang byung bde gshegs
171a1(dkon brtsegs): wAl nA 'dzum pa 'di//byung bar rigs nas 'jig rten ni tshom 'tshal//'gro ba'i phyi tsom thub pas bsal du byas la//'gro ba 'di dag ba tso
171a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis mdzod//lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas/rgyal ba bstod de lta rdzas rnams kyis mchod//bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad//rgyal ba
171a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bku' stsol gsol//zla 'drer dri med 'od mnga' mtha' las gaTI//ci nas bde ga shegs bka' ni 'di thos pas//mgon po 'gro ba thams cad
171a4(dkon brtsegs): dashAr 'gyur bar//rgyal ba lho rnyogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol//bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di sras chos rnams kun//sprul pa lta bun rnam par rtogs byudun/
171a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' bas doni 'di bka' stsal to/rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs//skye bo 'di dag the tsom bral gyur nas/thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod pa rtsom
171a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dris thos gyur te//dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lo tshogs su bcad
171a7(dkon brtsegs): de slar bka' stsal pa/lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas//rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste//'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bsten
171b1(dkon brtsegs): to/lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa//des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas//'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstun gyis//dpa' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon//
171b2(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni//mA lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas//chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing //rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por
171b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe//mi yi gtso bo gang gi'i bye snyed mchod//srid rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las//chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo //
171b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'drir byas pas//chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong //bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni//chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod
171b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur//lha tshegs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te//chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas//bskal pa dad+ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe//smra ba'i zla ba ma yi mchog tu
171b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni//bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po//chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing //'gro ba khrag khrig
171b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag med 'grol bar 'gyur//bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa//chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems//zhi gnas de la su sten bag yod pa//myur du bla
172a1(dkon brtsegs): med byang chub mchog zhi thog//sum+b+ha cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o////de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lja r+ya
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag bzhi bcus lha mo yin rnam nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rang
172a3(dkon brtsegs): te/rab tu draga'i zhing dga' ba dang /yid dang bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing //sangs rgyas kyi
172a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/de dag thob nA ma shes pa 'am//ma mthong ba 'am/ma rtogs pa 'am/mngon du ma byas pa 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag pa 'am/
172a5(dkon brtsegs): las samA/las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do//'di ltar dri bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang /don
172a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do//de yang ba com ldan 'das kyis/stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs pa rab tu
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen lags par mngon du mdzad pas/de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod bar de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so//
172b1(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste//shes par bya ba ma yin pa/rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa//ma bstan pa rab tu ma
172b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ma thob pa thob par ma byas pa/ma shes pa rnam par ma shes pa/ma bstan pa ma mthong ba ma btags pa/'dzin du ma bcug pa/rtogs par ma byas pa/thob par
172b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa/ma thob pa/nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ma bor ba/ma bzhag pa/ma spangs pa/bya ba med pa/byed pa med pa/rab tu zhi ba med pa/ma smang ba ma bstod pa/thob pa ma yin
172b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ma thob pa ma yin pa/bde ba ma yin pa sdug bsngal ma yin pa/snyan pa ma yin pa/mi snyan pa ma yin pa/gzugs ma yin pa/gzugs med pa ma yin pa/grangs med pa//
172b5(dkon brtsegs): babrang ba med pa/'jig rten med pa/'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/rnam par byang ba med pa/'gro ba med pa/ldog pa med pa/ma brtags pa/rnam
172b6(dkon brtsegs): par ma brtags pa/ma g.yos pa/ma bsams pa/ma bskyod pa/mngon par 'dus ma byas po/ma spros pa/spros pa dang bral ba ste/'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma
172b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/mig dang rna ba dang /sde dang /lce dang /lus dang yid kyi
173a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang ro drang reg bya dang /chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba
173a2(dkon brtsegs): dang sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma tshan ma mi dmigs pa/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi
173a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba'i
173a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmyigs pa/gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan
173a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mi dmigs pa/chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/sra dang chu dang me dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' dang rnam
173a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas pa'i
173a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjed pa ste/sangs
173b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi lhun bu mi shes pa rnams kyis zlos nu/'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/
173b2(dkon brtsegs): dos 'jigs par gyur pas/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/'khor ba ni yod
173b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la
173b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
173b5(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshol nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
173b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs//khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/kun
173b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs//'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa 'di gnyis te/khyod kyis gzhon las ma gsan rang gis gzigs//de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste//bden
174a1(dkon brtsegs): /pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so//gang gis bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba rnams//bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba//rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du//'jig
174a2(dkon brtsegs): rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to//sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa//sems can dmyal dang drod 'gro yi dgas dang //lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams
174a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad//rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang //phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang //bran gyi tshogs dang
174a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs//bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang //'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung //mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa//kun
174a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzob bde bar mkhas pas thugs chud nas//'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to//de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na//'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste//thob
174a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang //bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo//thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed//ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur//gang
174a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma bsten tshul 'dis shes par bya//nid rnams brgyad kyis de rgyad gnod par 'gyur//kun rdzob de la don das su smra ba//de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/
174b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang /bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang //mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing //de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa//de dag bder
174b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na//'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid//de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas//sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad
174b3(dkon brtsegs): skyong/de dag tshul min+d+ra bde tshal bgyid kyang //sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur//'dig sbyin dran pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis//ma log rgyas ni rnam par
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur na//sbrul gyi lpags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te//srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur//chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste//stong pa mtshan mu med
174b5(dkon brtsegs): pa do dem zhes//gang gis zas naste dga' ba skye 'gyur //de dgra tha med byang chub rjeb par byung/ji ltar bde ba gshegs pas gsus pa'i chos//de la lha rnams bcom
174b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis kyi//'gro ba thams cad yongs su da grol ba'i phyir//de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshul//byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams//skyes bu mchog gis dga'ab
174b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed tu gsol//de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad tu//blan med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thib bral ris kyi lce bye ba phrag ba ni bcu pa
175a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum bya mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol
175a2(dkon brtsegs): ba/'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des//khyod kyi 'khor ni the tsom 'tshal bar gyur//mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol//des ni 'khor
175a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos 'gyur na//'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur//rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la//bde ba nan tan
175a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur//rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'dir ni mchog ldan te//drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod//'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du//snyan pa'i
175a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol//sangs rgyasnga yon tan mthu dge thos byu rA na//skye dgu kun la rab tu sman bur 'gyur//bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na//mkhas
175a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni tshul bzhin pa rtsom par 'gyur//mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dzir//the tsom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par sol//'khor rnams thams cad thos par
175a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing stod//lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te//khyod kyi lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la//sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing
175b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag nyan//'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//'jig rten phan phyir
175b2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs pas 'jam mdzad pa//rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan//sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na//skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur//sangs rgyas yon tan
175b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la blo zhan cing //'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang bre ldan dang //tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang //gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur//gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga'
175b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang //gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang //gang rnams snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur//gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te/
175b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa//de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na//ud pa la phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur//nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa//sngon gyi rgyal la
175b6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur sngon byas te//de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di//me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta//'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la//bsnyen bkur byas/shing chags
175b7(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa ste//nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur//snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan//rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang gi yi//bye snyed kun la sngon tshad bsnyen bcu
176a1(dkon brtsegs): byas byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing //dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas//sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas//sdug bsngal gyur pa
176a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la snying rje bskyed//de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la//chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur//gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa//rnam
176a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren chos lnga 'jug pa 'chad par gyur//mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas//de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad//rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de
176a4(dkon brtsegs): dag rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad//de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas//'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam
176a5(dkon brtsegs): pas stong //rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra//rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas//kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas//de dag nga la mchod
176a6(dkon brtsegs): pra rgya chen byas//bdag gi cho sra bzhin du ni lung bstan nas//skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal ba dam pa la//bla na med po'i byang chub thob par 'gyur//bde bshags mnyam pa
176a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa bye ba'i phrag/nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur//blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro//sems can bas ma yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur//'thab bral 'khod
176b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams//rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa//rgyalnga ba dgra rgyal drang song chen po yis//lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtun dgal////'thab bral
176b2(dkon brtsegs): ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o///de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lho bye ba phrug brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa
176b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas//'di snyam du sems te//gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ci
176b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sam/'on te tshor ba 'am/'on te 'du shes sam/'on te 'du byed dam/'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
176b5(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan snyam nas//de dag 'di snyam du sems te//gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mu bstar to//tsher ba dang /'du
176b6(dkon brtsegs): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs kyang ma
176b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa/byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
177a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'byung rgyu bar bya/gzugs kyang
177a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa med pa/byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/rnam par shes po'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa//byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/byang chub kyang
177a3(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa/rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/rnam par shes
177a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/
177a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/byang chub kyang dmigs su
177a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa nas/ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang /spros pa med pa dang /gnyis su med pa dang /g.yo ba med pa dang /dmig su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa'i
177a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya//de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na/'di la sangs rgyas ni gang /byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /byang chub ni gang /lung bstan pa
177b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gang /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
177b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong //lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/de ltar chos thams cad
177b3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang /lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni the snyad tsam/ming tsam/brda
177b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam/kun rdzob tsam brjod pa tsam/gdags pa tsam ste/de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o//'di lta ste dper na/mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i
177b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse bu las de la nyal ba las sad na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/de rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing /de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de
177b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byeng chub sems dpa'i thegs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te//byang chub ma rnyed cing ro mo myong bas sdug bsngal du
177b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor pa ste/chos de dag gi don ni rnam par gzhan la so so'i skye ba de dag kyang rnam pa go zhan du zhen to//chos de
178a1(dkon brtsegs): drag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na/dri la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yis//gang zhig byang chub yin/gang+gA zhag lung
178a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yin/de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/so so skye bo yang dmigs su med de//so so skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/nyan thos kyang dmigs su
178a3(dkon brtsegs): med/nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su
178a4(dkon brtsegs): med/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/sangs rgyas kyis chos kyang dmigs su med/byang chub kyang dmigs su med//
178a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do//bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tsom ma mchis//yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas/dga' ldan ris kyi
178a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de dag la the tsom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las
178a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs li mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du
178b1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de//phyog su gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa dag gis mngon pa du bstod pa/gang dgu sangs rgyas yon d+han+da/
178b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gnos pa//de dag 'jug pa de bzhin ni shegs pa klu sa// byung skye gas me nI rnye b+hur des//men sa pa med pa'i snying yul spyong pa ra//gags da
178b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'du shes ma mchis te//sems dang bsapa bde ba'i rnamam go /su med rlo ma rnams kyi spyod yul legs//mi yi seng ge zung po de de ni la dkris//skyes budam pa mas
178b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi/byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis//phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nis//sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan//de dag byang chub smon pa ma
178b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing //byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smon de/dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par//ba gshegs sras rnams spyang po skyed byed pas//bde gshigs rnams kyis
