178b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams many+dzum b+ha gzigs//de la rgyu lu sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams//yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing /mkhas paM de dag 'jig rten 'din snyeng //gzugs kyi mthun
178b7(dkon brtsegs): marnam par gzhig gyes shing //mtshan mo'i rnam pa thams cad rab spang sa te/srid pa gtsum le de dag yong mi rlon/ rje sa po stong par blon lam de dag pa byed//phung po 'di dag ma sbyi
179a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur cing //lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes//de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis//
179a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams//de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te//mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'chal ba//de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab//gang zhig phung
179a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'gag pa ma mchis shing //khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos//byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa//bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang //kang rnams
179a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'tshal cing spyod bgyid pa//'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis//'gro ba thams cad 'dag med blor gyur ni//de 'dra'i blo can byang chub rnyed mi dka'//phung
179a5(dkon brtsegs): po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang //byang chub rgyal ba rgyal las mi g.yo bar//gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te//de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags//
179a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang //khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang //lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par//gang gis 'tshal ba de dang rgyal
179a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras//rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste//khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang //byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams//ngo bo nyid kyis stong par dang
179b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang //phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang //skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang //lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing //de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal
179b2(dkon brtsegs): bo'i sras//gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma legs te//ma chis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags//'dus byas ma lags 'dus mo byas ma lags//de ltar gang 'tshal de
179b3(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal ba'i sras//rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing //ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la//de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing //'dren pa 'khor dang
179b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas la bsnyen bkur lags//rnam par 'dren pa'i bstod pa'i bsod nams gang //ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi//dag pa de yis 'gro ba ma dung pa//rgyal ba mtshan
179b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan par grub par shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul bris
179b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//'dren pa rgyu yi skyobs ni gang zhig gis//stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa//'dzum pa'i rgyud 'dren pas bka' stsa la
179b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol/rjedes ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur//shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa//'gro ba 'dis mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te//nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi ses
180a1(dkon brtsegs): pA ra kun kyang 'jog rten phan pa'i zhal du lta//'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba//sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzini bgyid pa//de bzhin 'khor 'di lung
180a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan thos 'tshal zhing //rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta//'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste//sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan//
180a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te//kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod//de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyod cing //ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga'
180a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang //sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas//ye shes stobs kyis the tsom gcad du gsol//mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab//the tsom 'tshal
180a5(dkon brtsegs): pA'i the tsom pas la du gsol//sangs rgyas slar sngo'i ngag ni mi mnga' na//rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
180a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la//'dzum pa'i de ni dris de ni dus dang ldan//de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na//de
180a7(dkon brtsegs): ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas//'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa//gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te//nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i//dga' ldan
180b1(dkon brtsegs): lha yis desam pa mkhyen nas mdzad//'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mtho nga //rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par gyur//grang lnga 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i//rnam
180b2(dkon brtsegs): bar thar pa'i sgo gsumo rab tu rtogs//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas//bsom pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus//de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms//sngon
180b3(dkon brtsegs): chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan//de dag de bzhin grwa shegs dang deng phrad cing //skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas//stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas//de ring 'gro ba'i
180b4(dkon brtsegs): don chen shin tu byas//'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du//byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang //gang dge zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang //byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med//
180b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba//de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes//lha rnams gang yang de la the tsom med//byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod//de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag
180b6(dkon brtsegs): med ji bzhin du//lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i bri ldan te//mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na//de phyir 'di dag rgyal bya reng byung 'gyur//gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas//
180b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yong med pa ngal nem nur med//'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa//de la'ang lha rnams the tsom yong med do//chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/byang chub
181a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang //thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med//de la'ang lha rnams the tsom rnam par dag/blo mchog ldan pa'i dga'
181a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan lha 'di rnams//kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te//de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'//rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur//'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i
181a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal ba la//'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur//rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni//rang 'byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o//de ltar rgyal bas dga'
181a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan lha rnams kyi//bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa//de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang //yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur//dga' ldan
181a5(dkon brtsegs): pi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa//'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan
181a6(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas//tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te//rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang //yid bde ba skyes nas///
181a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing //de bzhin nyid la the tsom med par gyur nas//stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal naso//bcom
181b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal
181b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar na//chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang //sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang //mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang //mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang //mi zad pa'i mtha'
181b3(dkon brtsegs): dang //mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste//mtha' ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas
181b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//'byung
181b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o//ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o//bcom
181b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyis rjes su song ba lags te//chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das
181b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste//byang chub gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o//
182a1(dkon brtsegs): thun mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo//de ci'i skad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/mtshams med pa rnam
182a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
182a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya
182a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no//bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur
182a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni//mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'chal bar 'gyur na//yang dgra pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor
182a6(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na/de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan
182a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la bdag cag som nyi ma mchis the tsom ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsom ma mchis na/de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
182b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'chal bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis du
182b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sregs pa 'phrul dag rI ris ky-i lce bye ba dreg bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bsnyen pa gsan nas/'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya pa'i phyir ngo
182b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad//'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod
182b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma bstan te//rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang //rgyu ba mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas//khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa//mthong nas ltar bcas 'jig rten tha tsam
182b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang ljags rang byung gsungs//the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsil du gsol//khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad rgyud thos gyur na//'khor 'dri thams cad ngo 'tshar
182b6(dkon brtsegs): thod par 'gyur//byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du//de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dge 'gyur//the tsom 'tshal ba dgI ni nam du yang /byang chub yid bzhin bde bar
182b7(dkon brtsegs): drung ste//the tsomo som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams//byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur//rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dang//sdig pa yongs spangs byang chu
183a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan//lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na//rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur//de bas rgyal ba thugs rje che bskyed cing //the ca
183a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba rnams la thugs rtsibs//lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing //'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
183a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ras ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad//rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa//lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus
183a4(dkon brtsegs): par bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon//'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis//thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bsten to/mu stegs
183a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas//'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags//gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la lhung ba ltar//de la the tsom za bar mi 'gyur te//de ltar the tsom
183a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshul thob pa//bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes//nyi ma nub gyur na ma sros gyur pa'i tshe//mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes//de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras
183a7(dkon brtsegs): po tshul thob dag/bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes//skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni//sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsom med//de bzhin rgyal
183b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sras ba rtul thob dag/bdag cag thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur bar shes//ji ltar nyi ma chub par gyur pa'acha//nyam mi mthong sems can de dag shes//de bzhin pa gshegs sus
183b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul shes pa//ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes//chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'thur zhing //rgyu 'tshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes//de bzhin bde gshegs//
183b3(dkon brtsegs): sras po tshul shes pa//byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes//ji ltar gnam du byung ba 'phangs pa ni//sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tsom med//de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas
183b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag kyang //'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/gang thos nas n+ya the tsom med 'gyur zhing //sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la//rang gi sar nye lag
183b5(dkon brtsegs): stong ma yin par//mkhas pa rnams kyi sa chos nyid rab tu mthong //gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang //chos la mkhas pa
183b6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid rab mthong ba//de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus//de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing //bdag gis pa dag nyid lung bsten brjod byed pa//de la 'dren pa chog
183b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul mkhyen pa//mi byung lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad//de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la//gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shod/de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes
184a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sgra lnga//'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad//rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams//bla med byang chub thob par byur sems pa//de dag tshul
184a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i//'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya//gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing //mkhas pa gang dag pode gshegs bsnyen bkur ba//
184a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal//tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur//gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad//sha khrag lpags la mi lta byas
184a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bas//gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na//de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub da lta min//'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang //ma 'ongs sems can
184a5(dkon brtsegs): phran bzhed gang 'byung dang //da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa//kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob//rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa//
184a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dgra nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing //'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas//tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur//'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin
184a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa//de yis rgyal ba rang 'byung gnas pa'i rnams//de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul pa//tshul thob rnams kyis sngon bsten myur du thob//de la rta thul
184b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sgyu smra rnams ni//sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med//sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtseg/tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod//de ltar
184b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te//brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min//rtag tu dog bla shes mkhas pa bstan byas na//bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur//bde bar gshegs
184b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung mchog thos nus ni//'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te//rjes su yI rang the tsom med gyur nas//mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur//'phrul dga' ba lung
184b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i la'u ste/bco brgyad pa'o//bsa~M po bdun po//de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur lce sogs pa/gzhan 'phrul dang byed kyi ris kyi lha khrig khrig phrag
184b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar ngag gi mchod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yo da thos nas tshim zhing mgu le yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang
184b6(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag bris ni
184b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang des dmigs
185a1(dkon brtsegs): ba / pad+mo// ni dog pa pa yang da/ na 'ag rdzun / na /
185a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la lce/de nyis sna ma mchis pa'i rgyus rnams lnga chos rnams ni banyis kyi med pa rna / sems na/de 'di namya du dag gi
185a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa de'itshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems rgyu lags kyang de ni lem log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhen/bai com ldan 'das gling ledi
185a4(dkon brtsegs): rlub kyi ston pa de ni lam m-i gas hUM lags te/bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'byung rgyu byur ba kyi phyir chos de ning yang ma mchis sa nga na
185a5(dkon brtsegs): ni bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so//bcom ldan 'dus chos ni 'das pa ma lags/
185a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi lags//da ltar byung ba ma lags/'dus byas ma logs/'dus ma byas ma lags/dngos po ma lags/dngos po me mchis pa ma lags/mngon par shes par
185a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags/yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma logs/spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/bsgom par bgyi ba ma langs/mngon par bgyi ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
185b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la/chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po mu ljags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos de ni kun nus nyon mongs pa ma lags//
185b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byung ba ma lags te/gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/gang rjes der gnyen por gyur ba'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang
185b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis mi dmigs so//de ni'i slad du zhe na/com ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/yongs su shes
185b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma bgyi bya ma lags/spad bar bgyi bi mi legs/bsgom par brtsi ba ma lags/mngon du bgyi ba mi lags te/bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral/
185b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o//gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i gyi
185b6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang brel ba'o//gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bya'o/
185b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o//'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o//dus
186a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o//bcom ldan 'das da ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/skye bu dang 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/'das
186a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bzung ba 'am/ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/da ltar byung bas bzung ba 'am/'dus byas kyi bzung ba 'am/'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad
186a3(dkon brtsegs): du mi dmigs te/de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma legs/spang bar bgyi ba ma lag sa/bsgom par bgyi
186a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags/mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
186a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o//de nas gzhan 'phrul debang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
186a6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/bcom ldan srid pa mthar phyin legs par bla sungs//'dren pas srid pa'i snying po mu brnyes nA//skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs
186a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yis//'khor ba'i pha rol bzod phyir rab tu 'azhes//phung po rnams ni kun du mi dmigs te//phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid//chos gang gang gi gnyen po
186b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni/mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so//nga bo nyid kyis stod phyir dngos po gang //yongs shes bya dang spyad bsgom mar byag/gang yang ma mchis glang du'ang mi dmigs to//nga//
186b2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung //byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs to//byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no//sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/byang chub sems
186b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur//mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa//dri dge byeng chub 'ched rgyar sems bskyed kyang //mdza na sang skye 'i snong yul log pa ste//praM gr-is ngan pas
186b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam mi spyod//mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la//spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan lo mkhas//mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te//stong dang
186b5(dkon brtsegs): mo stong de bzhin da migs med pa//mkhas pa de dag byang tshub lam la spyod//de dag byang chub dam pa zhi po 'thob//phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min//gnas dri nyan thom
186b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis 'greng bya min//rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro/ste//rnam grol sems ldani zag med za ba med//dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang //de bzhin rang rgyal
186b7(dkon brtsegs): skyobs par gyur pa dag/mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med//go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang //nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la bsgom pa dang //gang rnams stong pas stong zhes
187a1(dkon brtsegs): stong sgra dang //chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus//sangs rgyas ma sprad rnams kyi bslab pa la//slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnam//
187a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs//ston pas bsten pa bzhin du dgyes byed logs//sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pa snu na//bdag cag bskyod
187a3(dkon brtsegs): nams mi tshung gang thob des//'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing //mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang
187a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur la sogs pa/gzhan 'phrul dbade byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo phal po che de dag gri dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
187a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyen nas//
187a6(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la//thub pa sa 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na//rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol//'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad
187a7(dkon brtsegs): ces/ rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsungs//'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu//'dren pa bka' stsol the tshom bsal du gsol//drang srong chen po'i
187b1(dkon brtsegs): zhalnga nas 'dzum rig nas//thub chen khyod ni 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal//gau ta mra rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la//'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol//'di dag 'khor
187b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te//mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod//'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal//don yod grogs mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol//
187b3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs bstan la the tshom mi mchis te//phyir zhing dang bskyed rim gror cher bgyid de//the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar//rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par
187b4(dkon brtsegs): khum bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing //gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa//lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchi mochi//de bos skye bo'i the tshom bcad
187b5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lu chags su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas//tshigs su bcad de dus su/
187b6(dkon brtsegs): gang smras shing //'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa//khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin//rta thul dri ba de yo don dris pas//skye bo tshogs tshon 'di yid rmyi byas gyur//khyod kyis
187b7(dkon brtsegs): de dris skye bo tshogs chen don//byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te//rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngos bstan to//'jig
188a1(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pas bstan pa'i lam de nas//don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong //gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par//smig rgyal ni ji ltar chu bzhin
188a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong /byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te//de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab//mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir me rnams gang //rtag tu mtshan ma
188a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing //mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong //mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur//mang ba'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam
188a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas//ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin//mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi//zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam pa 'thob//'du shes mtshan can mi
188a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam sems rgyud kyis//sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed//'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mi chung myong //de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas//mtshan mar
188a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa ni phung po dang //sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong //de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na//byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob//'du shes mtshan ma can
188a7(dkon brtsegs): la nyon mongs 'phel//mtshan ma med pa kun du sbyor ba spong //mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de//kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med yin//gang rnams byang chub 'thob par bya/
188b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa//rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chud yin//mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam par thob byed na//longs spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur//chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin
188b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis med//rnam par rtogs pas chos 'byung kun kyang stong //rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med bar 'gyur//de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra//rgyal bas gsungs pa
188b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thos gyur nus//mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal//dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar//mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin//'jigs
188b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis//mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing //rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnams shes nas//'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur//
188b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o///de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lho'i
188b6(dkon brtsegs): par dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa bA pA lpags pa dang /sngon
188b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang
189a1(dkon brtsegs): ba thob ste/chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to//
189a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin ma skyes pa yang ma yin/byung ba yang ma yin ma byung ba yang ma yin/grub pa yang ma yin ma grub pa yang ma yin/'gags pa yang ma yin
189a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa yang ma yin//gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/rjes su chags pa yang ma yin//
189a4(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba yang ma yin/rmongs pa yang ma yin ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/shes pa po yang ma yin shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/mthong ba po yang ma yin mthong ba
189a5(dkon brtsegs): po med pa yang ma yin/tshor ba po yang ma yin/tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ston lnga po yang ma yin ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/dngos po med pa yang ma yin/dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/'gro ba yang ma yin 'ong ba yang ma yin//
189a7(dkon brtsegs): song ba yang ma yin ma song ba yang ma yin/stong pa yang ma yin mi stong pa yang ma yin/mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/smon pa yod pa
189b1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin smon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to//de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming lA mi gnas/tha snyad
189b2(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi gnas/brjod pa la yang mi gnas te/de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/bya ba'i 'du shes can ying
189b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang mya yin/so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i skye bo'i/
189b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin//sngo so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/nyan thos ma yin pa'i
189b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes
189b6(dkon brtsegs): can dang ma yin/rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi
189b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i
190a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yud ma yin/sangs rgyus kyi 'du shes can
190a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/sad ste rgyas ma smin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes
190a3(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang
190a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can na mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur
190a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir/de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa//zhi la zhi ba'i thugs
190a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon//zhi bo bstan par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston//zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma
190a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis//khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes//zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten//yan lag brgyad pas
190b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs grong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton//sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god//de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer/
190b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar dreng zhes gsung //'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bston pa'i bslab pa bstun//gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob//bslabs nas zhi zhing
190b3(dkon brtsegs): yid kI zhi ba'i lam deng dbang po zhi ba dag/'jig rten mokhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur//'drin pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhib 'gro bzhi bgyid gang dag gis/
190b4(dkon brtsegs): med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa//de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur//nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhib
190b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu ston par 'gyur//'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das//thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs kyur//rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub
190b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab//thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rtul ba de la bdag cag dgasu ma mchis//dang dag phung po bor te byang chub ni tshol de la zhi ngar rtogs//phung pos
190b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags//dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshel de dag blo 'khrugs gyur ba ste//chos kyi mtshan me spyod yul 'di dag byis pa des
191a1(dkon brtsegs): ni ston pas gsungs//thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag rab tu gsungs//thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam par kun tu
191a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mi rnyed//de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'//de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur//bdud
191a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob//rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa//chags med thugs mnga'
191a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa//dris ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa//zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa
191a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog/de nas mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas/bdag
191a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa//mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni//log par rmongs
191a7(dkon brtsegs): byed chad pa sted 'dra zhing //ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen//rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen//ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pa//
191b1(dkon brtsegs): kha zas ro bArgya thos kyang ma 'grangs pa//de la bkres med zlas med sems can med//rmi lam de 'du chos rnams thams cad gzigs//sgom pa'i spyi zhig tul ba tshul ba//
191b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung chu ba sil dang zhing rnyog med 'judus gyur kyang //ngoms med che ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te//de bzhin khyod kyi rgyas rnams thams cad pa bags//'di lta byed med tshor myeng
191b3(dkon brtsegs): sim+ba ste can med//byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med//'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med ces//'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yongs mi mnga'//mi 'gro yid du'o
191b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig smra na//dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'phyo ba med//tshig nyid med cing dga' 'gyur dngos med kyang //de mkhyen de la the tshom yod mi mnga'//pi wang sgra snyan
191b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan na rna ra snyan te//sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min//de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs ni//phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'//nare nu
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa//gas kyi drung gzhug sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur//de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar
191b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang //rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur//de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //so so rang gis brtags pa'i
192a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhin//ji ltar mI yi dung gi sgra thos te//sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtag byas kyang //rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs//mi dbang khyod
192a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs//ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la//yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na//dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te//
192a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs//ji ltar mi zhig namakha'i 'ja' mthong na//yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong //na mkha'i 'ja' bzhin /
192a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis yan lag stong //drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs//grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na//grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmig
192a5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong //mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs//skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na//dga' ba snyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin
192a6(dkon brtsegs): stong //ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong //mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigaso//skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe//sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba
192a7(dkon brtsegs): mongar phyogs su de bzhin 'gags par mi 'gyur te//mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs//skyes bus ji ltar rje de brdungs pa'i tshe//thogs pa med cing
192b1(dkon brtsegs): /snyan pa'i rang bzhin te//khyod kyi yan lhag rnga sgra de dang 'dra//mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs//skyes bsdu ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe//sgra de 'jig rtenA dam+b+ha 'byung /
192b2(dkon brtsegs): d+h+r-ig pa med//ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag sbyong //mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzugs//skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdung sa pa'i che//g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i da
192b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang med//ji ltar rje bzhin khyed kyis yan lag steng //mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin ni chos kun gzigs//skyes bus ji ltar rje de brdungs pa'i tshe/sgra da yan lag ma byung rang dbang
192b4(dkon brtsegs): min/ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong //mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang mi mjed kyi bdag pa
192b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas/'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gzigs nas de'i tshe
192b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa mdzad de//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thun gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas//lhur
192b7(dkon brtsegs): bcos mi bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun//sgrib pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gri ba the tshom 'tshal//bde gshegs zhal bzang de la blta zhing
193a1(dkon brtsegs): thos par dgra' ste sdod//rgyal ba 'dzud mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du gsol//rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sas rgyas
193a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams//rgyu ma mchis pare 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad mu mthong na//bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad pa tshim rgyu de gsungs//rgyal po
193a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur//'khor 'dri the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyed la bems//padra gshegs thub rje pa'i gsung mchog
193a4(dkon brtsegs): /the tshom bcod pa nyan 'tshal na//rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs//thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur//
193a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal//ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes phra 'dra la blta//'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra
193a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung du skyugs gsolnga//de thos 'khor rnams tha tshom chad cing chos la banas par 'gyur//khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas//
193a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim//de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du bsgrub//brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed
193b1(dkon brtsegs): nus 'dus pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid//de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad bsung bsgrags gsol//rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nus de yis/
193b2(dkon brtsegs): nidage ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar//stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa lags par dgongs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
193b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa//rta thul nga yis phan ched 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa//rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa
193b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni mnyan par byos//de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsngags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa//phar dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom//tshangs pa
193b5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'khor 'di dog dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom me de//bskul pa khrag khrig gAng+gA'i bye ma snyed du dag pa legs bar spyod//kun tu rnam par dag la ma chabs yid
193b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya se mas ma bskyed//'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gan la yas pa//
193b7(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i bye ma stong na rdul brgya pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas//de dag phyi sa bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba//sred pa sel cing 'gro ba stong
194a1(dkon brtsegs): par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur//skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku cha'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur//bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur//de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te//'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni/
194a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtha' yAs rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus//de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur//g.yo ba mod cing sems
194a4(dkon brtsegs): med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur//de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i//sems can cig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal
194a5(dkon brtsegs): cher mya ngan 'da'//de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te//mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rob tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o//de na 'gyur/
194a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngalnga sdug bsngalA ya da mi 'gyur//de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing bslob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur//de na mi rnams dag gi
194a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur//mi sdug mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang //zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das rang byang chub
194b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur//sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba//de 'dra'i sgra de shing dam rtsig
194b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dag drang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur//bla gabu med dang mkhra' dang gtsug lag khung dang gnas dang gnas khang rnams na med//de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang
194b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung //de tshe 'dren pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang //gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur//'gre ba thams
194b4(dkon brtsegs): cing 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur//de tshe zhing mchog stod pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur//skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal ba khrag khrig byang
194b5(dkon brtsegs): chu ba rtson byas nas//drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te//zhing mchog de ni sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur//lhungs pa'i
194b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yongs pa rgya cher zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na//ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa//dri la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs
194b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur//de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ste//de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis//tshangs pa
195a1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o///de nas 'odu gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag
195a2(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos
195a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mi g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
195a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin
195a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do//de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang /
195a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang /byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang /sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /'jam pa'i spobs pa dang /dge ba'i spobs pa dang /rigs
195a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spobs pa dang /grol ba'i spobs pa dang /nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang /zab pa'i spobs pa dang /phra ba'i spobs pa dang /thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can
195b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi spongs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro//chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
195b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni/
195b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa med de/rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o//gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so//
195b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par rtog par
195b5(dkon brtsegs): a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing /de dag aM'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par gyur te/a zhes ba gyi ba ni mtha' yas pa kun du mtha' yas pa/
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pa/mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/yongs su ma grub pa/dngos po ma mchis pa/mi gnas pa/mi g.yo ba/'dus pa ma mchis pa/'phro ba ma mchis pa/
195b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa ma mchis pa/rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ma bsgrubs pa/yongs su thub pa ma mchis pa/ma brtags pa/gzugs ma mchis pa/bstan du ma mchis pa/
196a1(dkon brtsegs): bAltar ma mchis pa/ma mthong ba/bsam du ma mchis pa/rnam par mi gnas pa/mi shes pa/rnam par ma shes pa/ma smos pa/ma bstan
196a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/bsam du ma mchis pa/sang ba ma mchis pa/'ongs pa ma mchis pa/nye ba ma lags pa/ring ba ma lags pa/ma btags pa/de dag
196a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ming ma mchis pa/tha snyad ma mchis pa/mnyen po ma mchis pa/sgrib pa ma mchis pa/'pho ba ma mchis pa/'khrug pa ma mchis
196a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rtag tu ma mchis pa/mi zad pa/gnyis su ma mchis pa/ma byung ba/brdzun pa ma lags pa/bden pa ma lags pa/sho be ma lags pa/ma skyes pa ma
196a5(dkon brtsegs): lagrus pa/stang sdu pa ma lags pa/sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/gdags su ma mchis pa/mtshan mas mi bskyod pa/ma bzung ba/mthor ba/'dzin po ma mchi
196a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/gtan du ma mchis pa/yongs su gtan du ma mchis pa/ma btang ba/yongs su ma btang ba ste/a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa/chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so//a ni ma skyes pa ste chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so//a ni ma skyes pa ste chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur
196b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma lags so//a ni mA 'gags pa ste chos gang gi 'grag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba 'ang ma lags so//a ni ma 'gags pa yang ma lags te/chos gang gis mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du
196b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma lags so//a ni gnas pa yang ma lags/mi gnas pa yang ma lags/a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ma btags pa yang ma lags/a ni spangs pa yang
196b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ma spangs pa yang ma lags/a ni shes pa yang ma lags ma shes pa yang ma lags/i ni dmigs pa yang ma lags mi dmigs pa yang ma lags/a ni stong
196b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mA lags mi stong pa yang ma lags/a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags mtshan
196b5(dkon brtsegs): ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/a ni smon pa yang ma lags smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul
196b6(dkon brtsegs): /lo/chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste a'i tshul lo//chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a'i 'gro ba'o//chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o//
196b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o//chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad de//chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod
197a1(dkon brtsegs): pa//bcom ldan 'das rgyas gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rnyogs par bsgre ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par 'gyu'o//chos gang ma byung bdad da na/
197a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs phyir bgyi'o//chos gang ma grub po de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi//chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gan
197a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dum bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par 'gyis te/
197a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi tshul lo//bcom ldan 'das chos gleng ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/rmi laman bya ba sna tshogs 'byung
197a5(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du na/bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pA ya d+hud ba dngos po pa mchis pa ste/'on kyang dri do/
197a6(dkon brtsegs): la gangags par gsungs so//de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyur//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na brag rgya la tha skad mchis pa bzhin
197a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi tha snyed kyang blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu le gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdan sa
197b1(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sreg rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das
197b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor lA bud med kyi gzugs sam skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/
197b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa
197b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang brag cha'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste brag cha la bya ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis
197b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal
197b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa//bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul cig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs//
197b7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa 'ang de bzhin no//de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud//bdag gi don de phyogs bcur
198a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong //sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chub kyi 'du shes dz+nyAn//byismra pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul tu
198a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid//de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas go nas min dngos la bo rten kyang 'tshal//de bzhini byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yod ma 'tshal//
198a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das//gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis//blo stor yid nor sdug
198a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la//nyon mongs 'jigs pa tshe dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'bring //'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen /
198a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang //blo stor de dag sdug bsngalnga gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba//de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur
198a6(dkon brtsegs): yang khyer//de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na//skyes bu dam pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs//bde gshegs khyod kyis a'i
198a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge tshul chen sgo cig de ltar bstan//de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bozhin du yid bskyed cing //bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang
198b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya/yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bro nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol//bde bar ga shegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des//myur du nyon madra//
198b2(dkon brtsegs): dug bsal byang chub dpog yas zhi ba thob gyur cig/grol nas dug bad gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas//pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa
198b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'joms par mdzad//bde bshegs thams cad stong yang bag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab
198b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/grol nas 'gro ba kun la chabs med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/dri yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dbu mthu chen mgon por 'gyur//'ching dang bcings pa med cing
198b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med//de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dgra' nyon mi mongs//nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams
198b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang med//gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur//grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad do mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'//bcom ldan lhar
198b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa de//kun rtogs bdage nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis
199a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni//las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med//bde bla shegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni//
199a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag 'tshalnga//des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste//dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyi rab tu mchod par 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'jig
199a3(dkon brtsegs): rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ba//ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i//bdag cag dge rtswa de yis 'gro
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog/bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don pa sngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gis lhag
199a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la/'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen
199a6(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad dri gsol pa//'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun
199a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa//bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na//rgyal ba dpal skyugs rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig
199b1(dkon brtsegs): rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol//'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu dag cag rnams la gsungs//gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang gyur zhing //
199b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan yang bgyid par 'gyur//des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di//'phags pa'i yan lag
199b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol bar 'gyur//drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog mchis pa yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na//'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid
199b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal dag la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur//the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing //bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang
199b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur//'khor rnams 'di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du blta//'phro bo'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis gsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal
199b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol du bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal//gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur//'dren pa
199b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal//ring du song ba'i ma la bu blta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du blta//bde bshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad
200a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don kyang bsnun du gsol//skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur//thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags/
200a2(dkon brtsegs): ba don du gnyer/su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal//rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing drag 'gyur nas//
200a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang bsgom par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
200a4(dkon brtsegs): baM/rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legase bar dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs//bde gshegs rnam par sbrul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing //spobs pa che
200a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung de phyir gang dang gang ngag khyod kyis lngas gyur pa//de dag lung bstan ngas bshang kun kyang dbang po zhi ba sa mnyan par gyis//'od gsal ba'i lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal
200a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong ba ste//'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs//byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod//byang chub 'gro 'dod
200a7(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la snyan par 'gyur/tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas//sangs rgyas yon tan ngan gnyer blo sbyongs de dag byang chub
200b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de dag stobs skyes tshul dang rdul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur//pra skyes ma bzhin dka' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab//'od gsal ldan r+tha/
200b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag byang chub 'did la tshu la b+hI sgra bsta te//bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phru bo'i tshul 'di bstun byas nas//sems n+dan skyur ma'i grangs pas ches mang po dag
200b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dga' byas te//de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang 'byung sbyini bral kun mkhyen 'gyur//de drag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par//yang
200b4(dkon brtsegs): shing shin tu dag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste//kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin me khom yong mi 'byung //bde bar gshegs rnams thugs bzlas
200b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur//zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te//sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon phyogs
200b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs mu med par 'gyur//de nA rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi//sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs pang+gA'i bye skyid 'gyur//rta rdul 'jig
200b7(dkon brtsegs): rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas//gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas no//bsod na mas de la snga mas grangs sam
201a1(dkon brtsegs): dper kyang bya bar mi nus so/de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis//rgyu sbrul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa
201a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba rnyed sla min//de ni oM dum ba rali me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yos blo mangs gsungs//de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub ji gang 'dod pa yis//shin
201a3(dkon brtsegs): tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya//de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dag de 'dra thos gyur nas//'khor rnams thams cad
201a4(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur//khrag khrig lha rnams na mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed//dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug
201a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung //zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod//bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu
201a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol//khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur//sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol//'od gsal
201a7(dkon brtsegs): ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/nyi shu gcig pa'o///bam po brgyad pa//de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas
201b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mnod pa yang mthong /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag
201b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi
201b4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba mi myong la/sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags bde ba yang ma legs pa yang mi myong ste/sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i'i du shes nye bar
201b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang /mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyid kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /lag pa bcad dom/rkang pa bcad dam/rkang lag bcad dam/rna ba 'am/sna
201b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/rna ba dang /sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /spre lcag gis bzhugs sam/sgra lcag phyed tsal lam/lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i
201b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /btson rar bcug gam/lcags sgrog dang /shing sgrog tu bcug gam/brtson raM dmo po la rgyas btab bam/byis pa'i gtsug phud
202a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcings sam/dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom 'am/'bru mar gyi
202a2(dkon brtsegs): mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/mar gyi mar me dang /zho skol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /me'i nang du bor ramaHseng ge'i
202a3(dkon brtsegs): khar bstabs sam/stag gi khar bstabs sam bskam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/kar sha
202a4(dkon brtsegs): papA ne tsam du btubs sam/'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam/glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /mig phyung ngam/gsal
202a5(dkon brtsegs): shing gi rtse mo la gzhag gam/bsod pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba
202a6(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa
202a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/gang gis bdag la skom blud pa de dag dang /gang gis
202b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rim gro byas pa dang /bkur bstir byas pa dang /bsti stang du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/gang yang
202b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gshe ba dang /mi bde bar byed pa dang /brdeg pa dang /mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du srom gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub
202b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de lta bu'i
202b4(dkon brtsegs): las dang de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rje su song ba'i da ba'i 'du shes la brten cing bsnyen la bsgom zhing mang du byed de de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams
202b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa/de'i tshe bdud kyi las
202b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/dro'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang /skye ba la dbang ba dang /las la dbang ba dang /rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang /
202b7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad la dbang ba ste/dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o//de 'tshal na tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis
203a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gnas so//de ci'i skad du zhe na/'di ltar byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub snyoms dpa
203a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang /don 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang /'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang /byang chub sems dpe' bslabs pa
203a3(dkon brtsegs): rjed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /bdud kyi lus las rnam par rgyal ba dang /chos thams cad khong du chud par
203a4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/thecom ldan 'das gang giste byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
203a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu'o//de nas dpe rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 'od brjod nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyod pa//dge rgyas lha tshogs
203a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste//ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi//de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor
203a7(dkon brtsegs): pa brgal byung ba//thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod//'di ni rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te//sgyu ma'i
203b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa logs par mkhyen//yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar//de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong
203b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lte mA ri bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs//'di ni sems can srog dang shed bu gso pa gang zag ma mchis te//mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par byashig cing stong
203b3(dkon brtsegs): por rnam gzhog la//rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas bsgom pa'ang mdzad//rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par
203b4(dkon brtsegs): dka'//byams pa dge bsgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/sems can rnam par bshig cid 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen//
203b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rtag pa mi mda' the tshom bral thugs ldan//des na bde gshegs rnam brtags bri mnga' mchod par 'tshal//bang bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal byeg
203b6(dkon brtsegs): bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang //lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs//de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cwag rgyal ba'i dge /des pa
203b7(dkon brtsegs): jide bzhin kun tu 'tshal//des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'i tshal//thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang nI bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs
204a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga//dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal//de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyad tshul 'di ji bzhin/
204a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal//des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyas pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi//skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu stog bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs//'on
204a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stabs dang ldan pa bskyed//sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis//sangs rgyas
204a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod ltos khyod la mchod par 'tshal//'dren po chud med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan//gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs
204a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/thub pas bag med gang yang me gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te//sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod
204a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod par bgyis//thub pA sku ni rnam par sbyangs pas sku btsal mdzad nam brnyes kyang //de lhur 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung po mu legs bsnyel ba yod mi mnga'o//bud par
204a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas lus la seng ba'i bsgom pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs//sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa mchod pa bgyis//'dren pas tshe'i
204b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la//tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te//de ltar gang zhig dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang
204b2(dkon brtsegs): yod ma gzigs//sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis//thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed pa//gang gi nye bar
204b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang //thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs//bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas
204b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ston la mchod par bgyis//'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs//bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la//thar pa
204b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs//sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis//gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags
204b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis//gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te//de bos gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma
204b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis//ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal//ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na//'di dag thar pa nyid
205a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur//de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min//bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma
205a2(dkon brtsegs): bshig des na khyad la mchod par 'tshal//thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs//'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan
205a3(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'gyur//yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang dang bsgom pa mi dmigs te//chad par mi 'gyur bya ba 'dra ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs la//thams cad mkhyen gyi
205a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te//de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur//'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os
205a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs//de nas bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal//thar bar mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po
205a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga yang gsungs//rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lom 'di bsgoms shes bstan//thub pa dbang po dang ni bsgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te//'di la lha
205a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod par 'tshal//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po//de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid
205b1(dkon brtsegs): ces ston pa thub pas gsungs//de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te//thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tsom mchis de slad khyod la mchod//byang
205b2(dkon brtsegs): chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsung //'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol
205b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te//sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom mi mchis khyod la mchod//rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam/
205b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la bstan//brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mthar mar 'byin pa bsgoms shes gsungs//mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba ma mchis te//'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas ma chod 'os khyod la mchod//'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa
205b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs//gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can+da rnams la bstan//'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyin mongs min//'di la lha
205b7(dkon brtsegs): tshegs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson//sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang bsgoms shes gsungs//bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon
206a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs bag chags bcas bri de dag zhi//thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste//'di lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon
206a2(dkon brtsegs): bral khyod la mchod//stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de//gsod dang 'khrims dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang //
206a3(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang ni ma rig 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams//mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams bstan//sems can ming mig/
206a4(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra//gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste//bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis spong //
206a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spong ba 'di bston pa//mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug
206a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur//bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis//'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod
206a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal//de ltar dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
206b1(dkon brtsegs): cang mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa yung thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la
206b2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas//badre gshegs rgyal ba ma chog khyod kyis ni 'dzum po mdzad
206b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'jig rten bstan//rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol//
206b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod//dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan pa 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas//sangs rgyas gsung
206b5(dkon brtsegs): k+Shi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rlangs gyur te//chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo de gi ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur//bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring du
206b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig blo zlos bskyed//de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi brtogs shing phyibs rnams snang bar bgyis//suM zhig 'jig rten rgyangs bcu rgyal bu 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur gyi//de da
206b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod//rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa dang su btsun la dad pa skyes//bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan pa
207a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas//sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur//rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsal
207a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod//bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dod bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing //byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen
207a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la gnas//gang la 'dzum pa dang bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags//bsod nams rgyal ba'i mtshan mngal de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum//
207a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsol thos gyur nA//bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren//de ltar
207a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sres la gnas par 'gyur//'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
207a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsol pa//nga ye 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rda thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing //skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis
207a7(dkon brtsegs): dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa//khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur//de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro bo 'di dag dga' bas nyon//
207b1(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag du yi chos nyid sa ni the tshom med//kun kyang yid rangs rab zhi yid kyis tshogs bcud drag gis nga la bsngags//sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrug khrig stong grangs
207b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'os mchod byas te/the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par 'gyur//de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas de la bstod//bskal ba bzang
207b3(dkon brtsegs): bo'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur//'di dag bskal pa ut+pal lo la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur//'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yod
207b4(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan 'da' bar byed//sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba//de yang bstan gyis dang po'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon//rgyal ba de kun chos
207b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi tig ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur//'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur//de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur
207b6(dkon brtsegs): te//de tshe zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur//thub pa brags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na//thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel
207b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pas don chen 'gyur//sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis nga tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te//ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'tsho med 'thob//thub
208a1(dkon brtsegs): brkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te//sgrub pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dra//ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs
208a2(dkon brtsegs): nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su//byams pa bral phyir rgyu chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dod 'gyur ba//de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas
208a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal 'khor du//rkang ginyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dod//bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa des thos shing //
208a4(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyus ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas//'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' skye pha la cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed//bdag nyid chen po de tshes/
208a5(dkon brtsegs): nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs//dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba
208a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag rgyad rgyas lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu bdag gis mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga'
208a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la bzhugs pa dang /chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa thams cad
208b1(dkon brtsegs): las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang /mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /grol ba'i spobs pa dang /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /nye ba'i sgrub/
208b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /phra ba'i spobs pa dang /zab pa'i spobs pa dang /sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /'jam pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung ba shes nas/bcom
208b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la dga' bla skyes te chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis
208b4(dkon brtsegs): te de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams
208b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de la dmigs pa gang yang gzungs langs par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i
208b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur//khams la 'jug pa dang /skye mched la 'jug pa dang /dbang po la 'jug pa dang /bden pa la 'jug pa dang /rten cing 'brel
208b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang /sems can la 'jug pa dang /sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /dngos po la 'jug pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /dmig
