209a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa dang /dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /bdag la 'jug pa dang /stong pa la 'jug pa dang /mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang /mtshan ma
209a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /smon pa la 'jug pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /gnas la 'jug pa dang /gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /'dus byas
209a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa dang /'dus ma byis la 'jug pus kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par
209a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob po//de ci'i slad du zhe na/gzugs ni
209a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/sa ni sar yongs su ma grub//de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub po//de ci'i slad du zhe na/si ni rang bzhin ma mchis
209a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/chos gang yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o//chu dang mi dang rlung ni mi mchis te/chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o//
209a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi babyi/ma 'ongs po zhes gdags par mi bgyi//da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du
209b1(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/'di ltar gzugs su ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o//gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/gang ma skyes
209b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/de dag thams cad gcig
209b3(dkon brtsegs): du bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal te/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na 'dagro par lta ga la 'gyur/ma 'ongs par lta ga la 'gyur//da ltar byung
209b4(dkon brtsegs): bar yang lta ga la 'gyur te/de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang
209b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so//phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas/gzugs dmigs su ma mchis te/de ltar phung po la 'jug pas
209b6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro//gzungasu de yang 'ang tsam dang /tha snyad tsam dang /brda tsam dang /kun rdzol tsam dang /brjod pa tsam dang /gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par
209b7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/'di la mang po yang mi dmigs gzungs kyang mi dmigs//'jug pa yang mi dmigs/gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so//de ci'i
210a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la/spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/phung po ni spungs pa'i
210a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o//dper na khyim dang /khang bzangs dang /bsil khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dang /skar khu nga khol ma dang /ba gam dang /dra ba dang /stegs
210a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang /kha khyer dang /skar khud dang /blta bab dang /ra ba dang /shing btags dang /'obs dang /chos mang po bsogs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes
210a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba 'ang de bzhin te/gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/spungs pa mA mchis pas na/gzugs kyang ma mchis gzugs kyis
210a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po yang ma mchis so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ya nga rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/de la spungs pa lta ga
210a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchis te/spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis//rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang rma mchis so//de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob
210a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/gzungs thob pas sngags kyis 'thob par 'gyuraro//de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni mig gi skye ma med ces bgyi ba ni ci'i skye mched tsas ba
210b1(dkon brtsegs): na sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do//de la mig gang zhe na/'byung ba chen po bzhi dang pa ste/sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang pa'o//de las sa'i
210b2(dkon brtsegs): khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/chos gang gis rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o//de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang /me'i khams dang bu dang /
210b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o//de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das
210b4(dkon brtsegs): po zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis
210b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o//gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis
210b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//de ltar na mig kyang ma smras ma 'gags skyes mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o//gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang /
210b7(dkon brtsegs): brda tsam dang /kun rdzob tsam dang /brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ming de yang ming gos ma mchis pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos gang mig
211a1(dkon brtsegs): ce 'am/skye mched ce 'am/sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so//
211a2(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/de'i slad du skye mched
211a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pas gzungs thob/gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob po//de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob pa ni mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa/khams ni kho mas kyis
211a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni
211a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa'o//gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o//gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni skye ba ma mchis so//gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gags
211a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so//gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang /tha snyad tsam dang /brda tsam dang /kun rdzob tsam dang /brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes bdags
211a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so//ming de yang ming gis ma mchis brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/
211b1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o//gang
211b2(dkon brtsegs): le skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so//gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par

212a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa yang ma lags so//de ni de bzhin nyid dang /mA nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang /zhi ba dang mtshan nyid ma lags pA

212a4(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/khams
212a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /skye mched dang /dbang po dang /bden pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis patag+sa/

212a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dir ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
212b1(dkon brtsegs): na chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des nu dang /me dang /rlung dang /na mkha'i khams nyid mi 'do//
212b2(dkon brtsegs): ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dag gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang dris chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dir te/de ltar ni/khams la 'jug pas gzungs nga/

217b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a rnams kyi byang chub ste/ming tsam du bas kyi don dam par ni ma lAbs so//ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub/
217b2(dkon brtsegs): bo/de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das

217b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis te/de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
218a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang lnga la zhig 'di skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
218a2(dkon brtsegs): so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/byang chub kyang
218a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang
218a4(dkon brtsegs): lA lnga zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor la bskor to zhes mchi na/de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//
218a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzlog pa 'am bskor bar mdzad pa ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas
218a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
218a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/
218b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na/de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
218b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang la yang phan pa 'am gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
218b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na/de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci
218b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra 'dor ba 'am/len pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
218b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o//de ci'i srid du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos
218b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das gang la lnga zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na/de dag thams cad
218b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang gda'i//rigs kyi bu 'am//
219a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar myi 'gyur mi gda'o////bam po dgu
219a2(dkon brtsegs): bya//de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus/bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar chos nyid la nges pa 'gro ba brjod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
219a3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang /de'i tshe bcom
219a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcwang 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa//bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshulnga dang tshul min mokhyen la phyag 'tshal lo//'gro ba kun la
219a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa//'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan//mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes
219a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phrogs la mgos phyag 'tshal//khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan//khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi
219a7(dkon brtsegs): bshis pa mi g.yo brnyes//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams thag 'grol mdzad pa//mtha' yaso yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par
219b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal//phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral//khyim pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/
219b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rlong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin//grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong //khams
219b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs//dper na brag cha rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra//des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang
219b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings//grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis//skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams
219b5(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pas bstan//yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis pa bslu ba yang ba stong pa 'dra//mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mong po de la chags//dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho
219b6(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'khyam pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung //'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu ston po ste/thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong /mi
219b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal myang po dag ni de la chags//bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin//sems can sems can nyid sbyong sems can
220a1(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong //thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na//mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mya 'tshal
220a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po de la chags//mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgro nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol//rten 'byung chos rnams de dog skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs
220a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis//rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du bzung du ma mchi snga byis pa rmongs bgyid pa//mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings//
220a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol/thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhini chos rnams thams cad bsam mI khyab//thub
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral//thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te//de la'ang tshul cig 'di 'tshal gyur
220a6(dkon brtsegs): na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med//thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun
220a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab//thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par
220b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang //gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang /gang /
220b2(dkon brtsegs): dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba//de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongs su dkris//gang dag bde bar gshegs
220b3(dkon brtsegs): pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang //gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya dran 'das smra ba//de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi
220b4(dkon brtsegs): lag tu mchis//chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar ba gyi//gang do ga tshul dang tshul min 'dra la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa /
220b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal//de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos dpal sdug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur//de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags//de ltar 'di
220b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur//de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa//ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i
220b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas//kha cig yid rangs dogs med yid rangs sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas//'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag
221a1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan par gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che bA'i lha de dag gru lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang //rjes rnam
221a2(dkon brtsegs): nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas//sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir//de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pA rta rdul gyis
221a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//dpalnga sdug 'dren pa rnam sde ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te//rgyu med mI mdzad bka'
221a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum d+he skad thos/'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na//rgyal po lha mi lha min tha ma
221a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu 'di gsungs//di ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad gsal mthong nas//'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te byede gshegs
221a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi zhal du blta//mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs//de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/
221a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa dam pa lnga tshogs gang dag rang gis ring la lung bstan pa//de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcos rnam par 'phrul pa gsungs//mi mchog
221b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyangs pa'i gsungs dbyungs slob ste the tshom kun tu bsalta du gsol//de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing ma rnyog tu mgu ba 'jog/bad gu shegs rgyal mtshan man+dad+hA
221b2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag thams cad gzhon du mi sems par//'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam po sems shing //thub po 'drer mchog the tshom 'tshol ba de dag rnams
221b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi the tshom khum//des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min khams kun rgyal bar 'gyur//rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga'
221b4(dkon brtsegs): ste//bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyi de cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhos par 'gyur//de dag don gyi dbang la bsten naste bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal
221b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol//des ni yid rings gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur//'dren pa chen po lta de dag gi sngon gyi spyad pa thos gyur cing //rgyal ba'i gsung thos bya
221b6(dkon brtsegs): nasna brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste//tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad ma khyen par 'gyur//'gro ba rab tu 'brel ma
221b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang dag ston pa mdzad par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lo tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/lha tshogs rnams kyi ched
222a1(dkon brtsegs): dung yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa//rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs//gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa
222a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi rgyu'i tshul dang rgyu//de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gauts+tshag yid kyis nyan//thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs
222a3(dkon brtsegs): shing /rgyu la gzig sa nas rkang ginyis dam po dpal sdug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad//kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang //
222a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig khe rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang //kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te//skye bo sdug bsngal
222a5(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas//'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya//'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang
222a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya la don du mdzad par rig par bya//'dzum mchog ngos gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya//rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur
222a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te//kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas//des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad//
222b1(dkon brtsegs): rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur//rang rgyal dron du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur//'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum
222b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur//de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyun rnam gsum shes par gyis//rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi
222b3(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub//sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan she s+ya pur gyis//'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang ba shwad kyis//
222b4(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis//dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa dAs mdzad myur du thog mar nub//'bring gi don ni dus
222b5(dkon brtsegs): ched cung zad bsdud cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur//blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shAn tu ring du gan hAs//rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas
222b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum de theg pa'i drabang gis mdzad//gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rna ma gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis//gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po
222b7(dkon brtsegs): la bskor ba byed pa ni//de dag nga la rkyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur//'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis bskor ba byed par 'gyur//dal gyis
223a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgyu cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur//gang dag gson rgyun lu du ltung bzhag 'dra ba'i ba gshegs mthong gyur na//
223a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gri dang du shes par bya//gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha'
223a3(dkon brtsegs): yas mig ldan pas ni 'dran de la gebs pa dang //gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang //gang tshe ske mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum
223a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor byed pa//de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe'i dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya//bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan//rta phul
223a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis//des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa me dzad//de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen
223a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis//'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni//zhing rnams dag tu chos rdul shin tu rgya chen slu ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//mkhas pa
223a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur//de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bston//de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu
223b1(dkon brtsegs): drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong //bskul pa sum cu drug du thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyad//da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu//
223b2(dkon brtsegs): grang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas//thams cad du yang phun sum tshu lo rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed//rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod
223b3(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas//de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan
223b4(dkon brtsegs): skal ba 'byung //rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rung zhing skyengs te//sems can dam pa re kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpel zhes bya//de tshe yon tan
223b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de//de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni//gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrang
223b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang /legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin pa grangs mi 'gyur//'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba//de las nyis 'gyur
223b7(dkon brtsegs): de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur//de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin//de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang
224a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar 'gyur//bde gshegs de dag spyad pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur//'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam
224a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos//de tshe sros kyis gzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcur gnas par 'gyur//de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa//gang+gA'i glung
224a3(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur//de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni//nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yos mya ngan 'di' bar
224a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang 'byung de dag thams cad kyi//bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cig/yang dag shar bar 'gyur/
224a5(dkon brtsegs): te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin//mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas//rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yis 'jig rten don byed bdag cag
224a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhes te//thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'//bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas//
224a7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod do//rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la//yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dag ba
224b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la kun tu bsten byos te//dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis//'bras bu che ba'i lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum
224b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o////de nas gnas gtsang mi'u ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe/sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos
224b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i
224b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do//de nas lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang //btsun mo dang ni srog
224b5(dkon brtsegs): phangs btang //rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te//sprin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/khyod kyi tshul khrims rnam spangs pa//
224b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun tu byasnyengs mi mnga'//shin tu bsla bas pas mthar phyin pa//khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/
224b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas//yan lag garngubs pa 'ang bzad par mdzad//zab mor spyod lug ma lags te//bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//
225a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu brnon 'grus la myos pas gsol pa//brtson bla ma btang brtson 'grus te//stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas//rdzogs pa
225a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog baR+ShaswA pA//brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/khyod kyis bresam gtan bsten mdzad pa
225a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'jig rten gting mi snyed//dus gsum mnyam po nyid brnyes pa//bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol/
225a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin//yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa//shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i
225a5(dkon brtsegs): bu khams kyis blo gros kyis gsol po/sbyin pa dag dang ngag stan dang //don spyad 'thun pa'i don dag gis//'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul//'dren pa khyod la phyag
225a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa//byams chen thugs rje chen po dang /yun rnying dus nas bsgom mdzad de//sems can dpag ya s+t+waM songs
225a7(dkon brtsegs): su bsgral//gangs 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa//nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing //thub chen dul ba'i sems
225b1(dkon brtsegs): spanga' bas//sa thul thams cad rdul mdzad pa//kha lo bsgyur lnga phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa//sems dag mnyan pa'i sems
225b2(dkon brtsegs): spyad+ma pa//sem+b+has dul dbang ba s+yA ba//sems can gyi nA gyi sanas mkhyen pa/sems mkhyed khyed la phyug kyang 'jal//lha'i bu zla gros rnam par dag pas
225b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/shes rig ldan pa bru~M sa hA//blo gas mjug la rab tu thugs//thugs smras pa phun sum chags pa'i zla//si su khaMs rtogs sad b+hag kyang
225b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol ba/khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs//sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad//sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa//kun dag khyod
225b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu gang dri ma med pas gsol pa//dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba//khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang btsam//khyod kyis lha tshogs thams
225b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang //rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur//lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/khyod kyis chos rnams gyur par mkhyen//sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/
225b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya'i cing bsdu dka chos dag la//rgyu du mdzad la phyog kyi 'i tshal//lha'i bu 'tshan 'grus brtan pas gsol pa//dril gyur yongs su bral gyur pa//
226a1(dkon brtsegs): rgal te zag pa spangs//pha rol phyin cing thad la bzhugs//brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol
226a2(dkon brtsegs): pa du 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs//gauti mug spangs pa zag med pa//sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa//'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal
226a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa//khyod kyis dam chos shin tu bstan//'ji ga rten gsum du rab tu mchod//gcig pu bgrod pas bde bo brnyes//de
226a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu m+bi 'khrugs pas gsol pa//lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri//rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te//de bzhin bstod drang
226a5(dkon brtsegs): smod po yis//bde gshegs bskyod par mi nuso//lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thi pA pe sa gsol pa/dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam//mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis
226a6(dkon brtsegs): cin shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa//rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'//de bzhin nyid
226a7(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu zhugs//yang dge mtha' yang rab tu ston//khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis//lha'i bu blo gros dang be sa gsol pa/gnyis su med pa yang //
226b1(dkon brtsegs): drub ston//dpa' bo dpa lta bas rnam par gnan//gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis//de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin//lha'i bu rab tu dga' ba sdug stsol pa/mchog tu dag /
226b2(dkon brtsegs): yid dri rten pa dang /khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams//sbrul rnams lpags pa rnying 'dor bzhin//srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor//lha'i bzhi ba'i yid kyis gsol
226b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji ltar mar me mor zad cing //snying po zad pas zhi gyur bzhin//khyod kyi bsten pa myur thos na//shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'//lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas
226b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/glang gis kun mkhyen khyod ma thong ba'i//mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa ya d+ya//shes rab rgya chen gyis mkhas pa dag/'dod chags zhags pa gcod par
226b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/lha'i bu zhig nas mang gis gsol pa/zhi ba'i sems mnga' ni lnga spyod//cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi//nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa//dgra rnams zhi la phyag
226b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshul lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa//khyod kyis zhi gnas bsrubs pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byong
226b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing //sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur//lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni//dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan//shes rab
227a1(dkon brtsegs): chen pos de 'tshal na//de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur//lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par blta bas gsol pa//khyod kyis sems can
227a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gzigs//mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/ye shes mchog gis mnyam gzhag cing //byang chub ma tshig kyang thob par 'gyur//lha'i bu snang 'dzin
227a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/shes rab pha rol phyin gyur phye//thub chen khyod las gang slob pa//de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing //sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur
227a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa//'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung //ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na//de dag dri med bde ba 'thog/bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang
227a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung //lho'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa//chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtogs//thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs//de 'dra'i ye shes ston
227a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa//de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur//lha'i bu rabA tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa//gnas ma mchis shing bla ma mchis//chos rnams thams cad sems ma
227a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis//bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba//de dag khyed kyis de bzhin mkhyen//lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa//chos rnams thams cad gzhi med
227b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya yas ma samathachams sanamasama.amamaHthas mthathas mamamathamamamam lam ma sa/
227b2(dkon brtsegs): par//rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gizags//de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste//sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad//lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/
227b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rnams cad rten ma mchis//sems can mo mchis phan tshun min//lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin//yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu
227b4(dkon brtsegs): bAr snang rgyu bas gsol pa//bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams//bar snang lta bur snang ba ste//skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs//de smad 'jig rten chags
227b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'//lha'i bu dur 'dzin med pas gsol pa/khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag ku ni//lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni//g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med//spyod med rtsol ba med par
227b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs//lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa//sgyu ma sna tshogs lags bgyis pa//sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na//de bzhin ma lags de bzhin
227b7(dkon brtsegs): gda'/thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis//lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyi sku gsol pa/gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la//gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa//
227b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs//de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'//lha'i bu yid bzhin rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/
228a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams//de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad//de ltar 'gro bdun kyang mkhyen//lha'i bu spobs pa thegs med kyis gsol/
228a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/chos nyid la ni khor yug tu//spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing //chos nyid de yang brnyes pas ni//de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan//lha'i bu chags med blo
228a3(dkon brtsegs): gros kyis gsol pa//khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni//rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par//yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen//de bas thub pas rab rib bsal//
228a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/mya ngan med cing nyer len med//spros pa med cing rnyog pa med//chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs//de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis
228a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/chos rnams yang dag mi lags te//'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa//de dag khyod kyis yang dag
228a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyenade de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad//lha'i bu blo gros mchog gris gsol bya/lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa//rmongs pa med cing shes pa med//chos rnam
228a7(dkon brtsegs): ci yang mi bgyid pa//khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud//lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis//gzugs med ma lags
228b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can min//bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchisra//khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud//lha'i bu mig drapas kyis gsol pa/yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa//
228b2(dkon brtsegs): yod dang med pa ma lags par//rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du//de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol ba/byis pa rnams kyis bro/
228b3(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa//ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa//bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa//de dag rang bzhin khyed kyis gzigs//lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/gang zag
228b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma ma chis pa//ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa//bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba//de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas
228b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi//mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te//chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par//rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i
228b6(dkon brtsegs): bu smon pa med pas gsol pa/ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing //smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang //su la smon lam mchis gyur pa//de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen//lha'i//
228b7(dkon brtsegs): bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing //gang zhig 'gro la 'gyur de ma mchis//de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa//de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis
229a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs//lha'i bu ma smad pas smras pa pa/khyod ni sdig pakun spangs shing //bsad nams thams cad bsags gyu//bdag shegs spyod la skad
229a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' su smod de dag mkhas ma lag ste//lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa//ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs//char gyis sa chen ngoms pa bgyid//
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis//'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad//lha'i bu bas mA pa don yod kyis gsol pa//thub mchog gsungs ni don mchis te//chos
229a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//shin tu brtan nas mdzad pas na//de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan//lha'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/chos rnams
229a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dngos nyid kyis//ma skyes 'gags pa ma legs te//de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen//gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad//lha'i bu seng ge
229a6(dkon brtsegs): ros gsol pa/khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te//seng ge nga ros bsgrags mdzad pas//mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa//seng ge ri dgas phra mo bzhin//lha'i bu
229a7(dkon brtsegs): bag yod las kyis gsol pa/bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de//khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas//sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod//bag yod pas ni nges par
229b1(dkon brtsegs): byung /lha'i bu brag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/bgra yod pa la rab gnas te//khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel//stobs bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos//
229b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel//lha'i bu brag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/bag yod pa la brtson rnams ni//byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes//thob chen
229b3(dkon brtsegs): rang yang grol gyur nas//de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'a grol//lha'i bu bag yod nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/byang chub sems dpa' nyon thos dag/ji
229b4(dkon brtsegs): snyeng thar la brten pa'i rnams//kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste//bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung //lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/bag yod yongs su
229b5(dkon brtsegs): ma btang bas//rnam par 'dren pa khyad kyi sras//'gro ba 'di la ma chags par//thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung //lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa//
229b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing //khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na//thugs rje chen po mkhaso pa yi//byang chub rnam pa brnyes par 'gyur//lha'i bu bag yod
229b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson gyis gsol pa/bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing //mtshan nyid cig po rtogs bgyis pas//dpa' bo chen po khyed kyi sras//yab kyi dkor kyang thob par 'gyur//
230a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/brag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams//de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis//dpa' bo nyon mongs ri
230a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pas//nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin brnyal//lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshwa//khyod ni brag gis bzung ba na///
230a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//khyod kyi thugs ni sbyor ma gyur//lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi//de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul
230a4(dkon brtsegs): lags//byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang //thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs//lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/sangs rgyas zhi
230a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas bzhugs pa ste//'on kyang de lnga chags mi mnga'//sems can+da nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod//rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin//lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu
230a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis gsol pa/sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhugs//sus kyang mi skyong ri bo bzhin//khyod la gnod pa gyir mi nus te//sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//
230a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa//zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su rdul//bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te//'dod chags kyis
230b1(dkon brtsegs): naganod mi 'gyur//lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhing gnas la//dpa' bo chen po sgrol mdzad pas//tswi la gnas te bsam gtan
230b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/sus kyang khyod kyi tshul mA 'tshal//lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi//sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsung //
230b3(dkon brtsegs): grang zhes byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i//chos gzhan dri yI rjes su 'byung //lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'byung gis gsol pa//'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni//sems
230b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnyog pa dang por bgyi//zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching //de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad//lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsolnga pa/chos rnams kun
230b5(dkon brtsegs): b+hi spyod yul ni//zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs//de lnga chags med spyod pa ni//rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur//lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bsol pa//bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te//shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas//de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes//de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren//lha'i
230b7(dkon brtsegs): bu zhi gnas skyur len gyis gsol pa//sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang //lam gzhan dag gis ma mthong ste//zhi gnas ye shes che thob ni//rang byung nyid du nges par
231a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung //lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni//chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste//de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing //
231a2(dkon brtsegs): rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur//lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing //rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur//sman po 'a rgyal
231a3(dkon brtsegs): po ston pa ste//de ni lhag mthong dge ba lags//lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa//chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te//yang dag ji bzhin
231a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong gyur na//brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob//byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong //lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa//gang zag mchog rnams ye
231a5(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis//byang chub mchog tu nges por byung //rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis//brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur//lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol
231a6(dkon brtsegs): pa//yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu//chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na//byang chub gi zhal yas brnyes gyur te//dri bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas legs//lha'i
231a7(dkon brtsegs): bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson pa zhing //dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa//de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis///
231b1(dkon brtsegs): pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus//lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa//chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du//rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams//
231b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing //rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur//lha'i bu lcug mthong la brten pas gsol pa//rnams 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du//ye shes
231b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni brten mdzad pas//thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni//srog tshigs bye ba grol bar mdzad//lha'i bu khyad bar ldan gyis gsol pa/sangs rgyas mkhyen
231b4(dkon brtsegs): par thams cad mkhyen//'dren pa dam po mngon par 'phags//srid pa'i rgya mchis khyer ba yi//'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad//lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis
231b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing //chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na//sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te//sa bzang n+ya gro du skyes 'dra//lha'i bu
231b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa//rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras//ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste/byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing //skye bo mang po 'grol
231b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bgyid//lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa//sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rnam par ro la//chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi
232a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'//thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen//lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/dpa' bo chen pos chos kun ni//lhab mthong
232a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du yang dag 'du//rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na//de ni rang byung byang chub lags//lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol bA//sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste//
232a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing //thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed//lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/
232a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub phyir ni shes 'grol ba'i//'jig rten mkhas pa nges par 'byung //de dag byang chub mchog kyang thob//grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel//lha'i bu stong pa nyid
232a5(dkon brtsegs): la rton gyis gsol pa/stong pa nyid kyi chos bston pa'i//mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste//sems can bcings las grol bgyid cing //'ching ba thams cad rnam par
232a6(dkon brtsegs): gcod//lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/stang pa nyid la mos gyur pas//'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs//dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa//de ltar
232a7(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams la ston//lha'i bu stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsol pa/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni//chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste//srog chags rnams
232b1(dkon brtsegs): la thugs brtse bas//dpa' blos de la spyod pa mdzad//lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsdam pas gsol pa/skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la//'jigs sgyug thams cad rab tu
232b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs//chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing //na mkhi'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad//lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/stong nyid chos la brtan
232b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing //sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa//de dag ston pa mchod pa ste//mchod pa de ni bla na med//lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phabras kyis gsol pa/gang
232b4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa'i//de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs//stong nyid chos la brten bgyid pa//ma slad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur//lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren
232b5(dkon brtsegs): byis gsol pa/dpa' ba chen po chos rnams gang //mya ngan 'das min ston pa mchis//kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren//drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags//lha'i bu stong
232b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis bsol pa/stong nyid zhi las rten nus ni//khyod kyi spobs ma yang dag shor//stong pa nyid la gang brten pa//de dag rim gro brgyad pa lags//b+ha'i
232b7(dkon brtsegs): bu stong pa nyid la brtan gyis gsol pa//gang rnam stong pa nyid brten pa//mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur//nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams//byang chub rdul med 'thob par
233a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/gang+gA rnams stong nyid bsnyen bgyid pa//sangs rgyas chos kun phun sum tshogs//rang byung
233a2(dkon brtsegs): pham pa med par 'gyur//'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur//lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol po/sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur to//stong
233a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la gang brten pa//de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/stong gis dkrug par mi nus so//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bsdu gsol pa/mtshan ma med la man
233a4(dkon brtsegs): dgos te//dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas//sang sa rgyus 'jig rten rnams nas byung //mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'//lha'i bu mtshan ma med la
233a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gsol pa/mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing //zhi bo zhi la spyod pa rnams//mtshan ma rnam par bshi ka rnams kyis//tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus/
233a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsal pa/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la//'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de//mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing //zhi
233a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshalo//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni//mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te//yang
233b1(dkon brtsegs): dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas//de bzhin gshegs la bkur bsti bgyid//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du//gang zag mchog ni
233b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod mdzad pa//lha dang dri za mi dag kyang //khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig
233b3(dkon brtsegs): cing /dpal chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod//mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad//de bsdu khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/
233b4(dkon brtsegs): thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod//mtshan ma med la rnam par rol//'gro rnams yongasu smin mdzad cing //sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs//lha'i bu mtshan ma med
233b5(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs grub kyis gsol pa/gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa//de dag byang chub grib pa ste//yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can+da//de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/

233b7(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi mchod rten lags//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la brten pas gsol pa/zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba//sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med//'byung po kun gyi
234a1(dkon brtsegs): skabs dang rted//dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags//lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la myos pas gsol bu/man+t+ran ma myed la mos gyur cid //
234a2(dkon brtsegs): bas dgra lngas rgyal gyur pa//sangs rgyas brgal ba 'gro sgrol ba//de dag tshid ni ga la mchi sa//lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/mgon po phyung dag
234a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ni//rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa//de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste//sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nus byung //lha'i bu smon pa med pa la brtan pas gsol pa//
234a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod//srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad//srid pa yongasu chad pas na//sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos//lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes
234a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sde gsol pa/gang gis srid pa yongs bcom pa//de dag gzi mchog bskyed pa ste//de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras//rang gri yabA la phyag kyang 'tshal//
234a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa//sred pa yongs su bcad pas na//srid pa 'jigs bgyid srid pa la//de dag smon
234a7(dkon brtsegs): po mi bgyid do//lha'i bu smin pa med pas yongasu grol bas gsol pa/gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa//gzi ldan khyed kyi sras kyi rnams//re ba btang zhing bcing
234b1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba//de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur//lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa//de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgol//de dag mi skos
234b2(dkon brtsegs): zing zing med//dpal chen khyod la dreng phyag 'tshal//lha'i bu sman pa med la nges pas gsol pa/gang gis srid drang sdug bsngal dang //badra ba dngos po med bsgoms
234b3(dkon brtsegs): la/mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yob//de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags//lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong
234b4(dkon brtsegs): bAde dag khyod kyi bstan la dul//kha lo bsgyur zhing srid srel ba//sems dul khyod li phyag kyang 'tshalnga//lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gi sa gsol pa/srid
234b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dkon los byung ba'i rnams//bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te//nyon mongs dgra rnams pha ma mdzad pa//'jig rten mngon la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu smon pa med
234b6(dkon brtsegs): pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'//bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing //sred pa kun tu smon mi
234b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas//bdud kyi zhags pa yangs bcad cing //khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag
235a1(dkon brtsegs): la/bsgrub pa'i 'du shes mi bskyod do//lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/lus med 'chi ba med tshul du//lus 'dri gang gis mthong gyur//
235a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de drug sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'//'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs//lha'i bya lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/mi gtsang rul pa'i rnag zag pa//
235a3(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di mi zad de so bsams te//yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas//rnam 'drin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/lus la mi
235a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsang brtags bgyis te//lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing //lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas//nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu lus yongs su
235a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong gis gsol pa/sbrul gyi lpags pa rnying bzhin du//rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni//de bzhin gshegs po'i sku po che//sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang
235a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/lha'i bu lus la slong pe sra gsol pa/mi btsang dri nga rnag zag cing //rul pa'i lus la ma smad de//mi gcing gang ba rnam spangs nas//'dren pa khyod
235a7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/gang dag rul pa'i lus skye zhing //rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams//chos kyis rab tu
235b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i sras//de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur//lha'i bu lus kyis skyugs pas gsol pa/'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'dra//gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): pab/de dag lus las 'das pa ste//rkang gnyis ga tsA la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste//
235b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' ba//sangs rgyas mkhyen po mkhas pa dgra/srid gsum thams cad yongasu gzigs//lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral
235b4(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral//chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas//kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste//rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang
235b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa//khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen//khyod kyi sras rnams bsgom bgyid

235b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid//lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing //'jig la mngon
236a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi dga' ba//bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa//mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/mi ya
236a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa khyod kyi sras//srid par khrid pa rab bsal te//khyod kyi bslabs la bslabs pa dag/stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes//lha'i bu srid pa las brgal
236a3(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba yi//'jig rten mgon mchog skyobs rnams la//grangs gi rgyud du bgrang ba yi//grangs ni 'jig rten 'di ni med//
236a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa//srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste//gang dgra rtag tu dran spyod pa//de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod//srog chags
236a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams lnga chos kyang ston//lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa//srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol//rnam par 'dren pa srid bya rgal//srid
236a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thar phyin sangs rgyas te//srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu srid pa rab tu rje zhi byed kyis gsol pA//srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing //srid pa
236a7(dkon brtsegs): pham par mdzad nas gshegs//brtan pa sred pa mthar 'byin pa//khyod la do zla ma mchis//lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol ba/srid pa'i
236b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin rab zhig/mgyon po khyod kyi skud pa'i mtha'//srid par phyir log thams cad mkhyen//sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad//lha'i bu/
236b2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te//srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa//gang gis srid pa len byung pa'i//khyod kyis kun tu sbyor
236b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong d+hAlU'i bu srid pa rab tu skye ba thob kyis gsol pa//khyud kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te//srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no//zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'//mnyam nyid gyur
236b4(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyed 'tshal//lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/srid pa'i pha rol brgal ba ste//skyid par srid pa yang dag bsngal//rnam par 'dren pa thugs pa
236b5(dkon brtsegs): byas spyi bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad///bam po bcu pa//lha'i bu tshor bas mAnan gyis gsol ba/tshor ba bdag tu bgyis mchis//sems pa ma mchis
236b6(dkon brtsegs): rnol me mchis//bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis//tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen//lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol pa/ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par//tshor ba khyod
236b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis rab tu mkhyen//rmi lam sdug bu'i dga' 'dra ba//de la so so'i skye bo chags//lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/shes rab bcas pas longs
237a1(dkon brtsegs): byartabs nas//tshorab 'gro bar ma song zhing //'ong ba med la dngos med par+ya//de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol
237a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/tsher ba dang ni tshor ba po//rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs//zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang //khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan//lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyu
237a3(dkon brtsegs): la nges pas gsol pa/tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam//don dam nyid du mi dmigs te//khyod kyis sems can drir ba tu lwa bsdu//'gro ba the tshom ma mchis 'gyur//
237a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po//mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin//byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na//de ni khyod kyis
237a5(dkon brtsegs): yang drag gzigs//lha'i bu tshor ba la mngon par shes pas gsol pa/tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa//rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa//mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog

237a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dam las brgal cing sdig med pa//byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur//lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol pa/rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du//tshor ba
237b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas//tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal to//sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'//lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/mi rnams dag la gang 'tshong
237b2(dkon brtsegs): bi'i//tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen//nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba//de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa//
237b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sems kyi nyon mongs phra mo//bdud rnams kyang ni spu bkong ste//sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par//thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu sems yongs
237b4(dkon brtsegs): su shes pas gsol pa/ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis//sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin//sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen//de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod//lha'i
237b5(dkon brtsegs): bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/sgyu ma mkhan nam slo ba ma bzhin//gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i//sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags//de
237b6(dkon brtsegs): nu khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen//lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen//rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na//ji ltar
237b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du//byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs//lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/dul gyur la su rung ba yi//sems kyi rang bzhin
238a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs byed pa//gang la 'jig rten gAting mi rnyed//mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pA/
238a2(dkon brtsegs): glang gis sems la sems med shes//mkhas pa spyod lug mi 'gyur zhing //bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa//de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi//lha'i bu
238a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/gang do ga sems la sems med shes//de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te//dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos
238a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la//skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags//lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa//sems can de dag zho rab zhi//

238a6(dkon brtsegs): par dka' dang dpa' ba dang //khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa//de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur//lha'i bu sems drag pas gsol pa/sems dag las rnams
238a7(dkon brtsegs): gtsang gyur cing //yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa//de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na//zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur//lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas
238b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/gang gi yid ni chos nyid la//rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa//de dag mi dbang sras po ste//zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags//lha'i bu chos la sems pas/
238b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su//'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams//chos nyid la ni gang sems pa//de dag spyod yul ma yin med//lha'i bu
238b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa/mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams//chos kyi dbyings las nges byung ste//'dren po khyod kyi sras de dag/mtshan nyid
238b4(dkon brtsegs): cig gis nges byung lags/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni//chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs//dpa' bo
238b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang spyod pa'i//ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol po/chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa//de dag ye shes bsam yas
238b6(dkon brtsegs): do|sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med//sems can bsam la de dag mkhasde//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/glang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/chos kyi
238b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la bab pa rnams//de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa//bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jig pa med pas gsol pa/gang la de dag
239a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yi//'jigs pa med pas thob myed pas/de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs//de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung //lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkha
239a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste//chos rnams kun li shin tu mkhas//lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhags bzhin//chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston//
239a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnos pus gsol pa/chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas//khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs//mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis
239a4(dkon brtsegs): te/gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pA/sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i//chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de//
239a5(dkon brtsegs): bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi//'jig rten mgron la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bston pos gsol pa/gang dang gang gi sgro dgo nas//skyes bu
239a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ston mdzad pa//de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston//de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis//lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gasrel pa/mngon par brtson/
239a7(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kyi dbyings//skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen//brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//ye shes pha rol phyin par 'gyur//lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis
239b1(dkon brtsegs): gastsol pa/dApaSh+Ta b+h+yo khyod kyis sgru ba 'di//chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad//chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas//'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhug/
239b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gtong rnyed pa sa gsol pa/gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun//'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du blta//chos dbyingasmai rnam par mkhyen po
239b3(dkon brtsegs): yi 'dren pa khyod la phyug kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi//ye shes gnas
239b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di chos dbyings to//rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po//gang la spyod pa de legs so//lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen
239b5(dkon brtsegs): te/thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam//de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang //mtshan nyid gicig par shes pa lags//lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas
239b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen//mtshan nyid cig la mkhas pa ste//sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang //rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis
239b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//lha'i bu gnas nos nges par byung gis gsol pa/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras//gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes//gsal bar 'tshal ba'i
240a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams//rang byung nyid du nges par byung //lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/chos kyi dbyings la gang
240a2(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa'i//skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs//rang byung nyid du ge nas rnyed pas//de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur//lha'i bu gnas med pa
240a3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsol pa/gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba//de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos//bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang //de dag
240a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par yod mi nus//lha'i bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes pas gsol pa//gnas med grang gis rig gyur po//de dag bdag cag bdud kyi
240a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs//bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces//mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'//lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/gnas
240a6(dkon brtsegs): med 'du shes mkhas pa ni//chos nyid lnga ni rab gnas te//sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni//ji ltar rtswa yis shing rta bzhin//lha'i bu gnas med
240a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po//chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i//bdud kyi las ni gnas med de//gnas
240b1(dkon brtsegs): myang do zhes rgyal bas gsungs//lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa//b+his pa'i
240b2(dkon brtsegs): blo can rnams la bstan//rang gis de ni thugs chung nas//sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/
240b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin mede r+m+mA nI gang dge dang //las 'dra byung bu ma'i rdul ba'i//rgyu des khyud kyis thugs su chud//las ky-i gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu las
240b4(dkon brtsegs): mekhas pas gsol pa//chags dang ni sbyong gti mug ne//las ni rgyu zhes khyod kyis mi skyed//gling gis rgya mos brjod du yang //gang zag tshig gis
240b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud//lha'i bu ma 'ongs pA la mkhas pas gsol pa//ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag ni//mi rnams lngas gud bgyid 'gyur ba//de yi rgyu dang ldan
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dang //gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis ma khyen//lha'i bu ltar byung ba la lta byas kyis la pa/b+hi bi ste bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dpe gle/sems can rnam
240b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyu las//de nas dang las kyi legs pa rnams//srin kyang dren pa khyod kyis pa dz+haiM/'i hU~M skabs sa spyod yum rgyas gsas pa/m-i
241a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i//las dang rgyu dag ma mchi swA te//gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so//de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/
241a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas//dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang //ji ltar de yi len pa yang ///
241a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod//lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/rgyu dang lnga dang ldan pa dang //rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas//
241a4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen//de phyi rgyal ba mnyam pa med//lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa//rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //
241a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang //rnam smini so so yang dag rlig/thams cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu sgo bas la dga' bas gsol
241a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams//khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te//rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad/
241a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par btse bas gsol pa/rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams//'pho med dbang phyug med pa
241b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu na /nga / nas sa 'a sa m+b+ha l+yA ga/rgyud rgyun dang ldan smrapa nga//rnam par skyed pa rgyu pa//
241b2(dkon brtsegs): de kun rang bzhin ste nga ngo zhes//seng gau nga ror khyod kyis gsungs//lha'i bu stobs kyis rjes su 'brang bas gsol pA/'jig rten lngas ni gling zhig gis//
241b3(dkon brtsegs): khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pas//de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen//de bsra khyod ni de zla med//lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gasrol pa/khams
241b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni bsten bgyis shing //gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang //de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba//de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen//lha'i bu stobs yang dag
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyis gsol pa/khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing //ci 'dra'i rang bzhi ni gyur pa yi//sem sa can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen//phyag gi sror
241b6(dkon brtsegs): mo lnga dang 'dra//lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/khams glang la ni brten gyis shing //bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas//'du 'dzi ji 'dra bgyid
241b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//de kun bla na meng bas ma khyen//lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing //'dren pa
242a1(dkon brtsegs): dro yi khams dang ni//'du 'dzin shes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams//de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol
242a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/khams de dang ni de len dang //bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa//de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa dris//de phyir the tshom yod mi mnga'//lha'i bu khams la brten
242a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i//'khor ba de dang khams de dang //spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams//mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen
242a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ye shes gang gis khams de ni//'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi//mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes//blo
242a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog mnga' bsra yang dag bstan//lha'i bu khams na nges par byung gis gsol pa/khams gang la ni brten bgyis na//'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas//
242a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen//khyod la do zla ma mchis so//lha'i bu khams kyis rjes su song bas gsol pa/khams gang la ni brten bgyis pa//yon tan
242a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed bskyed pa dang //rnam par smon dang 'bras bu dag/de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu khams le yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/khams gang la
242b1(dkon brtsegs): ni brten bgyid cing //'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyis pa//de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen//de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod//lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas
242b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas//'gro ba ci 'drar mchis pa yi//sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang //ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen//

242b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes nges par 'jug/lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/sems can yang dag nyid nges te//ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med par//de la 'jig
242b5(dkon brtsegs): rten sgron ma khyod//rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug/lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ma nges phung por gyur pa la//gang zag gang rnams gnas
242b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams//de lnga ngan song ngan 'gro dang //mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu stobs kyis brdas gsol pa/sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid
242b7(dkon brtsegs): lags te//de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang //mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du//kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs//lha'i bu yang dag po mthong bas gsol pa/
243a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams mos//ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med//don dam nyid du bstan to zhes//de bzhin gshegs pa

243a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs kyi sras//ji ltar 'dod dgu rnam par 'phrul//lha 'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol bya/kun rdzob dang ni don dam
243a4(dkon brtsegs): drang /de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang //kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang //brda ldang dmigs su ma mchis sro//lha'i bu ye shes lhur len
243a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan//chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan//mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis//khyod kyis
243a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs//lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsolnga pa/nges par gyur pa'i sems can+da rnams//gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gon sa ma
243a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis//log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror//drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/khams gang la ni brten bgyis te///
243b1(dkon brtsegs): gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing //'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba//de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu mi sdug pa lnga nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ma mchis
243b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu brtags pas na//'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung //de la mos pa nges 'byung ba//de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs//lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/
243b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na//zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung //de la mos pa nges 'byung ba//de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs//lha'i bu rkyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol
243b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na//gti mug khams ni rab tu byung //de la mos pa nges 'byung ba//de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs//lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gi gsol
243b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/mtsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ser sna mngon du 'phel 'gyur te//de la mos pa nges 'byung ba//de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
243b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa na//'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung //de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba//de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen//
243b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnam par shes pa sring por 'dzin pas gsol pa/'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis//ci 'du'i khams la brten pa dang //mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag pa//khyod kyis ma lus rab
244a1(dkon brtsegs): t+yA m+bA n+da//lha'i bu nan tAn snying por byed pus gsol pa/'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis//gang gis rgyu 'byung nan+ta tAn dang //mos pa de la 'byung ba las//
244a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa med pa khyod kyi sgo gzigs//lha'i bu dbang po la myos pas gsol pa/sems can gang gis mkhas gang lnga//brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi//rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu
244a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen du des na khyod kyi dga' bar mdzad//lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang //gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang //dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang //
244a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang //srod par mngon pa 'jug pa dang //sred bzhi pra/
244a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i don//de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen//lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/dbang po nyam chung rnams dag ni//gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par
244a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal dusred pa rnam par gzhig pa srung //rkang gnyis dum paso bstan pa mdzad//lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bsdu gsol pa//dbang po rtul po ngur
244a7(dkon brtsegs): khrod rten//rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid//rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas//sred dang bcas pas khyod la blta//lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/'dod
244b1(dkon brtsegs): chags can dang 'dod chag sna dang //zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang //sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnams//rnam par gzigs la mngon ming megs//lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol bya//
244b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi//gnod sems med dang dben pa dag/dbang po rtul po bsten pa'i tshe//khyod kyi 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs//lce'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol
244b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs//sems can shes pa rjes su skye//zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid//de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu dbang po chel bas gso
244b4(dkon brtsegs): pa brnyed sems med dang byams pa dang //zhi bango bo nyid ma gzigs//deg deng nyon mongs ma dmyigs te//des ni 'jig rten khyad parapa'i dus//lho'i bu dbring po rje su 'brang gis gsol
244b5(dkon brtsegs): pa log par rnam par rtog pa dang //log pa nye bar ston pa yang //nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te//bzlob pas thar bar 'gyur ba gzigs//lce'i bu ye shes yid drag shar gyis
244b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //dngos li 'dzin pa mun sa ste//bzlog pas sna nga ba chen por 'gyur//de ni brags chen khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu ye shes
244b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams//rang bzhin nyid kyis mi mchis te//da ni rkang gnyis
245a1(dkon brtsegs): gcabs gzigs//lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/sems can gang gis shes pa gang //ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang //snod du gang rung ji snyed pa/
245a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'dras pas gsol pa/nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis//shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa//de yang ston pa khyod kyis
245a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//de bas khyod la mngon par dga'//lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa//yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang //spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang //nyon mongs nyon
245a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnam dag pa//thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs//lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol ba//dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang //gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang //bcings
245a5(dkon brtsegs): dang zar dang zad pa'ang shes//g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang //nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang //
245a6(dkon brtsegs): gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag/khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs//lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa//sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang //rnam thar
245a7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs dang //snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang //rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu stongs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te//chos kun
245b1(dkon brtsegs): rab nyid kyis ni//rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen//des na thams cad mkhyen zhes bgyi//lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa//chos rnams gang dag rang bzhin gang //chos gang gis ni
245b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod bgyis pa//yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud//des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'//lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa//log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs//rnam pa bani ni
245b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur//las las skyes par de dag mkhyen//des na khyod ni do zla med//lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi//gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang //

245b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnam byang dag/ming tsam myo zhes khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa//bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang //snyems par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin//
245b6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa las byung ba ste//de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel bas gsol pa//dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni//bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang //ldan dang
245b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang la 'jug/de ni rlung ltar chags pa med//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe//srid pa ma
246a1(dkon brtsegs): skyon dang yod mya 'dres//des na khyod la rda myed//lha'i brdzunaHmtha' la gnas pas gastsal pa//sprul pa brgyangs mad //byang chub pan
246a2(dkon brtsegs): yas chol mdzad cing //'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na//des ni khyod ni dpa' ba la gyis//lha'i du sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs pas gsal pa//mngon mapar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/
246a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsung tshe gsol pas na//spobs pa sna tshogs rab mda' bar//rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung //lha'i bu sngon mtha' la byung bas gsol pa//sngon chad 'khor bar spyod
246a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe//tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa//'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs//nges nas khyod ni tshul la mkhas//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa//sngon
246a5(dkon brtsegs): mthar chos rgyal mang po la//dpa' bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas//thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung //sems can khams la phyag kyang 'tshal//lho'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun
246a6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pas gsol pa//byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa//de la khyod kyis sa bon btab//lha'i bu sngon
246a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa//bskal pa bye ba brtags mdzad pas//chos kun sems can med pa zhes//chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen//'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas
246b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par//rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas//des na 'jig rten rmongs
246b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa//gnas dang gnas min bsten bgyis nas//las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na//khams dang dbang po mos pa dang //bsam gtan sngon gyi
246b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yang mkhyen//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtho' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa//khyed kyis sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas//stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po//dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel//
246b4(dkon brtsegs): des na 'jig rten 'di la gzigs//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa//dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi//sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang //dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams//mkhyen
246b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad//lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' spyod pa//la so sor rtogs pas gsol pa//thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi//sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing //khams dang mos
246b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pas na//de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad//lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol ba//bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su//sngon gyi mtho' la brtags bgyis kyang //khyod kyi
246b7(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa chags mi mdo'//des na mgon la bdag mos lags//lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang //rkang
