247a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gcangs smon tan gyi//pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis//wASh+Ti bu phyi ma'i mtha' lda mkhas pas gsol pa//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag
247a2(dkon brtsegs): gi/skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa//shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dgo//khyed kyi sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs//lha'i bu phye ma'i mtha' las nges byang byung gis gsol pa//rgyu gang gis ni las
247a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhog//bgyis shing rgyung drug mchir gyur pa//de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen//des ni thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi//lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsal pa/
247a4(dkon brtsegs): khams gang gi ni sems can gang //bsgos par gyur cing las dgyes pa'i//bag chags las dang sems can dag/khyod kyis g.yo ba med por mkhyen//lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig
247a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa//bshes gnyen ji 'dra bstan bgyis shing //las gang mngon par 'dus mchis pa//'gro ba gang du mtshos 'gyur ba//thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen//lha'o bu dngos
247a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//las de yi ni bgyis pa gang /dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//gang gi slad du las bgyis pa'o//de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu dngos po la
247a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa//dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang //las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa//thams cad mi byed pas de mkhyen te//de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags//lha'i bu dngos
247b1(dkon brtsegs): po rig pas gsol pa//sems can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa//dngos de ji ltar chags pa dang //de ni ji ltar grub pa yi//las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen//lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas
247b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa//shes pa gang gis dngos po de//brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen//de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang //thub pa khyed kyis shin du mkhyen//lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la
247b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas kyis gsol pa//chags pa gang gis las de rnams//nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i//nyon mongs de dag yang dag mkhyen//de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon//lha'i bu 'gro ba la
247b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa//'gro ba gang du las gang gis//mchi zhing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas//'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba//de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas
247b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa//'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi//gang gi las rnams smin gyur pa'i//dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te//de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug/lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas
247b6(dkon brtsegs): dus gsol pa/'phyo dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis//stan chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang //de bzhin dge ba'i lus rnams kyi//ngag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu las la mkhas
247b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa//'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi//snying dang gsar dang srad ma dang //las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen//de lo so so'i skye bo 'khrul//lha'i bu rnam par smin
248a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la n+ta khas kyis gas pa pa//rtswa rnam smin che ba dang //cho gang rnam smin rlung ba dang//rlung ngamache'am mnyam pa'o nga //del matsun na/
248a2(dkon brtsegs): na rnams rmongs//lca bu las lam ngas kyis gisam pa/'dul sa rnams gang legs dang //hUMs d+ha'i las rnams gang lags dang /lanA thA ste
248a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gang lags pa//de dag spyadan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu che 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa//tshe 'dre la ni gang bgyis pa'i//las kyin
248a4(dkon brtsegs): sprin mi gang dag/myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la//saM sar spyi bo rjengs pa mkhyen//lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/gang gis las
248a5(dkon brtsegs): bsags gyur te//skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa//gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed//shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen//lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la
248a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas kyis gsol po//lus gang bskal pa bya ba yi//phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyung zhing //dus gzhan drug na yang 'byung ba//de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen//lha'i bu
248a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma smin pa mong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa//las rnams gang zhig dkyis gyur ba//yongs su smin por mgyur ni//de sri 'i bra ci'i 'byon mo//rkang gcis
248b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gos na du nan// margyun pa nga ba ma sa stsag sa//las shA nan 'dud// da du sgyu byu g+sa/
248b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas des rtenato//seMsu su byugs nas sbyin//lha mangs su sa nga byu skye ga b.las ni sna nga smin /
248b3(dkon brtsegs): / 'gyur bas na//de la steng pa rnam pa ma pa'i sbyin sbyong ba byung du lung sa pas sa mas cad
248b4(dkon brtsegs): smral pa/des na rgyud nyud 'ju /las da/ rnaMs de lams//
248b5(dkon brtsegs): khyon kyi spyod pa la spyod pas ga //sems can spyod pa spyad ma //las kyi rnam par sprin po brtan//bong bu'i chu di shi chu//lan ces rnam par brtan pa da/
249a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/slob dang mi slob rnam par smin//rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing //kun nas nyon mongs las myong
249a2(dkon brtsegs): nas//las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan//lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na//las kyi
249a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu bstan pa yi//byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs//phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/'jig rten
249a4(dkon brtsegs): dag na rnam 'dren khyod//sems can rnams kyi shi 'phos dang //skye ba kun la ye shes 'jug/mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu dmigs pa myed
249a5(dkon brtsegs): pApa la spyod pas gsol pa/'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang lus//'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang //rnam sbyin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa//'dren pa rkang gnyis mchob
249a6(dkon brtsegs): gis mkhyen//lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhi//shin du bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin//rkang gnyis mchog khyod
249a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang //zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad//lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa dang bral bas gsal pa/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//yongs su
249b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyog las skyes pa ste//rmi lam dga' bar ba bzhin//sgra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'artul//b+hU'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa//yongs su rtog pa rang
249b2(dkon brtsegs): bas//nyon mongs zad pa rab bstan te//rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar//mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bstan//lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/rmi lam tshar chen 'bab pa
249b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar/de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung bar//zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa//rmi lam char chen 'bab
249b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar//de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste//nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gsol pa/ji ltar bu
249b5(dkon brtsegs): mo'i rmi lam na//bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na//dga' dang sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba//de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa
249b6(dkon brtsegs): lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin//khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs//de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan//thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu blo gros nges par rtogs
249b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa//chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni//ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang //bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs//'gro ba ji bzhin tshim par mdzad//lha'i bu ye shes
250a1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gsol pa/khyod kyi dam pa'i chos ston pa//thos nas yid ni dga' 'gyur te//rmi lam dag na rma bstan bzhin//de ltar rgyal bas bstan
250a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad//lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin//'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na//bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod
250a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni/lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'//lha'i bu blo gros nges par gsol pa/thub pa pi wang sgra 'dra ba'i//khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na//lha'i bu rnams kyang the tshom
250a4(dkon brtsegs): ngor/rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/sgra ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag/byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na//mi mkhas de la rmongs
250a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu sprul pa la sems kyi sa gsol pa/ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba//de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs//
250a6(dkon brtsegs): mgon po'i bstan pa de thos nas//bdag cag the tshom mchis so//lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang //sgyu ma lags
250a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal bas na//de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis//de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs//lha'i bu rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs kyis gsol pa//ji ltar brtson pas rmi
250b1(dkon brtsegs): lam na//sangs rgyas sku gzigs brtags pa bzhin//de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed//rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'jom gyis gsol
250b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu las te//'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags//rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags byung //de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu yongs su
250b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang bas gsol pa/ri sul dag na sgra byung ba//brag cha sems can sgyu ma lags//de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs//de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'
250b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te//sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags//'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan//byis pa mang po rab tu
250b5(dkon brtsegs): btsud//lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa//chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang //byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags//nan tan chos las shes par
250b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis//de la bdag ni the tshom chad//lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol ba/chos don yang dag gang lags pa//de na sus kyang ma rtogs shis//sus kyang ma
250b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan 'tshal ma gyur//de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs//lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtog pas gsol ba//zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang //bag chags dang ni rtogs dang
251a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog/kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa//thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags//lha'i bu kun du rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/kun nas nyon mongs
251a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag dang //zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang //ngag dang gshad dang nye du dang //ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags//lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/khams
251a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum rnams la ma chags te//na mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba//bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas//zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol
251a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/thub pa khyod kyis thugs yid ni//gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing //'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la//gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra//lha'i bu re ba med
251a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs//gzugs dang gzugs min gnyis gar min//'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur pa//sred zing khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//
251a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsol pa/'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la//khyod kyi sred pa yang drag chad//khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'//rnam par 'dren la
251a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas//khyu mchog dam pa spyod mdzad cing //sems can 'jig rten
251b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrol mdzad pa//thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu sred pa dang bral gyis gsol pa//kun du sbyor dang bral ba ste//yang srid pas pas zhir gyur pa//dag pa'i bdag
251b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid drag pa'i sems//dus dang bra la la phyag 'tshal lo//lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa//ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen//
251b3(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis//yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu 'dam las brgal bas gsol pa//'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba ste//srid pa'i
251b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dam las de bzhin brgal//gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'//yang srid rgal la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs//
251b5(dkon brtsegs): re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs/sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnams spangs pa//don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa//don dang don ma legs
251b6(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs//chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa//bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa//len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/bdag nyid dang
251b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhan rnams kyi//lam gang nyon mongs rim med pa//sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po//dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs//lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol pa//
252a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa//khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams//ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na//nyon mongs rnams ni nub par
252a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa//chos rnams kun la nges pas na//bsngo ba gang yang yong me gzigs//ye shes rgya mtsho mi snyengs par//seng ge'i sgra
252a3(dkon brtsegs): ni sgrog par mdzad//lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa//'jigs pa kun las yang dag brgal//zug rngu thams cad kun tu ston bsnyengs pa
252a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'//thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa//lha rnams dang ni dri za dang //bdud dang tshangs par bcas
252a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yis//khyod kyi chos la rgal mi nus//de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'//lha'i bu seng ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa//chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen
252a6(dkon brtsegs): pas//sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'//bdag la chos kyis sus rgol zhes//bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'//lha'i bu skrag med kyis
252a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/seng ge ri su la gnas pa ni//'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis//ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te//spa skong gnas na nga ro sgrogs//
252b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin thams cad mkhyen bya yang //myu stegs can+da rnams yongs skrag skye//lta bu dri za' 'jig rten na//mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog/lha'i
252b2(dkon brtsegs): bu thams cad zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten no//sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa//'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te//des
252b3(dkon brtsegs): nAnu rgyal ba bdag gi skyabaste//lha'i bu steng ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa//thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs//chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//
252b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'dra 'jig rten mo mchis te//cis mi bsnyengs lnga phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu rjes su 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa/sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na//'di
252b5(dkon brtsegs): nu khyod la rgol ma mchis//'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni//khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis//lha dzod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsngags
252b6(dkon brtsegs): te//khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas//srog chags bye ba skyong dag gis//byang chub mchog tu sems stong skyes//lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su 'thun gyis gsol pa
252b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes 'thun brtul shugs can//dpal chen de dag thob chen thob//byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing //gang za ga mchog tu de dag 'gyur//lha'i bu rje
253a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa'i chos la dga' bas bsol pa/khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te//byang chub mchog tu semasna btung pa//de dag 'jig rten sems
253a2(dkon brtsegs): can che//gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur//lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung
253a3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas//srog chags bye ba stong dag gis//byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed//lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsol pa/yun ring dus na
253a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang gis//sangs rgyas bslabs la legs bslabs pas//de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag/mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan//lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i
253a5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gsol pa/zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de//dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs ni//rgol ba 'di na yong ma
253a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis//lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa//khyod kyi gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i//lha dang lha bu mi dag ni//'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te//
253a7(dkon brtsegs): des na thub pa stobs dang ldan//lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni//ma lus yongs su bas pa ste//'di na
253b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgal ma mchis//des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pa//lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes//mi dbang khyod la gang rgol
253b2(dkon brtsegs): bo//rnam pa kun du mi dmigs te//de na sangs rgyas bskyengs mi mnga'//lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa//'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste//gti mug bag chags
253b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas par ni//nyis spyod las kyang zhi bas nA//sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa//rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang /
253b4(dkon brtsegs): bas par 'gyur ba lta ba'i tshe//de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug/des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/'dren pas gang la
253b5(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa yi//rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te//thams cad mkhyen pa de slad du//nyon mongs thams cad ma lus bsal//lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis
253b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa//'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo//rnal 'byor las ni nyams ma mchis//des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun//bag chags bcas par yongs su btsal//
253b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa//nyon mongs thams cad zad gyur nas//bag chags ma lus yongs su bsal//bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang //cis kyang mi
254a1(dkon brtsegs): bstongs spyod pa mdzad//lha'i bu zag pa la rtogs pas gsol pa/thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod//nyon mongs bag chags bcas par//
254a2(dkon brtsegs): bas//'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni//mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so//lha'i bu brag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa/khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/
254a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la skyon dri yod ma mchis//de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen//lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub//lha'i bu mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/zag pa rnams
254a4(dkon brtsegs): ni spangs pos na//skye ba yang skye ma legs te//thub khyod skye ba tha ma pa//des na ma gon po bsnyengs mi mnga'//lha'i bu tshad bsrung gis gsol pa//dpa' bo khyod
254a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis sa bon spangs//sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par 'gyur//mya ngan mkhri shing rnam par bskams//gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu shing btags
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bton gyis gsol ba//thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod//ma rig shing btags rnams kyang bsal//sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs//de bas ston pa
254a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyengs mi mnga'//lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol du song bas gsol pa/srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal//rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byos//khyod kyis snang ba yang
254b1(dkon brtsegs): dag phyung //'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub//wA bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/thams cad mkhyen bzhir gyur pa//nyon mongs thams cad rab tu
254b2(dkon brtsegs): bshig/bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'o//mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa//khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan
254b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgreng //nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu brtul//chos kyi lam srid mtha' yas pa//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol bya/
254b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so//thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa//sems can kun gyi dge ba shes gnyen//ye shes gtsol phyag kyang 'jal//lha'i bu chos
254b5(dkon brtsegs): gos can gyis gsol pa//khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa//seng ge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang //rgyal sras de dag chog med cing //sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis bsgom/
254b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos don du gnyer byas gsol pa/sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar//khyod kyis sras rnams sems bskyed cing //khyod kyis mi 'jigs thos gyur nas/
254b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol//lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsol pa/khyod kyis mi 'jigs thob gyur nas//sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir//srog
255a1(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba sgom gyur te//brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu brtson///bam po bcu gcig pa/lha'i bu chos kyi 'phags
255a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol ba/sangs rgyas tshos kyis mngon 'phags shing //'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i//gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas//brtul zhugs
255a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog can byang chub tshol//lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/thub pa zab cing lta dka' ba'i//chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa//khyod kyis sras kyis thos gyur
255a4(dkon brtsegs): nas//de dag bla med byang chub tshol//lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa/khyod kyis seng ge'i gsung zos nas//khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa//lus dang
255a5(dkon brtsegs): srog lnga mi lta bar//byang chub don du gnyer bar bgyis//lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa//thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/
255a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas//gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par//brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol//lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol
255a7(dkon brtsegs): po/mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas//theg pa gnyis po spang bgyis shing //la mi gzhan du ni mi mchi bar//bla na med pa'i byang chub tshal//lha'i bu nye
255b1(dkon brtsegs): bor gnas kyis gsol ba/seng ge'i ngango 'di bsgrags pa/rgyal ba'i skyes kyis thos gyur nas//byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing //de dag rkang gnyis dam par
255b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol ba/grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i//spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas//sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyis sras//
255b3(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyes//lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/'jigs myed khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa//ma smad sras kyis thos gyur na//de dag spobs
255b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nam du yang //sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog/lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol po/'jigs mod khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas//stobs chen khyod kyi
255b5(dkon brtsegs): sras kyi rnams//rtag tu rab tu dga' gyur cing //ma smad de dag byang chub tshol//lha'i buM yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa//khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos gyur nas//
255b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras//dga' zhing zhum pa mi mchis par//byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid//lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa//khyod kyis gsung
255b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags thos pas ni//sems rang gyur cing yid dga' ste//de dag yid ni nam du yang //byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis//lha'i bu chos la bar chad med la mkhas
256a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/chos rnams gang la brten bgyis kyang //dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing //de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i//gnas ni thub pa
256a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi mkhyen//lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/dkar po'i phyogs la spyod pa la//bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing //gnas kyang med
256a3(dkon brtsegs): par thub pas mkhyen//des na smyon pa bsnyengs mi mnga'//lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol po/dge la kun nas nyon mongs pa//nag po'i phyogs kyi rang
256a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te//khyod kyi thugs ni des mi gos//gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen//lha'i bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//nag po'i chos ni nam du yang //
256a5(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par//rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs//des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla//lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol pa
256a6(dkon brtsegs): cho rnams thams cad ma 'dres pa//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen//kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na//dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur//lha'i bu lam la mkhas
256a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la//dkar po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste//de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la//bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs//lha'i bu thar pa 'dod//
256b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol bya/nag pa'i phyogs la brten bgyid na//thar par 'dod pa mang po yi//byang du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs//des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen//lha'i bu dag/
256b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas//kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes//dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs//de khyod 'jig rten mchod rten
256b3(dkon brtsegs): lags//lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/kun nas nyon mongs sbyong bgyid pa//kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na//dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus//de skad bde bar
256b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gsungs//lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/sdig po rnams la brten byas kyang //dge ba mi 'grib gang sgru ba//de ni thar chos skal med ces//rkang
256b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs//lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa//chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang //zhe sdang gti mug gdul 'dod pas//thub pa'i spobs pa
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba//de lta bu ni nan tan bgyi//lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pas gsol pa//dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa//mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa//de dag ston pa sangs
256b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas min//de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs//lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa//nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos//rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa//
257a1(dkon brtsegs): de rten nyon mongs mi zad ces//khyod la rgol ba yong ma mdzes//lha'i bu tha ba la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/chos kyang nyon mo smra
257a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rnams//zag 'gyur thug pas bstan pa la//yang dag brtson byas myi zad rjes//rgol ba 'di na yong mi dmigs//lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brgyan pas gsal
257a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la//gang gA don du chos bstan pa//de brtson bgyis pas mi thob ces//'din khyod la rgol mi mchis//lha'i bu mi 'jigs
257a4(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyis gsol pa//'dod chags spyad phyir mi sdug pa//bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na//'dod chags zang par mi 'gyur zhes//khyod la rgal ba yod ma
257a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis//lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bya//zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa//de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur
257a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes//dgra 'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis//lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa/shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir//gsungs pa de la brten
257a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis kyang //gti mugasel bar mi 'gyur zhes//'din khyod la rgol me mchis//lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'jims kyis gsol pa/rnam par rtog pa
257b1(dkon brtsegs): gnon par ni//dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa//de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes//'di na khyod la rgyal ma mchis//lha'i bu mnan ma myed pa ltar ldan pa
257b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/nga'o snyam pa spang slad du//stong nyid khyod kyis bka' sprul te//des ni des zhi ma 'gyur zhes//'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis//lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal
257b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs kyis gsol pa//nga snyam nga rgyal spang skad du//mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs//brten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes//'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis//lha'i bu
257b4(dkon brtsegs): sems rgyud rnam par dag pas gsol pa/lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi//nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur//de nas nyon mongs pa zad ces//'di na khyod la ni lam
257b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis//lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa//phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang //nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug pa//'jigs pa med par rgol ba na//
257b6(dkon brtsegs): thub brjen po ma mthong //lha'i bu tha snyad shin du shes pas gsol pa//bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang //zad dang ma zad tha snyad tsam//'jigs pa ma mchis
257b7(dkon brtsegs): rgol bgyid pa//thub pa de ni ming tsam mo//lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa//mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas//khyod kyi sku yi phrin las 'jug/
258a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na//des na 'dron pa thams cad mkhyen//lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/sems can
258a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thugs brje bas//dpa' khyod sku yi phrin las ni//mtha' dag shin du nges pa lags//'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu lus kyi las
258a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nges pas gsol pa/sku yi bAn+da la sa rab nges par//lus can kun la sman slad du//'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de//des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/
258a4(dkon brtsegs): bu lus kyi mtha' shin du mthong bas gsol pa/sems can kun la sman slad du//'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni//sku yi phrin las dag pa dang //legs par yongs
258a5(dkon brtsegs): su brtags dang ldan//lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par gzhug pas gsol pa/shin tu mnyam par gzhag sku dang //sku yi phrin las dag pa dang /
258a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par sems can ba dun du//gang zug mchog ni spyod pa mdzad//lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsal po/snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang /rtsub pa yongs su spangs
258a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung //mkhyen pas shin du yongs brtags shing //mgon pa khyad ni gsung ba mdzad//lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa/dus su don dang ldan pa dang /
258b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan mang yongs su spangs pa'i gsung /gzung bar 'os dang blang 'os dang //'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad//lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs
258b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs te//'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba//dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin//sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod//lha'i bu mi slu bas gsol pa/srog gi don du'ang khyod
258b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni//srid pa rnams su brdzun ma gsungs//de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun//'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis//lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/'di ltar 'gro ba
258b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang //sangs rgyas chos rnams bcol slad du//thub pa'i gsung la sdod pa ni//yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu 'thun lags//lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las
258b5(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung gis gsol pa//mi mchog khyod kyi bden pa yis//rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te//chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang //rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis
258b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa/'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams//yang dag ji bzhin lta ba dang //chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang //mi yi dbang
258b7(dkon brtsegs): pos rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa/ye shes yongs su dag pa yis//bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi/tshig gi las yang rab tu mkhyen//nges na rgyal ba
259a1(dkon brtsegs): mnam ma mchis//lha'i bu yid la rtog pa sna gsol pa/mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las//ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni//de dag 'gro ba drugs
259a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes 'jug/'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/'gro ba thugs rje bskyed nas ni//gang la khyod ni spyod
259a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa//de la thugs ni dul bar byung //'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol pa/'gro ba'i bsom pa rnam dpyad nas//rnam 'dren
259a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi phrin las 'jug/thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni//mkhyen bzhin kun du rab tu 'jugs//lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/sangs rgyas sa dang yid
259a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis las//sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung //sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs//rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas
259a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa//sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus bsam gton dag la yang //gang gis gang la mngon spyad pa//sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu 'das pa
259a7(dkon brtsegs): la rtogs pas gsol pa/byang chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cing //gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa//sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brtags nas//sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen//lha
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa//sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang //khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi
259b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'//lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi//ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba//sangs rgyas bye ba grangs yid la//
259b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus//lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa//sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu//grangs med dpag tu med pa yi//ting 'dzin sgro dag
259b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa yis//zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad par 'gyur//lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa/'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang //bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs
259b5(dkon brtsegs): dag/gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston//sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel//lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa/gzhan dang gzhan dag
259b6(dkon brtsegs): zos shing 'tshal//rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis//gnod pa mi zad bgyis pa dag/gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag
259b7(dkon brtsegs): par byung gis gsol pa/thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa//khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi//las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang //'gro ba rnams la thogs
260a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis//lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni//ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang //skye dang las
260a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin la//thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so//lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol ba//brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi//mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi//
260a3(dkon brtsegs): pas mi dang las kyi 'bras bu dang //'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis//lce'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa//khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang //dus
260a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum kun la mkhas khrod kyi//ye shes mchog ni mi chags te//srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen//lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/las dang sems can
260a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang //rnam par smin pa myong ba dag/de dag thams cad ming tsam du//rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad//lha'i bu de lhor byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol
260a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni//de ltar byung ba thogs ma mchis//grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni//'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen//lha'i bu da ltar byung ba
260a7(dkon brtsegs): la dpyod pas gsol pa/mi yi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas//byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyis pa//dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par//nges par mnyam pa nyid
260b1(dkon brtsegs): du gzigs//lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing //ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te//dngos po thams cad dngos med par//rnam par
260b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa khyod kyi gzigs//lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol ba//'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang //da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams//ma mchis dngos po ma mchis pa
260b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa bstan pa mdzad//lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa//dus gsum sems can thams cad la//snying po mchis par ma bstan te//sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yod dang //brag cha lta bur
260b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bstan//lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni//dus gsum po dag kun du yang //sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa ni//khyod kyi dbang po chags mi
260b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga'//lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa/gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis//byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa//de dus tshun chad mos pa la//bri bar gyur par yong mi
260b6(dkon brtsegs): ganga'//lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa//'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni//rab tu rgyun chad mi 'gyur te//rtag par khyod kyis mos pa des//khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che///
260b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/chab las pad+ma ji bzhin du//khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags//'jig rten dag gis mi gos te//pad+mar chab kyis ji bzhin no//lha'i bu
261a1(dkon brtsegs): mos pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni//chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod pa ste//gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis//
261a2(dkon brtsegs): smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs//lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis//byang chub yang dag brnyes par 'gyur//mdzad pa
261a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyang mgon po khyod//brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad//lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni//thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug
261a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod//dgongs pa bri ba yong ma mchis//lha'i bu sems mnyam par gzhag pas gsol pa/mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag ste//sems can
261a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen//'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni//sems can rnams la chos kyang ston//lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyis//ye
261a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni//bsgrub pa bye bar brjod bgyid kyang //sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod//lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/rnam par grol
261a7(dkon brtsegs): ngadang ma grol ba//gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas//mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni//rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mngar//lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson
261b1(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas//ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na//rnam grol ye shes gzigs pas ni//yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'//lha'i bu sngon gyi
261b2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnam par spyod kyis gsol pa//mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du//dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyad kyis//spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste//de na sangs rgyas lags shes pastod//
261b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du//bde gshegs khyod la mchog mi mnga'//chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na//rang bzhin de la rmongs
261b4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'//lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni//rnam pa kun du bsnyel mi mnga'//mgon po dgrongs pa nyer gzhag pas//thub pa 'bru
261b5(dkon brtsegs): mar snod dang 'dra//lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/'jig rten sgron mo khyod la ni//mnyam par mi gzhag sems mi mnga'//ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams//srog
261b6(dkon brtsegs): chags kun gyis shes par dka'//lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni//ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste//mi yi dbang po'i sangs
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos//ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab//lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni//'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis//thams cad
262a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa ma pham pa//khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen//lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsal ba/sems can snying po bla na med//chos
262a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa//sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo//gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
262a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /kun du rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang /na mkha'i lding dang /klu'i bu mo dang //klu dang /grul bum dang /dri za dang /gnod sbyin
262a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi 'am ci dang /phreng ldan glang po che can dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang //dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul
262a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed dang /tshangs pa dang /'od gsal dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //lung bstan pa yang thos/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
262a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gos bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis
262a7(dkon brtsegs): su gyur/nem nur dang the tsom za bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye gau ta ma sngan tshad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni kun du
262b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshul bar gyur cing //'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur te
262b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la bdag cag gi gnas ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul
262b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang /thams
262b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher/gau ta ma khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing yid rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/des na bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod lnga dad pa
262b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis par gyur to//kye gau ta ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la/ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin
262b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo//dge sbyong gau ta mya khyod ni ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtags nas mun pa med par gyur te/snyun 'di las ldang bar
262b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do snyam ste/bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can
263a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa can dang /kun du rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun du rgyu dag de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyi ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig/dge sbyong
263a2(dkon brtsegs): gau ta ma legs so zhes gsol te/kun du rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun du rgyu dag khyod kyis ji ltar
263a3(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/de dag gis gsol ba/kye gau ta ma bdag gis bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/gang 'di pa dang ma gnyis kyang
263a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang /chags par yang gyur pa dang /chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas/'dod chags kyang 'byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur
263a5(dkon brtsegs): rozhe'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems//pha dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam//gsol pa/
263a6(dkon brtsegs): kye gau ta ma ma lags so//ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/kye gau ta ma ma lags so//pa'i sems las byung ngam/kye gau ta ma ma lags so//pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngab
263a7(dkon brtsegs): kye gau ta ma ma lags so//kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems//pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so//kun du rgyu dag 'od la rdzi
263b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/pha'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so//kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/pa'i kun du rtag pa de ma'i mngal du dwags
263b2(dkon brtsegs): sesam/kye gau tA ma de ni ma lags so//kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems//mngal na gnas pa de lha las 'tsho 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to//kun du
263b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/mngal na gnas pa mi dang lha ma yin dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /rung 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngami
263b4(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs sam/kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to//kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa'am/gzugs mang ba zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/kye
263b5(dkon brtsegs): ta ma ma 'tshal to//kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam//kye gau ta/
263b6(dkon brtsegs): ma ma 'tshal to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyud dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun du rgyu dag chos 'di ni rmi cing phra ste/mkhas
263b7(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/gzhan du mos pa/
264a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du dad pa//gzhan du brtson pa/gzhan gyi lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus kyu/kun du rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan nas chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper ni/mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/de'i
264a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba bshes gnyen la brten nu tshe 'di nyid la mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//
264a4(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'dra ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/
264a5(dkon brtsegs): des kyang chos zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag khyed kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du bltas pa/sngon log pa'i gdam ngag gis bslus pa/chos ma yin pa la chos su
264a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa/thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes de lung yi 'byung bar 'du shes pa/chus thos pa rnams kyis chud bsan pa yin te/kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na long ba'i
264a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pu long bar byas nas/gang 'di 'gro ba dang khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//kun du rgyu dgi de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze
264b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston pa yin no zhes khas che ba dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin na zhes
264b2(dkon brtsegs): khas che ba dang /'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba 'am/'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba yin na zhes khas 'che ba
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni mu stegs can byed pa yin no zhes khas che ba yin te/de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjes su ston pa de ni log
264b4(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su ston par 'gyur/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de na log par khong du chud bar byed par 'gyur/gang 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma
264b5(dkon brtsegs): yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par 'byin par 'gyur/'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni log par ston par 'gyur/mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang bsgral ba de ni
264b6(dkon brtsegs): log par sgrol bar 'gyur te/de dag ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na ba lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par bya
264b7(dkon brtsegs): gla kAlpA na de'i ba blang de dag gis pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram mi rnyed par 'khyil te/de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ba lang
265a1(dkon brtsegs): ji dro rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro//kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la lta mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par mkhas 'tsho zhing
265a2(dkon brtsegs): gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag nga ni ston pa nyid yin la ston par mkhas 'che bas nga gang rjes su ston pa de yang dag par
265a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ston pa yin/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su khas 'che bsnang gang khong du chud par byed pa de/yang dag par khong
265a4(dkon brtsegs): duchung par byed pa yin/'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yin la 'byung ba la mkhas par khas che bas//dgang 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la 'byung ba ston pa
265a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'che bas nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/mu stegs byed nyid yin la mu stegs byed par khas 'che bas ngagang sgrol ba de yang yang dag par sgrol ba yin te/ston pa'i
265a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rab tu shes nas ni rjes su ston//sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes nas ni khong du chud par byed/'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/mu stegs rab tu
265a7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas sgrol te/gang sgrol ba de yang mu stegs bde bas rab tu sgrol ba yin no//'di lta ste kun du rgyu dag khyed kyang thar pa 'dod pa yin la nga yang ston pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te/yang dag
265b1(dkon brtsegs): ngar khong du chud par byed pa/'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa/'byung ba mthong ba yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis/de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te mos pa bskyed la/dran pa nye bar zhog ste yid
265b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par gyis la/ma thob pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang /sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang /sngon ma song ba'i phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba dang //sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam 'grogs
265b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang /sngon ma btsal ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang /sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsoms shig/kun du rgyu dag chos gsum mngon du
265b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas mngal du 'jug ces gang smra ba de legs par phaH nyon la yid zung shig dang mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la ngas bshad do//kun du rgyu dag de la mnos
265b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de na sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsungs so//pha zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so//dri zla zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i
265b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bla dgas so//mer med po zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o//ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa'i gzhi ste/
265b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam por shes pa ni skye ba dang 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po la gnas na tsaM dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dag
266a1(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du me'i mngal du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang /'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur te/'phel
266a2(dkon brtsegs): nas skye bar 'gyur ro//bcos nas rnam par 'phel lo//'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur ro//'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes pa de dang de 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag
266a3(dkon brtsegs): de spyod par 'gyur te/de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi glen pa so ma yin no//yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyi yun thung ngus ma yin no//
266a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi mi brtson pas ma yin no//kun du rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni
266a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste skad sha sha po yin/skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/skad brtag dgos pa yin/skad che ba yin//skad lgang lhung po yin/rtag tu dngang pa yin/
266a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'dar ba yin/rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ri rgyug par mthong ba yin/me mngag 'bar ba mthong ba yin
266a7(dkon brtsegs): lcags zangs kyi nang du btso ba yin log na dbyig pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong ba yin/srin po dag gis bdag 'phang bar mthong ba yin/bdag nyid gson por gsal
266b1(dkon brtsegs): shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/khyi dag gis bdag dbang bar mthong ba yin/khyi dag gis bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par
266b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba yin/phyogs bzhir bris na phyogs mi shes pa yin/sems can kun la yid mi rton pa yin te//kun du rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems ni dmyal ba nas shi 'bos
266b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o//kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shrI 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/le lo tsha ba
266b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/mang du za ba yin/sa la 'drid po yin/mi 'jigs pa med pa yin/mi gsal bar smra ba yin/glen pa la dga' ba yin/mun pa la dga' ba yin/'dam rtsub la dga' ba
266b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/yang dang yang spos rtsa gcod pa yin/rgyun du rkang pa'i 'the bos sa rko ba yin/yang dang yang mgo la sbrang ma 'du ba yin/yang dang yang namakhar la sos 'debs pa yin/kun du
266b6(dkon brtsegs): bsnams te nyal ba yin/sA la nyal ba yin/mi gtsang bas mI 'dogs pa yin/yang dang yang namakha' lce snum pa yin/yang dang yang masmin pa za ba yin/gzhan du smra
266b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon du byed de/g.yo byed pa yin/bab bab tu spyod pa yin/rmi laman bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/rmi lim na bdag nags su song ste/rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/sbru lo gdud
267a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ba /nan bad thugs par mthong nan//kun du rgyu ga sa mnas bla nga 'i sku gsunasu
267a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bros pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du myur shes par bye//de dag ni bskul pa 'am bskalnga pa las lhug par brjod kyang zad par mi nus so//kun du rgyu dag/de la gshin
267a3(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'jos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste sgra ser ba yin/mig lnga'i mig 'dra ba yin/rtag par bkres pa yin//rtag tu sgom pa
267a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ser sna che ba yin/'dod chen che ba yin/thob pa mi rnyed pa yin//gzhan gyi la re ba yin/khro ba yin/mig dmar ba yin/bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/
267a5(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/sbyin pa'i gnas ngag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/dngos po kun la yang de nu ba'i sems yod pa yin/dngos po ngan pa rnams la yang
267a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yin/thob pa la mos pa yin no/zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred pa
267a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa yin/gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin/zas gtod na sems mi dga' ba yin/tshong dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog
267b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa yin te/kun du rgyu dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shrI 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag ni de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o//kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma
267b2(dkon brtsegs): yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste khengs pa yin/'tha' bkrol che ba yin/khon du 'dzin pa yin/nga rgyal che ba yin//lus che ba yin/
267b3(dkon brtsegs): mig che ba yin/mig dkar ba yin/mche ba snang ba yin/mthu dang ldan pa yin/'thab mo'i blo can yin/dbyen la dga' ba dang /bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/so
267b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba yin/'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/mtshon cha rno ba yin/tshig na ba yin/bdag gzeng bstod pa can yin/mi shes pa'i stobs can yin/nyon
267b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i stobs can yin te/kun du rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa ni lta ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o//kun du rgyu dag de la mi las shi
267b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/'phags pa dang bsten pa yin/'phags pa mi yin pa la smod pa yin
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba byed pa yin/mngon rtogs 'dod pa yin/grags pa 'dod pa yin/snyan pa 'dod pa yin/bzo la dga' ba yin/shes pa la dga' ba yin/nyon mongs pa chung
268a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin//khrelnga yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/byas pa bzlo ba yin/mdza' bo la gdung pa
268a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/bye brag shes pa yin/byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/tshig go mthu yod pa yin/gros bzung bar bya ba'i
268a3(dkon brtsegs): mthu yod pa 'du shA ga las bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin//pho& nus pa yin/skad thams cad 'dzin par mthu yod pa yin/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la
268a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa yin te/kun du rgyu de dag lnga sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtogs yin no//kun tu rgyu dag de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi
268a5(dkon brtsegs): rtags ni 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste mo dzes pa yin/gtsang sgra che ba yin/phreng ba la dga' ba yin/spos la dga' ba yinabadug pa la dga' ba yin/glu ldan pa
268a6(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul can yin/byug pa la dga' ba dang /'dod pa'i yon tan ngan don gyis migu zhing rgya chen pos dga' ba yin/rol mo ra sgra thams cad la dgal ba yin/sgyu
268a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la dga' ba yin/skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/khang pa dang khang po brtsegs pa dang khyim dang longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/dri
268b1(dkon brtsegs): sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/rgod po'i ngang tshul can yin//'jam par smra ba yin/dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/rgyan la dga' ba yin/che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/'gro ba'i ngang tshul
268b2(dkon brtsegs): can yin/lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin//chags pa'i mtshan ma dang //mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/kun du rgyu dag mtshan ma de dag la sogs
268b3(dkon brtsegs): pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o//kun du rgyu dag de la mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji dag gis dge ba'i
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten par bya/bsnyen par bya/bsnyen bkur bya'o//de la
268b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe/zhe sdang la yongs su brten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des sems can
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar skye ste/de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i spyad pa can du gyur pas de me'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag zos nas/bdag ni sems
268b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir/dge bo'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/de la dge ba'i
269a1(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to//byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims
269a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to//des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi dag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/byams pa chen po ma sgoms pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
269a3(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gas ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti mug la yongs su brten pas/des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas
269a4(dkon brtsegs): pas de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/de'i phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyis spyod pa can du gyur pas/de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos
269a5(dkon brtsegs): te mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag
269a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis shes par bya zhing de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag los yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshas gnyen btsal bar bya ste/de dag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de
269a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gti mug spang po'i phyir/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to//des kyang de'i gti mug gi bgo la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum
269b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid ston te/des de'i gti mug de ni rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag de la gaushin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la
269b3(dkon brtsegs): kun du brtan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/des ser sna dang ldan pa bag chags las byung ba'i mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang /bsags pa dang /zin par byas pa dang /rdzogs
269b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa dang /blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/de dag gshin rje'i
269b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te/mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o//
269b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser
269b7(dkon brtsegs): sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston te/des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
269'a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa ston te/de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni
269'a2(dkon brtsegs): ston mar gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la/nga rgyal la yang yongs su brten pas/de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang /bsags pa dang /
269'a3(dkon brtsegs): zin par byas pa dang /rdzogs par byas pa dang /blangs pa des lha ma yin du skyes te lha ma yin gyis gnas na gnas pa des lha mo yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/de lha ma yin nas shi
269'a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur to//des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha ma yin las shi 'bos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing //
269'a5(dkon brtsegs): des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga rgyal spang ba dang /nga'i snyam pa'i nga rgyal
269'a6(dkon brtsegs): gnom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams ston to//des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la spong pa nyid ston te/des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang /bdag rnam par
269'a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par 'gyur ro//yang na ji ltar byas sgyu ma rnams la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te/des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la chos rnams kyi
269'b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig pa stan tu/des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag na//
269'b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe 'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun du brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des las de byas pa da //bas kra
269'b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /zin par byas pa dang /rdzogs par byas pa dang /blangs pa des mir skyes te/mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te
269'b4(dkon brtsegs): mImi'i nang du skyes kyang /mi'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni mi'i nad nas shi 'phos po'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /des
269'b5(dkon brtsegs): mi'i spyod pa de dag la yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal par bya ste/de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston to/des kyang de'i
269'b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi sngags pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te/des de 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya
269'b7(dkon brtsegs): ngani las 'da' ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te/de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//
270a1(dkon brtsegs): de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston to//des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag bzung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro//
270a2(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe chings par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang /sbyin po mchog tu bzung ste byin pa
270a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas las de byas pa dang /bsags pa dang /zin par byas pa dang /rdzogs par byas pa dang /blangs pas lha'i nang du
270a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/de lha las shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te//des spyod pa
270a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bdag ni lha'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyi shes par bya zhing des spyod pa de dag la yang dag par 'di'i bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/de la dge
270a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing /mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do//mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa la slod cing mchog tu
270a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa'i sbyin pa bsngags par 'gyur ro//mchog tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims la bsngags par 'gyur ro//des de'i tshul khrims dang
270b1(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro//yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
270b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/de dang ldan pas myung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun du rgya dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos
270b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/dus gsum mnye pa nyid mnyan par bya'o//thos nas kyang shes cher gnas par bya ste grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul
270b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /'khor bzhi po yod pa dag tu gnas par bya zhing de dag dang 'grogs par
270b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//des 'gro ba byas te goms par rjes su 'gro bas chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye
270b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nus shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/gti mug gri gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig dka' bar gnas par bya'o//des
270b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te//des bstan bcos de dang bstan bcos shes pa de dag rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par bya'o//de'i phyir de la bstan bcos dang bstan bcos shes pa rnams
271a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rang bzhin med do//rang bzhin med do zhes bya bar snang bar 'gyur te/des de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing /myur du thams cad mkhyen
271a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni gang la brten na sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang //gang gis
271a3(dkon brtsegs): de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig mngon du 'gyur ba dang /de bsgoms pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
271a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya/yon tan la brtan par bya'o////bam po bcu gnyis pa//kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin
271a5(dkon brtsegs): las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab par bya'o//'di lta ste nga rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos de ni gang zhig de ni ci zhig
271a6(dkon brtsegs): gis yongs su bzung //de ni su las kun nas langs/su zhig de spang bar byed ces de yang dag par btsal na/nga rgyal de mi dmigs so//gang gis de yongs su bzung ba dang /
271a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la de kun nas langs pa dang /gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs pa/de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su bzung bas bdag dang 'jig rten bslas par yang dag par
271b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthong ngo //des chos thams cad rang bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos glang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//dngos po med//
271b2(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su ma grub po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//yongs su ma grub pas mi skye ba ste/gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag go//gang mi skye mi 'gag po de ni gdag su med pa'o zhes bya bar rab
271b3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so//gang gdags su med pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no//gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni thob pa yang ma yin chud zos
271b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//kun du rgyu dag de ltar na de ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de/chos nyid gang gis thams cad de bzhin nyid/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma
271b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de bzhin nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin nyid/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid pas/de'i phyir chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o//kun du
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya dag ngas ni sngan chad dang /da ltar yang 'jig rten brtags pa ni nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad de/nga rgyal gyis ni mi las shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro//nga rgyal gyis ni mtha
271b7(dkon brtsegs): ris na sa shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro//nga rgyal gyis ni sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro//nga rgyal med na gdags pa med do//
272a1(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de ni nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o//de yang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen/
272a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su zin pas shes par nus so//de nas kun du rgyu drug gyi bode dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/de dag ni mi skye ba'i chos la
272a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob nas stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas kyang de'i tshe
272a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa//mgon po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags//'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/'gro
272a5(dkon brtsegs): ba kun na spyod pa rnams gzigs te//lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin//'jig rten lta ba'i rnam pas kun du dkrugs//sprin stuni de dag gis na mkha' yog pa bzhin/
272a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod//long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam stor bzhin//'jig rten rtag deng 'jog rten mi rtag dang //rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha cig mchi/
272a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min zhes te//glang po'i dbang po khyim du btags ltar brlag/'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' med dang //mtha' yang yong la mtha' med kha cig
272b1(dkon brtsegs): mchi//mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min ces te//dper na bya ni gzeb ma bcug pa bzhin//la la dag ni lus la bdag ces mchi//la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi//
272b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas yongs su dkris nas nyal bgyid de//bya ni bya rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin//la la dag ni dbang phyug sprul zhes mchi//la la rgyu med byung zhes 'dogs pa bgyid//
272b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris//mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas gzigs//ji ltar gzab tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs pa//bu ga bu gar thar du re ba ltar/
272b4(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas 'das par 'gyur//thar pa mi thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin//tshangs dang skye dgu bdag dang skem byed dang //gzhon dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang
272b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam thos bu//phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te/rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba bzhin//dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas//bzung na gnyen skyon gsol bya
272b6(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa bzhin//lta ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byis pa dag/dbang phyug las ni bde ba 'tshol bgyid pa//rkun po'i tshogs rnams brtson rang stsal ba bzhin/'gro/
272b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams su sdug bsngal bar myongs//de dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gzigs//phyag gi mthong na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs//de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni/'gro ba
273a1(dkon brtsegs): /mkhyen pa 'gro ba spyod mdzad de//blo mchog tshe rabs 'gro ba bkrol ba ni//dper na rgyal pos btson rnams bkye ba bzhin//'jig rten sman skad bskal pa
273a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas su//dka' ba mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes te//lta ba'i rnam par sems can 'khyams mkhyen nas//de dag bcings las khyod kyis grol ba mdzad//bde gshegs
273a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge rkang gnyis gtso//chos tshogs gang la mnga'i dbang khyod mdzad pa//lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs mi mnga'//bde gshegs khyod ni de 'drang bdag cag 'tshal//stobs
273a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes shing //mi 'jig gang gis sngo ba'i dgra bsal te//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa//blo mchog de ni bdag cag thob par shog/bang
273a5(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum bskyod dang //gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang //gang gis mi mchog sems can lung bston pa//de ring yud kyis bdag cag de thob shog/de nas
273a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
273a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa//'jig rten phan bzhod 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa//mu stegs tshogs 'di shin tu 'phags gyur tam//mi mchog rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad//'dzum rgyu de ni
273b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bka' stsal gsol//bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas//'jig rten phan bzhed 'gro 'di the tshom 'tshal//zla ba nyal 'gro ba blta ba bzhin//blta zhing mchis
273b2(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal ba 'dzum rgyu gsungs//su zhig rgyal la mchod pa dam pa bgyis//gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis//rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong //mkhas pa myur du
273b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par dka' stsal gsol//mu stegs can rnams lung bstan de thos na//'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//'di ltar 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas btul//des ni
273b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun gyi rnam 'dren lags//rgyal bas the tshom legs par bsal du gsol//som nyi 'tshal ba'i som nyi dgum du gsol//des ni 'khor rnams 'di yid rangs shing gnas/
273b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas khyod kyi dgongs pa dad par mchi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/rta thul khyod kyis dus 'di shes gyur na//rgyal ba
273b6(dkon brtsegs): dgra las rgyal las dris pa lags//'dren pa rang byung nyid la de dris pas//'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang brjod par 'gyur//'dzum pa 'di ni ji ltar ngas mdzad pa//'dzum rgyu ngas de
273b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bstan par byas//yang dag ji bzhin nga yi bstan pa la//dga' ba'i yid du byos te deng nyon cig/mu stegs tshogs 'di rab tu dul 'gyur to//lta ba'i rnam spangs lta ba bzang
274a1(dkon brtsegs): por gyur//lta ba'i rnam par 'jig rten 'khyams mthong nas//snying rje can gyur byang chub rab tu zhugs//lta ba'i rnam pa dag ni rab spangs te//lta ba
274a2(dkon brtsegs): drang po rnyog med rtog gyur cing //nga yis lung bstan thogs med thos gyur nas//de dag kun gyis thams cad mkhyen sems bskyed//sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la dad bskyed de//
274a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje ldan pa rkang gnyis dam pa po//rgyal ba bye ba nyi shur tshang ba la//bla med byang chub tshol zhing bsnyen bkur byas//rgyal ba rnams la sbyin pa mi nyung phul//khrims dang zhi ba'i
274a4(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs//shes rab brtson 'grus stobs kyang 'bar bar byas//thugs rje ldan rnams drung du bzod pa ste//byang chub dam pa btsal nas yun ring du//pha rol
274a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa drug la blo yang zhugs//rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la zhu ba zhus//sangs rgyas brgya bgrangs dag la yid dga' byas//de dag sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang gis ni//lta ba'i
274a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa stug la gnas gyur pa//de dag bde gshegs rang byung mthong gyur nas//chags pa med pas lta ba'i rnam pa spangs//ston pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam par rtogs//
274a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas//ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed cing //rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur//ma 'ongs bskal pa skar mi 'dra ba la/
274b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom pa mtshan 'thun pa//grags pa chen por phyogs su rnam par grags//'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'grel par 'gyur//de dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur/
274b2(dkon brtsegs): te//de dag bkod pa sna tshogs mtshungs pa med//sangs rgyus zhing der sdig pa'i blo can med//blo gros dag par 'thun pa shra stag gnas//de ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyongs/
274b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khom bsal te dus de'i tha ma la//rgyal ba de dag sku tshe'i stobs ldan te//lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu thub par 'gyur//mi de dag gis byang chub 'dri thos na//de tshe mi mnyes par ni
274b4(dkon brtsegs): byed mi 'gyur//chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi mtshan thos na//bud med rnams kyang skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur//de ltar nga rgyal bcom pa drang srong che//skyon pas mu stegs lung
274b5(dkon brtsegs): bsten bka' stsal pa//de thos gyur nas lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams//yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par 'gyur//mu stegs can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///
274b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pas/lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams nas kun du rgyu rnams kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa thos nas/'di snyam du sems par
274b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pas/'gro ba thams cad tshim par byas pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam nas/de yang bu la chags pas kun du dkris par gyur
275a1(dkon brtsegs): /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thugs su chud nas/rgyal po zas gtsang ma la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod
275a2(dkon brtsegs): la tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po tshig 'bru ba rgya //ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs
275a3(dkon brtsegs): su byung ba'i chos 'di 'di lta ste/khams drugarnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do//
275a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/rgyal ba zlas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung nyan pa dang /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
275a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang zhe na/rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag 'di ni khams drug pa/reg pa'i skyes ched drug pa/yid kyi
275a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa ste/skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa zhes gang smras pa ci las brten te smras she na/rgyal po chen po khams drug ni 'di dag go//drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
275a7(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams so//rgyal po
275b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag ni khams drug ste/skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so//skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang
275b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de ci las brten te smras she nu//rgyal po chen po rig pa'i skye mched drug ni 'di dag ste//drug gang zhe na/gzugs rnams la blta ba'i phyir mig gi reg pa'i skye
275b3(dkon brtsegs): mched dang /sgra rnams la nyin pa'i phyir mug ni reg pa'i skye mched dang /dri rnams la sdom pa'i phyir sna'i reg pa'i skye mched dang ro rnams lo myang ba'i phyir lha'i rog
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye mched dang //reg bya rnams la reg pa'i phyir lus kyi reg pa'i skye mched dang /chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i phyir yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched do//rgyal po chen
275b5(dkon brtsegs): po de dog ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so//rgyal po chen po skyes bu de ni yid kyi nye
275b6(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes grang smos pa de ci las brten to smras she na/rgyal po chen po yid kyi nye bar spong bco brgyad ni 'di dag ste/bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di la
275b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur bar gzugs la nye bar spyod do//rna bas sgra thos na yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde
276a1(dkon brtsegs): /dang shAng skyems su 'gyu ba sprulats+tsha ba spyod//sad+ha na yod byed bya dang /yang mo 'do ba dang /bta mas su 'gyur ba la byung/
276a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod do//lhas ro myong na yid bde ba dang /ya mr-i bde b+hi dang btud seMrgyas su 'gyur bar rol te ba spyod do//rdzas kyis reg bya la reg na yod bde ba dang /yid mi
276a3(dkon brtsegs): dang btang snyoms su 'gyur bar drug bya la nye bar spyod do//srid kyis chos rig na srid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba deng btung snyoms su 'gyur bar chos la bar spyod do//rgyal po chen pode
276a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga gang dag yid bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang /gang dag yid mi bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang /gang dge btang snyoms su 'gyur bar nye bar spyod pa drug po de dag gcig tu bsdus na

276b1(dkon brtsegs): so dang rdul dang /dri ma dang /lpags pa dang /sha dang nA dang /chu rgyus dang //rus pa dang /rkang dang /snying dang /mchin pa dang /glo ba dang /mkha ma dang /sul ma sa dang //

276b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes rtog go/phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa zhes brtags nas chags par 'gyur te/phyi rol gyi skyes pa dang phrad par 'dod do//skyes pa de yang nang du bdag skyes pa zhes rtog sto/

277a1(dkon brtsegs): phrad par 'dod pas phrad par 'gyur ro//phrad pa'i rkyen gyis mer mar po skye bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do//rgyal po chen po gang la kun du rtag pa dang /
