340a4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya//lus kyi gos ni tshigs pa dang //mgo thong me ni 'bar ba bzhin//le lo sems ni bskyed gyur na//myur ba nyid du sel bar byed//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
340a5(dkon brtsegs): gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dga' ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//bzhi gong zhe na/sems can rnams ni 'khor ba na gnas shing brtson 'grus mi rtsom par
340a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong la//bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi lam le gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams ni rtag par le lo can du gyur
340a7(dkon brtsegs): par mthong la//bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams ni khong khro ba dang //'khon
340b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzin pa dang /phrag dog can du gyur par mthong la/bdag nyid ni khong khro ba dang /'khon du 'dzin pa dang /phag dog med cing rtag par byams pa'i sems dang ldan par mthong bas dka' ba'i sems skyes
340b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub par brtson par gzhan su yang bdag dang mtshungs pa med par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//de nas de'i tshe/
340b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/sems can le lo can mthong na//bdag nyid brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas//dpyir byang chub sems dpa' de//bdag nyid dga' sems 'thob par
340b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas na//skyo ba'i sems ni rab tu skye/khams gsum btson ra 'jigs pas na//brtson pa'i sems kyis spong bar byed//sems can khong khro 'khon 'dzin dgal
340b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid byams sems gnas pas na//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de//dga' ba'i sems ni skye bar 'gyur//sems can rnams kyis gang byas pa//de dag thams cad mi bya bar//de phyir bdag
340b6(dkon brtsegs): gis bla med pa'i//sangs rgyas lam ni btsal snyam sems//sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi//yang dag ye shes gang yin pa//bdag gis ye shes de bslabs nas//sems can kun
340b7(dkon brtsegs): skyabs bya sems//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de//rtag tu dga' sems skye ba na//'dus byas mi bden dag las ni//yang dag chos ni skye bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang
341a1(dkon brtsegs): /ba byang chub sems dpa ma pan da ldan na mabyas pa rnams du shA k+Sha/dul bstan su ma tshugs pa za nas su smra nas rlos mngan par sgrub pa /
341a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/bzhi gang shen byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dman ning shin tu mnyen pa na sems can dag /mthong bar gyur pa'i chu//rtag par bde bar 'ongs sam zhes mngangs dang ldan par gseng po
341a3(dkon brtsegs): ning phan tshun tshig sbyin par byed pas rtab byer 'dzum pa dang ldan pa yin/sems rtse gcig tu chos gnyer zhing rtag par dri rtog la rab tu mos pas na/dge ba'i don tshal zhing btsun pa la chog
341a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa yin/dben pa'o gnas la mos shing gcig pu 'dug pa la dga' ba sbyin/bdag nyid byung kyi lam la gnas shing semasaldan gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam la gnas pa pa dzu
341a5(dkon brtsegs): bayin te//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/mi khom pa rnams dang bral te/dul 'phun sum tshogs pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgyu
341a6(dkon brtsegs): grad ma bar mo 'gyur //de nas da'i cha bcom ldan 'das kyi mi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/mnyen pa'i sems dang ldan zhing //rtag pa byams sems pasgoms pa pa na/
341a7(dkon brtsegs): can dag dang sgra ba'i tshe//sems can gsang bar sgri bar byed//rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi//bab ma gyi nom chos kyang tshal//rtag par tshul khrims gtsang bkrung zhing //sbya me pa
341b1(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa yin//sbyangs pa'i chos la rab gnas kyang //shes rab zab mos spyod pas na//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de//mi lom rab spangs de la dang ldan//rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams la ni//chos
341b2(dkon brtsegs): zab rnams ni zhu byed pas//de phyir shes rab 'phel gyur nas//mi lo ma gnas su skye mi 'gyur//rtog par dgon par gnas mos shing //rnam dag sbyangs pa spyod pas na//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de//
341b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khom rab spangs khom dang ldan//blo ldan mkhas pa gang dag gis//chos 'di bzhi la brten byed na//mi khom thams cad rab spangs nas//sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas mang
341b4(dkon brtsegs): po mthong nas kyang //mi 'jigs dang dang ldan pas na//brtson 'grus mchog ni rab bskyed nas//sangs rgyas ye shes tshol bar 'gyur//de phyir ye shes gnyer ba dag/yang dag chos ni bslab par bya//
341b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos ni bslabs gyur na//byang chub lam ni thob mi dka'//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po byang chub sems
341b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing /rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nge
341b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongasu tshol bar byed pas gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste/
342a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs kyis bskyed pa'i sde dang /lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /gleng bzhi'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i
342a2(dkon brtsegs): sde dang /skyes pa'i rabs kyi sna dang /shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /gtan la phab par bsten pa'i sde rnams yongs su tshol bar byed de//
342a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btsal nas kyang klog cing kha don du 'don par byed/klog cing kho don du bton nas kyang yang dag par rjes su dran par byed/yang dag par rjes su dran par byas nas kyang ji skad bstan
342a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed de/gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas yongs su gtug
342a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing /rtag par mang du thos pa'i gtar rin po che bsags nas chos la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang gang po
342a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pas bsam gtan dang //ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag kyang gnas par bya ba med do//gnas pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams
342a7(dkon brtsegs): las gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro//gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pas chos rnams las thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir
342b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/gang po 'dod chags shing thogs par bya ba'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir te/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur/
342b2(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing /rtag par mang du thos pa'o gter rin po bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khrod///
342b3(dkon brtsegs): du chud par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongs su gnyer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rjesu dran par byed do//des chos
342b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su dran par gyur pa na/'dod chags par bya ba'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des 'dod chags
342b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med do//des chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir dris pa rnams kyi rje su len 'debs pa la thogs pa
342b6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bu bsags pa yin pas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing
342b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud nga 'gyur ro//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems
343a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas spyod pa dag la thogs pa med de/dmigus pa med pa'i byams pa ni dngos po rnams
343a2(dkon brtsegs): mi len pa gang yin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang po gong mtshan ma 'di la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug skyed par byed la/gang mtshan ma de la
343a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug skyed par byed pas so//dngos po'i mtshan ma 'am rdzas kyi mtshan ma 'am/phung po'i mtshan ma 'am/skye mched kyi mtshan
343a4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'am/khams kyi mtshan ma 'am/chos kyi mtshan ma 'am chos ma yin pa'i mtshan ma la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug skyed par byed pas/de'i phyir
343a5(dkon brtsegs): gang po ji tsam du len pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad ni log pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' ni mtshan ma de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i ched du byams
343a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems sgom par byed pas/sems can 'jig pa'i phyir du/mtshan ma 'jig pa'i phyir dngos po yang 'jig pa nyid do//dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir lta ba yang 'jog pa nyid do zhes
343a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe chos thams cad rnam par bshig ma byams pa sgom par byed do//de lta bu'i byams pa gang yin pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o//de lta
343b1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi byams pa zhes bya'o//de lta bu'i chos kyi byams pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o//gang po sangs rgyas kyi
343b2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa gang zhe na/mngon par 'du byed pa med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang gang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad
343b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyu kyi byams pa zhes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin cho sa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa zhes bgyi lags/bcom
343b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos so zhe 'am/'di ni chos ma yin no zhes sems par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang po gal te chos yod
343b5(dkon brtsegs): do zhes zer na//de ni chos ma yin pa yin pas/gal te chos bdade par gyur na chos ma yin pa yang med par 'gyur bar de la spros pa ci yang med pas so//spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan
343b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhes bya ste/khyod kyis de ltar rab tu brtags te/de shin du thag ring ba zhig yin nam/'on te shin du thug nye ba zhig yin/gang thos gsol pa/de ni thag ring ba yang ma
343b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/bananye ba yong ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhen/com ldan 'das de lta bu'i don de la ni phyonas kyang ma mchis/gnas kyang ma mchis/nang zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis/bya
344a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis pas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin du gang po khyod kyis chos rnam grangasu bgrang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
344a2(dkon brtsegs): chos ji lta bu zhig la grangs su bgrang bar bgyi ba lags/glang po ji tsam du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya bla'i chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs par dmigs par me mdzad//
344a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par mi mdzad mngon du mi mdzad do zhes de lta bu'i chos mi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni grangs su bgrang ba zhes bya'o//gang po chos rnams kyi grangs de dag ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ma yin
344a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i phyir/gang po deng khyod la 'di ltar rab tu dben pa'i chos mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su sdud par gyur pa bshad par bya'o//gang po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/'jig rten pa'i rnyed pa la
344a5(dkon brtsegs): gdub dag gal te mdo sde 'di thos par gyur na mnyan pa dang /len par mos par mi 'gyur ro//gang po ngas byang chub ces brjod pa'i tshig 'di khyod kyis sgra dang tshig tsam du phyogs cung zad cig rtog
344a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur par zad kyi/de'i don gyi tshul ni khyed kyis shes par ma nus so//don 'di ni shin tu zab pas tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi/mkhas pa dag gis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no//
344a7(dkon brtsegs): denas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gang gis don ni mi rtogs pa/sangs rgyas chos la mya ngan skye//gal te don ni rig gyur na//sangs rgyas de la ston par mdzad//
344b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ston dang gang seMnas pa//de na mya ngan 'dus gtong bas//'bang tshul sems ni med par yang //yang dag chas ni sems par byed//'ad mchis sgro yod pa med//'gag par chos
344b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yod min te//skye dang 'gag pa med gyur pa//de ni chos rnams la du dag mthun//chos gang skye ba med pa la//byed dang 'byung ba 'ang yong mi 'gyur//yin dang ma yin tha dang gcig/chos 'di la ni
344b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag med//de ni mya ngan 'das yin te//de na 'gag par bya ba med//thag ni nye ring gang zer po//de dag gnyi ka stong pa yin pa gang zhig stong par rtogs gyur pa//de ni mya ngan 'das shes yin//myu
344b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das pa gang shes pa//de yi slob ma zhes bya'o//gang po byang chub sems dpal gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsogs pa yin pas yong
344b5(dkon brtsegs): su gtug par mi 'byung zhing ga rtag par mang du thos pa'i gtor rin po che bsags nas chos rnams las nges pa'i don thos pas tshig gi don rnams lags par khong du chud par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i
344b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bkar stsal pa/rtag tu mang thos gnyer 'dod pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags 'gyur zhing //yang dgra res don thob 'gyur bas//de phyir rgya mtshog
344b7(dkon brtsegs): bur 'gyur//yi ge 'bru ni gcig pu dang //tshig gi don ni gcig tsam yang //bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du/brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro//de phyir yang dang /chos gnyer bya//gnyer nas tshul
345a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin bsam bya yi//chos kyi mtshan nyid mi blang zhing //sangs rgyas bsngags la zhen mi bya//de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing //yang dag chos ni dran par bya//'dod
345a2(dkon brtsegs): chags rtsod med sems kyis ni//'dren pa yongs su btsal bar bya//rtag par sems can rnams la ni//byams pa'i sems ni bsgom par bya//sems can la ni zhen med par//chos
345a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad zhi bar bya//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen gyis//'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na//myur du gzungs ni 'thob 'gyur bas//mang du thos pa de las skye//ji ltar na mkha'i ngo
345a4(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid//'phel zhing 'grib pa med pa ltar//chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin te//'phel ba med cing 'grib med pa//ngas ni shes rab stobs dag gis//bskal pa tshad med grangs med du//chos
345a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su bshad gyur kyang //'on kyang bshad pa zhes mi brjod//sems can nyid ni ji snyed pa//thams cad mi lus thob gyur te//kun kyang rab tu byung nas ni//mang thos kun dga' bzhin
345a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang //gzungs thob byang chub sems dpa' yis//sems can de dag thams cad la//skul pa bye blar chos bshad kyang //de yi shes rab gtugs mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas mkhyen pa
345a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med dam//na mkha' 'ang bar tshad kyang med//nam mkha' skye 'byung med pa ltar//mkhyen pa yang ni de bzhin no//klu yis chu ni ma blangs par//char chen dag ni 'bebs byed pa//chu de la
345b1(dkon brtsegs): no nus mod byung //char 'thob pa /ka rmed//byang chub sems dngul de bzhin du//gzungs 'di thab par gyur pa na//rnaMs rnams la niganasu med kyang //rkyen dang shad na zad mi 'gyur/
345b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir mang thos btsal ba la//dge' nas chu bzhin gnas bya ste//ches dbyings sangs rgyas rjes dran na//mang du thos pa de las skye//byams pas sems can kun khyab ste//sems can
345b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma zhi byed cing //chos kyi mtshan ma'ang zhi byed na//mang du thos pa'ang de las skye//mang du thos pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//glang
345b4(dkon brtsegs): po byung chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro//bzhi ga she ne/byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon
345b5(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur na don gyi tshul rab tu sems par byed kyi 'di mu yin no zhes smra bar mi byed de/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'dri dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang
345b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de dka' stsal pa/bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal ba'i//ma thos chos/
345b7(dkon brtsegs): tho gyur na//don gyi tshul ni legs byed cing //chos min zhe na smra mi byed//gal te stong pa'i chos thos nas//rtag tu don tshul chos byed pas//de phyir shes rab 'phel 'gyur zhing //byang chub lam
346a1(dkon brtsegs): ni de nas skye//ma thos chos ni thos gyur na//don gyi tshul ni tshol byed pas//byang chub las ni mi ldog cing //shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur//ma thos chos
346a2(dkon brtsegs): ni thos gyur na//nga rgyal ngan pa'i sems mi 'brang //g.yo sgyu dag kyang bskyed mi byed//g.yo bskyed pas ni byang chub min//ma thos chos ni thos gyur na//de yi don ni tshol byed
346a3(dkon brtsegs): pas/sngon chad thos par ma gyur kyang //rtse gcig tu ni sems pa ra byed//gang zag des ni chos thos tsho//yang dag chos ni thos 'gyur zhing //rtag par sangs rgyas mang mthong bas//byang
346a4(dkon brtsegs): chub las ni ldog ma 'gyur//sangs rgyas mang po mthang nas kyang //tshul bzhin zhu ba zhu byed pas//nyan thos ngag gis thos na yang //thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//'di ni ngo
346a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad ldan pas//'di 'dra'i zhu ba zhu bar byed//bdag cag bsam pa'ang yod min na//dngos po 'di thos ci smos zer//nyan thos ngo mtshar brjod pas na//lha klu thams cad
346a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' 'gyur zhing //sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod 'gyur na//'di ni mang thos 'bras bu yin//zhu ba gang yod zhus pa'i tshe//sang+yas de bzhin lan 'debs pa//'khor 'dus mang po
346a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa//thams cad phan pa che thob 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' len 'debs pa//mang thos 'di ni thos gyur na//'khor mad tshad med thams cad kyis//bla med chos mig thob
346b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/gang po rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur pa na//mngon par yid ches pas dang du len
346b2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gal ba med pa'i sems kyis tshul bzhin du bsamA nA 'dod pa yin no zhes smra bar mi byed na/des sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//
346b3(dkon brtsegs): glagang po sngon 'das pa'i bsal pa grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
346b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs
346b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/gang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba
346b6(dkon brtsegs): brog brgyad cu thub par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor 'dus pA re rA la yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang+gA'i klung brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bye ma snyed chos rnams la lon pa
346b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba she stag byung ste/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi grangs kyang de bzhin no//
347a1(dkon brtsegs): gang po bcom ldan 'das de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khrir gnas par gyur to//de yongs su mya ngan las 'das su nye ba'i cha byang
347a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba brgya phrag mang po kun du khyab par gyur pas/'jam
347a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' re re gnas par gyur to//gang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i
347a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos nams khad kyis le lo dang snyom las can du gyur pas 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo dag kha don du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa med par gyur pas/chos rnams stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
347a5(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde dang /tshul khrims rnam par dag cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyang mthar gyis nub par gyur te/de dag gis klog pa dang /kha don du 'don pa dang
347a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bshad par ma byas pa'i phyir de'i bston pa la chos kyi sde snod shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/chos kyi sde snod re re la yang mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya
347a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de mdo'i sde re re la yang ched du brjod pa'i sde sum khri drug brgya yod do//ched du brjod pa'i sde re re la yang tshig su bcad pa bye ba phrag drug khri bdun brgya yod
347b1(dkon brtsegs): do//gang ba de'i tsha de'i dus tha ma la dam par chos nub du nye ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod mang po de dag las mdo'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i sku 'bra' zhig lus par gyur to//da
347b2(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu bo che zhes bya ba zhig yod de/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ngem pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa/mang
347b3(dkon brtsegs): du thos shing rgya che ba/chos la legs par ston pa/tshig rgyun dang ldan pa/don gyi tshul gsal bar rtogs pa des rtag par sngon ma thos pa'i chos bsgrags po la mos par gyur to//des chos
347b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags par gyur pa na skye bo phal cher skur pa 'dabs shing 'gal bar byas par 'gyur bas chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa 'di ltar skye bo mang po 'di dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos zos
347b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur kyang /mngon par yid mi ches pas mnyan pa dang /len par mos pa yang med la gral te thos par gyur na yang khong du mi chud pas rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing 'gal bar byas
347b6(dkon brtsegs): nas skyon 'byin par byed pas/'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang ma yin la ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang mu yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag cag gos sngon cang nam ya
347b7(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon dang mkhan po las 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ma thos la/gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan rgan rabs gang yang slob dpon dang /mkhon po las 'dri la bu brgyad de thos par mi sgra
348a1(dkon brtsegs): bas so//zhes dge slong mang po de skad kyang zer la mdor sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde tsam las ma lus pas deng bdag ci'i phyir bdagu gcig pu gnas dben par mi
348a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o snyam mo//gang po chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa de de snyam du bsams nas/gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas par gyur to//de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling na bskal pa
348a3(dkon brtsegs): chags tshun chad grong khyer chen po chung dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/zheng du dpag tshad bdun yod cing rab tu mdzes par byas pa lam sreng rnams thad kar 'bab pa/skye bo mang pos ga
348a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lo legs shing bde bar gyur pa drug khri brgya stong yod par gyur to//de'i 'og tu phyis yang grong khyer chung ngu kha cig ni dpag tshad bdun yod pa/kha cig ni dpag tshad drug dang /lnga dang
348a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang /gsum dang /gnyis yod pa nang gi chung ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad gcig yod pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byas par gyur te/gang po de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer chen
348a6(dkon brtsegs): bo rab tu dben pa 'i bya ba na khyim bdag shin zhes bya ba byung ba de'i bu ni ma he shu ma ta zhes bya ste khyim bdog gi bu de dben pa la gnas pa las/lha zhig 'ongs nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/
348a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi nan tan chos dag la//bsal nas tshul bzhin soms shig dang //de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal//khyod 'tshang rgya bar lung bston to//gang po lha des tshig su bcad pa de
348b1(dkon brtsegs): nas mI snang bar gyur to//de nas khyim bdag gi bu de pa'i drung du song nas/rkang pa la mag zas phyag byas te/'di skad du bdag ni rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'ong
348b2(dkon brtsegs): zer gyi rgyal po de'i bstan pa las tshangs par spyod par 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /de nas khyim bdag shi nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/nga yi khyim na rin chen mang //gser dngul dag ni tshad kyang
348b3(dkon brtsegs): med/'dzam bu'i gling na med pa kun//nga yi khyim na ldan par yod//ngas ni rin chen btsal ba yang //bu 'dod spyod phyir btsal btsal na//ci phyir rab tu 'byung byed yin//'jig rten smod la dga' bar
348b4(dkon brtsegs): byed//de nas khyim bdag gi bu des tshigs su bcad de pha la smras pa//bdag ni rtag tu chos tshol mos//btsal nas yang dag tshul bzhin sems//longs spyod myong bar mi dga' bas//'jig rten 'dren pa
348b5(dkon brtsegs): byed par dga'//khyim gyi rin chen mi dgos pas//bdag ni 'dod pa nyung la mos//chos kyi gter ni dbyung ba'i phyir//rab tu 'byung bar mos po yin//sangs rgyas 'byung bar rab tu dkon//
348b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa yang rab tu dkon//deng bdag sangs rgyas bstan phrad na//ci'i phyir na btang bar bya//gang po de nas khyim bdag gi bu nges pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/bskor ba byas nas phyir byung
348b7(dkon brtsegs): ste 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//pha ni bye ba 'bum yod cing //ma ni bye ba brgya yod kyang //deng bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i sems//gang gis kyang ni bzlog mi nus//deng bdag lus
349a1(dkon brtsegs): srog pha ma dang //gnyen 'dab kun ni rab spungs nas//sangs rgyas chos ni mi sbyongs par//rab byung spyod pa gnyer bar byed//gang po de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu des tshigs su
349a2(dkon brtsegs): btsad pa 'di dag smras nas rab tu byung bar gyur to//chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob ga la ba der song nas//chos mnyan po gnyer bar gyur pa dang /de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba mthu chen thob
349a3(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang de la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stan to//de nas dge slong ma ha shu ma tas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde thos par gyur nas/chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces
349a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so//bdag gis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde sngon chad ma thos na/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di sus ni klog par byud/sus ni 'don par byed/sus ni yang dag par blangs nas 'dzin par byed gnas gang du ni thos
349a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/mthu chen thob pas smras pa/bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi rgyal po'i byin

349b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang don gyi rjes lan yang dag par btab nas/'di skad du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po la dge slong zhig gis dngos pa 'di dang khyod kyis ji skad dris pa/de
349b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du yang dag par la cab pa dge slong des thos par gyur nas/shin tu dga' bar gyur ro zhes smras so//gang

350a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med mi ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis mi'i lus thob nas shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur la/sems can de dag rer yang yun

354a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na mngon du bzhugs pa 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang+gA'i klung gi tha mu snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan/
354a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams yang dag par bsrungs pa'i grangs ni brjod kyis me lang ngo //gang po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos nas
354a3(dkon brtsegs): don gyi tshul yid la sems par byed na yon tan rgya chen po de lta bu dag thob par gyur par rig par bya'o//gang po khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ma hA shu ma tas chos smra ba
354a4(dkon brtsegs): mthu chen thob pa las sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos nas/don gyis tshul rjes su 'brangs par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
354a5(dkon brtsegs): ke ru war du zhes bya ba 'di nyid yin te de'i tshe dge slong ma he shu mya tAs yang dag par chos gsungs pa dang /sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyan nas don gyi rjesu 'brang zhing tshig la mngon
354a6(dkon brtsegs): bya med pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas mang po dang phyung nas mdo sde zab mo shin du gya nom pa mang po thos pa dang /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dang 'di rang la yang
354a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa rgya mtsho lta bul chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya ba'i mdo sde zhus pa las ngas kyang yang dag par bstan pa ni sems can tshad med pa snyed phan pa chen
354b1(dkon brtsegs): po thob par gyur pa yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpas ma thas chos
354b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas don tshul sems bya yi/bdag gis sngon ched ma thos shes//de skad du ni sgra mi bya//ma this chos ni thos gyur na//yang dag dran pas don sems na//rgya mtshor 'bab chu shong ba
354b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin//de phyir shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur//mang du thos pa 'phel 'gyur zhing //shes rab dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas mdzad pa thos 'gyur shing //rgya cher sems can phran
354b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dogs//mang thos rgya mtsho sogs 'gyur zhing //shes rab dag kyang gtugs mi 'gyur//tshig gi don ni rab shes pas//khyad par nang na mchog tu 'gyur//de phyir sngon chad ma dzes
354b5(dkon brtsegs): chos//yang dag par ni mnyan par bya//ma thos chos ni mnyan byed na//de 'dra'i rnam smin thob par 'gyur////bam po gnyis pa//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
354b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mang du thos pa yongs su gnyer ba bzhin du 'dun pa'i bsam pa bskyed cing gnas dben par gnas pa la mos pa'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas/sems rtse gcig tu nan
354b7(dkon brtsegs): tan brtson 'grus kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bya'o//yongs su gnyer nas kyang zhe sdang yongs su spang ba'i phyir byams pa bsgom par bya'o//
355a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags yongs su spyad pa'i phyir mi sdug pa bsgom byang gyur//gti mug yongasu spyang ba'i phyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pad+ma bya'o//gang ba/
355a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gang yin/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar ni brdzun 'grus rnam par byed ce na/gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang la lnga zhig bskul pa
355a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gam/bskal pa gcig las nyung ba cig tu 'gro 'am 'dug pa dag tu rtag par brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o snyam du sems na/gang po de lta bu gang yin pa de ni yang dag
355a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus shes mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang la le zhig bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa gcig las nyung ba zhig tu tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsrung ba dang /
355a5(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub spyad pa dang /sbyangasngo pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang dmigs pa'i dngos po'i rjes su 'dod pa'i sems su bskyed nas chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang
355a6(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gyur na 'di lta bu 'di yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus shos mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
355a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur cing /'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par mi 'gyur ba de gang
355b1(dkon brtsegs): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po byang chub sems dpas sngon ma thos par chos zag ma stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med cing don dang
355b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su mthun pa de lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo thos par gyur na/mi mthun zhing 'gal ba med par de'i don gsal bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas sems
355b3(dkon brtsegs): la nor pa med par nyan pa dang /len pa dang /klog pa dang /kha don du 'don pa dang /gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o yang dag pa'i
355b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus shes bya'o//mdo sde zab mo thos nas de'i don rab tu rtogs te mi mthun pa med cing 'bral ba myed pa'i brdzun 'grus de lta bu//de la nA sangs rgyas rnams kyi
355b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags par 'gyur zhing /'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang smod par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir gang po byang chub sems dpa'ang ltar 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyis pa
355b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyid pa gang yin pa de bdag gis 'dir gting gi mthar thug par byar//'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams byung byar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de bdag gis bying bar mi bya'o//
355b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyis 'jigs pa gang yin pa de dag la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya'o snyam pa'i go cha bgo bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag gis go cha bgos pa na 'dzag
356a1(dkon brtsegs): rten pa dang rjes ma mthun pa ma yin pas/'jig rten pa'i chos spyad pa'i phying go cha bags pa yin 'jigarten pa'i chos spyad par phyur go cha bgos pa
356a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi/'jig rten pa'i chos mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin/'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/'jig rten
356a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bzlog pa'i phyir go cha bgos po yin no snyam du sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yang dag pa'i brtson
356a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus shes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis po 'dra dang ldan par gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mi 'gyur ro//de nas
356a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyer ba//rtag par brtson 'grus
356a6(dkon brtsegs): rab bskyed de//don gyi tshul ni sems byed pas//sgra yi rjes su yongs mi 'brang //byang chub sems dpa' tshig mi 'brang //chos rnams stong par shes pa'i phyir//dge
356a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ni tshol bar byed/bskal pa dag na grangs med par//bye ba stong phrag mang por no//nyin mtshan rtag par 'dug gyur te//sems bskyed dka' ba rab spyad kyang //sngon chad
356b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thos mdo sde dag/yid mi ches na brtson 'grus min//don zab gting nablang rnyed pa//le lo can zhes mi bya'o//de 'dra'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags
356b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gting ni mi rnyed pa//de gting byang chub sems dpa' 'thob//'jig rten 'jigs shing bying gyur kyang //byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bying med//brtson pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni
356b3(dkon brtsegs): stong dben byang chub tshol bar byed//stong pa'i chos la 'jigs med pas//ldog cing bying gyur pa yang med//bdag chos mtshan nyid gnas pa las//de phyir 'jigs bying rab tu skye//chos rnams
356b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'jigs mthong ba//de ni byang chub lam zhes bya'o//nan tan brtson 'grus gong bskyed pa//mang thos rgya mtsho myur du 'grub//gzhan yang glang po byang chub sems dpas phung po lnga la
356b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas par bya/skye mched bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya//khams bco brgyad la mkhas par bya//rten cing 'brel par 'i'abyung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya'o//phung po lnga dang
356b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched bcu go nyis dang //khams bco brgyad dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la rab tu mkhas par gyur pa na gnas pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro//
356b7(dkon brtsegs): gonas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad la mi sems shing rnam par rtog par yang mi byed do//mi sems shong rnam par mi rtog par/sems can la chos bstan nas lta ba thams cad
357a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing 'jig tshogs la lta ba rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur te/byang chub snyoms dpa' gang chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/bla na med pa yang dag par//
357a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//byang chub sems dpa' phung po lnga//skye mched bcu gnyis stong
357a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes//khams ni bco brgyad rab 'byed cing //rten 'brel bcu gnyis rab tu rtogs//lnga phung rjesu mi 'brang zhing //lus ni mi bden nyid du rig/phyi nang skye mched thams cad kun//rang bzhin dag ni/
357a4(dkon brtsegs): stong par shes//de ltar chos rnams shes nas kyang //gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de//shes rab rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sem
357a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ji ltar tshul khrims bcad pa dang /ji ltar 'dul ba yang dag par bstan pa bzhin du legs par rjesu slob par byed pas yong su nyams par mi byed do//byang
357a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ji ltar tshul khrims la skyob par byed ce na/chos thams cad slob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la slob pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang
357a7(dkon brtsegs): po byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad slob par byed pa gang yin pa des ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur la/chos shes pa des ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab thob par gyur te/rnam
357b1(dkon brtsegs): pAr myi rtog pa'i shes rab des dngos po thams cad shes par gyur pas so//ji ltar dngos po thams cad shes par gyur ce na/byang chub sems dpa' ni nang gi dngos po thams cad dang phyi rol
357b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dngos po thams cad rab tu shes pa gang yin pa'o//gang po ci'i phyir nang zhes bya zhe na/nang zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du myong ba dang bcas pa 'dod chags par bya ba'i gnas 'di lta ste/nang gi
357b3(dkon brtsegs): lus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa las skyes shing /de la kun rdzob du btags pa'i ming tsam du yod pa 'di ni mig go//'di ni rna ba'o//'di ni sna'o//'di ni lce'o//'di ni luso///
357b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yid do zhes brjod pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni nang zhes bya'o//chos de dag la so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par byed pa'i phyi nang zhes bya ste/'di skad du bdag gis mig 'di lta bu thob
357b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes brjod kyang de lta bu'i mig mngon par 'du byed po med la de bzhin du rna ba dang /sgo dang lce dang lus dang yid thob par bya'o zhes brjod kyang 'di ltar rna ba dang sna dang lce dang nga yid mngon par 'du
357b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med par yang /de na las kyis rkyen gyis slong zhing rnam par smin pa rab tu bskyed pas de'i phyir nang zhes bya'o//de'i phyir bye brag la so so'i skye bos mngon par zhen nas/'di ni mig go//'di ni rna
357b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid do zhes zer ba thams cad ni nang zhes bya'o//gzhan yang gang po nang zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'di gnyis mngon par 'du byed pa yang mi bden zhing slu bar byed pa yin na/
358a1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo'i mngon par zhen pas yang dag par blangs nas rtsod pa skyed par byed kyi gang po de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di dag bzod pa nyid nas yang dag pa ji lta ba
358a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin thugs su chud pas mngon par zhen por mi mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thug su chud nas mngon par zhen pa mi mdzad ce na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ches 'di dag la
358a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs par mi mdzad do//gang zhig la phyogs par mi mdzad ce na/'di lta ste/mig 'di ni sred pa 'ching ba yin no zhes phyogs par mi mdzad la mig dang bral ba la phyogs par mi mdzad do//rna ba dang /sna dang /
358a4(dkon brtsegs): lce dang /lus dang /yid la yang phyogs par mi mdzad la yid dang bral ba la yang phyogs par mi mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di dag la rlung zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs
358a5(dkon brtsegs): la/phyi rol zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag la phyogs par mi mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par bsrung ba yin pas/'di skad du dge slong
358a6(dkon brtsegs): dag mig ni bdag kyang ma yin la/gzhan yang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang gi ngo bo nyid migasu med pa'i phyir ro//chos gang ni mig yin/mig nI su'i yin/chos gang ni rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus
358a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /yid yin/yid ni su'i yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs paso//gang po mig kyang deng so sor rab tu brtags/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
358b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /yid kyang dang so sor brtags na/chos gang la yang mngon par zhen cing lon pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang gis ji tsam du chos la len pa dang bcas pa des ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed la/sdug
358b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal skyes pa'i phyir ni bde ba med par gyur pas/de'i phyir gang po ji tsam du chos la len pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa des ni sdug
358b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal spong bar mi byed pas/gang po 'di ni mig so sor brtag pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid 'jug pa'i gnas med par so sor brtags po zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
358b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po gal te 'jug pa'i gnas yod par gyur na 'byung ba'i gnas kyang yod par gyur pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mig ni stong zhing bdag dang bdag go ba med do//rang bzhin
358b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis de 'dra zhing /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyu stong zhing bya dag dang bdag gi ba med de/rang bzhin gyis de 'dra bas ngo bo nyid med do//'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon
358b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba yang med la 'jig pa yang med do zhes gsung so//gang po chos nyid 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa mu byung yang rung ste/ngo
358b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos rnams skye yang mi skye ba nyid du thug su chud pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs pa yin pas/'di skad du de de
359a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung ste/ngo bo nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa nyid do zhes gsung ngo //gang po ci'i phyir mi skye ba zhes bya/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir ni mi skye ba'i shes zhes bya zhe na/gang po chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o//lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o//sdug bsngal
359a3(dkon brtsegs): zad pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o//lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa gnyis po 'odi lta ste/kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang
359a4(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa'i bden pa yod par gsungs pa zhes bya'o//gang po de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ces gang gsungs pa de nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa zhes gsungs so//sdug
359a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'o//'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid med pa yin pas mkhas pa
359a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan nyid med pa yin par rab tu shes so//gang po mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan ma med pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur
359a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di ltar 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni stong par yang shes//rab tu dben pa yin par shes/skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas yin par yang shes//phan pa mchog yin par
359b1(dkon brtsegs): yang shes/yongs su gdung ba med par yang shes te/mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar 'dus ma byas rab tu shes kyang ye shes de la skye ba'i mtshan ma med do//gang po mkhas
359b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams ni mtshan ma rnams yongs su spangs pas de na mchog dam pa mngon par 'du byed pa med pa 'jig pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro//gang po mngon par 'du byed
359b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa de la 'jig pa yod kyi mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de la 'jig pa yang med do//'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid yin no//
359b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma med pa yin no//'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni smon pa med pa yin no//gang gis kyang
359b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du ma byas la//gang gis kyang 'jig pa med par dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni gang po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
359b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs
359b7(dkon brtsegs): po rnams dmigs su med pa gang yin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigasum marmi ba de nyid
360a1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/gang po chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmig su med pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das
360a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te de lta na ni chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub lags par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lu pa/gang po de bzhin te/chos thams cad
360a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ces mi bya'o//chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yin zhes bya ba yang kun rdzob btags pa tsam du
360a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod par zad do/de ni le lo can rnams kyis rtogs par dka' zhing rig par dka' ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/l-i lo can gang yin pa de dag ni chos rnams mnyam pa nyid
360a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub pa mi byed la/mnyam par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas dang rtsod par byed pas so//gang po gang dag mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed
360a6(dkon brtsegs): ce na/gang po 'jig rten pa thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed do//sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la ni mnyam pa yang med mi mnyam pa yang mdo/
360a7(dkon brtsegs): gang po ngas lam 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/rgyu dang rkyen gyis de'i phyir mdo sde 'di dag las chos
360b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni yang dag pa'i gnas skab su thams cad kyang nges pa nyid du zhugs pa yin pas/de ni nges par byang chub kyi sbyor zhugs pa zhes bstan pa yin te/de'i phyir ga na
360b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad byang chub ces bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med
360b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang lags pa de ni nges pa yang lags/ma nges pa yang lags/tshig 'bru dang yi ger zhugs pa yang lags/tshig 'bru dang yi ger ma
360b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yang lags/tshig 'bru la zhugs pa yang lags/tshig 'brul ma zhugs pa yang lags pade ni shin du ngo mtshar tshe lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das deng
360b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pas chos thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob lags so//bcom ldan 'das dang bdag gis chos rnams la rnam par
360b6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i snang ba thob pas/dngos po gcig las kyang dngos po thams cad rtogs par gyur la/dngos po thams cad las kyang dngos po gcig rtogs par gyur pas so//de nas
360b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/gang po khyod kyis 'di ltar myur ba kho nar sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa leg so legs
361a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus su sangs rgyas mang po rnams la mchod cing rim glo byas pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas nye bar bston
361a2(dkon brtsegs): te zhu ba dag zhus pa las gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o//gang po ngas mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi na mkha'i phyogs cig na/khyod kyis sangs rgyas drug khri
361a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong las mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i yon tan gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis khyod chos rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis
361a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po las mdo sde 'dri sngon thos par gyur pa zhig lags na/ci'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa gcig tsam yang ma mchis
361a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po ngas sngon mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyis tshe khyod kyis skal pa gcig gi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
361a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur kyang /de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis ngos dang 'dir khyod chos smra ba rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa zhes
361a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma dge ba'i las ci zhig bgyis na/bskal pa gcig
361b1(dkon brtsegs): gus bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po
361b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mi dge ba'i grogs po la brten pa'i phyir dang /gzhan yang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos rgya cher ma spel ba'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar
361b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog cing nyams par gyur pa yin no//gang po chos bzhi dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing nyams pa nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyu ro//ban
361b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs la brten pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu spangs nas 'di skad du 'di ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ci dgos
361b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i mtho' ni shin tu thag ring ste/'gro ba lnga po rnamasu kha brgyud cing sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bas khom pa dang 'phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad pa
361b6(dkon brtsegs): yang shin tu dkon/shin du dang ba'i dad pa thob pa yang shin du dkon/sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par gyur na yang khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba ches shin tu dka' bas/deng khyod
361b7(dkon brtsegs): khom pa dang ldan pa chung ma gsan cig/khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung brtan pa
361'a1(dkon brtsegs): da pa yang ma yin la/dA Sh+T+rI byas par rgyu ba yang ma yin sa ma sa m+b+ha na 'du nga ma grob b+h+yonam su'akhor pa phyung
361'a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras byas//gang zag des deska smras pa zos pa'i dbang gis sems bying nas byang chub kyi lam las ldog cing la los mos par mi 'gyur te//gang po byung chub sems dpa'i nga
361'a3(dkon brtsegs): che dang po 'di dang ldan pa gyur na/bla na med pa'i bya chub lngas slar ldog nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dang 'geng byang chub ses
361'a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i rjesu mthun pa'i ming 'di sa/byang chub semasna 'i skye snong kyi mdzo /byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i mad /byang chub ngoms pa'i byag
361'a5(dkon brtsegs): mdo dang //pha rol tu phyin du d+hI/dats+tshaH su mthun pa'i mdo nas par mgyur na/'di ltar zlos par mi gyur pa'i phyir skrod brtan pa bzhin du spyod par mi ju / nang
361'a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin du yang dag por slob par mi 'gyur bas/des byang chub sems dpa'i chos gling ni bsten par b+h+yAM/rjes gang ni yong su sri ba / mi gang ni yang dog par chu
361'a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rigs/chos gang ni yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i mi rigs/chos gang ni byang chub sems de pa'i chos yin chos gang ni nyin thos kyi chas yin pa dag rab tu mi naso//
361'b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mi shes shing rab tu 'byed par mi nus pa'i phyir bsten par bya bar rigs pa'i chos ni bsten par mi byed la/bsten par bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu brton par 'gyuraro///
361'b2(dkon brtsegs): nges bsten par bya ba'i rigs pa'i chos ni bsten par mi byed la/bsten par bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu bsten par byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems

361'b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzin cing bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang /log por lta ba rnams spyod cing mthar 'dzin pa'i lta bar lhung ba dang /log pa'i sdig pa rnams bying ste drang dka' bar gyur nas mdo sde
361'b6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo don dam pa'i rjesu mthun pa dag thos par gyur na yang mngon par yid ches pa'i rtags cung zad tsam yang med cing 'gal bar byed pa dang /mngon par ma rtogs nas yang dkri/
361'b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'jigs pa'i kha na ma tho ba dge slong bar byed na/rgyu dang rkyen des mi khom pa'i gnasu skyes nas sangs rgyas rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/dam pa'i chos kyang thos
362a1(dkon brtsegs): pAr mi 'gyur/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rje su bstan pa dgu dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang thob par mi 'gyur ro//
362a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas sangs rgyas rnams mi mthong ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyuraro//yang dag pa'i chos ma thos pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis rje su bstan pa drug
362a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rje su bstan pa'i chos dang phrad par ma gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshos gnyen rnyed par mi 'gyur//dge ba'i
362a4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen ma rnyed pa'i phyir khom pa'i gnas dang bral nas mi khom pa'i gan su skye bar 'gyuraro//mi khyim pa'i gan su skyes pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang bral
362a5(dkon brtsegs): nas mi dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad par 'gyur ro//mi dge ba'i grogs po'i rje su 'brangs pa'i phyir sngon gyi yi dam brjed cing stor bar 'gyuraro//des sngon gyi yi dam brjed
362a6(dkon brtsegs): cing stor bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang spong bar byed/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang spong bar byed pas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing /byang chub kyi bsam

362b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang /lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed cing sems zhum par gyur nas gcig tu 'gro ba la dga' zhing chos kyi ser sna byas nas gzhan dgal
362b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i 'dun pa med pa dang /chos kyis gzhan dag rgya cher yongasu rjud por mi byed na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyu dang rgyan gyis shes rab dang dran pa rab tu nyams par 'gyuraro//
362b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba'i dang gis gzhan pa dag dang sbyin cig mdo sde'i chos klog cing 'don par mi byed la/chos kyis gzhan dag dang mthun par mi byed pas glu
362b5(dkon brtsegs): zag de lus rjes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyang stong par gyur la/byang chub sems dpa'i busam pa yang brjod por 'gyur te/gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po

362b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu gsal bar bsnyen pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/mi dge'i grogs po bsten byed cing //byang chub la ni mi brtson na//rgyu dang rkyen ni de'i phyir

363a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i//chos ni thos par yod mi 'gyur//de yi sems ni 'phel 'gyur na//byang chub sems ni bsgrub par 'gyur//dam chos rgya cher thos gyur kyang //ser snas gzhan

363b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan dran pa zab cing thag kyang ring //btsun pa'i sems kyis rab brtson zhing //mang thos shes rab brgyan dang ldan//byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ni//chos 'di

364a1(dkon brtsegs): chos dran rgyun ni mi gcod cing //rtag par mang thos gnyer bar bya//khrims bsrungs gnas gtsang rab tu skye//dran pas shes rab sbyong bar 'gyur/

364a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab bslabs nas//bla med 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur//gzhon yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na byang chub la phan 'dogs par

366b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin du 'dun pa skyes nas/sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed pas/sems can gang 'di ltar chos

367a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po spyod pa zhes bya ste/bdag gis bslab par bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir byams pa zhes bya'o//bdag gis drang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir snying rje zhes bya ste//byung
367a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i byams po chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa des ni sems can rnams kyi mgon dang /skyabs dang /gnas dang /gling dang /mthar phyin pa'i

367a5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems can stong pa'i byams pa zhe sdang med pa zhes bya'o//glang po byang chub sems dpa' gang byams pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i rgyu dang
367a6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i rgyus chos rnams skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po bsgom pa zhes bya'o//
367a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs par gyur pa de la bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
367b1(dkon brtsegs): drang po 'di dang ldan par gyur pa des ni yon tan thams cad la sgrib pa'i 'ching ba rnams yongs su gcod par byed do//yon tan gyi 'ching ba yongs su gcod pa'i phyir mnyam pa
367b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
367b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas phung po dang //khams dang skye mched de dag la//bdag med par ni rtag shes pa//byams bsgom stong par lta bor byed//bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis
367b4(dkon brtsegs): dog/nges par yang dag dmigs su med//chos rnams dmigs su med pas na//byams pa'i sems kyis sgom par byed//chos rnams la ni mi gnas te//mi gnas
367b5(dkon brtsegs): bya yang ma yin pa//'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yem//chos rnams myi gnas pa zhes bya//bla med bzod pa gang thob pa//chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid bzod//
367b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams skye 'gug med do zhes//don gyi tshul ni rab tu rtogs//blo gros chen po ldan pa dag/chos 'di la ni brten byed na//rtag tu gya nom gzungs thob cing /
367b7(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur//rtag par sangs rgyas phreng bar 'gyur//chos rnams kun gyis don rig 'gyur//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' dri//bla med byang chub
368a1(dkon brtsegs): tha~Mb phyurang 'gyu//gan yang \u0f88\u0f90da byung chub sa sa dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po rnams ninan tan btsun 'grus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa

368b1(dkon brtsegs): klu rab tu dran par 'gyur//sems can thams cad kun gyis kyang //bkur sti dgu ni byed par 'gyur//'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa yi//sang+yas rgyas dag la mchod byed na
