374b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ngas ni rtag tu shes rab bsngags/tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang bsngags pa yin//bzod pa
374b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgom la bsngags byed cing /mang du thos pa'ang bsngags pa yin//ngas ni dge ba'i chos spyod cing //byams sems tshig snyan sgra la bsngags//sems can la ni
374b3(dkon brtsegs): phan gdags phyir//yon tan mang po ci rigs bsdigs//nga ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang //khong khro kho na 'dzin gti mug can/phrag dog nga rgyal g.yo sgyu dang /
374b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug long sems can gnod byed sron//le lo dang ni skom las dang //bka' blo mi bde sgra dga' dang //byas pa mi bzo lim log can//nyes pa chung la cher
374b5(dkon brtsegs): khro dang //rnyed pa la ni gdu ba dang //bdag ni rnyed par rab dga' zhing //gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba//'di dag lha ni nga mi bsngags//blo chung rnyed pa dag 'dod cing //
374b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnyed la phrag dog che//gzhan gyi khyim la ser smra byed//'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags//rnyed pa dag ni tshol ba'i phyir//spyod lam dag ni 'chos byed pa
374b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'tsho ba dag min pas//nga yi chos las shin du ri//lam mi bsgom pa dag la ni//nyes pa 'di dag thams cad yod//'di ni ngan 'gro rkyen yin pas//
375a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'ga' yang bsngags su med//sdig pa dag lta ma spangs na//'dod srid sems ni rab tu mang //'dod sregs sems ni mang thar
375a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir//rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du//bzod bsgom sems can phan gdags shing //khengs pa'i sems ni rab btul nas/
375a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du sangs rgyas bya bar sems//bdug gis byams sems rab bsgoms te/bzod pas sems can brdze bar bya//chos rnams sbyong zhing rkyen las byung //'brel pa
375a4(dkon brtsegs): med cing shes par bya//rkyen gang gis ni chos rnams yod//chos de sems las byung ba yin//mi bden 'du shes khong khro bskyed//mkhas pa thams cad stong pa
375a5(dkon brtsegs): yin/mi bden 'du shes khams gsum bskyed//lus kyi rgyud ni 'chad mi 'gyur//mi bden 'du shes mi rtog na//nyes dmigs 'di dag yod mi 'gyur//
375a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu chos rnams sems pas na//rkyen las byung ba rab tu shes//rtag tu chos rnams stong lta bas//thams cad yongs su bzlog par nus//khrims spang sems
375a7(dkon brtsegs): tsan sdug bsngal ba//nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la//sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i chos ston pas//phran pa mang po rab tu byed//gang zhig shar lho nub byang dang //
375b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'tshams bzhi po dag nas ni//mi gtsang dug gi bum thogs nas//mgo yi steng du blugs gyur na//sus byin sus ni lon byed ces//bdag ni khang khro yod
375b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed//chos gang zhig ni bdag yin zhes//brtags nas brtson 'grus ljon par byed//nyes pa ci yod gnod byas zhes//ngan sems gzhan la lha mi byed/
375b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas//byam sa sems de la phan 'dogs byed//sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas//rnam smin 'di myong snyam du sems//dang du blangs te mi byed
375b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/byang chub lam la gnas par byed//smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di//gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin gyis//'di ni nges par las kyi rkyen//yun ring lon kyang //
375b5(dkon brtsegs): chung mi za//sems can 'jig rten gnas pa dag/rtag tu dge sdig las slong bas//ded bdag sdug bsngal 'di myong yang //las rkyen yin par rab tu shes//gal te
375b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan pas len byas na//phyis kyang sdug bsngal myong 'byur na//de phyir dngos po ngan pa yis//de dag la ni gnod byas snyam//bla na med pa'i chos gnyer nas//gzhan dag la
375b7(dkon brtsegs): ni ston byed pas/sems can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa//thams cad las ni thar bar byed//gal te 'ga' zhig me tog spos//phreng ba dag gis bdag mchod kyang //rjes su
376a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa mi bskyed par//mnyam par bsgom pa bsgrub par bya//byams sdang dag ni las min pas//rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed//
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sus byin sus ni len byed ces//chos rnams yang dag rtogs par byed//stong pas byin zhing stong len na//phyi nang gnyi ka stong pa na//stong la byin dang len med pas/
376a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun la bdag med do//stong la 'dod chags bral ba med//stong la kun nas nyon mongs med//rnam par byang ba'ang med pas na//dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin
376a4(dkon brtsegs): stong la rnam par rtog pa med//stong la ngo bo nyid rnams med//stong ni rtag stong mtshan ma med//de ni rnam dag lam yin no//gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur nas//lus ni
376a5(dkon brtsegs): dum bur bcad gyur kyang //las kyi rkyen las byung rig pas//de la zhe sdang yong mi bskyed//sems can dge sdig slong bas na//las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len//bdag kyang
376a6(dkon brtsegs): nges par snga ma'i sdig/sdug bsngal rnam smin 'di myong snyam//sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang //lus btags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang //sgyu ma stsal pa sgrib rgyu 'dra//stong
376a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing med pas mtha' yang stong //kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod//kha cig drin ni dran gyur nas//mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang //dga' dang mi dga' yong mi byed//rnyed pa
376b1(dkon brtsegs): thob kyang dga' ba med//kha ngan byas kyang khong mi khro//'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pas na//sangs rgyas yang dag lam mi sems//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems//
376b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad srong bar byed//rtag tu dben stong bsgoms pas na//sgrib pa rnams ni spong bar byed//bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas
376b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs med ye shes snying rje yi//brtse ba dag ni bzod pa yin//bden bzhi dran dang yang dag slong //dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag/thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed
376b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi bsgom//ngas kyang wa ra na sir ni//bla med 'khor lo bskor ba yang //bzod pa dag gis gni byas pas//sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa
376b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags//khyod kyang bzod stong bla med ga ni//yongs su bsgom par byed na ni//chos kyi chos nyid de yin pas//spangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur//gzhan yang gang po byang
376b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'dod pa lnga pa dag spangs nas rtag par rab tu byung bar mos pas//sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu byung ba la
376b7(dkon brtsegs): dazhol bar byed pas 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do//rab tu byung nas kyang 'dri 'dzi rnams spangs nas shin du bag nga ba'i ri nga //nags tshal dpon pi dag tu
377a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing dge ba'i chog chud mi za bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
377a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//rab tu byung la rtag mos pas//rtag tu rab tu byung bar 'gyur//ri dang nag
377a3(dkon brtsegs): tshal gnas mos pas//yon tan 'byung gnas 'phel bar byed//dben par gnas la brtan byed pa//'dod lnga'i chags pa yongs su spong //de ni 'dra'i ji med pas na//dge
377a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rkyen ni nyams mi 'gyur//phan tshun 'dul zhing gtam 'dri dang //tshig gis smra bar byed pas na//stong dben nyer zhi dben pa la//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags/
377a5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams//rtag par yongs su bsten bya zhing //grong khyer la ni chags mi byed//bsnyen na rnyed sems skye bar 'gyur//rnyed pa thob na rab tu dga'/
377a6(dkon brtsegs): stor bar gyur na mya ngan skye//de yis sangs rgyas mchod byas kyang //mchod pa byas shes mi brjod do//de 'dra'i nyes dmigs spong 'dod na//rnyed pa rnams ni spang bar bya//spangs
377a7(dkon brtsegs): nas gnas dben rab gnas nas//stong pa'i chos ni bsgom par bya//gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par chos gnyer ba yongs su slab par byed pas//yongs su
377b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyer nas kyang klog cing kha ton du bton nas//'di ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang //sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin du phra ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/'dod pa mang ba
377b2(dkon brtsegs): dang chog mi shes pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do//'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi 'dod chags rgyas par mi byed do//zhe sdang gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed
377b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do//gti mug gcod pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi gti mug skye bar mi byed de//khengs pa bcom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi khengs pa slong ba yongs su tshol
377b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do//nga rgyal gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do//bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos spong ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi
377b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed do//bdag med pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi bdag dang gang zag dang sems can dang srog la
377b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do//rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi shes rab chen po nyams par gyur pa'i chos yongs
377b7(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bar mi byed do//rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi shes rab rgya chung ngu thob par byed pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar
378a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do//phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yongs su tshol bar byed kyi yon tan rnams phun sum tshogs par
378a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do//de ltar chos yongs su btsal nas kyang klog par byed/kha ton du 'don par byed/tshul bzhin du yang dag par yid la
378a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed sgrub par byed gzhan dag la/yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang 'jig rten pa'i khe dang grags pa yongs su tshol
378a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed la/thu na legs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa'i brjod pa tsam yongs su tshol bar mi byed pas sems can mang po chos la dgod par byed de/gang po byang chub
378a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
378a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byung ni//tshul khrims spangs pa dag la mos//des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas//ye shes
378a7(dkon brtsegs): char ni 'bebs par byed//rnam dag chos zab de thos nas//yang dag dran pas don sems byed//ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni//de bzhin yang dag sgrub par
378b1(dkon brtsegs): byed//rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis ni//gzhan lnga rgya cher rab bstan nas//sems can mang po phan 'dogs kyang //sems lnga reb chung zad med//yon tan rnams kyi ro rnyed
378b2(dkon brtsegs): no bdag nyid chos de rab gnas shing //gzhan yang de lo 'god pas ni//de phyir sangs rgyas chos 'phel 'gyur//bskal pa tshad med rnams su ni//yon tan mang po ci bsags
378b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad mngon du gyur nas ni//byang chub lam du sdud 'jig 'gyur//de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yin//chos zab dag ni yongs btsal nas//rtag par sems can
378b4(dkon brtsegs): brtan par bya//yon tan rnams ni de las skye//gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur
378b5(dkon brtsegs): na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med cing mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi
378b6(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa
378b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma ro gan 'da' bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste//bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i
379a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni tshe lo drug cu thub par gyur to//'dus pa re re la chos bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par
379a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su
379a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu zhag bdun tshun chad nyan thos chen po ji snyed pa phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to//gang po de
379a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de yang da ji lta ba bzhin du skyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur te/nyan thos chen po rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i
379a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe skye bo rnams phal cher 'di snyam du dge sbyong gi tshes ni rab tu bde zhing skyid pa yin na bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung snyam du bsams nas/so so nas sgra dang
379a6(dkon brtsegs): kha spu bregs te/chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas/khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //rab tu byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim pa'i khyim du 'gro zhing
379a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar byed pa dang /rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid 'chol bar byed pa dang /bdag nyid nyam 'tshag tsho ba 'ba' zhig tu sbyor zhing bsod nams dang ye shes dang
379b1(dkon brtsegs): mo ldan bdag la 'jog spyang par gyur bas dngos po gsum po 'di 'da' zhig spyong par byud kyi las glanan ni mngon par mi bsgrub par gyur to//lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og dugan
379b2(dkon brtsegs): rten tha thams cad yongs suM mye na las 'das te ma lus par gyur sa/dge slong mang po/drug khyi ma rnams dang 'dun du byed ng+yas rgyas kyi mye sa lab mornas /rnam
379b3(dkon brtsegs): drims bsrung ba dang /skyongs pa'i yon tan spyod lam ni mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni bal cher blangs nas su yang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to//gang po de'i tshe dge slong
379b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dod pa mang po dag la spyod par mos shing bza' ba dang /btung ba'i rol chags par gyur pas/de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu dam shi ri zhes bya ba rgyal po shin du byams
379b5(dkon brtsegs): ces par byed pa zhig yod de//des gnas dben pa zhig tu gnas nas/'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ngas chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na/deng de'i nyan thos rnams
379b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag med par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems shing rje tshom du gyur pa dang /de'i tshe lta zhig de'i tha~Mng du 'dus nas lus mi snang bar byas te/'di
379b7(dkon brtsegs): skad du kyi rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs pa mi rog na 'das brnyes pa'i chos ni shin du zab cing yongs su rig pa la rnam par nges pa yin no zhes smraso//de nas rgyal bu ngos ltas/de skad
380a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa thos pa dang /'di skad du/kye de bzhin gshegs pa mar gan 'das/brnyed pa'i chos zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa
380a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i chos dngos po ji lta bu zhig yin/lhas smras pa/rgyal bu chos de ni gzugs kyang med/rnar ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yang
380a3(dkon brtsegs): me daphung po dang /khams dang /skye mched kyang med/'dod pa lnga yang med/'dod pa'i sems kyang med do//de bzhin gshegs pa mi rogan 'das de lta bu'i chos
380a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa brnyes pa sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu bstan to//de nas rgyal bus lha de la smras pa/bdag gis de lta
380a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par gyur nas/ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub tu rung ngam/lhas smras pa/kye rgyal bu khyed sems rtsi gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus byos
380a6(dkon brtsegs): shig dang thob par dka' ba med do//gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du des par lhas kyang bskul te/bdag gi khong du chud par byas nas bdag rab tu byung nas chos zo
380a7(dkon brtsegs): mo de yongs su gnyer bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas pa ma ga la ba der song ste mgos gtugs te phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so//yab yum deng bdag ni de bzhin
380b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mo ro gan 'da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo//pha mas smras pa/khyod dang nged spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos/da ltar sangs
380b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni khyim pa rnams dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do//de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/da ltar dge slong mang po rnams//
380b3(dkon brtsegs): bag med 'dod pa lta yang steng //zhing rmed nyo chung byed pas na//khyim pa rnams dang bye blag med//dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing //bdag nyid gso bar mi nus pa
380b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'di'i skye bo meng bri rnams//lus gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung //khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes//byug cing 'dod lde bde ba myong //nong dang rin chen rab mang na/
380b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya//de nas rgyal bud ma shi ris pa mi la tshigs su bcad de spras pa/bdag ni dbang drug mi tsho le te//gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid//de
380b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang //rnam dge tshul khrims 'ba' zhig tshal//sgra zhig bdag ni go bgyis te//rab tu 'byung bar bsgral bas na//sangs rgyas gsul
380b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zab ma chos//bdag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal//m+b+ha smras bdag gis thos pas na//sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur//sang sa rgyas bstan pa chub tu /
381a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni grogs bgyis bsrung bar sems//de nas phya mas tshogs su bcad de ngam sha ri la smras pa/mdo sde zab mo zad nub pas//
381a2(dkon brtsegs): kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na//de ring khyod kyis su las ni//sangs rgyas chos zab bos par 'gyur//gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las//don zab 'don pa yod
381a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na//de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas//de 'og rab tu 'byung ba'i rigs//da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de pha ma la smras pa/deng bdag nan tan brtson
381a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis//tshul khrims bsrung zhing sbyangs pa spyod//thag ring ri dang nags tshal nas//sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag tshol//gang po ngam shi ris tshigs su bcad pa
381a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di smras nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba byas te rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang /pha ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo /de nas dge slong rnams kyi thang du sang
381a6(dkon brtsegs): nas sgra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ste//bslab pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin
381a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad//bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ba bsgrub par
381b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis dge slong dum shi rI la 'di skad ces smras s+ho//bdag cag gis de bzhin klushegs pa las chos zos pa ni med
381b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad pas/deng khyod kyang 'di lta bu'i chos la spyod cig/de nas dge sbyong ngam shi ris dge slong rnams la smras pa/khyed na
381b3(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar dbul po slang rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas/de'i phyir deng khyed gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas/spyod pa rnams khyim pa dgra dang bye brag du gyur pa ci yang
381b4(dkon brtsegs): med do//deng khyod bdag dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o//de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de dge slong dam
381b5(dkon brtsegs): shI rI la smras pa/bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrubs pa'i//dngos po de ni thab gyur pas/gos zab dag ni 'byor cing ldan//rgyal pos bkol ba las kyang thar//shin du
381b6(dkon brtsegs): bde zhing rab tu skyid//brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med//khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa//de dag da ltar gang yin pa//de dag da ltar gang yang med//'di gnyis
381b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das min pas//mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin//dngos po 'di las lhag par ni//bdag cag la ni dgos pa med//khyim pas rtag tu sbyor 'bul ras//
382a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag chos gos lhung bzed mang //sman dang nor zas shin du mang //sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang //gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam sha
382a2(dkon brtsegs): ri dang dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang /sems la rab tu gdung ba skyes nas mchi ma blags te dus nas gtsug lag khang gzhan
382a3(dkon brtsegs): dag tu song ste/yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan
382a4(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad//bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /dge slong mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par
382a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de nas dge slong dam shi ris dge slong mang po de dag spangs nas gcig pu ri dang nags 'tshal dben pa'i gnas su song nas sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo
382a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba la 'dun par gyur pa dang /de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na 'da'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin du bstan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben
382a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa/'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba/bya ba byas pa/
382b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa drug dang /rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te/ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin//
382b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong shin du brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te/'di lta ste/'dod pa'i ro ni myangs pa'i
382b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir//'khor ba dag ni rgyun mi gcod//dgra ni gsos nas dur khrod 'jug/don med sdug bsngal meng po myeng //lus ni mi gtsang ro dang 'dra//bu ga dgu nas mau gtsang
382b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jag/sbyin bu me gtsang myos pa bzhin//blun pos lus srid de dang 'dra//yang dag mi yin kun rtog pas//de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin//mkhas pa dag ni mi rtog
382b5(dkon brtsegs): pas//'dod lta dag ni 'gag par 'gyur//l-ig tAshA las ni 'dod chen ste//'dod chen las ni nyon ma ste//yang dag rten la zhen med pas//nyon mongs lhag ma
382b6(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur///bam po bzhi pa/glang po dge slong shin du brtan pas raM phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger byis pa dge slong dam sh+tsa
382b7(dkon brtsegs): ri re drug dben par song bas//yun ring zhig lon nas ri phug gi thig la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong nas/kha don du bslabs te/de
383a1(dkon brtsegs): don gang yin pa yid la byas pas ring po ma lon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' sngon zhugs la
383a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas phyag byas te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bdag gi gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs
383a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma mthong //chos gzhan yang ma thob kyi bar du 'di las mi ldong ngo zhes yid dam bcas so//glang po de bzhin gshegs pa ma ro gan 'das gsungs pa'i mdo
383a4(dkon brtsegs): sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton du shes pas/brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dge slong da ma shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
383a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te/de'i drung du phyin nas/de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do//gzhan
383a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mang du thos pa'i dngos gzhi'i tshig bzhi dang /rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang /sgo'i tshige bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no//dge slong ngam
383a7(dkon brtsegs): shi ris thos nas kyang kha don du bton te yongs su bzung bas tshis rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thab par gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ma ro gan 'das gsungs/
383b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rung gi ngang gis sems la snang bar
383b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi ro gan 'da'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa dang /bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang /gdan khri dang
383b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi po rnams dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mI 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma
383b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to//dge slong ngam shi ri yang chos rnams las shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas
383b5(dkon brtsegs): mthur gyis rang gi yul du song ste/pha ma'i drung du phyin nas pha ma la yongs su drag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa bral ba'i rjes su 'thun pa/zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i
383b6(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas/gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam shi rI phra ma dang /
383b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi btsun mo dang /blon po chen po dang /'khor rnams kyis chos de thos nas shin du mngon par yid ches par gyur pas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong dam shi ri la 'di skad
384a1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so//btsun pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab cing de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'di'i bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes gang
384a2(dkon brtsegs): po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang /btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i rjes su dus gcig du byung bar gyur to//rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi
384a3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur te//gang po dge slong dam shi ris da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'di'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas
384a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can mang po de dag bde ba la yang dag par bkod do//sngon gyi tshe rabs gyi byams pa dang /snying rje chen po'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spyon
384a5(dkon brtsegs): lam btab pa'i phyir/de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ljongs gcig nas gcig tu grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu//yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song
384a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' dang /de'i nyan thos kyi sngags pa yang brjod/gzhan yang yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa bral
384a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rjes su mthun pa/zab mo shin du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi
384b1(dkon brtsegs): ri yang skye bo mang po kun gyis mchod cing rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pas snyan pa'i grags pa yang kun du grags par gyur to//gang po
384b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dam shi ris de ltar sems can mang po'i don rgya cher byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /de'i slob ma dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang //
384b3(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig du 'dus te/spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te/bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyung grags gnyis
384b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa brtsigs te/me tog dang spos dang byug pa dang /spos kyi phye ma dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing /rim gro dang
384b5(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/gang po dge slong du ma shi ri 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pos//
384b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab pa bzhin du rgyal rigs su skyes nas dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa me ro bAn+da 'da' yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu kho sum
384b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya lon pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/sngon gyi smon lam dang tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis skye rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi rang gis
385a1(dkon brtsegs): slar thob par gyur to//gzungs thob pa'i stongs kyi dbang gis sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/tshe rabs su
385a2(dkon brtsegs): ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni ma bstan to//gang po de'i tshe da ma shi ri dge slong meng po rnams las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang /dge ba'i rtse
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ba lhan sdug pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa thos pas bstan pa'i mdo rnams thob par gyur na/sems kyi rjes su yid rang nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed//
385a4(dkon brtsegs): gus pas mchod par byas nas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang yongs su bsrung bar byed do//dge slong de dag las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa dang dbang po rtul
385a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi gsal dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni dge slong dran pa thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur nas/mngon par yid ches pa yang med//
385a6(dkon brtsegs): dang du len pa yang med/'gal ba dag byas nas skyon 'byin cing 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdag cag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang ma

385b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang bar don la rton pa'i phyir sems kyis kyang 'gal bar mi byed do//'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa
385b2(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par bsrung bar byed la/gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang bsrung bar byed do//gang po de'i tshe dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dag bsnyen dang /
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrog phrag brgyad cu dge slong dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to//gang po de'i tshe dge slong dA ma shi ri'i
385b4(dkon brtsegs): slob ma 'khor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyis su gyes par gyur te/gcig gi ming ni de ma shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to//gcig gi ming ni
385b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang /de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni da ma shi ri yin no zhes pa smras so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
385b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong ngam shi ri ni mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes zer bas bral te bdag nyid kyis smras
385b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na mang po kun the tshom za bar 'gyur ba dang /dge slong dran pa thob pa ni de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi dgra bcom pa me yin no/

386a2(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur pa dang //de'i slob ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spangs nus//mchod pa byas te bsregs so//'khor bzhi po rnams
386a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus nas ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyung grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas/spos dang //

386b1(dkon brtsegs): nas gargyas rnams pang du gyu //gnas thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon mthos pal mad rnams yang dag pa stan to//don che ge slong na pa thob par dag rbang
386b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa bo lhun skyug pa de dag ni yang shas bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas/sems rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis

386b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun mi sdugs pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong po nyid kyi don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin du zab pa

387a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//dge slong ya shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas
387a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /dge slong ya sha'i rjes su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten bdun
387b1(dkon brtsegs): khri brtsigs nas/spos dang /me tog dang /spos kyi phye ma dang /byug pa dang /phreng ba dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur

387b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i bu bcas pa 'di ni sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yin no zhes bsgrags pas/sgra de'i rjes su ming yang rab tu 'dren pa zhes btags so//de lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang /

387b6(dkon brtsegs): bcos mang po rgya cher kha don du 'don pa dang /mang du thos shing zab mo la 'jug pa dang /tshig 'bru dang /spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang //chos bstan pa'i thibs la
387b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhas par gyur to//gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing
388a1(dkon brtsegs): song nas/de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byas so//de'i tshe da ma shi ri dang /dran pa thob dang /
388a2(dkon brtsegs): ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams gcig du 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thad du 'ongs te/des bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa gdab par bsham so//de nas de'i
388a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs par rig nas 'di skad du kye dge slong mang po khyed dngos po khyed dngos po ci zhig gis ni rgol bar sems/dngos po gang
388a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig ni 'dri bar sems shes smras pa dang /dge slong mang po rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan gyis non cing mi bde bar gyur pas cang mi zer bar gyur te/dge slong
388a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang ma nus so//gang po byang chub sems dpa' de ji srid du 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rgyas
388a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to//de yongs su mya dran las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to//dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ma
388a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i tshe grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song
388b1(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can mang po'i ched du yongasu dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bcu bla na med pa
388b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to//
388b3(dkon brtsegs): dang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas/de gang gi nub mo 'tsho ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyi de nyin par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par gyur to//gang po
388b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir mdo sde zab mo yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to//gang
388b5(dkon brtsegs): po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang
388b6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin no//gang po byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu zhing de nyid kyi steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par
388b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur te/de'i tshe zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/de'i snyan pa
389a1(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu byung nas tshe rab sgyu ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bstod rnams kyi rgyu dang rten gyis shes rab zab cing gus la la rnaM ba dang /skabs pa gtugs
389a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing myur la thogs pa med par gyur to//dge slong rab tu 'drin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa le lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dge ba'i
389a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa na/slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas sangs
389a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to//de nas
389a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar spyod pa dang phrad par
389a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te//sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lo bdun khri'i bar du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na mod pa yang dag par
389a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to//de'i tshe de'i ming ni shu la zhes bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar spyod pa des 'di skad phung yongs su
389b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
389b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan
389b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyuraro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir
389b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa'i zab mo yi//rnam dag nges pa'i chos thos nas//bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing //gzhan dag la yang ston
389b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed//'jig rten gting ni mi dpogs kyang //byang chub sems dpa' bying mi 'gyur//tshul khrims rnam dag rab gnas nas//rgya chur sems can phan yang
389b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs//gling bzhi dang ni rtogs pa brjod//sangs rgyas lam zhes 'khor la ston//sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pas na//'di ni nges pa'i chos yin no//
389b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' phan spyod pa//sems can la ni phan yang 'dogs//sangs rgyas chos rnams bsrung byed cing //'khor la byang chub 'dems par byed//sems
390a1(dkon brtsegs): can dag gi chos bzhin don//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byed//'khor la sangs rgyas lam ston pas//byang chub sems ni nye bar 'gyur//
390a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lam ni bsrung byed cing /sems can rgya cher phan 'dogs pas//lha dang klu dang 'dre srin dang /gang zag chen pos bkur bar 'gyur//de phyir rnam
390a3(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa yi//stong zab gya nom chos thos nas//rtse gcig sems shing gnyer byed na//shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur//gzhan yang glang po byang
390a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
390a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro//de la spyod pa gang zhe na/gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten
390a6(dkon brtsegs): nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed//tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgom par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/bsam gtan la mnyam
390a7(dkon brtsegs): par gzhog par byed/shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa sgom par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang
390b1(dkon brtsegs): las mdo sde de lta bu dang rjes su ston pa'i thabs mkhas pa ston par 'gyur/sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub sems
390b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phu na sum tshogs
390b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams//spyad par bya
390b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos dag ni//sbyin pa btang nas rab dga' zhing //'gyod pa med pa yin zhes bshad//de la dga' ba gang zhe na//dga' bas lus kun khyab pa yin//rtag
390b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' sems 'di yis ni//byang chub lam ni spyad par bya//byang chub sems dpas sbyin patang nas//byang chub tu ni bsngo byed cing //sems can rnams la
390b6(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs na//rang don dpag med thob par 'gyur//slong ba dag ni mthong 'gyur na//sangs rgyas 'du shes rab bskyed de//de ring 'dir ni 'di 'ongs na//
390b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la byang chub lam yang sbyin//bdag ni 'di yi dbang gis na//rnam dag zhing ni thob par 'gyur//'di yis bdag la sangs rgyas bstan//bdag la sangs rgyas
391a1(dkon brtsegs): lam ston byed//deng bdag 'di dang phrad pas na//rnyes pa chen po rab rnyed ces//dga' bas lus kun khyab nas ni//dngos po gzhan la
391a2(dkon brtsegs): mos mi byed//dga' zhing drung du 'ongs gyur na//rgyang nas gsong por smra bar byed//khyod ni dngos po ci zhig 'dod//bdag gis zad par sbyin zhes zer//gal te
391a3(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa med zer na//byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' zhing //'di bdag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir//dngos po med ces zer bar zas//'phags pa 'dis
391a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gang mos pa'i//'dod nyung chog shes chos kyis ni//'dir 'ongs bdag lag byas nas//byang chub kyin ni zab par byed//deng bdag gang zag 'di yi rgyus/
391a5(dkon brtsegs): rjesu bstan pa'i chos kyang thob//khyod kyis dgos med gang zer ba//tshig 'di legs pa yin zhes zer//dngos po 'di ni 'dod zer zhing //bdag la byin cig/
391a6(dkon brtsegs): zer na yang //byang chub sems dpa' ci bdog pa//thams cad dga' bar khyer zhes zer//gal te sbyin pa btang nas ni//phyis kyang 'gyod pa med gyur na//
391a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lam ni dran pa'i phyir//sems ni rtag tu dga' ba thob//sems can kun la skal yong pos//thams cad phongs pa med 'gyur zhing //ma lus
391b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tshim bya zhes//sbyin pa gtong cho bsngo bar byed//byang chub lam ni spyod pa'i tshe//sems can bdag ni ming thos pa//rang gi ngang gis chog shes shing //
391b2(dkon brtsegs): ser sna chags sems med pa ro shog/bdag gis yul gyi sems can kun//lam spyod thams cad chog shes shing //'dod lnga chags pa kun spangs nas//
391b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab byung mos par shog/de 'dra'i spyod pa tshad med dang //sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa yis//rtag par sbyin pa rab gtong zhing //sems can bdag rjes
391b4(dkon brtsegs): slob par shog/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin gtong tshe//byams sems sems can khyab pas na//'jig rten dog ni thams cad na//de 'dra'i bde ba yong med//
391b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na khyim thab phyug po zhig/nor dang rin chen shin du mang //bu ni cig gcig yod pa las//lo ni mang pos lam ring mthong //khyim bdag bu 'ongs thos
391b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas//dga' bas lus kun khyab 'gyur zhing //yun ring lon nas deng 'od shes//de gdod btsas bzhin rab tu dga'//byang chub sems dpa' slong
391b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas//de'i sems ni rab tu dga'//khyim bdag de yi dga' bas ni//bcu drug char yang mi bod do//sbyin pa gtong bar zos gyur na//de yi sems ni rab
392a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas//byams sems las byung dga' ba ni//dpe zla dag ni yong med do//ji ltar rgyal pos nyes byung ba//yan lag
392a2(dkon brtsegs): btubs shes bsgo bas na//gsod pas bsad gnas khrid nas ni//mtshon gyis bdag par gzas nas ni//rgyal pos longs spyod thabs byin na//mi de'i
392a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bas kyang //byang chub sems dpa' phongs pa la//sbyin btang dga' ba tsam mi phod//byang chub sems dpa' la mo bsgom tshe//bsod nams
392a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni mi tshol gyi//slong ba yod na gtong byed pas//de phyir dga' ba chen po thob//byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang //dgra bcom rang rgyal mthong
392a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na//gus sems phrad dka' rig pas na//de phyir drung 'gro mchod par byed//byang chub sems dpa' gzi byin ldan//gsal rno sems ni dul
392a6(dkon brtsegs): bas na//yon tan mos shing lam gnyer phyir//sangs rgyas dge 'dun mchod par byed//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang //de yi nyan thos ma
392a7(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par//lhag pa'i bsam dang gus sems kyis//lha 'dre gzhan ni mchod mi byed//gal te rang rgyal 'ga' zhig gis//rang byung mya ngan 'das
392b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thob//de 'dra'i yon tan ldan mthong nas//de la yang ni mchod pa byed//byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams zhing //dge dang mi dge rig pas na//'jig
392b2(dkon brtsegs): rten khams ni gang yin pa//mu stegs sdig can mchod mi byed//tshul khrims phyogs la rab gnas shing //byams sems sems can kun la khyab//brtson
392b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dag kyang dpe zla med//bzod shes mang thos rgya yang tsha//de 'dra'i yon tan ldan pas na//'jig rten kun gyi gtso gyur nas//sangs rgyas byang chub
392b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon byas te//bla med 'khor lo bskor bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra yi//chos bzhi dag ni bsgrub byed na//dge ba'i rtsa ba ji skyed pa//thams
392b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kun ni mngon du 'gyur//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//yon tan dag ni gang bsgrubs pa//de kun byang chub sems dpa'i lam//'dir ni bsdu bar bya ba
392b6(dkon brtsegs): yin//de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams//rtag tu byams sems bsgom par bya///rang byung ri dang tshal gnas shing //dgon pa'i gnas la mos par bya//
392b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag par shin tu rnam dag cing //zab mo nges pa'i chos btsal te//byang chub spyod pas ldan byas pas//de yi bdag nyid 'phel bar bya//dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
393a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus/sku'i ba sgra'i bu gnas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya stong dum
393a2(dkon brtsegs): bkye'o//gzhan yang ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kun nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i phung po ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa dag byung bar gyur te//gzhan yang glang ba spu'i buM ga re re kun nas/
393a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma snyed byung bar gyur te/'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis kyang //de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bstan pa mthong
393a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gang mdzad pa mdzad nas/tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/glang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i bu
393a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mthong ngam/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags//gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pas rgyun
393a6(dkon brtsegs): chad pa med pa yin na/deng nyan thos rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu bzhugs nas chos 'chad par mthong ste/nga ni yang dag par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
393a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun du rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin du chos ston par mdzad do//
393b1(dkon brtsegs): gang po gal che 'ga' zhig yang dag pa'i tshig gis 'di skad du mtshungs pa med cing dpe zla med pa rkang gnyis kyi mchog/bsod nams kyi zhing /shin tu zab cing dpag par dka'
393b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/spyod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/gom pa gcig bar na yang sems can thams cad kyis sems gang dang /spyod pa gang gis rkang pa bteg cing bzhag pa shes par yang mi
393b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lo/gzhal bar mi nus pa de gang yin zhes zer na/de ni nga yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/gang po sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa gang dang /
393b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa gang dang /spyod pa gang gi zhabs bteg pa dang /zhabs bzhag pa gzhal bar mi nus pas so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar
393b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/bcom ldan dgongs pa gang dag dang //spyod pa gang gis zhabs btegs bzhag/ge yo dang mi g.yo sems can gyis//dngos po
393b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na rtag mi rigs//rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tshad med de//spyod pa dag kyang tshad med do//yon tan dag ni tshad med phyir//mchog tu mtho zhing gtso bor 'gyur//blo glas
393b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po tshad med pas//sus kyang mthar thug shes mi 'gyur//gal te sems can thams cad kun//shes rab dang ni rdzu 'phrul stobs//thams cad shA ri'i bu dang ni/
394a1(dkon brtsegs): mau gal lta bur byu da//daskyes rkang pa ga ban/pa'o//dngos po dag ni rig mo 'gyur//gal te snyoms ldan thams ma/
394a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang rgyal grub 'gyur kyang //nga yi gom cig mi rig na//chos zab gzhan lta smos ci dgos//nyi zla tshad med ji snyed pa//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig
394a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu khung gcig/'od zer tsam yang mi phod do//gal te 'jig rten khams bya ba//khrag khrig phrag ni bdun khri yi//nyi ma'i
394a4(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor kun du yang //zhing ni tshad med snang byed pa//de 'da'i nyi ma chen po dag/phyogs bcu gang+gA'i bye ma skyed/thams cad nyi ma gcig tu gyur//'od zer
394a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang rI rab tsam//de 'dra'i nyid chen po dag/rtag par phyogs bcu gsal byed pa//sang si rgyas 'od dang basbyin gyur na//sdong po chag bzhin snang mi
394a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brur//nyi ma chen po de yi 'od//ljon shing lo ma mi thal zhing //ri dang klung dang brag rnams la//thams cad du ni thags par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs
394a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'od zer ni//ri rab dang ni lcags ri deng //rdo rje'i ri ni thams cad la//thal bar 'gro zhing thogs pa med//'od zer rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs dang //gzi byin
394b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni tshad med pas//yid ches med pa ma gtogs par//mthong ba su zhig sems mi bskyed //sems can de 'dra'i khyod zer drang //rdzu 'phrul chen po thob 'gyur na//
394b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag kyang ni thob 'gyur zhes//phal cher bla med sems kyang bskyed//de tshe bcom ldan 'dzum mdzad nas//kun dga' bos ni 'di skad gsol//gang slad bcom ldan 'dzum
394b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad//thogs med mkhyen pas bka' bshang gsol//bcom ldan kun dga' bka' stsal ba//sems can rnams kyis deng ba yis//rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs mthong bas mA~M/
394b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed sangs rgyas grub par spyon//'khor 'dir sgrog chags sum khri yis//chos 'di bsrung bar dmu yang bcas//bdag cag sangs rgyas 'das 'og tu//mdo sde 'di
394b5(dkon brtsegs): ni gdon bya sems//de dag de ni 'das pa'i 'og/mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas//bar dang tha ma'i dus kyi tshe//ji skad bstan bzhin bsgrub par 'gyur//byang chub sems
394b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed shin du dka'//sangs rgyas chos mos pa yang dka'//tha ma'i dus tshe mdo sde 'di//'dzin cing 'don pa de bas dka'o//bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du//sangs rgyas
394b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba shin du dkon//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//mdo sde 'di bshad de bas dezhi ni//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la bkri sprul pa/
395a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ngas mdo sde 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dzam bu'i gling na ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
395a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdo sde 'di gnas pa de srid du//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gnas par 'gyur bas so//kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo 'di nub par gyur pa'i phyir//
395a3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs par bya ba'i chos kyang nub par 'gyuraro//ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi
395a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang nub par 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo dang khyod kyis mchad pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par bya'o//ji ltar na nyan thos rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo
395a5(dkon brtsegs): byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par 'gyur zhe na/khyod kyis 'di snyam du me tog dang spos dang /spos kyi phye ma dang byug spos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
395a6(dkon brtsegs): ba da na dang /na bza' dang /rol mo sel snyan mchog dam pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa ni mchod pa mchog dam pa yin no//snyam du
395a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam par mi bya ste/kun dga' bo de lta bu de dag ni mchod pa dam pa zhes mi bya'o//gang gi mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/len pa dang /'dzin pa dang //
395b1(dkon brtsegs): klog pa dang /kha don du 'don pa dang /ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i yo byad dam pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
395b2(dkon brtsegs): cing rim gro byas pa dang /bkur bstir byas pa dang /bla mar byas pa dang /bsngags pa brjod pa byas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos
395b3(dkon brtsegs): la mchad cing rim gro dang /bsnyen bkur mdzad kyi 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la ni/btsun par mi mdzad pas so//de lta bas na kun dga' bo ded mdo sde 'di nan
395b4(dkon brtsegs): tan brtson 'grus kyis khyod la yongasu gtad pa yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo ngas kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
395b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba yin//'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
395b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/bla na med pa'i chos
395b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi'akhor lo yongasu bskor ro//ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
396a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing //bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro//da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs
396a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
396a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/deng chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar mdzad pas/de'i phyir kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo
396a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang yongasu bzung bar bya'o//ngas yul ba ra na se ri dgas rgyu ba'i tshal du yang nyan thos rnams la 'dis chos kyi 'khor
396a5(dkon brtsegs): lo yongs su bskor to//kun dga' bo ngas dang 'od ma'i tshal 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'di yongasu bskor nas/sems
396a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi the tshom yongs su bcad do//kun dga' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang na mkha'i sa 'tshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
396a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsungaso//ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang na mkha'i sa 'tshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag
396b1(dkon brtsegs): par gsung bar 'gyur ro//ngas dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang na mkha'i sku 'tshams 'dir byang chub sems
396b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par bshad pas/de'i phyir sa gzhi 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten chen po lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams
396b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mchod pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur par rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo sa gzhi 'di 'ba' zhig thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan 'di lta ste/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
396b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis 'dir mdo sde zab mo 'di yang dag par gsungs pa dang ldan pas/kun dga' bo 'di ltar 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems
396b5(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed pa de dag 'od ma'i tshal 'dir zhugs par gyur na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug slong bar mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
396b6(dkon brtsegs): bcug lag khang gzhan yang zhugs par gyur mod kyi/de dag gang la yang 'di lta bu'i yon tan med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo ka lan da ka 'od ma'i tshal
396b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir dud 'gro'i skye gen su gtogs pa dag zhugs par gyur na ni/'dod chags skye bar mi 'gyur la/bya mang po zhugs par gyur na ni dus ma yin par sgra mi 'byin paso//
397a1(dkon brtsegs): ji sbyar shes zhe na/yul mu ga d+hAr rgyal po gzugs can sna ba skye bo nas dbang bsgru ba nas/dang rje rtsa la par zhugs par
397a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas taM/bskyed mos tshal 'dir zhug/sa nas lhan cig tu skye bar byas pa las zhugs ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags kyi cing mo byab par
397a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa med par gyur par tshur sar gyur to//btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang so so nas 'dod chags kyi sems kyis cing mo bya ba'i bsam pa med par gyur par
397a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor bar gyur pa dang /de'i tshe rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/'di snyam du 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bdag gi mol du byung bar gyur nas/bdag
397a5(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong bar gyur cig/mthong nas kyang sa kyis mngon par yid ches par gyur cig/mngon par yid ches par gyur nas kyang /mchod pa byed par cur
397a6(dkon brtsegs): la bskyed mos tshal 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dir zhugs par gyur nas/bdag chos thos par gyur cig
397a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/bskyed mos tshal 'di ni mchod gnas su gyur pa dag gi gnas yin gyi 'dod pa lnga dang ma bral ba dag gi gnas ma yin snyam du sems pas so//
397b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal po gzugs can snying po bskyed mos tshal 'di bzhugs pa na/de'i lta bu'i dge ba'i sems skyes pa dang /'dras pa'i dus su de bzhin
397b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gsungs pas na/de'i phyir bskyed mos tshal 'di
397b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan ji snyed pa de dgra ni gzhan dag dang thun mong du ma gyur pas/lha dang mi dang lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis gus pas byag byed pa yin
397b4(dkon brtsegs): no//kun dga' bo bskyed mos tshul 'dir ni snrel gdug pa dang /cings pa dang /sbrang bu dang /sbrang bu chu rings la sogs pa med do//gal te ga nus par
397b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na yang gdug pa'i sems med do//'di yang 'od ma'i tshal gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yan tan yin te/gal te lo brgya'i bar du tshal 'di'i yon tan+da
397b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi dri gtsang khang 'di ni yon tan tshud med pa snyed dang ldan gyi bu nan ni
397b7(dkon brtsegs): delta ma yin pas so//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa da/'a bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'od ma'i tshal 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang
398a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma 'tshal lagaso//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring bgyi bar mi mos pa'i sdig pa gang //
398a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa deng bdag bshegs par 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dang po chos rnams las chos kyi mig rnam par dag
398a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par gyur pa de nyid kyi tshe/sdig pa de dag byang bar gyur to//rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o///bam po lnga pa/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
398a4(dkon brtsegs): mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du/bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams legs par ston par
398a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/bcom ldan 'das ni shin du ngo mtshar che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs par bsgrub
398a6(dkon brtsegs): cing /skye 'gag med pa'i don sems can gyis khong du chud par byed paso snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyi
398a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam po thugs kyis mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa mi dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mau dag la de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/nga bzhin gshegs pa
398b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa yin no//gal te nga'i nyan thos gang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i don thos par gyur na/sems myos myos por 'gyur zhing mos
398b2(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi 'gyur ro//mau dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po lta re shig zhog gi/ngas gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/snying
398b3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po ji snyed cig dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs pa brjod par gyur na yang /khyod kyi sems myos myos por 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom
398b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//legs so//bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe thugs
398b5(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po las phyogs cung zad tsam zhig bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/stsal mau dge la shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /khyod
398b6(dkon brtsegs): la du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/snying rje chen po las phyogs cung zad cig dpes bstan par bya'o//sngon byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud pa spyod pa na/
398b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po ji snyed cig spyad pa brjod kyis mi lang mod kyi/snying rje chen po de ni dngos po rnam pa bzhi la gnas par 'gyuraro//bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i
399a1(dkon brtsegs): skung chen pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du snying rje chen po la gnas pa de tsam dus ngas rgyas kyi nasu mngon paru bsgrubs par gyur pa gang
399a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//mau dag la nga ni sngon sems can rnams la 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang ldan
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bas/sems can ji snyed cig sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur pa dang /sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag dang //
399a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdus 'joms dang /yang sos dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che ba dag na sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dag la yang /ngas rtag
399a5(dkon brtsegs): tu sems can de dag gi ched du sems can dmyal ba chen po na sdug bsngal ji srid yod pa de dag gi sdig pa'i las myi byung ba de srid du sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur kyang
399a6(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to//mau dag la gal te sems can gyi don du gyur pa'i rgyu dang /rkyen ci yod par gyur na ngas de dag thams cad dang du drang nas//
399a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar par byas nas nga nyid sdug bsngal dang du len par byed pas/sems can gcig gi sems can dmyal ba
399b1(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i las mthar thug pa'i bar du dang du blangs kyang /de'i tshe de'i sems la 'gyod pa ci yang med do//mau dgral dus ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam
399b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/blo dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas dang /de'i nyan thos dag la 'di ltar rigs pa'i tshul 'dri ba'i rgyu dang /rkyen yong bar
399b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na sdug bsngal dang du blangs nos/sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba las thar par byed pas/mau dag la mkhas pa dag gis thos par gyur na/nga'i mang
399b4(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa 'di bsngags pa brjod de/byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/sbyin pa gtong bar byed/tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgom par byed/brtson 'grus
399b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom par byed/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa'i bsdogs pa brjod par byed do//mo dgal ngas de lta bu thos nos brtson 'grus chen po bskyed de chos yongs
399b6(dkon brtsegs): su gnyer ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsum pa bskyed nas/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa chen po thob par bya ba'i ched du brtson 'grus brtsams//
399b7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin po rnams phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i ched du bzod pa yongasu bsgom so//mau dgal ngas sngon ji ltar bzod pa yongasu bsgoms zhe na/sngon byang chub sems
400a1(dkon brtsegs): dpar gyur pa na/'di ltar sems bskyed de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i sems can pa'i bdag gzugs can nam gzugs
400a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'am/'du shes can nam/'du shes med pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min yang rung ste/sems can de dag thams cad ma lus par mi'i
400a3(dkon brtsegs): lus thob par gyur nas/thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs te/'di skad du kye khyod ni bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin
400a4(dkon brtsegs): la/bdag cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis mang du phongs pa yin tAM/khyod gal te bdag cag la sbyin par mi nus na/bla na myed
400a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyuraro zhes sems can de dag gis de'i tshe tshigs brlang pos brgyad bkag gamau/mi bden pas skyon smos
400a6(dkon brtsegs): pAs/yid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir rol gri dang /dbyig pa dang /gyo mo dag gis bdag gi lus la gnod pa byas kyang bdag de'i tshe zhe sdang dang /'gyod pa
400a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed par bdag gis 'di ltar sems rab tu gdul bar bya'o//sems can 'di dag ni glen zhing gti mug pa dang /shes pa med pa gti mug gi las byed pa
400b1(dkon brtsegs): yin na/gal te bdag gis kyang se/mas can glen zhing gti mug pa 'di dag la zhe sdang dang /khon du 'dzin pa bskyed par gyur na/'o na ni bdag 'di dag dang
400b2(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa yang ci yod 'di dag ni lam du ma zhugs pa yin la bdag ni dge ba'i lam du zhugs pa yin pas deng bdag gi sems can 'di dag las sdug bsngal dang du blangs te
400b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi bsam pa mi bskyed par sa chen po bzhin bzang po dang /ngan pa shong bar bya'o snyam nas/mau dgal da sngon bzod pa 'di lta bu yongasu bsgoms so//gzhan yang mau
400b4(dkon brtsegs): dgal des ni yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du bltaso//'di lta ste dper ni/khyim bdag shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba/rin po che rab
400b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mang ba/bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /ldan pa brtul shugs rnam pa brgya spyad de/bu cig rnyed par gyur nas/sems la sdug cing blta bas mi ngoms par
400b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/mau dag la khyim bdag de ni rtag par bu de'i legs pa'i dngos po tshol bar byed/rtag par legs pa'i dngos po sbyin par byed/rtag par phan pa sbyin pa byed kyi/
400b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa dang /phan po ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do//de bzhin du mau dgal nga yang yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la bro cig pa bzhin du blta bar byed pas/ngas
401a1(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas drug par sems can rnams la legs pa'i dngos po yongasu btsal nas phan 'dogs pa byed kyi/gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin
401a2(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin par mi byed do//mau dag la ngas ni yun ring po nas lam nor ba'i snyems can rnams dang /lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam
401a3(dkon brtsegs): bston nas/yang dag pa'i lam la yang dag par rab tu bkod do//mau dgal rgyu dang rkyen des na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas sems can rnams la shin tu
401a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i bsam pas bu gcig pa brtse zhing phangs pa la lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa yin par rig par bya'o//mo dag la sngon 'das pa'i dus na tshong pa phal po che zhig mtshan mo
401a5(dkon brtsegs): lam du zhugs te dong ba las lam ltor nas/lam gol par zhugs pa dang /mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pa'i phyir/gar 'gro ba mi shes nas/thams cad kyis 'di
401a6(dkon brtsegs): skad du bdag cag ni lam sbyor te/mgon byed pa yang med/skyabs byed pa yang med/gnas byed pa yang med/sems can rnams la su zhig lha 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin
401a7(dkon brtsegs): nam/mi 'am/mi ma yin pa gang zhig bdag cag la lam bstan nas/lam ma nor bar thob par gyur/su zhig bdag cag la snying brtse bas par 'dogs shing /mtshan
401b1(dkon brtsegs): mo mun nag lam gol zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa 'dir snang ba sbyin par gyur zhes smra so//mau dag la de'i tshe dgon pa'i nags tshal zhig na/mu stegs can gyi drang srong cig rtswa'i spyil
401b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i nang na 'dug pa las/mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na tshong pa mang po rnams snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa sgra thos nas/de 'di snyam du dong tshong pa mang po rnams mtshan mo mun nag tu
401b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/dgon pa'i gnas nags tshal 'dir lam stor bar gyur te/gal te bdag gis skyabs ma byas na/tshul yang ma yin la/tshong pa mang po rnams kyang stag gam//
401b4(dkon brtsegs): seng ge 'am/spyang gi'am/glang po che'am/wa 'am/gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gtses shing srog 'phrog par 'gyu ro//snyam nas mau dgal de'i tshe drang srong des sgra chen
401b5(dkon brtsegs): po phyung ste/tshong pa rnams la smras pa/kye tshong pa rnams khyed ma 'jigs shig deng bdag gis khyed kyi skyabs bya zhing /snang bas khyed la lam yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes
401b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe drang srong des tshong pa rnams tshig gis spro ba bskyed de/ras kyis lag pa gnyis dkris nas/'bru mar gyis kun du khyab par blugs te/me sbar nas sgron ma byas te/
401b7(dkon brtsegs): tshong pa rnams la lam bstan to//mau dag la de'i tshe tshong pa rnams so so nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin te/bdag gi phyir lus dang srog la yang
402a1(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa med par gyur to snyam mo//mo dgal de'i tshe drang srong ngas lag pa bsregs pa'i snang bas tshong pa rnams la lam bstan nus kyang /
402a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can la snying rje cher skyes par gyur nas/'di snyam du nam bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/lam
402a3(dkon brtsegs): log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba byas nas/yang dag pa'i lam ston par gyur cig snyam mo//mau dgal de'i tshe de'i dus na/lag pa gnyis
402a4(dkon brtsegs): bsregs par gyur kyang /lus dang sems las gyur pa cung zad kyang med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi don
402a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gnyer ba na lus dang srog la yang mngon par zhen pa med pas so//bsam pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa yongasu btang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis de'i lag pa yang snga ma kho
402a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gyur cing rma yang med par gyur to//tshong pa rnams kyang lam rnyed par gyur te/nam langs nas drang srong gis lag pa gnyis la rma yang med par mthong ba dang /
402a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa bskyed nas/'di snyam du drang srong 'di mi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas mtshan thog thag lag pa gnyis la me sbar nas bdag
402b1(dkon brtsegs): gA gi snang ba byas te/lam yang drug par deston kyang 'di'i lhag pa tshigs pa cung zad kyang myed pas gdon mi za bar 'di ni spyod pa chen po grub cing yon tan chen po dang ldan
402b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no snyam nas/mau dgal de'i tshe tshong pa rnams kyis drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so//drang srong khyed kyis mchog tu dka' ba'i dka' ba spyod par gyur pa ni shin
402b3(dkon brtsegs): tu legs so//deng spyod pa 'dis dngos po gang zhig thob par smon lags/drang srong gis smras pa/kyi tshong pa rnams bdag gis dngos po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag
402b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs byang chub thob nas/khyed la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bzlas te/lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam
402b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan par smon to//de'i tshe tshong pa rnams sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/thams cad kyis ji skad du bdag cag dngos po ji lta bu zhig gis drang srong 'di la lan klan
402b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhes smras pa dang /drang srong gis smras pa/khyed rnams rtse gcig tu dge ba'i chos spyod pa la bka med par ma byed cig/rkyong pa rnams kyis ji srad bstan pa
402b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes sbas nas/tshong pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing gus par phyag byas te/de nas gyes par gyur to//mau dag la khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na
403a1(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can gyi drang srong tshong pa rnams kyi ched du lag pa spar nas lam snang ba byas pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/de ltar mi lta
403a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/de ni de nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong pa rnams ni da ltar gyi dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no//mo dag la de bzhin gshegs pa
403a3(dkon brtsegs): ni yun ring po nas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin po dang /lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang
403a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang /mig med pa la sems can dag yongs su dag pa'i mig thob par byas pa dang /nad tshabs che ba'i sems can rnams bsos nas
403a5(dkon brtsegs): sos par byas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen ngas de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas/sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o//
403a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yong mo dag la sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nad kyi bskal pa chen po byung bas sems can rnams nad kyis nyon mongs
403a7(dkon brtsegs): por gyur to//de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dbang phyug gi sde zhes bya ba grong khyer chen po brkyang khri bzhi stong la dbang byed cing mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to//
403b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa sems can dang ldan par gyur to//de'i lus kyi yan lag gam/lag pas sems can rnams la reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos par
403b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//zla ba chang nas su khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /btsos ma thag tu 'di skad du bdag ni nang pa rnams gso bar nus so zhes smraso//gzhan yang bcas pa'i tshe/'dzam
403b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling gi lha 'dre rnams kyis 'thun par 'di skad du deng rgyal po'i bu bcas pa 'di ni mi'i sman pa yin no zhes pas/de skad smras pa'i sgra de kun du grags pa'i phyir/ming yang
403b4(dkon brtsegs): mi'i sbran pa zhes btag so//de'i tshe mi rnams kyang gang nad kyis btab pa rnams khrid nas rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang /nad pa gang rgyal bu'i drung du phyin pa de dag rgyal bu'i lag
403b5(dkon brtsegs): pas reg par gyur tam/lus kyis reg par gyur kyang rung ste/thams cad nad sos nas bde ba thob par gyur/de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa kun gyis nad pa khrid
403b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal bu la bstan pa dang /rgyal bu'i lag pa reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos nas/mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur to//mau dag la rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis
403b7(dkon brtsegs): lo stong gi bar de ltar nad gsos nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byaso//'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu nad pa rnams der 'ongs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa thos pa dang /mya ngan
404a1(dkon brtsegs): dang smre sngags bton to//dus nas su zhig bdag cag na ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar byed ces smras//nad kyis btab pa rnams rgyal
404a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mi'i sman gang du bsregs pa smras nas/gang du bsregs pa shes par gyur pa dang /bsregs pa'i gnas der rus pa blangs te phye mur btags nas/lus la bskus
404a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /thams cad nad sos par gyur nas/di skad du rgyal bu mi'i sman da dung yang nad pa rnams gso bar nus so zhes smras//mau dgal de ltar nad pa rnams gsos
404a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis rus pa rnams kyang mthar gyis zad par gyur to//rus pa rnams zad pa'i 'og du bsregs nga'i gnas der song nas/sa dang thal ba dang sol
404a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams blangs te so so nus lus la bskus pa dang /nad thams cad sos par gyur to//mo dag la de ltar rgyal bu mi'i spyan gyis nad kyi skal pa chen po byung ba na/
404a6(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas nad kyis btab pa rnams gasngos pa yin no//mau dgal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu mi'i sman ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam
404a7(dkon brtsegs): du sems na/de ltar mi lta ste/de ni nga nyid yin no//ngas nad kyis sdug bsngal med pa'i sems can mgon med pa/skyabs med pa dag gi nad gasmos so//ngas
404b1(dkon brtsegs): dong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab chen po'i sman gyis sems can rnams gsos nas/sdug bsngal
404b2(dkon brtsegs): mthar byas so//mau dag la nga ni sems can gyi ched du gang blangs pas pa na 'dogs par gyur pa de bzhin du lon cing phan 'dogs par byed pas/mo dag la rgyu dang rkyen des na/
404b3(dkon brtsegs): ched du sems can gyi phyir lus blangs nas/phan 'dogs pa gni par rig par bya'o//gzhan yang mau dag la sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/nga gcig pu grogs med par
404b4(dkon brtsegs): song ba las gcan na ma rung ma zhig 'ongs te/nga'i srog bAH rnas pa'i sha bad+ma bar 'dod pa las/nga 'chi ka'i ngas kyi tshe sems bskyed nas 'di skang du bdag 'che ba'i dus byas
404b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu dgon pa'i nags tshal 'dir dud 'gro'i lus ngo che ba zhig tu skyes nas/gcan zan ma rungs pa gang bdag gi srog bcad pa de dag 'grangs shing tshim par gyur cig
404b6(dkon brtsegs): ces smon lam btab po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gcanaHna ma rungs pa de dag ni rtag par srog chags phra mo gsod cing sha za bar byed pas/sgrog gtsang ba'i kha na mtho ba
404b7(dkon brtsegs): mang du bskyed kyang 'grangs shing tshim par mi 'gyur bas ngas 'di skad du bdag 'dir dung 'gro'i lus pa cheng skyes nas/sha zani po khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams 'brangs
405a1(dkon brtsegs): shing tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu der dud 'gro'i lus po cher skyes nas/gcan
405a2(dkon brtsegs): zan ma rungs pa sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba rnams 'grangs shing tsham par byas pa yin no//de bzhin du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed du ched du lus blangs nas/
405a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan pa byas te/mau dag la ngas gal te bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa las lhag par sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
405a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can bkres shing skom pa rnams la rang gi sha dang /khrag gis tshim par byas pa dag brjod pa na yang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro//mau dgol de ltar na
405a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas sngon sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i sems rab tu bskyed pa yin no//gzhan yang mo dag la ngas mngon par dran te/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
405a6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ngas sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa mthong ba dang /'di snyam du bdag gis spangs te yongs su mi bskyab pa'i mi rigaso//snyam du
405a7(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas/de dag gi thad du song nas 'di skad du kyi khyod la sdug bsngal ji lta bu zhig yod/ci zhig 'dod ces dris pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/dang bdag
405b1(dkon brtsegs): cag rno shin tu bkres shing skom mo//ngas de skad smras pa thos nas 'di skad ces smras so//khyod bza' ba dang btung ba ji lta bu zhig 'dod/de dag gis nga la bdag
405b2(dkon brtsegs): cag ni khrag 'thung zhing sha za ba yin pas gal te lus kyi sha dang khrag bdag cag la byin na ni/bdag cag gdod bde zhing nAd med par 'gyu ro zhes smras pa dang /
405b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas de dag la de bzhin du gnang nas/rang nyid kyi sha bcad/khrag phyung nas sems can de dag la byin yang mau dag la de'i tshe nga'i sems la 'gyod cing phangs pa
405b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med/mya ngan yang mang /bying ba yang med/'di snyam du deng bdag gis lus kyi sha ji tsam bcad pa de tsam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phyogs kyang de tsam
405b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ngas yun ring por rtag par de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la mos par gyur to//de ltar sbyin pa yongasu
405b6(dkon brtsegs): btang yang rab tu dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur pa yin te/rgyu dang rgyan des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu
405b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o//gzhan yang mo dag la nges mngon par dran te/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba yon
406a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mA n+dan+d+ra bI dang sman pa dkri bla rtsu ba rag+sa sngags b+hA zlog+sa r+m+ma rgyal basbyangs pa snyam du nga
406a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis cu'i phyi mchod sbyin rkyen po pa sh-im sa nas sems n+da nas rnaMs par mi ts+tsha ma//de skyem du sa sa nas mchod sbyin rje
406a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shams nas/bza' bo 'dod pal bzar bya/btung ba 'dod pa lnga btung bya/gos dang /mal tshe dang /gsir dang /dngul dang /rin dets+tsha'i
406a4(dkon brtsegs): ngos po dang /shIhrIr+N+Na nga /byinan pa dang /rno dang /smug dang /d+hU'i snying po dang /sh+'ulI dang /bairmAR+YA /b+h+yor+ya dang /mAni shrI li lus sogs
406a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /spos kyi phyi ma dang /dar gyi lu lI nga /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bu dang bu mo
406a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /bran po dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /rta dang hU~M glang po che dang /bA glang dang /lug dang /zhing gi dngos po 'dod pa dag la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
406a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' mdur spyad nas/thams cad yongasu btang ngo //mau dgal rgyal po stobs po ches de ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba dang /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di
406b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag gis ci'i phyir rgyal po 'di la bar chad byas te/'bras bu mi thob par bya snyam du bsams nas/de nas bram ze zhig tu sprul te/rgyal du de ga lwa ba der song nas/
406b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba la 'di skad ces dris so//kye mchod sbyin chen po'i dus 'dar dngos po ji lta bu zhig yongs su gtong //rgyal pos smras pa/bram ze bdag la nor ci bdog pa thams
406b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su gtong bas/phangs pa ci yang med //bram zes smras pa/khyed kyis yid ma de lta bu yin na/deng bdag gis slong ba gang yin pa de sbyin par nus sam/
406b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa/bdag gis ci bdog pa thams cad zad par gtong ngo zhes ma smras sam/bram zes smras pa/rgyal po chen po gal te de ltar na/deng
406b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal po'i lus kyi yan lag 'dod do//rgyal pos bsams pa/bram ze 'di ni nor zas 'dod pa ma yin gyi/deng 'dir 'ongs nas bdag gi mchod sbyin bshig
406b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa yin te/bdag gis gal trai lus kyi yan lag ma byin na ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi mchod sbyin chen po bzhig par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/bram ze la
406b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so//khyed la lus kyi yan lag sbyin gyis tshod la khyer cig/bram zes smras pa/kye rgyal po chen po dang de skad smras pa 'di la 'gyod par gyur pa lta
407a1(dkon brtsegs): med dam/rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa/bdag gi sems la 'gyod pa med de/deng slong ba mang po phyogs bzhi nas 'dus te/'ongs
407a2(dkon brtsegs): na yang bdag gis thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam mo//bram zes smras pa/deng bdag gcig mu sgrim par bya ba yang dka' na/gzhan mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos
