425a1(dkon brtsegs): dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//glang po che'i lag dA ni dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun chad bar der nam yang
425a2(dkon brtsegs): sems la ldog cing gyur pa yang med la/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dran yang ngas chos de
425a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas/nga'i 'khor rnams las sems rtse gcig tu nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba dag gzud pa'i phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar
425a4(dkon brtsegs): zad do//glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/da mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i de shes rab gsal zhing rno la mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan
425a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//de'i tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang /'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung
425a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phan yon mthong nas/khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste lam bsgoms par gyur to//de dag thams cad nga'i thad du 'ongs pa dang /ngas chos bstan pas rang
425a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing sems la rang dbang thob pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pas rtag du rdzu 'phrul
425b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis na mkha' lha myangon par 'bag s+thA nus klong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dag tu zhugs te/bsnong+ga snyoms bsgyangs nas drA wA d+him+b+ha g+ho byas+ya so//da de'i tshe 'di
425b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du 'di lta 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/bdag gis 'di dag gi mchod pa blang pa'i phyir nI mi rigaso so snyam du sems par
425b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//drang srong de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang ngas thob par ma gyur pas chos de thob par bya zhing /mngon sum du ma byas pa
425b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bye ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to//glang po che'i lag ngas nan+ta tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas chos de mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe/
425b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lta zhig 'ongs te/mngon du lung bstan nas dra la 'di skad duste ye shes 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed cig/khyod ni bla na med po yang dag par
425b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su rnas par 'gyuraro zhes bsgo'o//glang po che'i lag ngas de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba
425b7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas lam bsgom pa btang bas/sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas zla ba phyed kyi bar tu dben par 'dug pa'i tshe/dga' bas lus kun du khyab par gyur to//
426a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur la/bdag
426a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas gzhan dag kyang
426a3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par bskul ba yin/theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob
426a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba yin gyi gzhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems pa yin/sems can nyos pa spyod pa de dag la dus du su rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos gtam dag
426a5(dkon brtsegs): smras nas de dag gi dge ba yongs su bsrung bar byed pa yin/bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan nas ser sna med par
426a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin te/glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la bdag nyid kyang
426a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka'
426b1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' brtan sems kyis//bla mod theg pa rab gnas shing //sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas//thog pa de la 'god par byed//byang chub
426b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spyod spyod tshe//rtag par phrag dog khong khro med//nan tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas//dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur//sems can sdig spyod mthong 'gyur
426b3(dkon brtsegs): na//'du shes rjes su 'doms par byed//rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan//khong khro dag ni med pa yin//rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas//sems can rnams la spel bar byed//
426b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chur ni rlan byed ltar//chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed//chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa//khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur bas//the tshom sems ni ma skyed ces//lha rnams
426b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni go bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas//nan tran brtson 'grus skyed par byed//dngos po 'di ni des bden pas//bdag ni sangs rgyas nges grub sems//byang chub sems/
426b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag ni//brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang //dran pa dang ni shes rab dag/bdag nyid rgya cher 'bel bar 'gyur//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//'jig rten du ni bung
426b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na//byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni//'di 'dra'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur//gang zag chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing //rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang //thams cad sems ni
427a1(dkon brtsegs): rab dga' zhing //lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur//bstan bcos gtsug lag tshig dang don//tshig 'bru tshigs bcad ces dang grangs//de dag thams/
427a2(dkon brtsegs): cad legs rtogs pas//sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//dbang po rno zhing shes rab ldan//bya ba stobs la mi ltos pas//thabs dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gis//
427a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su grub par nus//dgra rnams rab tu 'dul ba yang //lus kyi zho shas mi ltos par//shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis//rang gi sems ni 'dul bar
427a4(dkon brtsegs): byebyad//sems can rab tu brtse ba'i phyir//'jig rten du ni skyes pas na//rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang //ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur//lha rnams kun dang sgra
427a5(dkon brtsegs): bas na//de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig/ci'i phyir de ltar rig ce na//bdag sems shes zhes sems phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu//sangs rgyas rnams
427a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mthong bas na//der song chos ni rab zhugs nas//sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs/sangs rgyas zhus lan gsungs pas na//the tshom dag ni chad par 'gyur//
427a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas//thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas//sangs rgyas 'gyur bar lung ston pas//de phyir
427b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de//sems ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur//shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang //phyi nang kun la chags med pas//de phyir dga' ba chen po yis//bdag/
427b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid sangs rgyas grub par shes/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi//bzod pa gya nom thob pas na//de phyir dga' ba chen po yis//bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par shes//
427b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing //chos bstan mi rung rig pas na//de 'dra'i shes rab thob 'gyur nas//lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur//de yi sems ni nad mi
427b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas//phyi rol na yang mi gnas te//'du shes thams cad 'das pas na//de phyir bzod pa bla med thob//yun rings byams dang snying rje yis//sems can kun la sems
427b5(dkon brtsegs): pas na//de phyir bsod nams de yi bang //sangs rgyas tshad med mthong bar 'gyur//de yi lus ni thams cad kun//sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med//de 'dra'i bzod pa
427b6(dkon brtsegs): thob pas na//chos kyis bdag nyid 'phel bar byed//byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la//su zhig rjes su slob mi byed//rab brten dam chos gang gnas pa//de 'dra'i
427b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thob par 'gyur//de phyir lam ni gnyer ba dag/rtag par nan tan chos gnyer bya//chos kyis bdag gi kha btsal nas//byang chub la ni phan gdags bya//rgal
428a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lan gradab pa'i lde'u ste bdun pa'o////de nus bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
428a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur pa
428a3(dkon brtsegs): ni ngo mtshar che lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/nga ni yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
428a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka'
428a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/chos gnyer chos ni gang thob pa//de ni sangs rgyas lam gzhi ni//rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa//chos ma yin pa spong byar 'gyur//rtag tu yang dag lam
428a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa//log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed//sangs rgyas chos pa rtag brten pa//de ni lam la brten par 'gyur//des n+ti mi khom rnam spangs nas//khom ldan
428a7(dkon brtsegs): dog ni thob par 'gyur//khom ldan gnas ni thob 'gyur na//brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za//gnas gnyisu ni mchog tu btsun//kha dog gzugs
428b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mchog tu 'gyur//g.yog 'khor dag ni phun chags shing //thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//brtan pa'i sems kyis d+hAg tu ni//rdul khrims brjod pa'i phyogs lhag /ldan
428b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus phyogs la rang gnas shing //bsam gtan shes rab 'phel bar byed//rtag hU~M sems can thams cad kyi gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur//yon tan kun gyi mjug myur bas
428b3(dkon brtsegs): don rig 'jigs pa ci yang med//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob
428b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid de/bdag cag ni sngon dang po nas le le can du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing /bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur ba
428b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches la mchis pas na/'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lag so snyam du sems lag so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad
428b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing spro ba bskyed nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lag so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dis rnams
428b7(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu dga' ba mdzad pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dga' ba'i dngos po sha stag
429a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so//
429a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i
429a3(dkon brtsegs): slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po de lta bu tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dang ldan pas//bcoM lhan 'das byang chub sems
429a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyod de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su
429a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor te/sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongasu bzla bar bgyis lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/khyod
429a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/sems can
429a7(dkon brtsegs): thams can gyi phan pa dang bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/sems can thams cad kyi ched du
429b1(dkon brtsegs): byubyang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i rgyu lta bu'i skyon lam chen po dang /da/ bu'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa shAn tu dka' ba chang meng dpag tu me dgrangs med pa dang
429b2(dkon brtsegs): ljon ci yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /'khor ba ni pan mas+t+rai dang /lha dang mI dang /rtswa dang /gnod sbyin /dri ba dang /lha me
429b3(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas ma ston par bstod do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////'phags
429b4(dkon brtsegs): pa da//na mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong drug brgya pa lnga sna gang pos 'dus pa ste/'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzogs /rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yAH
429b5(dkon brtsegs): ba li ni/pa ri br-in+d+ha na ma ma hA ya nA sU tA/bo sh+tha du//'phags de yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhis bu bzag po chen po'i ma/bam po dang bau/sangs rgyas dang bya chub sems dpal
429b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal//di snyed du dag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal bya'i khyab na bya rgong phung blo'i rnyil dge slong stong nyis bcu lnga bcu dge slong shi
429b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpe'i lnga spyong thams cad kyang skabs pa thogs pa mang ba/bzong ba zab pa/bdu byir rgol ba bcom pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
430a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nye bar gyur ba/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/gzungs thub pa ting nge 'dzin thob pa/sbubs pa mtha' yas pa thub pa mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa
430a2(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas smon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa shA stug la/'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
430a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po kun tu bzang po dang /kun tu mig dang /kun du lta ba dang /kun du 'od zer dang /kun du 'od dang /blo gros mchog dang /blo gros 'phel dang /blo gros mtha' yas dang /blo gros
430a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen dang /blo gros mi zad pa dang /sa 'dzin dang /'gro ba 'dzin dang /rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /khyad par blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi
430a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
430a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /lha'i bu 'tshams bzang dang /lha'i bu blo gros logs gnas dang /lce'i dbang po thams cad dang /klu'i
430a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang /mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /dri za'i dbang po dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i 'khor brgya stong du ma
430b1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa thams cad dang /'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs
430b2(dkon brtsegs): te/lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par 'phags/nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang /zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la ni snang bar mdzad//
430b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/brgya byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dka'/'khor los bsgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/seng gi ltar chos
430b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni sgrogs/muM'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni dang /lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus
430b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/don shin tu
430b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pas chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/sems can thams cad kyi go bar byed pa dang /
430b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge bo/don bzang po//tshig 'bru bzang po//ma 'dres pa/yongs su
431a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su byung ba/yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga'
431a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyis
431a3(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas shin tu lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ste/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs
431a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das lnga tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci//klu dang nyan
431a5(dkon brtsegs): thos ngag dang sangs rgyas sras//'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis//zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal//rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes
431a6(dkon brtsegs): par lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur//thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhags te//'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed pa mdzad//tshangs pa'i gnas la
431a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i tshangs pa de//tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar//bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin bzhugs pa//sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal
431b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang ngu//gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar//mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug/thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun//
431b2(dkon brtsegs): la gsal//gling bzhi mo yi bdag po snang ldan pa//'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar//'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa rab mdzad cing //thugs rjes dgongs
431b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes//mi kha' la nyi ma lham me thal le bA//nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar//nyi ma sbyong bas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od//sangs
431b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal//dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar//shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun lo gsal//rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra//kun 'od zil gyis
431b5(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas rnam par mdzes//ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba//mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar//gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni//drang srong chen po'i ye shes
431b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyang gsal//seng ge ri sul bsten pa'i sgra sgrog cing //sA la ri dgas tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar//mr-i dbang bstong pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing //pha rol mu steg
431b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams skrag par mdzad//nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar//nor ba thams cad zil mnan lham me ltar//rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba//'gro
432a1(dkon brtsegs): kun zil gyis mnan nas lham mer bzhugs//'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis//lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur//
432a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang //yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis//mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lham me ba//mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho
432a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mthong //gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel//rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs//yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron//
432a4(dkon brtsegs): grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba//bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dis thob des//'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
432a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas//thal mo sbyar te mig gnyis mi 'dzum
432a6(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni blta//chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod//zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang /mthong bar dka' bo dang /khong du chud par
432a7(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang /brtag mi nus pa dang /rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang /zhi ba dang phra ba la ni 'jug/sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rje su rnam par dpyod
432b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni yang dag
432b2(dkon brtsegs): par blta de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig
432b3(dkon brtsegs): gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la/ni rtog/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas pa med pa/namakha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/chos thams cad yang
432b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
432b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku rtag pa dang zhi ba dang ther zug pa la ni 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rje su song ba dang /sems can thams cad la mngon du phyin pa
432b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'jug/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa'i mur yang thug pa myed pa ni rjesu dran par byed/chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam par
432b7(dkon brtsegs): dpyod cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du
433a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/de zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas te/chos gos zin nus de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/
433a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /gsar bu las drang po rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing /rgyal po'i khyab kyi grang khyer chen po
433a3(dkon brtsegs): ga la baM dang /bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la baM der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
433a4(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
433a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/tshugasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo//nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs
433a6(dkon brtsegs): l-I phyag 'tshalo//rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo//srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshalo//zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byam kun du yang //'dren pa dang
433a7(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung //rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing //yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi//bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyid//
433b1(dkon brtsegs): te/'thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas//de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing //yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi//byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na//khyod ni thugs ni
433b2(dkon brtsegs): skyob mi mnga' bar//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su//sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad//'dren pa khyod kyi sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad//bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni
433b3(dkon brtsegs): bosam gtan bslabs//shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs//des na rnam 'dren tshe lo phyag 'tsha lo//rdzu 'phrul kang dang ma na shes mchog la ma khas//dbang po stobs dang
433b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa brlabs//sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chung rtogs//mnyam med ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo//'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen//spyod pa gang dang
433b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar las 'byung dang //tshul sgo gang gis rnam par bral 'gyur ba//de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong //gang gis
433b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang //gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las//'gro bas legs bgyis pa dang nongs bgyis mkhyen//'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag
433b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams dang /de ltar lha dang mi yi mchod rnams dang //gang gis ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin//bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen//dga'u rI zhing
434a1(dkon brtsegs): dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang //drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshang //rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par
434a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//mya ngan 'das ni chos gnas ci 'dra dang //rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang //der ni chos mdzod mdzin pa ci 'dra ba//de dag ma lus ma yi dam pas mkhyen//
434a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi//ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug/chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye
434a4(dkon brtsegs): shas 'tsho khyod la//khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag/skar ma rnams kyis na mkha' spras pa ltar//mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab smras pa//mi mchog
434a5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mchog la phyag 'tsha lo//gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi//lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid//tshang po brgya byin 'og min lha yi
434a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams//khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags//khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'//dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yasu 'khyil bar gnas//lhun po'i rgyal po lta
434a7(dkon brtsegs): bur spyi gtsug 'phags//bsod nams cha cher byung ba lham mer bzhugs//'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing //khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu
434b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes//'gro ba thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa//spyan ni ut+pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi//zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar//rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lham me ste//
434b2(dkon brtsegs): blta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba//zhal bzang mi yi mchog la phyog 'tshalo//ngang pa rma bya ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs//glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis//sa rnams g.yo
434b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa//stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshalo//phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes//sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas sbas//bzhengs
434b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang pus mo'i lha nga reg cing slebs//sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tsha lo//'khor lo 'dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar//sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs//zhabs
434b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer gyis ni yod smin pa'i//mi rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi//chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po//chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba//chos kyi spyod
434b6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa//'dren pa chos kyi rjes la phyag 'tshalo//byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'//de yis skye 'chi sred
434b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phel bgyid pa//nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur//brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol//grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel//
435a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba gnas mchi ba//bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston//gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing //'bral ba'i sdug
435a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba//gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de//thugs rje brnyes nas khyed kyis bstan pa mdzad//chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i
435a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal//thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas//bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des//'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog/de nas tshe dang
435a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstong nas thal mo sbyar te/stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
435a5(dkon brtsegs): gzar ti/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nge sa lnga btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar po btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
435a6(dkon brtsegs): dgal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyi na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
435a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so//de skad ces gsal po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad
435b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to//yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dri shig dang /dras dris pa de drung de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal
435b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ngu dang ldan na
435b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa thob/myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/spobs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob pas snang ba
435b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /yid gnyis sbyong ba dang /som nyi spong ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
435b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pa 'thob/sems can 'jud pa la mkhas pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /ldem po can yang dag pa dang /sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa
435b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'thob pa dang /zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang /chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang /myur ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/de nas tshe dang
435b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol te/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rab nges pa//yang dag nyid du ji ltar nges 'byung dang //ye shes rgya martsa
436a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' mchid rnam nges pa//mi mchog rgyal ba bdag la bshad du gsol//shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu//sems can dam pa bsod nams//
436a2(dkon brtsegs): mchogs bsags pa//khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags//byang chub spyod mchog dro med deng bdag gsungs//gzugs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba
436a3(dkon brtsegs): yid de ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur//gang gis skye ba'i dgongs pa gcod 'gyur ba//shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/'khor bas bskal pa bye ba mang por
436a4(dkon brtsegs): ni//'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen pa blta bgyid kyang //skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi bskyed cing //de dag don dge bsten par 'gyur ba dang //dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs
436a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang //tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang //sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang //byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol//bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan
436a6(dkon brtsegs): skyong ba po//sred pa skegs pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa ste//chos kyi tshul yang bskyung bar mi 'gyur ba//sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol//gzugs dang longs
436a7(dkon brtsegs): spyong spobs pa phun sum tshogs//snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim pa mdzad//bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba che mo nas so//sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par
436b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan du ga s+ho lnga/DAka la bing kA'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa//tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa//chos 'tshul gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags ljags kyis//ga
436b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod//byang chub dam pa'i mchog la 'dun pa mchis//chos dang 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te//'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags/
436b3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen dam pa bsgrag pa'i dus la bab//thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis//bdag gi bsaM pa brgyal bas rab tu mkhyen//rgyal ba tse 'drim lags don du gnyer//spyod pa
436b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa legs par bshad du gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldam pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//yul 'khor sbyang
436b5(dkon brtsegs): khyed leg so legaso//yul 'khor skyod khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /yul 'kho skyod khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /lha dang mI rnams kyi sa pa
436b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /phan pa dang /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa
436b7(dkon brtsegs): ni legs so//yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol to//tshe dang
437a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di spyad nas bka' sprul to//yul 'khor sbyong byung
437a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan
437a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems
437a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo//de la 'di ni chos nyid yin te dri la 'di skad ces bya'o//bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon
437a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa//byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa//gAyo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa//ye she/sku mtha' med ldan lnga de dag yod//skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir
437a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni//srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir//de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor//des pas sems can kun
437a7(dkon brtsegs): la sems mnyam pa//bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la blta//'di dag thams cad bdag gis grol lo zhes//gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o//stong nyid
437b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud//bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin//'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la//byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs//mkhas
437b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa//dI la nan tana? byed cing kun du gnas//dul zhing zhi la N+Do ga tu skyon rnams spangs//rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lamra la dga'///
437b3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/bzhi gang zhe na/gzungs 'thob pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
437b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang /chos zab mo la mos pa thob pa dang /tshul khrims yongs su dag par spyod pa ste/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin
437b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob pa'o//'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba//gzungs rnams grags
437b6(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu 'thob//nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel//de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin//byang chub yan
437b7(dkon brtsegs): lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed//de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston//de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag lo brten pa ma yin te//
438a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar ring du rnam par sbyong //dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas//de dag bdag dang sems can sreg tu
438a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba kun mi 'byung //de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan//sangs rgyase tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor//yul 'khor skyong/
438a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems
438a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyong rjesu mthun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba nu 'khod pa rnams dga' bar
438a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyong bdog po thams cad yongasu gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khyod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor
438a6(dkon brtsegs): skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
438a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so//'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'od skad ces bya'o//gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas
438b1(dkon brtsegs): snang mdzad pa'o//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun du de dag mthong //byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can dkrol ba'i phyir//dga' zhing gus par gnas na
438b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod//'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan//thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhon rab tu sbyor//dmigs med chos thos
438b3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang //'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de ma skye//de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med//slong ba nye bar 'ongs
438b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'//grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang //thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med//yul 'khor skyong byang chub
438b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang /yul 'khor skyong byang chub
438b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la blta bar mi bya ba dang /yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya bo dang /
438b7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas lus dang /srog la blta bar mi bya ste/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o//'di la 'di
439a1(dkon brtsegs): ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta//yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag
439a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul//de dag gang du 'dra bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed//bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri ma bral//
439a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mi thob yid zhum med//'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgra dang tshul 'chos spangs//sems can don phyir brtson 'grus
439a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas//sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin//lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i
439a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa lag rnam spangs te//bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor//lus ni dum bu dum pu bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med//thams cad
439a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid res phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom//yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos
439a7(dkon brtsegs): te/bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang //yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas
439b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyod 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa'
439b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor spyod mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos ste/yul 'khor
439b3(dkon brtsegs): skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so//'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam
439b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di la 'dod byed cing //tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba bslong //de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems//tshul khrimos de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can
439b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor//de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed//de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med//gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong //'di la
439b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong //'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo myed tshul 'chos med//bag yod de dag bsam pa thug pas rab tu sbyor//thos na
439b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed//bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer//skye rga 'chi bras bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa//'a gro ba mgon med
440a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i gtson ra 'dir bltas nas//zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te//srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed//'dus byas
440a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang //dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis//bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgol
440a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes//de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam gdab//yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste//
440a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/bde 'gro thob ste de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba phrad pa dang //bla mo la srid zhu byed de//de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang /bas mtha'i
440a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste de yang rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la myi lta ba dang /spobs pa thob sde de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
440a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o//'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//brten pa nags tshal sul na rtag tu gnas pa ri/
440a7(dkon brtsegs): byed//de dag rtag tu khor mos rnyed pa don gnyer min//chags med blo can rtag tu stobs dang ldan pa yin//zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral//
440b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed//de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor//bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed//rgyal ba'i ye shes
440b2(dkon brtsegs): ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed//grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur//lha mo rnams kyi nang na skye bor phyin pa yin//rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtortag tu sems can 'dzud//
440b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed/sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dga' 'gyur te//de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar 'gyur//de dag byang chub rdul bral dam
440b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas nas//sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grol//yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i
440b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongasu sbyong ba'i chos te/bzhi gang zhe ni/khong khro ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /kha bsag dang thob kyis 'jal ba yongasu spangs te dgon
440b6(dkon brtsegs): por gnas pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang //nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol la ste/yul 'kho
440b7(dkon brtsegs): skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyong ba'i chos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bkar
441a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal to//bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na//tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med//de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin//g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing
441a2(dkon brtsegs): spros sems med//khyim gyi blo gros de yang mya ngan ca//skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba//spangs te de la mi lho rab byung nas//thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed//
441a3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa brten pa na//shes khe 'thob pa kun+da la mi rten zhing //lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la//seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal//byang chub
441a4(dkon brtsegs): lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na//ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing //rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni//'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no//dper na bas
441a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing //seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin//ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton//de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med//g.yang sar
441a6(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas//rab tu thar pa bya phyir 'bad par byed//gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na//bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur//mi mchog spong
441a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag 'dod pa na//'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab ston tshig smra zhing //sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rlom sems med//rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas//stong pa nyid dang
441b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mang lams//'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'//de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu//ci nas byang chub lam ni grub med cing //
441b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni rtag tu bsam pa longasu sbyong //gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na//yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod//byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas//gang
441b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gzhan du gnyer ba de dag 'gyur//gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pas//blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang bskyed//yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa
441b4(dkon brtsegs): ste du bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi bzo zhing g.yo la brten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
441b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sa dang /yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsags gis
441b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur bsti bsgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang so ste/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grwayang sa'o//de nas bcom
441b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'phags pa bla med rnam dang pha ma la//de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin//de dag byas pa mi
442a1(dkon brtsegs): bzo g.yo can te/rtag tu kun du ma bsnams spyod cing rmongs//rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste//de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dgal//
442a2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig tshul khrims brtul shugs ji ltar kyang //'di ni bdagu dang mtshungs pa med ces smra//de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste//glags tshol ba la rtag tu btsun
442a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin//de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'//de dag dge sbyong yon tan shAn du ring //phyi mo'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i//dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring
442a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ru de dag 'tshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang //phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed//byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring //'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin
442a5(dkon brtsegs): tu ring //'phags lam gyu nom rnam par spangs nas ni//de dag 'gro ba lngang ni 'khyam par 'gyur//yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byung
442a6(dkon brtsegs): chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor spyod ma
442a7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed po
442b1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang /yul 'khor skyo pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgrogs byed pa'i chos te/yul
442b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub las bgegs byed pa'i ches so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
442b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol to//ma dang lce lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems//de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro//bzod ldan rtag brtson dgra slong mthong nas ni//gtsug lag khang nas 'tsho
442b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dbyug pas 'jog/pha rol rtswa chod phyir 'di ni phrag dog ste//de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin//glags lta byed zi de 'khrul pa tsho lnga pa ca na//sul 'khrul yod
442b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yi gleng bya snyam//de dgra dA yi bstan pa 'di las ring //de dge yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol//de dge rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nus ni//ngan song shin tu mi zad 'bar
442b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro//de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang //chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas//rtag tu khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor//ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar
442b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur ta re//sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che//bskul pa bye ba mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur//de ltar dal ba dem pa rnyed pa la//gal te tha dod dag med
443a1(dkon brtsegs): rnan/bar gyis//sbrul 'altar spyo gang drug pani po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bskon par mi byA b+hUste//bzhi gang shin+d+ha/rdul 'dza spyod nga chung/
443a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang /yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten pa
443a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang /yul 'khor snong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spyad pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bye ba dang /yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la bdam
443a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i gang zag bsten par mi bye ba ste/yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas brten par mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
443a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//gang dog sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing //gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen byed pa//de dag rtag tu byang chub
443a6(dkon brtsegs): lam la 'phel//dper na mkha' la zla ba yang ngo bzhin//dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang //bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dang //de dag dug phyis bzhin
443a7(dkon brtsegs): du rtag tu spang //gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer//gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos//'dod chags bral ba'i bdud rtsi mthun spong po//de dag
443b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na ngan skyugs rdza bzhin spang //gang zhig byang chub dam pa ma tshang rgya 'dong //zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags//rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed
443b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa//de dgra rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste//de dag me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya//gang zhig bdud ni gi dul bar bya ba dang //'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor
443b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang //de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa//des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya//gang zhig byang chub ngom pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod//de yis rnyed dang
443b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug dang mi sdug dang //grags dang 'tshang 'dra phyag dog nga spangs te//sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya//yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'dri dag ni byang chub sems
443b5(dkon brtsegs): da pa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/bzhi gang zhe na/yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug
443b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan po'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos deng /
443b7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor sbyong mi mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /yul 'khor skyong yongasu ma dag pa'i shes pa dang /bzod pa'i longs
444a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
444a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//gang dgas la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing //
444a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba//de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na//des na do na sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed//yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshul//shes pa ma dag
444a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod//gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la//bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mo 'dud cing //sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa//chos dang tshogs la de ni mos
444a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med//bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la nga mi mos//sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa//de ni mi nad 'di nas shi 'phos nas//las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs//
444a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam//yid btags 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed//gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing //mi'i dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar
444a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa//de yis ngan song lo ma rnams rab spangs te//byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya////bam pa gnyis pa/yul 'khor sbyang bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
444b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du shes
444b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang ye shes dang bral ba dang bag med pa la brten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /phyir
444b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o//de nas bcom
444b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing //rtag tu 'jig rten pa yis bsam gtan bsgom//ltar gyur 'di dag
444b5(dkon brtsegs): gis ni de bcings te/glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin//khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang //gang zhig lag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems//ye shes spangs shing blo gros
444b6(dkon brtsegs): rmongs gyur pa//mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings//gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa 'di dag dang //skye rga na 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod//brnyas par byed dang rlom
444b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bor nas ni//byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur//sdug bsnga la mtha' yas ma lus pa med pa ste//bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas//sdug dang mi sdug gnyen
445a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lus btang //brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur//pha rol phyin drug sa dang yon tan dang /stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor/
445a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur na//'gro ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur//bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyod che//sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du//
445a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang dul dang nges la rtag tu spyad//gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur//bas mtha'i nag su rtag par dge' ba ste//byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyang //
445a4(dkon brtsegs): lom na yang brtson 'grus nyams mo gyung //skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o//srid pa'i btson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas//sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni//
445a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed//'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs//bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing //rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug/pangs
445a6(dkon brtsegs): pe'i srog dang shin tu 'byor po dang //grong khyer nor dadang 'bru rnams mang po btang //me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i//nag su thub pa nga ni bzod dgur
445a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur//su mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa btsod//de tsheng ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur//nags dang su lo na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i//thub pas bla ma rgas pa gsol
445b1(dkon brtsegs): nang du mi yi dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang //ying nI yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur//lags par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nus//lus la ma bltas rab
445b2(dkon brtsegs): tu mchongs par 'gyur//nga ni byang chub mi tshig gi rgyu yi phyir//lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to//stug mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir//lus btang nas ni
445b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyuskrag mo tshim par byas//na mkha' las ni lha'i tshogs rnams kyis//skyes chen brtson 'grus brten pa legs shes bsgrags//gAng tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na//
445b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye gyur tshe//rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni//nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas//rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te//rorjod pa
445b5(dkon brtsegs): grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe//nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya//bsdad par byas pa myur du thar par byas//dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas//nga yis
445b6(dkon brtsegs): pangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te//nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas//de tshe nga ni kun+da sbyin rgyal por gyur//da 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe//skyabs su 'ongs pa'i
445b7(dkon brtsegs): phug ron mthong nas ni//rang gi lus las sha yang bcang byas te//rang lus ngas btang 'dzegs pas phongs ma btang //rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe//sbran pa mcho
446a1(dkon brtsegs): gis nga yi ched du ni//mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang //srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin//'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad
446a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa na//rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe//chung ma ma dris khyo las mi 'phyo ba//bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang //gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes
446a3(dkon brtsegs): byar gyur tshe//nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang //bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas//nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo //rgyal bu gzi brjed dri ma med
446a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur tshe//nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bskul mchod rten bad+mon//mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste//stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas//nga ni rgyal po zla 'od
446a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i tshe//mi bzang mig can khros par gyur nas ni//de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pas na//ngo tshe nga yis mgo po bcad de byin//nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar
446a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur che//grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo//thams cad du yang rgya cher sman gyi rnams//de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go//srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang
446a7(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe//nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na//bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis//lus brgyar stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas//gang tshang sden mi yi rgyal
446b1(dkon brtsegs): po ni//rin chen gtsug pur gyur tshe me tog dang //spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi//cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo //nga sngon rgyal po mos
446b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur pa'i tshe//shing bal 'drab ma 'jam pa lta bu dang //pad+ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i//lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btango //ded dpon seng ge 'dzin
446b3(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa na//snying rje med cing mi bzang rab gtum pa//srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas//rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur//gang tshe mig bzang zhes
446b4(dkon brtsegs): byar gyur pa na//byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa//srin mo dag lA na chung 'du shes pa//tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar bar byas//gang tshe bsnod nams 'od zer gyur
446b5(dkon brtsegs): pA na//lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa//bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su//rgyal ba'i bsten pa la ni rab tu byung //sems can don phyir du ni spyod pa na//
446b6(dkon brtsegs): dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi//rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na//snor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang //rgyalnga po ut+pal mig ces byar byur tshe//pad+ma sngon
446b7(dkon brtsegs): po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig/yid du 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa//'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas//sman pa'i rgyal po sgra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe//sdug dang brel
447a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu nyen pa mthong nas ni//bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa//ngas ni snying rjes yongasu thar pa byas//sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na//
447a2(dkon brtsegs): nad kyis btab pa nad pa'i mi mthong nas//nga yis rang gi khrog kyang byin 'gyur te//mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas//rgyal po me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe//nga yis
447a3(dkon brtsegs): lus las rus pa phyung nas ni//nad kyis rid par gyur la rkang byin te//ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo //rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe//rang gi mdzod rnams
447a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dus btang zhing //phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste//phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar par byas//rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe//byang chub 'dod
447a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir//'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi//lag pa phrugs kyang mi blta rab tu byin//rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe//snying rje ldan zhing
447a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro don phan 'dod do//skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi//gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas//rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe//'jam zhing mnyen la dri med
447a7(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i brla//dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni//rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no//bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe//bud med bkres skom
447b1(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag ngas mthong nas//gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yin//ru ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang //rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na//shin tu nyams dga'
447b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yi rgyan mchog dang //rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhin//btang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang //rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe//rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral
447b3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung //'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do//srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe//grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas//lus kyi dam pa me
447b4(dkon brtsegs): bltas btang bar byas//de che nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med//spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na//rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtog dga' ste//nga ni rim 'gro gus la rab tu dga'//nga rgyal
447b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med//skyabasu 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni//snying rje bskyed pa bya sa nas lus btang ste//gdol ba mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni//spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma
447b6(dkon brtsegs): btang //rgyal po dbang du myur tsho nga yis ni//glang po blo ma rgan dran lus bskams traM//shin tu yid 'ongs zas kyang ngas ma zos//de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur//bgro dka'
447b7(dkon brtsegs): gangs can ri la dreng dbang gyur//nga yis zhag bdun par du bsrungs pa'i mi//de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang //ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med//kha ba kun de 'dra ba'i glang por
448a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur//byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol//dug dang bcas pa'i mnga' yis bsnun kyang ni//mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med//dum bu'i gling
448a2(dkon brtsegs): du nags tshal spyod yul ba//sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe//mthong ba tsam gyis me zhi gyur nas//lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor//ri dgas gyur
448a3(dkon brtsegs): che gang+gA'i rlabs shugs kyis//khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa//de yis gsong phyir nga gan khrod de 'ongs//'on kyang nga ni de la yid ma khros//rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te
448a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon med pa//tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas//bkres pa de dag rnams kyis gsod gyur tshe//rus sbrul skyes gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan//nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa
448a5(dkon brtsegs): na//sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyer gyur tshe//sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste//srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur//srog chags nges par gang che gyu pa na//
448a6(dkon brtsegs): nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni//lus ni spun+da lta bur yang bsgyur byas te//sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas//ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe//
448a7(dkon brtsegs): mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan//mda' yisi bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de//de tshe gsong la nga yis byams pa byas//dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du//
448b1(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngog su gyur pa'i tshe//srin mo'i nang du song ba'i tshong pa rnams//nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral//'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe//'dab chags
448b2(dkon brtsegs): kun lar ni nga gyur tshe//'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangasu nas//bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur//gal ba nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'o ma legaso sbyong ri bong rdzogs gyur de la
448b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan//thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs na//de yi ched du ngas ni gnas kyang btang //sdong pa me tog 'bras rgyas ni tshe'i tshe//sdong po bskams kyang ngas ni de ma btang //
448b4(dkon brtsegs): de tshe brgya byin byas gzo ngas mthong nas//sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas//nga ni spu ya rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe//mi yi rgyal pos klu yis yul bcom ste//spu yi tshogs
448b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa byung mthong nas//rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bstan no//nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir//sA lu blangs tshe mi yos bzung nas ni//no tsa tsaM phyir da yi snga
448b6(dkon brtsegs): lu len//lo tog smin 'di ma rungs byar sems sam//ne tso des smras bzang po gsen du gsol//bad gi rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len//pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/
448b7(dkon brtsegs): de la snying rje bdag gis sA lu blangs//gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'dabs pa yi//'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes//de skad cig smras de ni bdag thos te//des na bdag ni rku ba gzhan
449a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur//na tsa legs sA lu ci dga' khyer//sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon//khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dud 'gro yin//legs khyod ni dul zhing
449a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bsdams//byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ban//sngon chad stod pa de la sogs pa rnams//spyod pa'i tshe na dka' blo brgya la yang //nga yi yid ni skyo bar
449a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa med//nang gi dag gam 'on te phye yang rung //nga yis dngos po mi btang gang yang med//tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang //bsum gtan
449a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang shes rab ngas smad do//sha dang lpags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag dang de dag rang gis lus las sbyin pa byas//bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe//ngas ni
449a5(dkon brtsegs): de chu lus ni bskams par byas//nga la sgyur na rgyalta bar 'gyur ba yi//sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa//sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te//sngon
449a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug/spyod pa'i tshe na dra yis gang bsten pa//brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang //spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams//
449a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyuraro//'di thos gyur nas rdo yi tsha na ni//bsten pa 'di nyid la ni 'phye bar 'gyur//de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len
449b1(dkon brtsegs): cing //rtag tu gnyid don khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur//rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la snang //bstan pa sun par byed cing yon tan nyams//zhi ba'i
449b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thos par gyur pa na//'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer//nga yi slob dben thos pa rgya mtshor gyur//mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin/
449b3(dkon brtsegs): de yis 'di ni rnam po ji ltar yang //sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas//pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi//bla ma de ni dpag med yin
449b4(dkon brtsegs): tan chung //des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis//'di lam 'jug pa 'di ni nor pa yin//gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang //rnam pa ces kyang gang
449b5(dkon brtsegs): thig med bstan pa//tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la//gang 'bad med nga la byed pa don med 'gyur/gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni//'di la bdag
449b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can shed skyes med//gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa//de la bdag gis dral byas don med 'gyur//sdig pa'i bla dang mu stegs ngan
449b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pas//rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste//dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni//tshig 'di gsung bar nam ya ngo mi 'byung //ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem
450a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang //khA ltar spyi rtol chu la rgod btum zhing //phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pa tshig pa yi//dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la
450a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung //lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdo ba byed cing //chos gos grub rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed//chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas//grong
450a3(dkon brtsegs): dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu//de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni//khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo bsten par byed//bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di
450a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs nas//de dag rtag tu phran yig khyer bar byed//de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang //de dag phyugs dang bran mo bran pho bsrel//zhing gi las dang
450a5(dkon brtsegs): tshong gi sbyor ba la//brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin//de dag 'phags min chags kyang mi sgra med//bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med//de
450a6(dkon brtsegs): dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni//dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor dang mtshungs//dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni//de dag la yang mi snyan
450a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod byed de//tshul khrims 'chal pa sla ba zhugs nas ni//bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces brjod//rab tu byung ba de dag bskam pa ltar//khyim pa
450b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod byas bskum pa du lta min//khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang //bu drung bu mo dag kyang yod pad+ma 'gyur//gang gi khyim du do dag chos gas dang //lus
450b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ljongs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba//de yi chung ma las ni yongs rmugs shing //nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min+ti//'dod pa 'di dge basbyin bya
450b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te//dre 'gro yid btags dmyal bar ltung byed ces//de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing //de dag bdag nyid mdul nye ba ni min//dri ltar de dag bdag
450b4(dkon brtsegs): mdul ba//de dge slob mtshogs kyang rab mdzu'i//khe zlas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtamarnams la//de dag nyin dang ma chen du 'bru bar byed//ston pa'i phyir rgyu yin
450b5(dkon brtsegs): tan phyir min te//de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin//'gro bas rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas//rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor//de dag skye ba
450b6(dkon brtsegs): numaso la smra ba ni//bdag gis snying rjes 'di dge sdang byud kyi//slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni//rim g+ho don dru gnyer ba med ces ste//de la na
450b7(dkon brtsegs): non dang ma ji can mang //lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/rtag tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang //'ongs shing lhag pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/
451a1(dkon brtsegs): lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams//de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson//de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min//de dag spangs
451a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs//de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang //'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur//de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste//lugs
451a3(dkon brtsegs): kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra//de dag nag su gnas par gyur kyang ni//sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste//nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs
451a4(dkon brtsegs): la/de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur//de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang //bslabs dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjod nas ni//rgyags
451a5(dkon brtsegs): dang nga rgyal grags pa yongs rgyas te//de dag mi zad mnar med lhung bar 'gyur//de dag rgyal po'i gtam lo rtag dga' zhing //rkun po'i gtam brjod
451a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la'ang rtag tu dga'//nye du brten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste//de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed//bsam gtan dang ni kha don btang nas su//rtag
451a7(dkon brtsegs): tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson//gnas la bskam zhing khre gnyer 'byin par byed//de dge slob ma 'khor kyang mdul ba//nga ni gtsug lag khang gi
451b1(dkon brtsegs): lag gi grwa/bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te//dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa//gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do//gang dag tshul khrims/
451b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing yon tan ldan//chos 'dzin skye ba'i don lnga mngon brtson lnga//dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa//de dag rnams ni sdug par mi byed do//'di ni
451b3(dkon brtsegs): de yi gnas bskos pa ste//'di ni ngo yi lhan gcig gnas pa yin//'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin//khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song //'dir ni dge
451b4(dkon brtsegs): slong dag kyang mang bkod de//mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la//'di ni rnyed par 'byung ba yod ma yin//'dir ni ci zhig spyod kyis dge slong song //de dag la ni
451b5(dkon brtsegs): mAl stan bgo bya ba//nam du srid par 'byung ba ma yin te//de dag khyim pa lta bu sogs 'gyur zhing //'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur//
451b6(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag/kun tu smad pa byas par gyur pa ni//de dag nga yi tshig ni dran 'gyur te//bas mtha' dag dang nagasu de tshe gnas//kye hud rnyed pas
451b7(dkon brtsegs): zil non yon tan sdang //dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa//rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur//phyi dus
452a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/rtag par yongasu brnyas par 'gyur ba ste//de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams//spangs nas dgon
452a2(dkon brtsegs): pab nag su gnas par 'gyur//'byed dang zug zer 'thab mo dga' ba dang //yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed//de dag skye bo'i ston par grags gyur te/
452a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur//'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter//yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba//'di ni tshul khrims nyams
452a4(dkon brtsegs): dang phrag dog dang //rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur//ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas bum pa dang //bud+d+ha'i rdzing bu yongasu bskums pa dang /
452a5(dkon brtsegs): rin tshun mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar//phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur//phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos//rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin
452a6(dkon brtsegs): tu mi bzang tshe//dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba//de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin//spyod pa 'di la rten par dga' ba rnams//de dag bzang 'gro ga
452a7(dkon brtsegs): la yod de ring //'di nas shi 'phos yid btags 'gro ba dang //dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas//lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa//
452b1(dkon brtsegs): mi bzang drag po nyams pa dang bar 'gyur//ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang //rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur//sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di dag rtag brten pa//
452b2(dkon brtsegs): long ba 'am 'o na bya 'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur//lus la rtag tu she bkra 'byung bar 'gyur//'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong ni 'jigs par 'gyur//
452b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten pa no//de dag su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te//de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing //de ni rtag tu smra 'bab par yang 'gyur//
452b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs//mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bskrun//bkres dang sgom pa'i 'jigs pas yongasu gdungs//yang
452b5(dkon brtsegs): nA de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas//sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni//nges pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod bor ba//legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par
452b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis//'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re//gang zhig sangs rgyas tshogs dang 'phags tshogs dang //bslab dang sbyang ba'i chos lo dga' gyur pa//gnyen
452b7(dkon brtsegs): da rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la//de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis//'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang //'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta
453a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang //sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing //'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la//pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la//rtag tu
453a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyi sa//ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa//de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams ma bya sa//gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang
453a3(dkon brtsegs): po'o////yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur to//mi brtson pa dag la mchod por 'gyur//
453a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa drag la mchod par 'gyur//mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur//zang zing la dga' bar
453a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing //chags pa mang ba dang /khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /g.yo dang ldan pa dang /bya khA ltar mu cor smra ba dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /nye du lhur len
453a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//phun tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa bAsgrub par 'gyur/rnyed pa yongasu bAtsal ba'i phyir/de dag grong du 'jug gi sems can yongasu smin par bya
453a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ma yin/sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur//de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang dge ba'i
453b1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur/ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/snod chag pa
453b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'gyur//gcig le gcig 'khrul pa dang /sbyor ba nyams pa dang /mi shes pa dang /la lo can dang /phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas ye shes
453b3(dkon brtsegs): la mi rtog pa mang ba dang /rang dgar byed pa dang /shar gnyer ba dam pa dang /gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang /rigs ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan//
453b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lnga spyod par 'gyur/yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang /chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur//mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnam su skye ba
453b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur//de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//de dag la nyes pa bshags pa
453b6(dkon brtsegs): yang med par 'gyur na/ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dwagos de dag gis sangs rgyu kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag
453b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyongango zhes bdag nyid khos 'che bar 'gyur te/yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de da gA la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na sangs rgyas kyi
454a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes lta ga la zhig/de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la
454a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/brgyad gang zhe na/ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang /dbul po'i
454a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim du skye ba dang /rigs dma' bar skye ba dang /modo gi ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang /sdig po'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /nang mang ba dang /yang ba ma
454a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni/byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yul 'khor
454a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed tshig gis khas 'tsho ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o//tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o//g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes pa
454a6(dkon brtsegs): mi smra'o//zung zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o//mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongasu dag pa zhes pa mi smra'o//shes rab
454a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes pa mi smra'o//ser sna can la bsam pa yongasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o//mi brtson pa mang ba la gzung sa thob ces nga mi
454b1(dkon brtsegs): smra'o//yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongasu tshol ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o//khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongasu dag pa zhes de mi smra'o//skyong
454b2(dkon brtsegs): lam bcos mA can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes bya mi smra'o//khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag po zhes nga myi smra'o//ma gus pa la sems yongasu
454b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o//tshod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o//lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongasu tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o//
454b4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar dwa mi spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni gzhan du smra ba la gzhan du byed
454b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag dka' stsal to//yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing
454b6(dkon brtsegs): khengs pa can//ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che//nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas//de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring //chags pas
454b7(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non na le lo 'phel//le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams//dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams//tshul khrims 'chal par gyur na bzang 'gro
455a1(dkon brtsegs): nyams//dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur to//mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las 'grol bar gyur//de dag gsor b+h+yo khyur ni bauR+Sha nas//
455a2(dkon brtsegs): gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs//rnyed pa don du gnyir bas dgon par 'gro//der song nas kyang gos dang nyi du tshol//mngon shes rig dang stobs pa phun
455a3(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs//bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin//rmong sa nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa//mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang //dma' ba'i rigs su
455a4(dkon brtsegs): skye dang long ba dang //mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin//de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos//bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams//g.yangs
455a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi bzad lhung bar 'gyur//de nas skal ba bye bar thar pa med//gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na//dri phyir lhas sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob//
455a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni b+ha ltung ltar//chags pas kyang ni mi ltar mi rig so//bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung mi chags//tshul khrims ma dag
455a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba rnams las nyams//byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob//de dag bstan la mi dgos ngur shing bzhin//byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos
455b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul ba//dper nu thar pa de bzhin ma gnas//de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam bcas ltar//nga rgyal zil non byang chub da 'dra'o//byang chub don du gnyer bas chos
