455b3(dkon brtsegs): chang logs par bshad don phyir//g.yang sna chen po me lce 'bar ltar mchongs//de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa//thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan

455b5(dkon brtsegs): me dang mtshungs//yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs meng pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs

456a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //yul 'khor

456a7(dkon brtsegs): stong byung bar gyur to//rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du rin po che sna bdun gter mi bcu'i ched tsam byung bar gyur te/yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams

456b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smad//nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing //legs sdom dga' la ser sna byed pa dang //sems can kun la snying rje byams

457a3(dkon brtsegs): dang nor bu mu tig dang //bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang //byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du ga/nyer//rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna ba ste//slong ba rnams la

460b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba mdzes pa blta ni sdug pa sha stag go/thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa/rol mo'i sgro mkhas pa gar mkhas pa/rgod mkhas pa

461a1(dkon brtsegs): ga ta cang yang mi ring ba/ha cang yang myi thung bag/hA cang mi skyem pa/ha cang yang mi snom pA/hacang yang mi dkar ba ha cang yang ma stog kha nas

461a4(dkon brtsegs): nyanos par byed pa byung ste/blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed//de de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na bsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na/ngo mtshar gyi sems myi bskyed pa de

461a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to//lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang /bdag nam zhig na bag yod

462a1(dkon brtsegs): ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dud//de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan//glu dbyangs pheg
462a2(dkon brtsegs): rdor dus kyi rnam par nges po shes//khyod dga' dus lnga dang bab mya ngan+da ma byed cig/pad+ma rnyings pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman//me tog 'bras bu yal grwa 'dab

462a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra//rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba//gser dril g.yer ka ta lnga'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa//zab cing brtan pa ma chog gi

463a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gcad don mi gnyer//khrag dang gtson dang mi gtsang ba dang d+hI ma 'dzag/gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar brar+g+ha//

464a3(dkon brtsegs): bo yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bur bgyi//rgyal po bdag ni dwe dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te//bdug ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la sgron ma mchis//byang chub don

466b3(dkon brtsegs): g+hanas nyes dmigs spyong ba dang /de ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa yang ba dang /ji skar mkhas pa rnams kyis pag med pa spyod pa dang /ji myur ma rig pa'i rgyun nug mongs po dang /

467a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pa ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par skyong bar mi nus na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
467a4(dkon brtsegs): bar sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo//de yang 'di snyam du sems te/bdag sgo nas byang na ni nye du'i tshogs kyi bar chad bya su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas

467a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs te/khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/de bzhin gshegs pa de

467b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa brkyang ste/'od phyung nas 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go//'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i phang lo tsam byung

467b3(dkon brtsegs): spyo de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
467b4(dkon brtsegs): don grub blo de ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin
467b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul po dang /bzhin nu de sdong bu bcad pa skyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/de bzhin gshegs
467b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dwe la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshalo//yul 'khor skyod de nas rgyal bu gzhon no bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo
467b7(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa//bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas gdod//tshogs chen sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnye do//ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas no//
468a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol//'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni//mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te//thos nas skye
468a2(dkon brtsegs): ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na//mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu//lam mnyam pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ljongasu par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig/dad pa'i 'byung
468a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan//g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod//mgon po bcings pa bdag ni dang grol mdzod//
468a4(dkon brtsegs): som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol//byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston//chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol//mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol/
468a5(dkon brtsegs): rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol//sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug du phyung //khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod//srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du
468a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol//yan lag brgyad pa'i ldem gyi lam chen gyis//mya ngan chu chen pha rol bskul du gsol//srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung //dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste/
468a7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub//bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed gcig nges gsungs//byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur//ji ltar byang chub spyod
468b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog spyad na//'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las mthar 'gyur ba//'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston//yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal
468b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bston no//rgyal bu bzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
468b3(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob po//mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste//de nas mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/de bzhin
468b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de la gtor mngon par gtor to//yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
468b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad du mngon par bstod pa/mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal//gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshalo//rdul bral khyod
468b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis//mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang //khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni ra rgyal bzhin//
468b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis//thub pa khyod ni smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes//kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar//thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di
469a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa//spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra//rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tsha lo//ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba//de yis
469a2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs//chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid//'jam snu mo gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshalo//tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang /
469a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba//'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid//bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo//rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs
469a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis//'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid//'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du rAg/oM na'i byon pa mnyam med bcom
469a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das//glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs//bcom ldan gany+dza shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs//sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzod//bcom ldan 'das
469a6(dkon brtsegs): sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste//khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra//'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas doms mi 'gyur//khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs
469a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan//khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad//khyad gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes//sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan//mchog tu thugs
469b1(dkon brtsegs): rdonA la phyag 'tshal//ltung ni rgyun dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgas//khyod na pand dang brdzun 'grus dgyes rab btan//khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'drag po mngag/mnus
469b2(dkon brtsegs): med yaM shrIs mnga' la phyug 'tshal//khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dzams//khyod ni seng gI lta bar 'khor du sgrogs//khyod ni snyan pa'i rgyal ba d+hi gsum sa la//mchog
469b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo//thob pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos//khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing ka'i skad//srid gsum
469b4(dkon brtsegs): rol gshegs la phyag 'tsha'o//khyed kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma ste zla dang //gar la lci dang rmyi lam 'dra ba dang //bdag med sems can mod cing srog 'gro med//chos rnams
469b5(dkon brtsegs): smyig tu rgyun 'dra bar mkhyen// po ni bya skye ba med pa'i tshul//mi shes pas ni 'am par 'khyams gyun te//thugs thags rje la rigs pa brgya dag gis//dadan
469b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad po lags//'dod chags la sogs nod mang brgya dag gis//skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro lce tog gzigs te//bi ra gshegs sems can po rgyu dag
469b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'grel cing //bla med sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu//skye dang na dang 'tsho dang mya ngan na na//sdug dang bral dang smre sdigs 'don pa brgyas//rtag tun pa'i sdug bsngal gzigs
470a1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni//thub pa thugs rjes yongasu 'grol cing rgyu//dud 'gro yid btags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su//'gro kun shing rta'i phang lo bzhin du 'khor///
470a2(dkon brtsegs): glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis//de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad//gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa//'phags lam de nyid gang
470a3(dkon brtsegs): dge sngon chad kyi//chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs//'jam zhing mnyan la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/tshangs las
470a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa//dri za mi tsi lha yi bu mo mchog/sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsungs pa mdzad//bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis//yongs
470a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs yon tran mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung //de thos sems can khra ga khrig phrag brgya dag/theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid//khyod la mchod pas lha'i
470a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bas ni//rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob//mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa//phyug cing nor che 'byer pa chen por 'gyur//mtshungs med khyod la dang
470a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed pa ni//gling bzhi bdag po 'khor lo bsgyur ba mchog/'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed pa//rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur//rgyal ba khyod la
470b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bgyis pas ni//tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag pa dang //yongasu dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang //gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur//
470b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa//mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang //thos pa 'ang da ltar 'bras bu ma chis lags te//gnas mchog rga
470b3(dkon brtsegs): shi myed pa 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa//'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni grags
470b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam//bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'grod//bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i//bsod nams bgyid pa rtag tu mi bas te//byang chub dam pa ma
470b5(dkon brtsegs): thob bar du ni//bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur//gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa//yongs su dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur//dam pa'i zhing du lus
470b6(dkon brtsegs): dang drag yid kyis//sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur//rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs//yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur//mtho ris thar pa
470b7(dkon brtsegs): mi yi bde ba dang //'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur//khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po//phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis//rgyal ba khyod
471a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba ni//bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs//rims nang bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa//mthong na dpa' ba thugs rje
471a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa//bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dges pa//mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas//mngon par shes pa
471a3(dkon brtsegs): lha thob mkha' la gnas//dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te//dri mod chos ni 'gro la rnam par 'byed//lho dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs/
471a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas//bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des//'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par sh+log/yul 'khor skyod de nas mtshan mo del
471a5(dkon brtsegs): nam nangs pa dang //rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi'i khor du ba'i sgra thos so//thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga'
471a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ga la bya der song ste/phyin nas 'di skad ces smras//khyed ci'i phyir du/de dag gis smras pa/rgyal bu gzhon nu bi sod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o//
471a7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa skyel ba ltar sa la 'gyol te/langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsa'o//
471b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'ang skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la
471b2(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logasu song ngo //yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i
471b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
471b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'odas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
471b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod po//srid gsum khyod
471b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis//sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos 'gyur//skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur//yon tan ye
471b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rgya mtsho dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/lha jo bo rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongasu dag/rgyal po sdug cing 'jam
472a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gsar pa khwa dag 'ang//blta sdug gzugs mdur thub pa'i skul phyug+sas rna'o//bskul pa bye brgya byas ma gyis m+b+ha khyab brtul shugs spyad//
472a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba brgya mAng sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad//sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya brag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad//des na khyod sra 'azang zhing shin tu mdzes pa la gas/
472a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang shes rab dang //bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs//khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal
472a4(dkon brtsegs): mi lagaste//rgyu shel nor bu zlog gi khyod kyang mdzes ma lags//'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs cad ston//chu na 'dra nod sgyu ma 'dre bar goda' ba lags//
472a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi phyogs rnams kun du rgyal ba'i sku yang dgal//bde ga shegs rnams ni sgyu'o tshad ni mnga' mi lags//khyod ni dga' ldani 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs pa
472a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la//'chi 'pho marjod cing rab dga' glang por gyu nas ni//dpa' bo yum kyi lhum su gshegs par ganga' ba mdzad//thub chen namakhwa'i lca bur thams cad
472a7(dkon brtsegs): ces su zhugs//bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa 'ang mdzad pa ste//sa 'ga'i dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzod//nga na lha mir bcas 'gro na
472b1(dkon brtsegs): gtso shin tu lha//'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang byung //thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang //yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag
472b2(dkon brtsegs): na gda'//bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brgyas gyur kyang //kho cig tu ni bud med nang nu zhugs par gda'//yab dang yum dang srasA dang bud med rnams kyang
472b3(dkon brtsegs): btang //gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du//sems can dam pa bye ba brgyu las yongs bskor nas//nags gnas gnas cig phu nas 'byung bar gda'
472b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang mdzad//khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang //zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad//sngon chad 'khor los bsam gyis mi khyab
472b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor gyur kyang //khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad//rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//mya ngan zlas zhes 'khor gyi nang
472b6(dkon brtsegs): du tshig tu gsungs//rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni//khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung //khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes
472b7(dkon brtsegs): rab thabs mtshungs med//thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mad rgyas par 'gengs//phyogs rnams dag no mkhyen pa khyod kyis bsngags pa gsung //kun tu spyod yul thub
473a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshalo//chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshalo//sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang //thub pa khyod ni
473a2(dkon brtsegs): gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags//sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshalo//'gro ba'i don du glang gis ni byang chub mchog thob pa//lam+ba mchog
473a3(dkon brtsegs): myi yi da pa' bo khyod kyis legs gsung pa//bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas//mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi//mi yi dga'
473a4(dkon brtsegs): bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba//srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/bdag gis 'dir bstong bsod nams mtha' yas gang sgrubs des//
473a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa 'i bsam
473a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang reg par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan to//yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal
473a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer
473b1(dkon brtsegs): dudang gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur
473b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gnang ngo //yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis pha ma de gnyis dang grogs po de dag dang bud med de dag la smras pa/khyed cag thams
473b3(dkon brtsegs): cangad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shog/ci nas grong khyer dga'i mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu
473b4(dkon brtsegs): rte su yi rang ngo //yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phu'o//
473b5(dkon brtsegs): ro bri ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to//dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis
473b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chag sa bsham pa'i steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub
473b7(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa/me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ras btsocos pu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/dge slong re re la gos kha na ma
474a1(dkon brtsegs): thob med pa gang yin pa de/phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dpa gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byaso//de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du
474a2(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/bdag la dga' ba ma byas/sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yo de la mo byas//bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam
474a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par mo gyur/rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/lus dang srog la yang
474a4(dkon brtsegs): mi lta na dngos po gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs po de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la
474a5(dkon brtsegs): lan gnyi su ma zhuso//bar skabs der khrus ma byas mar dang 'dru mar gyis lus la ma bskus rkang pa ma bkrus ngal ba'i 'du shes mu bskyed do//zan za ba dang bshang
474a6(dkon brtsegs): gci byed pa mgo togs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to//gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/can da na dmar po'i zhugs
474a7(dkon brtsegs): la bzhin pa byas so//gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang /phreng
474b1(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad dang /spos thams cad dang /rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsogs te/phyis mchod
474b2(dkon brtsegs): rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so//ma chod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yog so//mu ti ga gi dra ba'i bla re dag briso//mchod rten
474b3(dkon brtsegs): re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phulo//mchod rten de dag thams cad la yang sil sman brgya stong phu lo//'dzam bu'i gling khor yug tu me tog gi
474b4(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa bskrun to//mchod rten re re la yeng ma re me'i rdzi bo brgya stong las mar me bus so//mar me'i rdzi po re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mAr drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong
474b5(dkon brtsegs): gi mar me buso//spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byaso//tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu byung ngo //de rab
474b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag du bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /rtag tu tsog bu ba sbyin nam yang glos ma phab po//nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid
474b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis non par ma gyur to//de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin po byin te/de gzhan la tha na leg so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar
475a1(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur na/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti lta smyos kyang ci dgos/de chos nyan pa 'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to//de la lha rnams kyang bskon//
475a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed do//yul 'khor gyi mi thams cung dang /btsun mo'i khor dang /nang mi thams cad dang /grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rje su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo //
475a3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjesu slob pa'i yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung
475a4(dkon brtsegs): gis/bdag cag gis de la rim sgro dang bsnyen bkur byas na//dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyu ro snyam mo//de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las
475a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongasu bzung ngo //tshul 'di lta bus
475a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi lnga rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byaso//yul 'khor spyod de'i tshe de'i dus rgyu rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur
475a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgazhan nog yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar ngogs shing ji tsam za'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa
475b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to//yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
475b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom zla 'amo yid gnyis su gyur nA khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
475b3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to//grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to//yul 'khor skyod de lta bas na byang chub sems dbu'
475b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa dang /sdug pa dang mi
475b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa yongasu spangs pa dang /bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rje su brlab par bya'o//ngas bye dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa
475b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo//de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshogasu bcad pa lhur len pa dang /shes kyi khe la chags pa dang /nga rgyal
475b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom pa dang /'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang pa dang /'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang /rab tu byung ba don med pa dang /dge sbyong sun par byed pa
476a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub sems dpa'ang su rgod dang /lus dang ngagra dang sems mi ngang ba dang /lhas lta ba dang /khas 'che ba nor ba dang /rang ngam san+d+has pa bas nyam
476a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gos dang zas deng mal chu dben pa'i ched kyi sman dang /yo byad kyi mtshan ma chags pa dang ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /khrel med pa dang /cho ga nyams pa dang /dam pa'i
476a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin pa 'jug pa dang /spyod yul dang bral ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
476a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to//yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos na sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang //
476a5(dkon brtsegs): mi bsten par shes par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na//snying ni thob
476a6(dkon brtsegs): dang shes kyi khe la skyong //byang chub yon tan rgyas khebs byor nas ni/de dag thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dgal//khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mo sa blo bral//shes gyi khe phyir
476a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dbang du song //nyon mongs rag lus sring pa'i 'gro bar gzhol//bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra//lus ni dgon na drangan pa grong khyer du//thob phyir de dog
476b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pas sbyong //gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste//de 'dra'i de dgra sbrul lhur ring du srang //de dag sangs rgyas chos dang rje bzhin du//dge 'dun yon tan gyis gang dga'
476b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song //sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro ba khyams//nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas//yang dag lhag pa'i bsam
476b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsgrub pas 'di la sbyor//bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnying dka' dal rnyed kyis//de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid ston pa 'dir brtson gyis//gang zhig theg mchog byang chub
476b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i tshang rgyar 'dong //de yi rgyal po de yi yon tan 'dra bar bya//bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya//de ltar bang bshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags
476b5(dkon brtsegs): meng 'grub//yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten//rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya//bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'ang ma spangs shig/
476b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa lta bur 'gro ba sngar ni 'khyams sa re//'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya//der gnas nas ni bdag mi skas shing gzhan mi spang //sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba
476b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya mnyes ma byas//rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la sbyong //lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya//gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par
477a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi//da yis mdo 'dir bsgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnus na//de dag rnams kyi phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dga'//gang dag
477a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa//thos nas phyir zhing yid ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs//de lta bas ni bstun la mos pa bskyed
477a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya//rnam par rgyu ba'i tshun phyis 'gyod g+hur+yA tA raM//yul 'khor spyod byung chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la
477a4(dkon brtsegs): yang gang zhig bdag 'di la brlab bo//bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyiskye bskyob na
477a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi phung po'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i ga na na pa brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/stong gi cha dang /brgya stong gi cha dang /bye ba
477a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gi cha dang /grang sde dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe drang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon
477a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
477b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnam su la sa sems rnam
477b2(dkon brtsegs): par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags//
477b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to//yul 'khor skyong
477b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig/skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang /byang chub
477b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
477b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid
477b7(dkon brtsegs): rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstong ngo //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
478a1(dkon brtsegs): lce'u spyong phrag brgya pa las yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i lo'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa bcoM brgyud pa rdzogs//
478a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gur gyi mkhan po 'dzini mi tra dang /da na shI la dang mu nai war ma dngazhu chen gyi m-i ts+tsha ba bya ni de ye shes sdes bsgyur
478a3(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus te/skad gas re ched kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//shA lo ka stong pa ma po gsum dang shu lo go
